item.text: @#/ /rgyud 'bum nga ba bzhugs so/ /
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ he badzra tan+t+ra rA dzA nA ma/ bod skad du/ kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po/ kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po/ rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rje btsun gsang ba las shin tu ches gsang ba'ang de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ e ma'o byang chub
sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po snying rje chen po legs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sems dpa' chen po dang / dam tshig sems dpa' chen po dang snying po
kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba nyon cig /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ gang phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags/ /ji ltar sems dpa' chen po lags/ /gang gis dam tshig sems dpa'
lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rdo rje mi phyed ces byar brjod/ /sems dpa' srid pa gsum gcig pa/ /'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'

zhes byar brjod/ /ye shes chen po'i ros gang ba/ /sems dpa' chen por brjod par bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig la spyod phyir/ /dam tshig sems dpar brjod par bya/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ ming bsdus pa ni ji lta bu/ /gang zhig kye yi rdo

rje lags/ /he yi rnam pas ci zhig bshad/ /badzra yis kyang de bzhin ci/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /he ni snying rje chen po nyid/ /badzra'ang shes rab brjod par bya/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud/ /de ni nga yis bshad kyis

nyon/ /lta stangs dgug dang brda chen dang / /don byed rnam mang brjod pa dang / /rengs par byed dang skrod pa nyid/ /sde rengs byed dang mngon spyod dang / /ji ltar rigs pa rnal 'byor ma'i/ /bskyed dang gnas dang byed rgyu dang / /don byed ye shes rnam

shes dang / /lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba'o/ /he ru ka ni bskyed pa'i rgyu/ /dang por gcig ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje snying po snying rje che/ /dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing / /dngos po'i 'ching bas 'ching bar 'gyur/ /de yongs shes pas grol ba yin/ /dngos

po med par yongs shes pas/ /dngos po bsgom 'gyur shes rab can/ /dngos po med pa yongs shes pas/ /de ltar he ru ka bsgom bya/ /lus la ye shes chen po gnas/ /rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/ /dngos po kun la khyab pa po/ /lus gnas

lus las ma skyes pa'o/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lus la rtsa du lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsa rnams ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ byang chub kyi sems sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab pa bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'dzag pa'o/ /

de rnams kyi nang nas rtsa rnam pa gsum ni gtso mo ste/ dang / ro ma dang / kun 'dar ma'o/ /shes rab rang bzhin gyis/ /thabs kyis ro ma yang dag gnas/ /kun 'dar ma ni dbus gnas su/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /mi bskyod

'bab pa ste/ /ro ma de bzhin khrag 'bab cing / /shes rab zla ba 'bab bshad pa/ /de ni kun 'dar mar rab grags/ /mi phyed ma dang / phra gzugs ma dang / rtse ba ma dang / g.yon pa ma dang / thung ngu ma dang / rus sbal skyes ma dang / sgom pa ma dang / dbang ma dang / skyon ma dang / 'jug

ma dang / ma mo dang / mtshan mo dang / bsil sbyin ma dang / tsha ba ma dang / dang / kun 'dar ma dang / ro ma dang / gzhol ma dang / rangs ma dang / shin tu gzugs can ma dang / spyi ma dang / rgyu sbyin ma dang / sbyor bral ma dang / sdug gu ma dang / grub ma dang / 'tshe

ma dang / de bzhin du yid ma dang / sum skor ma dang / 'dod ma dang / khyim ma dang / gtum mo dang / bdud dral ma'o/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di rnams ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /

srid gsum yongs gyur thams cad ni/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /yang na thabs ni thams cad kyis/ /dngos po'i mtshan nyid du ni brtag /sdom pa'i dbye ba'ang bshad par bya ste/ A li dang kA li ni zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / shes rab dang / thabs so/ /chos dang /

longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs so/ /e ba~M ma yA ni/ e yi rnam pas lha mo spyan/ /ba~M gi rnam pas bdag mar brjod/ /ma ni lha mo gos dkar mo/ /ya rnam pas sgrol mar brjod/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo la pad+ma 'dab ma drug cu rtsa

bzhi dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo la 'dab ma brgyad dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la 'dab ma bcu drug dang / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /'khor lo'i grangs kyi rim pas rnam par gzhag pa/ skad cig ma bzhi ni

rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rnam par smin pa dang rnam par nyed pa dang / /mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mo/ /de kho na nyid bzhi ni/ bdag gi de kho na nyid dang / sngags kyi de kho na nyid dang

lha'i de kho na nyid dang / ye shes kyi de kho na nyid do/ /dga' ba bzhi ni/ /dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o/ /sde pa bzhi ni gnas brtan pa dang / thams cad yod par smra ba dang / kun gyis bkur ba dang /

dge 'dun phal chen no/ /zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / A li dang / kA li dang / 'pho ba bcu drug dang / dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / thun tshod bzhi ste/ de ltar thams cad bzhi bzhi'o/ /lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa lnga bsregs shing / /spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs te/ /bsregs pas ri bong can ha~M 'dzag /rdo rje rigs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// //sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+har+m+mA NA~M Ad+ya nut+pan+na twAta oM AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ 'byung po thams

cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ /bU~M A~M dzri~M kha~M hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bon no/ /oM de ba pi tsu badzra hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ kye'i rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /sngags thams cad kyi rkang pa dang por gyi rnam pa dang / mthar ni swA hA dang / hU~M phaT kyi rnam pa ni nang du gzhug go/ /

oM a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha swA hA/ grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags so/ /a A i I u U r-i r-I l-i l-I e ai o au aM aH/ rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sa bon no/ /oM trai lo kyA k+She pa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ phyag gnyis pa'i'o/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ phyag bzhi pa'i'o/ /

oM ki Ti ki Ti badzra hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ phyag drug pa'i'o/ /oM AHhU~M/ sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /oM ra k+Sha ra k+Sha hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ sa sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /oM hUM swA hA/ rengs par byed pa'o/ /oM a~M swA hA/ dbang du byed pa'o/ /oM khaM swA hA/

skrod par byed pa'i 'o/ /oM dzrI swA hA/ sdang bar byed pa'o/ /oM buM swA hA/ mngon spyod kyi'o/ /oM hUM swA hA/ 'gugs par byed pa'i'o/ /oM g+huHswA hA/ gsod par byed pa'i'o/ /oM ku ru kul+le hrIHswA hA/ ku ru kul+le'i sngags so/ /AHphuH'i rnam pas mtha' yas

kyi gzugs brnyan byas la bdud rtsi lngas ni blugs/ me tog nag pos ni mchod/ klu 'dul bar byed pa'i khu bas ni byugs/ glang po che'i chang gis ni mgo bo byugs/ kham phor kha sbyor du ni bzhag /ba nag mo'i 'o mas ni dgang / gzhon nu ma nag mos bkal ba'i skud

pas ni dkri/ /rlung gi phyogs su rdzing bu byas te mtha' yas der bzhag go/ /de'i 'gram du dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya ste/ dur khrod kyi sol bas ni rdul tshon nag po/ skyes pa'i rus pa'i phye mas ni rdul tshon dkar po/ ldong ros kyis ni rdul tshon ser po/ dur khrod kyi so

phag gis ni rdul tshon dmar po/ rkun ma'i lo ma dang / skyes pa'i rus pa'i bye ma dag gis ni rdul tshon ljang gu ste/ rdul tshon 'di rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bzhengs so/ /dur khrod kyi srad bus thig gdab cing dkyil 'khor khru gsum pa bya ste/ de'i dbus su mtha' yas mnan pa'i

kye'i rdo rje zhal brgyad pa/ zhabs bzhi pa/ phyag bcu drug gis brgyan pa/ spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhis phye pa/ 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par mdzad pa bri'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis nang gi ma rungs pa'i sems kyis dben pa'i gnas su sngags bzla ste/ oM g+hu ru g+hu ru g+hu Tu g+hu Tu/ ma

sa ma sa g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ g+ho Ta ya g+ho Ta ya/ a nan ta k+Sho b+ha ka rA ye nA gA d+hi pa ta ye he he ru ru kaM sab+ta pA tA la/ ga tA na nA ga A kar Sha ya/ bar Sha ya/ gar+dz+dza ya/ tar+dz+dza ya/ phuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHhU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ gal te char mi 'bab na de'i tshe sngags 'di bzlog la bzlas

te char 'bab bo/ /gal te mi 'bab na/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa ltar 'gas so/ /char 'bab pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o/ /sprin dral ba bshad de dur khrod kyi ras la nye bar 'dug nas sngags bzlas shing dral te/ oM Ar+yA sh+ma shA na pri yA ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ sprin

dral ba'i cho ga'o/ /pha rol gyi sde rnam par gzhig par bya ba'i phyir kha Ti kA'i bsgrub pa bshad de/ kha Ti kA dang bdud rtsi lnga dang / ku ThA rats+tshani na dang lhan cig btags la ril bu bya ste/ sngags ni/ oM badzra karta ri he badzrA ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ dngos grub kyi don du bye ba bzlas shing

sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas te/ de bsgrubs la ril ba spyi blugs kyi mgrin par bskor zhing bskor nas bcag na dgra thams cad kyi mgo med par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje gri gug gi cho ga'o/ /lha rnams dgas par 'dod pas thig le bsgrub ste tshangs pa'i sa bon rgyal la bsgrubs nas/ ku ThA

rats+tshi nan dang bsres la nyi ma gzas zin pa na mi bskyod pa dang btag cing btags nas dgra sta bya ste/ de rkang pas mnan nas sngags bzlas te/ oM badzra ku ThAr pA Ta ya pA Ta ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ bye ba bzlas la thig le byas te gang la phyag byas pa de 'gas so/ /lha dgas pa'i

cho ga'o/ /tsha bas gdung bar bya bar 'dod pas ar+k+ka'i lo ma la dug dang ske tshe dang tsi tra ka'i khu bas dgra bo'i ming phri zhing 'bras phub kyi me la gdungs te sngags khri bzlas so/ /oM he badzra dz+wA ra dz+wA ra sha tUM b+h+ru~M hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ tsha ba'i cho ga'o/ /khri bzlas pas 'grub bo/ /chang skyug

par bya bar 'dod pas bsgrub bya'i lte bar yaM gi rnam par bsgom zhing maM gi rnam par gyur pa las chang lto bar rnam par bsgoms te skyugs par byed par bltas na chang skyug go/ /rab tu myos ma dbang du bya bar 'dod pas mya ngan med pa'i brgyad la mya ngan med pa'i 'og tu song ste gos dmar po bgos

nas myos byed kyi 'bras bu bza' zhing / kA kA ma tsi kA'i khu bas thig le byas nas sngags bzlas te/ oM a mu kI me hrIH/ ba sI b+ha ba tu swA hA/ khri yis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba dang nyi ma dbang du bya bar 'dod pas sA lu btags pa'i 'gyur ba la zla ba dang nyi ma byas nas rdo rje'i chu la

gzhug cing sngags bzlas te/ oM badzra arkaka mA tsa la mA tsa la tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha he badzrA ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ bye ba phrag bdun bzlas te nyi ma dang zla ba dag yang dag par gnas shing nyin mtshan bye brag med par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba dang nyi ma rnam par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o/ /oM na grA na grA

zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis dus ma yin pa'i dus su don bsgrub pa'i phyir gzhon nu ma'i mig dag la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod cing snyan gsan dbab bo/ /bcu bzhi pa'am brgyad pa'i snga ba'i dus su

bum pa la sogs pa gzhag cing 'bru mar dang a lak+ta'i khu ba la sngags 'di nyid kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags so/ /de nas mngon par bsngags pa'i a lak+ta'i khu bas sngags pa'i mthe bong rgan po la bskus nas 'bru mar gyis kyang blugs la gzhon nu ma la bstan te

nga'i rdzas sus khyer smos de la des smras pa/ che ge mo zhes bya bas khyer ro/ /rdo rje skar ma'o/ /be Tu yA be Tu yA zhes brjod na glang po che 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /mam+mA mam+mA zhes brjod na stag 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /te l+li yA te l+li yA zhes brjod na bse 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /i li mi

li phuHphuHzhes brjod na sbrul 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /nor skyong 'dul ba'i phyag gis lag pa rab tu bstan na khyi 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje ma dang / dkar mo dang / chu ma dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / bdag med ma dang / sa spyod ma dang / mkha' spyod ma'i rnal 'byor las rengs

par byed pa la sogs pa brtul zhugs can gyis byed do/ /sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas lha'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dang por byams pa bsgom par bya/ /gnyis par snying rje rnam bsgom zhing / /gsum par dga' ba bsgom pa dang / /kun gyi mthar

ni btang snyoms so/ /yang ni stong pa'i byang chub ste/ /gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu/ /gsum pa la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs/ /bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod/ /re phas nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas/ /nyi der hU~M byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje de nyid kyis ni ra ba dang / /gur

bcing ba yang rnam par bsgom pa nyid/ /dang por ro ni rnam bsgoms pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid brjod/ /de stengs rnal 'byor pa gnas nas/ /he ru ka nyid rnam par bsgom/ /rang gi snying gar re ba bsgom/ /de las byung ba'i nyi dkyil 'khor/ /der ni hU~M gi

rnam pa nyid/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin can/ /hU~M las byung ba'i rdo rje ni/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/ /rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas par/ /yang ni hU~M gi de nyid bsgom/ /hU~M gi rnam pa gyur bltas nas/ /zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje skye ba nag po che/ /'dam

skyes sngon po 'dra ba'i mdog /yang na sngo dang nyi ma'i mdog /dad pas nges par rnam par bsgom/ /nam mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni/ /rdo rje skye ba snying rje che/ /rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi/ /lha mo brgyad po rnams kyis mchod/ /dkar mo mtshan ma 'dzin/ /

chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i snod/ /ro langs ma ni chu lag ma/ /g+hasma rI ni sman 'dzin cing / /puk+ka sI ni rdo rje'i lag /de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin/ /gdol pa mo ni cang te'u rdung / /'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod/ /'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas/ /g.yung mos

sku la 'khyud pa nyid/ /A li zla ba kA li nyi/ /sa bon nang du son gyur pa/ /de nyid sems dpa' zhes byar brjod/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab pa yi/ /rang gi lus mtshungs rnam par spro/ /bsdus nas snying gar dgug pa na/ /

yo gi zhe sdang bdag nyid 'gyur/ /sngo dang nyi ma mtshungs pa'i mdog /ban+d+hu dmar po'i spyan dang ldan/ /skra ser gyen du 'khyil ba dang / /phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /'khor lo rna cha nor bu dang / /lag gdub dang ni ska rags nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pa/ /'di

rnams phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /sdang mig brgyad gnyis lo yi tshul/ /g.yon na rdo rje thod pa dang / /g.yon pa nas kyang kha T+wAM ga/ /g.yas na rdo rje nag po nyid/ /hU~M gi yi ge 'don pa'i bdag /rnal 'byor ma brgyad yongs bskor nas/ /dur khrod du ni mgon po rol/ /dbugs rgyu zhes

bya'i rigs pa 'dis/ /dur khrod ces ni mngon par brjod/ /phyag bzhi ni bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba rnam par dag pa ste/ gong du brjod pa'i gzugs dang / sku mdog dag hU~M las byung ba'o/ /phyag g.yon gyi dang po na skyes pa'i thod pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag gis bkang ba/ de

bzhin du g.yas kyi phyag na rdo rje/ phyag lhag ma dag gis shes rab la 'khyud pa/ shes rab rdo rje phag mo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can no/ /phyag drug pa/ zhal gsum pa/ g.yon dmar ba/ g.yas zla ba dang nyi ma lta bu dang po sngon po/ gcer bu gong du brjod pa'i sku mdog

dang gzugs can/ phyag rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par dag pa'o/ /phyag g.yon gyi dang po na rtse gsum pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje/ phyag g.yon gyi gnyis pa na dril bu/ phyag g.yas kyi gnyis pa na gri gug /phyag lhag ma dag gis rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma la snyoms

par 'jug pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba de ltar shes rab ste/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa na gri gug dang thod pa/ khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi ro mnan pa'o/ /lha'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rang gi snying

gar sa bon bsam mo/ /sa bon las 'od zer nag po lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis phyung nas/ des khams gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs la ma mo brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM sar+b+ba ta thA

ga ta zhes sangs rgyas de rnams he ru ka'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba na me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rnga'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gur gum gyi char 'bab par 'gyur

ro/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i glu spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyis blang par bya'o/ /dbang bskur nas spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /'dis ni he ru ka rdzogs pa nyid do/ /thun gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsgom pa rnam par

bsgoms nas langs te lha'i gzugs su gzhag go/ /dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas de kho na nyid kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /ngo bos gzugs med mthong ba po/ /sgra med thos pa po yang med/ /dri med snom pa po yang med/ /ro med myong ba po yang med/ /

reg med reg pa po yang med/ /sems med sems las byung ba'ang med/ /skyed byed ma dang sring mo nyid/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod/ /gar ma tshos ma rdo rje ma/ /gdol ma de bzhin bram ze mo/ /thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis/ /de nyid rig pas rtag tu mchod/ /ji ltar

bye bar mi 'gyur bar/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsten pa nyid/ /ma gsang sprul dang chom rkun dang / /sa spyod me yis sdug bsngal byed/ /rigs lnga'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba/ /thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya/ /rdo rje 'dis ni gdab pa nyid/ /des na phyag rgyar brjod par bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma de

bzhin las/ /de bzhin gshegs dang rin chen nyid/ /snying rje chen po dam pa yi/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru brjod/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya g.yung mo nyid/ /de bzhin pad+ma'i gar ma nyid/ /las ni tshos mar rab tu bshad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bram ze mo/ /rin chen gdol mar

shes par bya/ /phyag rgya lngar ni rnam par nges/ /'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya/ /dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing / /de bzhin slar yang gshegs pa nyid/ /'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod

par bya/ /rigs ni rnam pa drug brjod cing / /mdor bsdus pas ni rnam pa lnga/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /phyi nas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /rigs dang 'byung ba lha rnams dang / /phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyi/ /rigs dang bgrang bya 'di yis ni/ /rigs zhes mngon

par brjod par bya/ /sgom pa po med bsgom pa'ang med/ /lha med sngags kyang yod ma yin/ /smos pa med pa'i rang bzhin las/ /sngags dang lha ni yang dag gnas/ /rnam snang mi bskyod don yod dang / /rin chen dpag med sems dpa' bo/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang / /

thams cad sangs rgyas de nyi brjod/ /tshangs pa sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid/ /'jug phyir khyab 'jug brjod par bya/ /rtag tu dge bas zhi ba nyid/ /thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid gnas/ /dam pa'i bde bas de nyid de/ /bde ba rtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas/ /gang phyir lus las byung ba nyid/ /

lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya/ /sangs rgyas 'di la b+ha ga mnga'/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod par bya/ /b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod/ /dbang phyug la sogs yon tan kun/ /yang na nyon mongs la sogs bdud/ /bcom phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod/ /gang phyir skye 'gro skyed pa

yis/ /shes rab ma zhes brjod par bya/ /gang phyir skal ba ston pa yis/ /shes rab sring mo zhes bya nyid/ /btso blag ma dang bu mo dang / /gar mkhan mar yang brjod par bya/ /sems can thams cad 'tshod pa'i phyir/ /btso blag ma zhes de bzhin brjod/ /yon tan 'jo phyir

shes rab ni/ /bu mo zhes ni brjod par bya/ /snying rje chen po g.yo ba'i phyir/ /shes rab gar mar brjod par bya/ /gang phyir bcom ldan mi reg pa/ /de phyir g.yung mor brjod par bya/ /A li kA li rab brtags pas/ /brjod pa bzlas par yang dag bshad/ /rkang pa'i rjes ni dkyil

'khor nyid/ /nyid phyir dkyil 'khor brjod par bya/ /lag pa sgyur ba phyag rgya yin/ /sor mo nyed pa'ang de bzhin no/ /gang phyir rnam sems bsam gtan ni/ /gang bsams de ni bsam gtan no/ /ji ltar pha las bde thob pa/ /de yi bde ba rang gis bza'/ /bde ba gang gis 'chi

ba 'di/ /de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod/ /de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /spyod pa pha rol phyin mchog nyid/ /gang gis dngos grub mthar 'gro ba/ /kye yi rdo rjes dngos grub rgyus/ /sgom pa po yis rnam 'dzin pa/ /rna ba dag la rna cha bzas/ /

spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin/ /lag pa dag la lag gdub gnyis/ /rked pa la yang ska rags nyid/ /rkang par de bzhin rkang gdub bo/ /lag pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid/ /mgrin par rus pa'i phreng ba ste/ /bgo ba stag gi pags pa nyid/ /bza' ba mi 'chi'i bcu phyed de/ /he ru ka sbyor

skyes bu ste/ /kha dog lnga la rnam par gnas/ /rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan pa/ /rigs ni gcig tu rnam par brtag /kha dog du ma nyid kyis ni/ /gang phyir dbye ba mtshon mi bya/ /shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang / /ma mo'i khyim dang mtshan mo dang / /yang na dben pa'am

bas mtha' ru/ /bsgom pa bzang por brjod par bya/ /cung zad drod ni thob pa na/ /gal te spyod pa byed 'dod pas/ /gal te 'grub 'gyur 'dod yod na/ /'dis ni spyod pa spyad pa nyid/ /shin tu bzhin mig yangs ma/ /rang gis dbang bskur snying rje can/ /rdo rje'i bu

mo 'di khyer nas/ /spyod pa bya bar rtogs par bya/ /rdo rje rigs kyi dngos med na/ /rang 'dod lha yi rigs kyis bya/ /yang na gzhan gyi rigs byung ba/ /byang chub sa bon gdab pa dang / /sbyang ba yis ni gzung bar bya/ /gal te dga' bas glu blang ste/ /de tshe rdo rje mchog ldan no/ /gal

te dga' ba skyes pa na/ /thar pa'i rgyur ni gar bya ste/ /de tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar/ /yo gis mnyam par bzhag pas byed/ /'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa/ /rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med/ /mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen bdag /lag gdub rnam par snang mdzad brjod/ /ska

rags la ni don yod gnas/ /kha T+wA~M ga gzugs shes rab ste/ /thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te'u nyid/ /zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa/ /glu ni rnam dag sngags su gnas/ /gar ni bsgom pa byas pa nyid/ /de yi phyir na glu dang gar/ /yo gis rtag tu rtag tu byed/ /sman ni rnam par

bza' ba ste/ /chu ni rtag par btung ba nyid/ /rga shis zil gyis mi non cing / /rtag tu bsrung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rkun ma'i skra las cod pan byas/ /de la hU~M byung sbyar bar bya/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa rnams/ /rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin/ /thod pa sor lnga pa yi tshad/ /byas

pas cod pan 'dzin par byed/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las/ /skra yi ska rags nyis skor nyid/ /thal ba skra yi mchod phyir thogs/ /rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pas 'dzin/ /cang te'u sgra ni bzlas pa ste/ /kha T+wA~M ga sgom shes rab nyid/ /rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'di dag bzlas dang

sgom pa yin/ /brkam dang rmongs dang 'jigs dang khro/ /ngo tsha'i 'bras bu rnam par spang / /bdag nyid kyis ni gnyid spangs nas/ /the tshom med par spyod pa bya/ /lus kyi sbyin pa byin nas ni/ /phyi nas spyod pa yang dag spyad/ /skal dang skal min rnam dpyad pas/ /de phyir sbyin pa sbyin

mi bya/ /bza' bca' de bzhin btung ba nyid/ /ji ltar rnyed pa rab tu bza'/ /yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog phyir/ /zhen pa tsam du mi bya'o/ /bza' dang bza' min spyod pa dang / /de bzhin btung dang btung min nyid/ /bgrod dang bgrod min sngags pa yis/ /rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o/ /

dngos grub rnyed pa'i slob ma gang / /yang dag ye shes snang ba po/ /mnar med spang ba'i rgyu yi phyir/ /grub pas bla ma mngon phyag 'tshal/ /bslab dang dbang las rnam par grol/ /de bzhin ngo tsha'i 'bras bu nyid/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi/ /yo gis rnam dpyad snying rje che/ /sbyin sreg

mchod sbyin dka' thub 'das/ /sngags dang bsam gtan rnam par spangs/ /dam tshig sdom las rnam par grol/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas spyod pa byed/ /nges par sngon du lha min gang / /brgya byin ltu bu yin na yang / /de la 'jigs par mi bya ste/ /seng ge'i gzugs kyis rnam par

rgyu/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rtag tu snying rjes btung bar bya/ /rnal 'byor btung dga' rnal 'byor ba/ /gzhan gyi btung bas bzi ba med/ /spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas ts+tsho m+mA'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /gang gis spun dang sring mor yang / /

the tshom med par shes par bya/ /gang zhig sor mo gcig ston dang / /gnyis kyis legs par 'ongs pa yin/ /g.yon pa'i mthe bong bcangs pa las/ /bsnyun gyi phyag rgyar rnam par shes/ /gang zhig srin lag ston pa la/ /de yi mthe'u chung rnam par sbyin/ /gang zhig gung mo ston

pa la/ /de yi mdzub mo rnam par sbyin/ /gang zhig srin lag ston pa la/ /de yi mgrin pa rab tu bstan/ /gang zhig gos ni ston pa la/ /de yi rtse gsum rab tu bstan/ /gang zhig nu ma ston pa la/ /de yi mtshams ni rab tu bstan/ /gang zhig so ni ston pa la/ /de yi kha ni rab tu

bstan/ /gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa la/ /gtsug phud dgrol bar brjod par bya/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la/ /de yi rgyab ni rab tu bstan/ /gang zhig rkang mthil ston pa la/ /lto yis rnam par rtse bar bya/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan gyis ni/ /dam tshig gis ni rnam par bye/ /

de la rnal 'byor mas smras pa/ /e ma bu ni snying rje che/ /gal te phreng ba lag ston na/ /'du bar bya zhes smra ba yin/ /phreng ba mngon par gtad byas na/ /dam tshig la mnos brtul zhugs bzang / /de la phyi rol zhes 'du ba/ /bzang po'i spyod yul la gnas pa/ /de la 'du bar rnal 'byor

mas/ /gang smras de ltar thams cad bya/ /kye bcom ldan 'das 'du ba'i gnas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni/ /zhing dang nye ba'i zhing nyid dang / /ts+tshan do nye ba'i ts+tshan do dang / /de bzhin 'du ba nye 'du ba/ /'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod

nyid/ /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod nyid/ /'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis te/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid/ /'dis ni gzhan gyis brjod mi bya/ /kye bcom ldan 'das gnas la sogs pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gnas ni dzA lan d+ha rar bshad/ /de bzhin

du ni au T+yan nyid/ /gnas ni ko la la gi ri nyid/ /de bzhin du ni kA ma rU nyid/ /nye gnas mA la wa zhes brjod/ /si na d+hu na gar nyid do/ /zhing ni mum+mu nir bshad de/ /zhing ni byed pa'i brang nyid do/ /de wI ko Ti de bzhin zhing / /zhing ni lcags pa'i brang nyid do/ /nye zhing gu la ta zhes brjod/ /de

bzhin a rbud nyid dang / /ba yi mchog sbyin kha ba'i ri/ /nye ba'i zhing ni mdor bsdus pa'o/ /ts+tshan do ha ri ke la dag/ /lan tshwa rgya mtsho'i nang skyes dang / la ma ba kA dang kAny+tsi nyid/ /de bzhin sau rA Sh+Ta nyid do/ /nye ba'i ts+tshan do ka ling ka /gser dang ldan pa'i gling dang ni/ /kong ka Na yang nye tsan

dor/ /mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya/ /'thung gcod grong khyer gyi dang yang / /'thung gcod grong gi mthar gnas pa/ /tsa ri tra dang ko sa la/ /bin d+h+ya gzhon nu'i grong khyer ro/ /rdo rje snying po snying rje che/ /nye ba'i 'thung gcod de nye ba'o/ /dur khrod rab son dge 'dun dang / /dur khrod

rgya mtsho'i 'gram nyid do/ /skyed tshal ra ba rdzing bu'i 'gram/ /nye ba'i dur khrod brjod par bya/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rnal 'byor ma rgyud kye'i rdo rje/ /rnal 'byor ma yi legs 'du ba/ /nyin bar nyid kyang rab bshad bya/ /kye bcom ldan 'das nyi ma gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ /zla phyed bcu bzhi dang / /de bzhin du yang brgyad pa nyid/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun nyid/ /lan bdun pa yang bza' bar bya/ /'bad pas snying rje bskyed pa yis/ /gsad par bya bar brjod pa nyid/ /snying rje med na mi 'grub pas/ /de phyir snying rje bskyed

pa nyid/ /thams cad gdug pa gzhug pa ste/ /cho ga'i gtso bos dgag par bya/ /de la 'di ltar blta ba nyid/ /nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /mtshan mo shes rab brtag par bya/ /mi bya cung zad yod ma yin/ /rtag tu mi bza' yod ma yin/ /'di la mi bsam yod ma yin/ /bzang ngan mi smra gang yang

med/ /ji ltar bdag nyid de ltar gzhan/ /de bzhin bdag ni nga mchog nyid/ /'di ltar sems pa'i rnal 'byor bdag /bza' dang btung ba la sogs spyad/ /yan lag ji snyed bsgyur ba dang / /tshig rnams rab tu rgyas pa nyid/ /he ru ka dpal gnas bzhugs pas/ /de snyed sngags dang phyag rgya

yin/ /shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te/ /he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid/ /ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid/ /ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o/ /rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /skye bo gang dang gang rnams kyi/ /sha ni mkhas pas bza' bar bya/ /sems can de de'i dbang du 'gyur/ /brda

dang gnas gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bshad par bya'o/ /nam mkha'i khams su b+ha ga bsam/ /dbus su rnam par bsgom pa ni/ /'khor lo sngon du ci rigs par/ /lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid/ /'khor lo

sa dang chu ni sngo/ /ji ltar rigs par byin za dang / /lha rnams kyis ni rlung chen dang / /ji ltar sgom po 'byung ba yang / /chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo nyid/ /'phar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa/ /ze'u 'bru las ni gcig 'gyur te/ /gru gsum gyis ni phyi mar brjod/ /de dbus

shi ba lnga yi/ /gdan gyi bdag nyid rnam par bsam/ /de yi steng du zla ba yin/ /zla ba'i steng du sa bon nyid/ /phyi nas bdud las rgyal bas mnan/ /gnyis 'dus pa las bde chen po/ /A li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas/ /kA li'i gzugs kyis snang byed do/ /

zla ba nyi ma 'dus pa las/ /dkar mo la sogs rab tu grags/ /zla ba me long ye shes ldan/ /bdun gyi bdun pa mnyam nyid ldan/ /rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni/ /so sor rtog par brjod par bya/ /thams cad gcig gyur nan tan nyid/ /rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /mkhas pas

cho ga gsungs pa yis/ /rnam pa lnga bo bsgom pa nyid/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi gdan/ /yi ge las byung gong bu la/ /hU~M phaT rnam pa'ang 'dod mi bya/ /sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po rnam par bsgom/ /phyag mtshan

zhal sogs gong ma bzhin/ /zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od/ /thabs dang shes rab rab bzhin las/ /'di ltar thams cad rdzogs pa nyid/ /zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas/ /A li shes rab kA li thabs/ /'di las dkar mo la sogs pa/ /kha dog dbye bas so so yin/ /re zhig nang gi 'phar ma

la/ /rnal 'byor ma lnga ngas gnas pa/ /phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom/ /dbang por rdo rje gshin rjer dkar/ /chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma/ /lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /phyi rol gyi ni 'phar ma la/ /dkar

mo chom rkun ro langs ma/ /g+hasma rI dang puk+ka sI/ /ri khrod ma dang gdol ba ma/ /brgyad pa Do m+bi nI ru brjod/ /'og ldan ma dang steng ldan nyid/ /mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod brjod/ /srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /snying rje chen po 'di dag gnas/ /lha mo thams cad kha dog gnag /drag chen

phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan/ /zhal gcig spyan ni dmar ba rnams/ /lag par gri gug thod pas khyab/ /'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang / /lag par lag gdub ska rags nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas/ /'di lnga phyag rgya dag pa'o/ /ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /de ltar thams

cad rnam par bshad/ /lag pa gcig ni thod pas brel/ /g.yas pa na ni gri gug 'dzin/ /g.yon pas kha T+wA~M ga nyid do/ /stag gi pags pas rnam dkris shing / /rol zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar/ /phyag gnyis gyen du dbu skyes ser/ /nga rgyal la sogs skyon drug rnams/ /gcod

phyir gri gug rnam par gnas/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam rtog gi/ /mgo bo'i pad+ma'i snod du ni/ /bdud rnams rnam pa bzhi yi khrag /dngos grub phyir ni btung bar bya/ /stong pa'i rnam pas kha T+wAM ga/ /thabs kyis ro ni rnam par brtag /'dis ni 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na/ /dngos grub

myur du thob par 'gyur/ /dang por nag po rab tu bsgom/ /gnyis par dmar po rnam par bsgom/ /gsum pa la ni ser po bsgom/ /bzhi par ljang gu de bzhin no/ /lnga par kha dog sngon po dang / /drug par dkar po'i lus can te/ /yan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor pas/ /

dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni/ /rdzogs pa'i yang ni rim pa nyid/ /rim gnyis mnyam par gnas nas ni/ /rdo rje can gyis chos 'chad do/ /bskyed pa yi ni cha bshad do/ /nam mkha'i khams ni pad+ma la/ /b+ha ga zhes bya ye shes brjod/ /bsgom

pa zhes bya snyoms 'jug nyid/ /de yi bde ba 'khor lor brjod/ /sngon du byung ba zhu ba nyid/ /rim pa ji bzhin rang rig nyid/ /lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems/ /ji ltar 'byung ba khu ba yin/ /lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis/ /re zhig btsun mo shes rab yin/ /skyes bu thabs su brjod

pa nyid/ /kun rdzob don dam dbye ba las/ /phyi nas de yi rnam pa gnyis/ /re zhig skyes bu rnam pa gnyis/ /de yi khu ba'ang bde ba nyid/ /skyes bu ji bzhin shes rab la'ang / /de yi khu ba'ang bde ba nyid/ /de nyid phyir na dga' ba nyid/ /bzhi yi rab tu dbye ba yis/ /skye med rim pa'i phyogs

las ni/ /'di ltar lhan cig skyes rnam bzhi/ /dga' ba dang po dpa' bo nyid/ /mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma/ /shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges/ /de bde'i thabs las thams cad rig /dga' ba'i bde ba cung zad de/ /mchog tu dga' ba de las lhag /dga' bral dga' bas

chags bral yin/ /lhag ma lhan cig skyes dga' nyid/ /dang po reg par 'dod pa dang / /gnyis pa bde bar 'dod pa nyid/ /gsum pa 'dod chags 'jig pa nyid/ /des na bzhi pa bsgom par bya/ /mchog tu dga' ba srid par brjod/ /dga' bral las ni mya ngan 'das/ /

dbu ma dga' ba tsam nyid de/ /'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs/ /'dod chags med cing chags bral med/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di la thabs dang shes rab med/ /yang dag de nyid snang ba'o/ /gzhan gyis brjod min lhan cig skyes/ /gang du yang ni mi rnyed de/ /bla

ma'i dus thabs bsten pa yis/ /bdag gis bsod nams las shes bya/ /dman pa 'bring dang mchog rnams dang / /gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams kyang / /ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa yis/ /'di kun mnyam pa nyid du blta/ /dman pa'i gnas ni phra ba'i don/ /mchog ni dngos

por brjod par bya/ /dbu ma gnyis kyis spangs pa nyid/ /gzhan rnams zhes bya dbang po drug /gang rnams de rnams brtan dang g.yo/ /'di kun zhes bya nga nyid de/ /mnyam nyid mtshungs par 'dod pa nyid/ /ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pas ni/ /mnyam zhes bya ba mtshungs par brjod/ /de yi

'khor lor zhas brjod/ /bsgom pa ro gcig mnyam pa nyid/ /'dis ni don gyis brjod par bya/ /nga las 'gro ba thams cad 'byung / /nga las gnas gsum po yang 'byung / /nga yis 'di kun khyab pa ste/ /'gro ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ma mthong / /de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes na/ /shin tu mnyam

gzhag gang goms pa/ /bsod nams chung ba'i mi yis kyang / /de ni grub par the tshom med/ /bza' dang btung dang blugs pa dang / /nyal dang log dang sems pa na/ /phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas/ /de nas sngon du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir yid kyis mi bsgom par/ /'gro ba thams cad

bsgom par bya/ /thams cad chos ni yongs shes na/ /bsgom pa nyid ni bsgom pa min/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po gang / /rtswa lcug 'khri shing la sogs pa/ /bdag gi dngos po'i rang bzhin las/ /dam pa'i de nyid nges bsgom bya/ /de rnams dam pa gcig yod min/ /rang rig bde ba chen

po nyid/ /rang rig nas ni byang chub 'gyur/ /rang rig phyir na bsgom pa nyid/ /rang gis rig pa'i 'gyur ba las/ /dman pa las ni las skyes te/ /rang gis 'phrog cing rang gis byed/ /rang rig rgyal po rang gtso bo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang phrag dog dang / /de bzhin gti mug nga rgyal nyid/ /de kun

de gnas nyams dga' bar/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /chos 'byung las skyes ye shes ni/ /mkha' mnyam lhan cig thabs dang bcas/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las/ /'jig rten gsum po de las skyes/ khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan nyid/ /de yi bde ba 'dod mar brjod/ /

gcig dang du ma bral ba ste/ /skad cig gcig las mchog dga' ba/ /rang gis rig pa'i ye shes 'di/ /ngag gi lam 'das spyod yul te/ /'di ni byin rlabs rim pa'i phyir/ /kun mkhyen ye shes de lta bu/ /sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni/ /me dang nam mkha' nyid dag ni/ /rang gzhan rig pa'i

tshor ba yis/ /kun gyis skad cig mi gnod de/ /mtho ris mi yul rkang 'og gi/ /skad cig las ni gzugs gcig 'gyur/ /rang gzhan cha yi rnam rtog gis/ /gnod pa nyid ni nus pa min/ /thams cad rig byed grub mtha' dang / /de bzhin las rgyas la sogs pas/ /srid pa dag

'gyur dngos grub min/ /yang ni srid mthar skye bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ /de med pas kyang dngos grub med/ /gang gis mi shes kye'i rdo rje/ /de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur/ /chu bo'i rgyun ni rab 'bab dang / /mar me'i rtse mo rab bcings ltar/ /rtag tu de nyid rnal 'byor gyis/ /

nyin dang mtshan du rnam par gzhag /rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'du ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /nges par dngos po thams cad kyi/ /dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod/ /phyi nas re re'i dbye ba yis/ /lha rnams

kyi ni brjod par bya/ /phung po lnga dang dbang po drug /skye mched drug dang 'byung chen lnga/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag /nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib sbyang bya/ /rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid/ /dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min/ /yul gyi dngos po dag pa'i phyir/ /rang gis rig pa'i bde ba mchog /

gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang / /gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas mthong ba/ /dngos po de kun dag pa ste/ /'di ltar 'gro ba sangs rgyas bdag /kye bcom ldan 'das rnam par ma dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs

la sogs pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po'i phyir ro/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yang gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ /mig gis gzugs ni gzung bar bya/ /sgra ni rna bas mnyan par

bya/ /dri ni sna yis tshor bar bya/ /lce yis ro ni myang bar bya/ /dngos po lus kyis reg par bya/ /yid kyis bde sogs thob pa ni/ /dag pas dug med byas nas ni/ /bsten bya 'di dag bsten pa nyid/ /gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te/ /tshor ba la yang dkar mor brjod/ /'du shes chu yi rnal

'byor ma/ /'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnam shes phung po'i tshul gyis ni/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ma gnas so/ /rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur/ /nang gi 'phar ma la'o/ /de nas phyi yi 'phar ma bshad/ /dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI/ /mer ni de bzhin

ri khrod ma/ /bden bral gdol pa mo bzhag cing / /rlung du g.yung mo rnam par bzhag /phyi nas lha mo dkar mo sogs/ /dbang dkar gshin rjer chom rkun ma/ /chu bdag phyogs su ro langs ma/ /lus ngan por ni g+hasma rI/ /'og tu sa spyod ma zhes brjod/ /steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes

bshad/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid kyi phyogs/ /srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /lha mo 'di gnyis rnam par gnas/ /gzugs la dkar mo rtag tu bshad/ /sgra la chom rkun ma rab grags/ /dri yi cha la ro langs ma/ /ro la g+hasma rI rab grags/ /reg la sa spyod ma zhes bshad/ /chos kyi dbyings

la mkha' spyod ma/ /rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur/ /phyag gi dag pa stong pa nyid/ /bdud dag pa las zhabs rnams nyid/ /rnam thar brgyad kyis zhal rnams nyid/ /rdo rje gsum gyis dag pa'i spyan/ /sa ni buk+ka sI zhes bshad/ /chu khams rngon pa mo zhes

brjod/ /me ni gtum mor shes par bya/ /rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu grags/ /zhe sdang zhes bshad rdo rje ma/ /'dod chags chu yi rnal 'byor ma/ /phrag dog rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /ser sna gsang ba'i dkar mo nyid/ /gti mug de bzhin rdo rjer bshad/ /zhe sdang la sogs rnam spyod pa/ /bskyed pa'i rim

pa'i phyogs las ni/ /'dis ni phung po sbyang bar bya/ /gang dang gang gis 'jig rten 'ching 'gyur ba/ /de dang des ni 'ching ba las grol te/ /de nyid mi shes 'jig rten mi grol zhing / /de nyid rnam spangs dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur/ /de phyir dri med sgra med gzugs nyid med/ /ro dang sems kyi rnam par dag pa

med/ /reg med chos med thams cad rnam par dag /rang bzhin dag pa'i 'gro la 'gro bar shes/ /rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu ba'o// //de nas ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi/ /rim pa yang dag rab tu bshad/ /gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i/ /cho ga'ang rab tu bshad par bya/ /dang

por lha yi bdag nyid kyi/ /rnal 'byor pas ni nor 'dzin sbyang / /'bad pas hU~M las rdo rje can/ /byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor pri/ /tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i khyim dang ni/ /dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang du yang / /dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs/ /rdul tshon dam

pa'i tshon dang ni/ /yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te/ /rin chen lnga yi phye ma'am/ /yang na 'bras la sogs pas so/ /de nas dkyil 'khor khru gsum dang / /mthe bong gsum ni lhag par bya/ /der ni rigs lnga las byung ba'i/ /rig ma bzang mo rnam par gzhug /yang na ji ltar gang rnyed de/ /

de ltar bcu drug lon pa nyid/ /ji srid khu ba ldan gyur pa/ /de srid phyag rgya bsten par bya/ /phyag rgya'i gdong ni bcing ba dang / /thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin no/ /bsten pa de las gang byung ba/ /slob ma'i khar ni btung bar bya/ /ro mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul nyid/ /de nyid la yang bya bar bya/ /

rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur/ /rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs/ /mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid/ /dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog /thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres/ /chags dang chags bral rnam par 'dres/ /de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog /de nyid yi ge dam

pa nyid/ /de nyid 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de/ /de nyid thams cad khyab pa po/ /thams cad lus la rnam par gnas/ /dngos dang dngos med de las byung / /gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams dang / /rnam par shes pa kun gyi tshul/ /skyes bu sngon rabs dbang phyug dang / /bdag

dang gso ba sems can dang / /dus dang gang zag nyid dang ni/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di/ /sgyu ma'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas/ /dang po dga' ba tsam nyid de/ /gnyis pa'i grangs las mchog dga' nyid/ /gsum pa las ni dga' bral bshad/ /bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par

brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang ni/ /rdo rje snying po la sogs kun/ /mkhas pas de skad nges thos nas/ /mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur nas ni/ /brgyal zhing sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /dang po dga' ba 'gro ba'i gzugs/ /de bzhin mchog dga' 'gro ba nyid/ /dga' bral dga' ba'ang

'gro ba nyid/ /gsum pa lhan cig skyes pa med/ /bcom ldan bka' stsal kye'i rdo rje/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa/ /rdo rje snying pos rtogs bya'i phyir/ /the tshom legs par sel ba ni/ /'dod chags med cing chags bral med/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsum

po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir/ /lhan cig skyes pa byang chub brjod/ /yang na de nyid thams cad bdag /yang na kun gyis rnam par spangs/ /de yang dga' bral dang por mtshon/ /dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs/ /dang po sprin dang 'dra ba yin/ /grub pa sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur/ /gnyid log

sad par mi byed par/ /nyal dang log pa'i khyad par las/ /rtag tu rmi lam 'dra bar 'gyur/ /dngos grub mtshan nyid mi phyed pa'i/ /phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub/ /ston pas dkyil 'khor 'di skad gsungs/ /gru bzhi yang dag 'bar ba nyid/ /sgo bzhi gzi brjid chen po ste/ /do shal

do shal phyed pas brgyan/ /phreng ba sna tshogs rnga yab ldan/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan/ /rdo rje srad bu mnyam par ldan/ /me tog sna tshogs nye bar brgyan/ /bdug pa mar me de bzhin dri/ /bum pa brgyad la sogs pa ldan/ /de yang yal ga la sogs brgyan/ /mgrin pa gos kyis dgab

pa dang / /rin chen lnga ni yongs su gzhug /rnam par rgyal ba shar du sbyin/ /rang 'dod lha yi gzugs kyis ni/ /sar pa legs par bkal ba dang / /shin tu tshad ma mdzes pa yi/ /sra dbus shes rab can gyis gdab/ /'khor lo'i bdag po'i bzlas pa 'bum/ /dkyil 'khor can gyi de

bzhin khri/ /gong du gsungs pa'i sngags nyid kyis/ /mkhas pas nor 'dzin rnam par sbyang / /gong gi a sogs sngags kyis ni/ /de la gtor ma rnam par sbyin/ /ji ltar bsam gtan de bzhin 'dir/ /bsrung ba ji ltar gsungs pa nyid/ /gang zhig dbang ni rab phye ba/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor cho

gas sbyin/ /mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa nyid/ /ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin 'dir/ /'phar ma gnyis bzang rnam bris nas/ /myur du dkar mo la sogs bri/ /shar du gri gug rnam par bri/ /lho dang nub tu'ang de bzhin no/ /byang dang me yi mtshams dang ni/ /bden bral rlung du'ang de bzhin no/ /dbang

ldan du ni ci gsungs pa/ /da lta de ltar 'og dang steng / /rdo rje sems dpa'i snyems byas nas/ /rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te/ /phyag gnyis kye rdo rje sbyor bas/ /slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug pa nyid/ /khrus dang gtsang sbra dri zhim lus/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /hU~M hU~M snyems

pa byas nas ni/ /hI hI rnam pas 'jigs byed bdag /phyi nas de nyid yang dag bshad/ /rnam dag ye shes gzugs can dang / /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /khyad par cung zad yod ma yin/ /mchog dgar bsgom pa med cing sgom pa po yang med/ /lus kyang med cing gzung ba med dang 'dzin

pa'ang med/ /sha dang khrag kyang med cing bshang dang gci ba'ang med/ /skyug bro rmongs med gtsang sbra mchod phyir thogs med dang / /chags med sdang ba med dang rmongs med phrag dog med/ /ser sna med dang nga rgyal med cing mthong bya med/ /bsgom dang sgom pa po med bshes dang dgra med cing / /rlom

sems med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sna tshogs nyid/ /rdo rje snying pos 'di skad gsol/ /gzod nas rang bzhin med pa yi/ /lus kyi rang bzhin dag pa ni/ /ci slad 'byung ba'i bdag nyid lags/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /mkha' 'gro bde ba sbyin pas gsungs/ /rlom sems med pa'i

rang bzhin bdag /thams cad lus la rnam par gnas/ /kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'byung ba chen po las gyur pa'i phung po lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /po la kak+kol sbyor bas/ /reg pa sra ba'i chos kyis ni/ /sa ni de las skye bar 'gyur/ /

byang sems khu ba'i rnam pa las/ /chu yi khams ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bskyod pa las ni drod skye ste/ /'gro bas rlung du rab tu grags/ /bde ba nam mkha' nyid kyi khams/ /lnga bo rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba/ /de phyir bde ba de nyid min/ /lhan cig skyes

pas gang skyes pa/ /lhan cig skyes par de brjod bya/ /rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes brjod/ /rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig /phyag rgya rgyu dang bral ba las/ /yo gi snying rje thabs su 'gyur/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /byang chub sems zhes rab tu brjod/ /sngags kyi bzlas med

dka' thub med dang sbyin sreg med/ /dkyil 'khor can yang med cing dkyil 'khor yang ni med/ /de ni sngags bzlas de dka' thub dang de sbyin sreg /de ni dkyil 'khor can dang de ni dkyil 'khor nyid/ /mdor bsdus nas ni sems ni 'dus pa'i gzugs can no/ /dbang gi le'u zhes bya

ba ste bcu pa'o// //mnyam par ma rangs dbral ba can/ /rtag tu ltung bar byed par brjod/ /dbang gi lta stangs g.yon na gnas/ /g.yon pa nas ni gzugs brnyan gnyis/ /g.yas pa'i cha la dgug pa nyid/ /steng nas kyang ni gzugs brnyan gnyis/ /dbu ma

rengs pa'i lta stangs nyid/ /sna yi rtse mo'i dbus su gnyis/ /'byung ba nyid kyis ltung bar byed/ /rngub pa yis ni dbang du byed/ /dgang ba yis ni dgug pa nyid/ /gzhil ba yis ni rengs par byed/ /rlon pa'i shing la ltung byed nyid/ /dbang ni me tog rab tu grags/ /rdo rje'i shing la dgug

pa nyid/ /g.yo bcas rtsa la rengs byed nyid/ /zla drug goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'dri la the tshom med/ /'di la 'khrul ba mi bya ste/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /lta stangs bzhi po bsgrubs nas ni/ /mkhas pas sems can gzhug par bya/ /gsad par 'di la bya

ma yin/ /dam tshig nges par nyams par 'gyur/ /sems can slu ba spangs nas ni/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad bya/ /sems can gnod pa tsam gyis ni/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur/ /de la dam tshig bza' bya ba/ /na dang ga ha dang po dang / /mtha' yi shwa dang dang po'i

shwa/ /kye'i rdo rje yi dngos grub phyir/ /bdud rtsi lnga yang de bzhin bza'/ /kye yi rdo rjes gsungs mtshan nyid/ /skye ba bdun pa'ang de nas mtshon/ /dga' bral dga' ba la smod pa/ /lan bdun pas ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /skad snyan mig dang ldan pa dang / /dri lus gzi brjid chen po dang / /

de yi grib ma bdun du 'gyur/ /mthong nas rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon/ /de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /skad cig las ni mkha' spyod 'gyur/ /ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste/ gong du brtag pa bcu gnyis par/ /rgyas par gsungs pa mdo ru bsdu/ /hrIHlas byung ba'i lha mo ni/ /

kha dog dmar zhing phyag bzhi ma/ /mda' dang gzhu yi lag pa ma/ /ut+pa la dang lcags kyu 'dzin/ /'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed/ /'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams/ /khri yis 'jig rten phal ba nyid/ /bye bas phyugs dang gnod sbyin sogs/ /

'bum phrag bdun gyis lha ma yin/ /'bum phrag gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid/ /brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid/ /kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las rdo rje snying po mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so// //rdo rje snying pos gsol

ba/ bcom ldan rdo rje snying po bdag /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa/ /rab gnas mtshan nyid bzang po nyid/ /rim pa ji bzhin bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /ci gsungs sbyin sreg byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs pa dang / /

snga bar sku gzugs sbyang ba dang / /sta gon la sogs byas nas ni/ /nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /sku gzugs snying gar rab tu gzhug /rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor pa/ /rab mthong sngags kyi pha rol son/ /oM badzra puSh+pe AHhUM swA hA/ oM badzra d+hu pe AHhUM swA hA/ oM badzra dI pe

AHhUM swA hA/ oM badzra gan+d+he AHhUM swA hA/ /oM badzra nai we d+ye AHhUM swA hA/ sna tshogs hUM ni rdzogs pa dang / /me tog la sogs dbul ba nyid/ /gong ma'i rgyud kyi chog rim pas/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil gong ma bzhin/ /zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po nyid/ /rgyas pa nyid kyi gru bzhi pa/ /

gsad pa la ni gru gsum brjod/ /'di nyid la ni lhag ma bsgrub/ /khru gang dang ni khru phyed nyid/ /zhi ba'i steng dang 'og tu yin/ /khru do dang ni khru gang nyid/ /rgyas pa'i steng dang 'og tu brjod/ /sor mo nyi shu'am de yi phyed/ /gsad pa'i steng dang 'og tu yang / /zhi bar kha dog dkar por 'gyur/ /rgyas

par ser po de bzhin no/ /gsad pa la ni kha dog gnag /dbang la dmar por rab tu grags/ /dbang la ji bzhin de ltar dgug /gsad la ji ltar zhe sdang sogs/ /zhi la til dang rgyas la zho/ /gsad la tsher ma de bzhin no/ /sdang la sogs pa'ang tsher mar brjod/ /dbang dang dgug la ut+pa

la/ oM a sne ma hA te dzA/ sar+b+ba karma pa sA d+hu kaH kA ru N+yA kr-i ta sa twa ar+tha a smin san+ni hi to b+ha ba/ me dgug pa'o/ /ma ma rin chen sna tshogs 'dzin/ /kye yi rdo rje khros mchod pa'i/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /che ge bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'dri/ /swAr+thany+tsai ba ba rAr+thany+tsa sA d+hi taM gats+tsha ha bya

b+hu ka /A ga mi Sh+ya si ya thA kA le sar+b+ba sid+d+hiM ku ru Sh+wa me/ me dga' ba'i sngags so/ /oM dzaHhUM baM hoH khaM raM mchod yon gyi sngags so/ /oM ni ri ti hUM khaMHzhabs bsil gyi sngags so/ /oM d+h+wa~M d+h+wa~M lha bshos kyi sngags so/ /kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las brtag pa gnyis pa

rab gnas kyi le'u ste dang po'o// //rdo rje snying pos gsol ba/ nam mkha' lta bu'i chos kun la/ /rgya mtshor ku ba ji lta bar/ /rang 'dod lha yi gzugs las ni/ /sems can ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bdag med rnal 'byor

ldan pa'am/ /yang na he ru ka dpal brtson/ /gzhan pa'i sems kyis skad cig kyang / /dngos grub 'dod pas mi gnas so/ /dang po goms par byed dus kyi/ /gnas ni gang du bsngags pa'i sems/ /gcig tu mnyam gzhag 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ /gnas ni bzang po nges par brtag /

rang gi khyim du mtshan dus su/ /bdag nyid 'grub pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rnal 'byor ma bsgom shes rab can/ /yang na he ru ka dpal gzugs/ /rkang pa 'khrud dang za ba dang / /'thor 'thung so rtsi za ba dang / /tsan+dan gyis ni lag nyed dang / /smad g.yogs kyis ni rkang 'gebs dang / /

'byung dang smra dang 'gro ba dang / /'dug dang khro dang rgod pa dang / /bcom ldan 'das ma bsten pa dang / /shes rab brtul zhugs can nyid kyis/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rnam par bsgom/ /gzhan gyi tshul gyis skad cig kyang / /gdug pa'i sems ni mi rigs pas/ /dngos grub 'dod pas dngos

grub phyir/ /mkhas pas 'bad pas mi gnas so/ /bsam gtan nyon mongs 'jig byed pa/ /rdo rje snying po nga yis bshad/ /brtse bas dngos grub don du yang / /zla ba phyed du yongs su rtogs/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs nas/ /lha yi gzugs su sems pa yis/ /nyi ma

gcig tu ma chad par/ /bsgom pas yongs su brtag par gyis/ /rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /'khor bar thabs gzhan yod ma yin/ /rig ma lhan cig goms byas pas/ /'phral du mngon du byed pa nyid/ 'jigs smyo de bzhin sdug bsngal dang / /mya ngan gdung ba 'tshe

ba dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ches/ /sgrub pa po ni nyon mi mongs/ /phan dang gnod pa'i 'bras 'byung bar/ /de ltar nges par shes nas ni/ /ji ltar de ni skad cig kyang / /rnal 'byor ma rnams du 'bod gnas/ /mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang / /srog chags gsod la

dga' ba dang / /gzhan yang skye ba dman gang dang / /rmongs dang ma rungs las byed dang / /gzugs ngan yan lag mtshang ba'ang / /bsams pas de rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dge ba bcu la goms pa dang / /bla ma la gus dbang po dul/ /nga rgyal khro las rnam par gol/ /des

ni re zhig nges 'grub 'gyur/ /rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mnyam par bzhag pas dngos grub 'thob/ /zla ba gcig tu gsang la spyad/ /ji srid phyag rgya ma rnyed par/ /gnang ba rnyed gyur sngags pa la/ /rnal 'byor ma yis bstan par bya/ /phyag rgya che ge mo khyer la/ /

sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin/ /rnyed pa de yang mig yangs ma/ /gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan/ /si h+la ga bur yang dag ldan/ /byang chub sems kyis rnam par sbyang / /dge ba bcu las brtsams nas ni/ /de la chos ni rab tu dbye/ /lha yi gzugs kyi sems

dang ni/ /dam tshig sems dang gcig pa nyid/ /zla ba gcig gis skal ldan par/ /'gyur bar 'di la the tshom med/ /mchog thob pa yi bud med gang / /rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/ /yang na bdag gi nus pa yis/ /lha dang lha min mi rnams dang / /gnod sbyin mi'am ci las kyang / /

phyag rgya bkug la rab tu brtag /de yang khyer la spyod pa spyad/ /bdag nyid la ba mngon du'i phyir/ /gang bshad 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyi/ /spyod pa longs spyod phyir ma gsungs/ /yid ni brtan nam g.yo'am ci/ /rang gi sems ni so sor brtag /rdo rje snying pos gsol ba/ /bdag med

rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /phyag rgya nyid ces ji ltar brjod/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya nyid dag gis/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bud med gzugs ni spangs nas ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs su bya/ /nu ma spangs pa po lar 'gyur/ /

kak+ko la dbus yang dag gnas/ /'gram gnyis dril bu nyid du 'gyur/ /ze'u 'bru bo la can du 'gyur/ /lhag ma bdag nyid chen po nyid/ /dpa' chen he ru ka yi gzugs/ /he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid/ /'bad pa med par skyes bur 'gyur/ /gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /de phyir

phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /chags dang 'jig pa dag gis kyang / /thabs dang shes rab gnod mi 'gyur/ /gang phyir thabs ni 'byung ba nyid/ /'jig pa shes rab srid mthar byed/ /des na rab 'jig yod ma yin/ /de nyid la ni chags pa med/ /la la 'jig pas 'jig par 'gyur/ /'jig

pa'i dngos med zad pa med/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis spros pa bsgom/ /spros pa rmi lam ltar byas nas/ /spros pa nyid ni spros med byed/ /ji ltar sgyu ma rmi lam dang / /ji ltar bar ma'i srid yin pa/ /rtag tu goms par sbyor ba las/ /dkyil 'khor

nyid ni de bzhin 'dod/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur ba/ /ji ltar shes pa'i bde chen po/ /'di ni de yi byin brlabs yin/ /gzhan las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med/ /bde ba gnag cing bde bser/ /bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar/ /bde ba ljang gu bde ba sngo/ /bde ba rgyu dang mi rgyu kun/ /

bde ba shes rab bde ba thabs/ /de bzhin kun tu ru skyes bde/ /bde ba dngos dang dngos med bde/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor 'di/ /de yi bde ba bde chen brjod/ /rdzogs pa bsgom pa med pa ste/ /bskyed pa yis ni ci

zhig 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' che/ /dad pa'i shugs kyis rab tu nyams/ /lus kyi dngos med gang las bde/ /bde ba smra bar mi nus so/ /khyab dang khyab byed tshul gyis ni/ /bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa nyid/ /ji ltar me tog la

gnas dri/ /me tog dngos med shes mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med pas/ /bde ba nyid kyang dmigs med 'gyur/ /dngos nga dngos po med pa nga / /dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas nga / /gang zhig le los bsnun pa dang / /rmongs pa gang gis nga mi shes/ /rdo rje btsun

mo'i b+ha ga ni/ /e yi rnam pa'i cha byad gzugs/ /sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog /bde ba can du rtag tu bzhugs/ /'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga / /rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa nga / /'jig rten ston pa bsgrub bya nga / /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa nga / /lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin

nga / /mchog mtha' dga' bral dang por ni/ /mun pa la ni mar me ltar/ /de bzhin bus kyang yid ches kyis/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde chen du/ /ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan/ /gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan/ /khu ba zhes bya'i rnam par gnas/ /de med pas ni bde med 'gyur/ /bde

ba med na de med 'gyur/ /nus pa med phyir ltos dang bcas/ /lha yi rnal 'byor las bde ba/ /de phyir sangs rgyas dngos po min/ /de nyid dngos med tshul yang min/ /zhal phyag rnam pa'i gzugs can nyid/ /mchog tu bde bas gzugs med pa/ /de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes/ /

rang bzhin lhan cig skyes par brjod/ /rnam dag rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa nyid/ /lha yi rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /bzhin lag kha dog gnas pa ni/ /skyes pa tsam gyis rnam par gnas/ /'on kyang bag chags phal pas so/ /dug

gi dum bu gang nyid kyis/ /skye bo thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dug gi de nyid shes pa des/ /dug gis dug ni 'bigs par byed/ /ji ltar rlung gis zin pa la/ /mon sran sde'u yi bza' ba sbyin/ /bzlog pa'i sman ni brtags pa yis/ /rlung gis rlung la snun par byed/ /rnam rtog las ni

rnam rtog dang / /srid pa nyid kyis srid pa dag /ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa/ /chu gzhan dag gis 'gugs par byed/ /de bzhin dngos po'i rnam rtog kyang / /rnam par nges pas sbyang bar bya/ /ji ltar 'tshed pas tshig pa yang / /me yis kyang ni gdung bar bya/ /de bzhin 'dod chags mes

tshig pa/ /'dod chags me yis gdung bar bya/ /skye bo mi bzad pa yi las/ /gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba/ /thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur/ /chags pas 'jig rten 'ching 'gyur ba/ /'dod chags nyid kyis rnam grol 'gyur/ /bzlog

pa'i bsgom pa 'di nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes/ /'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin la/ /kun tu ru las lnga ru 'gyur/ /dga' ba chen po gcig nyid las/ /dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas/ /reg pa sra ba'i bag chags kyis/ /sra ba gti mug

chos kyi phyir/ /gti mug rnam par snang mdzad brjod/ /gang phyir byang sems gsher ba nyid/ /gsher ba chu yi khams su brjod/ /chu ni mi bskyod gzugs kyi phyir/ /zhe sdang 'dren pa mi bskyod pa/ /gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las/ /drod ni rtag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /'dod chags

dpag med rdo rje yin/ /'dod chags drod las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /kak+ko lar ni gang zhig sems/ /de ni rlung gi rang bzhin can/ /phrag dog don yod grub pa yin/ /don yod rlung las 'byung ba nyid/ /bde ba 'dod chags khrag tu 'gyur/ /dga' ba nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha'

ser sna rdo rjer 'gyur/ /ser sna nam mkha' las byung nyid/ /sems ni chen po gcig nyid la/ /lnga yi gzugs kyis rnam par mtshon/ /rigs ni lnga po de nyid las/ /stong phrag du ma skyes pa nyid/ /de phyir 'di dag rang bzhin gcig /bde chen mchog tu rtag pa nyid/ /'dod chags la

sogs sems lnga yi/ /dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang gA'i klung ni bcu yi bye snyed kyis/ /rigs gcig la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs/ /rigs kyi tshogs la rigs ni du ma rnams/ /de rnams rigs ni rnam pa brgya/ /de rnams la yang 'bum phrag rigs chen

rnams/ /bye ba'i rigs la grangs ni med par 'gyur/ /de la rigs la grangs med rigs rnams ni/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las byung ba rnams/ /kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las dngos grub gtan la phab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas rdo rje can

gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams la rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'i thabs bka' stsal pa/ sdom pa dang ni dbang dang yang / /de bzhin dgongs pa'i skad nyid dang / /dga' dang skad cig dbye ba dang / /gzhan yang bza' ba la sogs pa/ /de la sdom pa bka' stsal pa/ /sangs rgyas

kun gyi sdom pa ni/ /e ba~M rnam par reb tu gnas/ /e ba~M rnam pa'i bde chen po/ /dbang las yang dag shes par bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan ston pa 'gro ba'i bla/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi

sdom pa nyid/ /e ba~M rnam pas ci zhes brjod/ /rim pa ji bzhin bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /e yi cha byad bzang po gang / /dbus su ba~M gyis rnam par brgyan/ /bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas/ /sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog /skad cig dbye bas

phye ba nyid/ /dga' ba de las skye bar 'gyur/ /skad cig shes nas bde shes pa/ /e ba~M rnam par rab tu gnas/ /sna tshogs dang ni rnam smin dang / /rnam nyed de bzhin mtshan nyid bral/ /skad cig bzhi ni rab shes pa/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes 'gyur/ /'khyud dang 'o byed la

sogs pa/ /sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs bshad/ /rnam par smin pa de las bzlog /bde ba'i ye shes za ba nyid/ /bdag gis bde ba zos pa yi/ /gros ni rnam par nyed par brjod/ /mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan/ /chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs/ /

sna tshogs dang po'i dga' ba nyid/ /rnam smin la ni mchog dga' nyid/ /rnam nyed dga' bral dga' ba nyid/ /mtshan bral lhan cig skyes dga' nyid/ /slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang / /bzhi bde yang de bzhin no/ /dbang ni bzhi yi grangs kyis ni/ /dga' ba la sogs rim

zhes bya/ /dgod pa dag pa slob dpon nyid/ /lta ba gsang ba de bzhin no/ /lag bcangs las ni shes rab nyid/ /gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa de yang nyid/ /sems can rnams kyi dngos grub phyir/ /dbang ni rnam pa bzhi ru bshad/ /gtor dang blugs pa zhes bya 'dis/ /des

na dbang zhes brjod par bya/ /shes rab bcu drug lon pa la/ /lag pa dag gis yang dag 'khyud/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor bas/ /slob dpon dbang du rab tu brjod/ /shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma/ /gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan/ /mthe bong srin lag

dag gis ni/ /slob ma'i kha ru ltung bar bya/ /de nyid du ni mnyam pa'i ro/ /slob ma'i spyod yul dag tu bya/ /ston pas shes rab rab tu mchod/ /rjed par byas nas gtad par bya/ /ston pas smras pa sems dpa' che/ /phyag rgya bde ba ldan pa khyer/ /phrag dog khro ba

rnam spangs pa'i/ /slob ma cher gyur shes nas ni/ /ston pas de la gnang ba sbyin/ /kun tu ru gyis rdo rje 'dzin/ /ji ltar dbang bskur gsol btab pa'i/ /slob ma'i bya ba bshad par bya/ /bla ma phyag rgya ldan mthong nas/ /bstod dang mchod pa ji bzhin bya/ /bcom ldan zhi ba

chen po kye/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor gcig bzhed pa/ /mi phyed phyag rgya sgrub pa po/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba/ /ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid che/ /mnga' bdag bdag la'ang de ltar mdzod/ /'khor ba 'dam gyi tshogs nad du/ /bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyobs/ /zhim pa'i bza' ba btung ba dag /

pa la che mchog ma da na/ /bdug pa lha bshos phreng ba dang / /dril bu rgyal mtshan byug pa yis/ /'di rnams mchod pa rnams kyis ni/ /slob mas rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod/ /mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob/ /sna tshogs spangs pa'i skad cig la/ /ston pas smras pa sems dpa' che/ /

bde ba chen po rnam par gzung / /ji srid byang chub bar du ni/ /sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin/ /slob ma snying rje can mthong nas/ /rdo rje can gyis 'di skad smras/ /'di ni ye shes chen po nyid/ /thams cad lus la rnam par gnas/ /gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul/ /dngos dang dngos

med bdag nyid gtso/ /brtan dang g.yo ba khyab nas gnas/ /sgyu ma'i gzugs can nyid du 'dod/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs kyis ni/ /rtag tu nges par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje snying pos rnal 'byor ma rnams la bzod par gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ci zhes brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag grong khyer la/ /bcom ldan bdag ni 'khrul gyur pas/ /rim pa ji ltar bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dkyil ni snying po zhes brjod de/ /byang chub sems ni bde chen po/ /len

par byed pas dkyil 'khor nyid/ /'dus pa dkyil 'khor nyid du brjod/ /'khor lo zhes bya nam mkha'i khams/ /yul la sogs pa rnam par sbyang / /bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas/ /de yi bde ba shes par 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ sdom pa zhes bya gang gis dang / /dam tshig gang gis

gnas par bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /khyod kyis srog chags bsad pa dang / /gyi tshig kyang smra ba dang / /khyod kyis ma byin par yang long / /pha rol bud med bsten par gyis/ /sems gcig srog chags gsod pa nyid/ /gang phyir srog ni sems su brjod/ /

'jig rten bsgral ba zhes bya ba/ /gyi tshig tu rab tu bsgrags/ /btsun mo'i khu ba ma byin par/ /gzhan gyi bud med rang mtshungs mdzes/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /yul de rnams kyang ci lags/ dbang po rnams ni gang

lags/ skye mchid ni ci lags/ phung po rnams ni gang lags/ khams rnams de yang ci lags/ 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yul drug ni/ gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni/ /ro dang de bzhin reg bya dang / /chos

kyi khams kyi rang bzhin nyid/ /'di rnams yul ni drug tu brjod/ dbang po rnams ni drug ste/ mig dang rna ba sna dang ni/ /lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid/ /'di rnams dbang po drug po ni/ /gti mug rdo rje la sogs ldan/ /yul dang yul can dag gis ni/ /skye mched pa nu gnyis

dag tu 'gyur/ /phung po lnga ni gzugs la sogs/ /mthar ni rnam shes snying rje che/ /dbang po dang ni yul nyid dang / /dbang po'i rnam par shes pa nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams go bya'i phyir/ /khams ni brgyad rnams su bshad/ /rang bzhin gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /min

bden min de bzhin du/ /thams cad chu yi zla ba ltar/ /'dod pas rnal 'byor mas shes kyis/ /'di lta ste/ gtsub shing dang gtsub stan dang skyes bu'i lag pa'i rtsol ba las glo bur du me skye bar 'gyur ro/ /me 'di ni gtsub shing la yang mi gnas/ gtsub stan la yang mi gnas/ skyes

bu'i lag pa dag la yang ma yin te/ rnam pa thams cad du yongs su btsal na gcig na'ang yod pa ma yin pas me de yang bden pa yang ma yin zhing pa yang ma yin no/ /de ltar chos thams cad rnal 'byor mas yid la gyis shig /de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa rdo rje

mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis bdud rtsi lnga thogs shing dam tshig gi rdzas thogs pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la mchod par byed/ kun tu ru'i sbyor bas rjes su chags par byed/ bdud rtsi lnga'i ro yang 'thung bar byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas rang byin gyis brlabs

pa bstan pa/ kye kye rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa'i/ /de nyid bdag gis gsang mdzad pa/ /rdo rje mchod pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /bshad kyis 'dod pas rab tu nyon/ /lha mo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ /rangs par gyur te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha

nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa dang / /bgrod dang bgrod min mi spang zhing / /khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste/ /grong gi chos ni

rab tu spangs/ /blo ldan sngags nyid mi bzla zhing / /bsam gtan nyid ni dmigs mi bya/ /gnyid ni spang bar mi bya ste/ /dbang po rnams ni mi dgag go/ /ba la thams cad bza' bar bya/ /kha dog lnga la mnyam par spyad/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /btsun mo thams cad

dga' bar bya/ /mdza' bo sdug par mi bya zhing / /de bzhin gdug la zhe sdang nyid/ /rdo shing 'jim pa'i bdag nyid kyi/ /lha 'di rnams la phyag mi bya/ /g.yung mo gdol ba ko lpags mkhan/ /phyag dar mkhan sogs reg ring dang / /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u dmangs rnams/ /bdag

gi lus ltar reg pa nyid/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang bu ram chang / /dug dang nim pa bu btsas skyes/ /skyur dang mngar dang bska la sogs/ /kha ba lan tshwa tsha ba dang / /dri nga dri zhim mchil snabs rnams/ /byang chub sems bsres rab tu bza'/ /gnyis med ye shes sems kyis ni/ /

mi bza' cung zad yod ma yin/ /rang byung me tog rnyed nas ni/ /pad+ma'i snod du bzhag pa dang / /lud pa dang ni snabs dag gis/ /bsres nas brtul zhugs can gyis btung / /smad g.yogs kha dog sna tshogs dang / /ro bsregs thal bas de bzhin brgyan/ /me tog ra ba song gnas

rnyed pas/ /mgo skyes legs par bcing bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ thams cad yul gyi rnam dag pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar gsungs na/ /nges par dbang po drug gi grangs/ /rnam par dag par ma mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mig

la gti mug rdo rje ma/ /rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma/ /sna la ser sna ma zhes bshad/ /kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ /lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma/ /yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /dbang po rnams ni dag bya'i phyir/ /'dis ni go cha sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ dgongs

pa'i skad ni ci zhes bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis nges par gsungs/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dam tshig che/ /nyan thos la sogs mi shes pa/ /dgod dang lta ba dag gis dang / /'khyud dang de bzhin gnyis gnyis kyi/ /rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis/ /dgongs

pa'i skad ni ma bsgrags pa/ /bcom ldan nges par gsung du gsol/ /dgongs pa yi ni skad chen po/ /dam tshig brda ni rgyas pa ru/ /rdo rje snying po ngas bshad kyis/ /khyod ni rtse gcig sems kyis nyon/ /ma da na chang ba la sha/ /'du ba ma la ya dzar brjod/ /'gro ba khe Ta ro ni shrA pa/ /

rus pa'i rgyan ni ni ra~M shu/ /'ong ba phra~M kha Na ru brjod/ /cang te'u kr-i pI Ta ru brjod/ /skal med du d+hu ra zhes brjod/ /skal ldan kA liny+dza ra~M brjod/ /reg min Di Na Di ma zhes brjod/ /thod pa pad+ma b+ha dza na~M/ /bza' ba tr-ip+ti ka zhes bya/ /tshod ma mA la hAn d+ha na~M/ /bshang ba tsa tuHsa ma~M brjod/ /

gci ba ka stu ri zhes brjod/ /rang byung si grar shes par bya/ /khu ba karU ra zhes brjod/ /sha chen sha li ra~M zhes brjod/ /dbang po gnyis sbyor kun tu ru/ /rdo rje bo la zhas brjod de/ /pad+ma kak+ko la zhes zer/ /kha dog dbye bas phye ba la/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ /'di ni gsang ba'i

skad yin no/ /phyag rgya lnga ni bsdus pa nyid/ /g.yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/ /gar ma de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs/ /rang 'tshed ma ni rin chen rigs/ /skye gnyis de bzhin gshegs par brjod/ /tshos ma las kyi rigs nyid de/ /phyag rgya 'di rnams dngos grub sbyin/ /'di rnams khu

ba rdo rjer 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs can gyis mchod nas btung / /rdo rje snying po sems dpa' che/ /gsang ba'i skad ni mtshar che ba/ /nga yis khyod la gang bshad pa/ /de rnams thams cad gus pas zung / /kye rdo rje 'dir dbang bskur gang / /gsang ba'i skad kyis mi smra ba/ /de yi dam tshig

nyams par ni/ /'gyur bar 'di la the tshom med/ /'tshe ba dang ni rkun ma dang / /gdon dang rims dang dug gis kyang / /gal te sangs rgyas gsang ba'i skad/ /mi gsung na yang 'grongs par 'gyur/ /rang gi dam tshig rigs rnyed nas/ /gal te tshig 'di mi smra na/ /gnas bzhi las

skyes rnal 'byor ma/ /de yi tshe na khro bar byed/ /kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang ba'i skad ces bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad the tshom du gyur/ yid gnyis

su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan the tshom bsal du gsol/ /spyod pa'i le'u las gang bshad pa/ /glu dang gar ni dngos grub sbyin/ /de la bdag ni the tshom mchis/ /glu ni ci lags gar kyang ci/ /lha yi le'u las

gang gsungs pa/ zhe sdang la sogs phyag rgya rnams/ /de la bdag ni the tshom mchis/ /gang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya ci/ /sngags btu ba las gang gsungs pa/ /bdag med la sogs sa bon nyid/ /de la bdag ni 'khrul par gyur/ /gang gi sa bon sa bon gang / /rigs kyi

le'u las gang bshad pa/ /bcu drug gnyis kyi bdag nyid rtsa/ /bcom ldan bdag ni 'khrul gyur pas/ /de rnams rnam dag bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /kol+la i ri T+Thi a bo lA/ mum+mu Ni re kak+ko lA/ g+ha Na kiM pi Ta ho badz+dza i/ ku ru Ni ki a

i Na ro lA/ ta hiM ba la khadz+dza i/ gaD+heM ma a NA pi dz+dza a i/ ha le kA li ny+dza ra pa Ni a i/ dun+du ru pA dz+dzi a i/ tsa us ma kats+tshur sih+lA kap+pu ra lA i a i/ mA la i in+d+ha Na sA liny+dza ta hi~M b+ha ru kha i a e/ phe~M kha Na khe Ta ka ran+te shud+d+hA shud+d+hA na mu Ni a i/ ni rang shu a~M ge tsa DA wi ta hi dzi sa rA

ba pa Ni a i/ ma la ya dze kun+du ru bA Ta i/ DiN+Di ma ta hiN+Na badz+dzi a i/ dran pa mi 'phrog rnal 'byor bas/ /he ru ka yi gzugs kyis gar/ /chags bral mi goms sems kyis ni/ /'dod chags sems kyis bsgoms pa nyid/ /rdo rje chos dang sangs rgyas dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang ma

ma yas/ /glu dang gar ni 'di dag gis/ /legs par glu blang gar kyang bya/ /'di nyid kyis ni tshogs bsrung zhing / /de bzhin bdag kyang bsrung ba nyid/ /'dis ni 'jig rten dbang du byed/ /'dis ni sngags kyi bzlas pa nyid/ /gang du gus pas glu len dang / /gang du gus bcas gar byed

pa/ /tshogs kyi bdag pos sngar byas nas/ /de la dri ni mtshon par bya/ /sgog pa'i dri ni dang po nyid/ /de nas yang ni bya rgod dri/ /ga bur ma la ya dza~M nyid/ /ngang pa dang ni bung ba'i sgra/ /glu yi mtha' nas mnyan par bya/ /ba lang tshe yi sgra yang ni/ /phyi rol tshal du

mtshon bya dang / /gru yi byin brlabs mtshan nyid do/ /phyag rgya rtags dang mtshan ma ste/ /'dis ni rigs ni mtshon par bya/ /rigs 'tshol bsgom pa'i sbyor ba las/ /dngos grub med cing sgrub po'ang med/ /zhe sdang phyag rgyas bdag med ma/ /gti mug phyag rgyas rdo rje ma/ /

ser sna'i phyag rgyas dkar mo nyid/ /chags pas chu ma phyag rgyas gdab/ /phrag dog phyag rgyas mkha' 'gro ma/ /zhe sdang phyag rgyas puk+ka sI/ /gti mug phyag rgyas ri khrod ma/ /ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdol ba mo/ /'dod chags phyag rgyas g.yung mo nyid/ /yang ni dkar mo zhe sdang

las/ /gti mug phyag rgyas chom rkun ma/ /ser sna'i phyag rgyas ro langs ma/ /'dod chags phyag rgyas g+hasma rI/ /gti mug phyag rgyas sa spyod ma/ /'dod chags phyag rgyas mkha' spyod ma/ /'dod pas phyag rgyar shes par bya/ /A li dang po bdag med ma/ /A li gnyis pa rdo rje

ma/ /A li gsum pa dkar mo nyid/ /bzhi pa chu yi rnal 'byor ma/ /lnga pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /drug pa puk+ka sI zhes brjod/ /bdun pa nyid ni ri khrod ma/ /brgyad pa sme sha can du brjod/ /dgu pa yang ni g.yung mo nyid/ /yang ni lnga gnyis dkar mo nyid/ /bcu gcig chom rkun ma

zhes bshad/ /bcu gnyis ro langs ma zhes brjod/ /bcu gsum pa ni g+hasma rI/ /bcu bzhi pa ni sa spyod ma/ /lnga pa ni mkha' spyod ma/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sa bon nyid/ /rigs kyi le'u las rtsa rnams gang / /bcu drug gnyis kyi bdag nyid gsungs/ /rtsa ni gnyis gnyis rnal

'byor ma/ /re re rnam pa gsum du brjod/ /ro ma kun 'dar ma/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ma zhes brjod/ /gang phyir bcu drug cha med pas/ /'bad pas kun gyi lhag ma spangs/ /ci'i slad du zhe na/ don gyi bya ba mi byed phyir/ /lnga'i cha yi bdag nyid kyi/ /zla ba byang chub sems

su 'gyur/ /bde ba chen po A li'i gzugs/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams de yi cha/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol ba/ rnal 'byor ma kun las byung ba/ /lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nyid/ /'grib med btung mchog nam mkha' nyid/ /ga bur nges par cis mi spang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol ba/ thabs gang gis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs dang ni/ /rang byin rlabs pa'i rim pas kyang / /kun rdzob don dam gzugs

can gyi/ /byang chub sems ni rab tu bskyed/ /kun rdzob kun da lta bu nyid/ /don dam bde ba'i gzugs can no/ /bud med kak+ko la bde ba can/ /e ba~M rnam pa'i rang bzhin du/ /bde ba bsrung ba nyid kyi phyir/ /bde ba can zhes rab tu bsgrags/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /

rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyi gnas/ /'di nyid 'khor ba zhes bya ste/ /'di nyid mya ngan 'das pa nyid/ /'khor ba spangs nas gzhan du ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa rtogs mi 'gyur/ /'khor ba gzugs dang sgra la sogs/ /'khor ba tshor ba la sogs pa/ /'khor ba dbang po rnam nyid do/ /'khor ba

zhe sdang la sogs pa/ /'di rnams chos ni mya ngan 'das/ /rmongs phyir 'khor ba'i gzugs can nyid/ /rmongs med 'khor ba dag pas ni/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni mya ngan 'das/ /kun rdzob don dam tshul can no/ /shin tu bzhin mig yangs

ma/ /gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan/ /sngo bsangs dal ma rigs bzang ma/ /si h+la ga pur 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rang gis dbang bskur kye'i rdo rje/ /skra bzang sgrub pa po la dga'/ /der ni chang yang btung bar bya/ /de nas rang yang btung ba nyid/ /rang bzhin don ni rab

bsgrub phyir/ /phyi nas phyag rgya rjes chags bya/ /bo la kak+ko lar bcug nas/ /kun tu ru byed brtul zhugs can/ /der ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i/ /ga bur mkhas pas mi spang ste/ /de ni lag tu mi blang zhing / /nya phyis dung chos nyid du min/ /nges par blo dang stobs kyi phyir/ /mi 'chi

lce yis blang ba nyid/ /ga bur nyid ni bdag med ma/ /bde ba bdag med tshul can nyid/ /de yi bde ba phyag rgya che/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas/ /dang po'i dbyangs yig rang bzhin te/ /blo zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor las/ /

de nyid bcom ldan shes rab ma/ /de ni ring min thung ba min/ /gru bzhi ma yin zlum po min/ /dri dang ro dang myang las 'das/ /lhan cig skyes dga' byed pa can/ /de las skyes pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /de yi bde ba za ba nyid/ /de dang lhan cig phyag rgya che/ /bde ba sbyin pa'i dngos

grub 'gyur/ /gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni/ /ro dang de bzhin reg bya nyid/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yang / /shes rab nyid kyis dpyad par bya/ /de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs/ /bde chen bzang po'i rnal 'byor ma/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang / /ye shes lnga

yi rang bzhin can/ /de ni me long ye shes gzugs/ /mnyam nyid ye shes dngos po can/ /yang dag gyur pa so sor rtog /de nyid bya ba nan tan te/ /chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag ma/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor bdag po nga / /de nyid bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi

rang bzhin can/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol ba/ 'khor lo bsgom pa'i lam dang ni/ /lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid/ /thams cad bcom ldan 'das gsungs na/ /sdom pa'ang bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rnal 'byor ma lus dbus gnas su/ /

a yi rnam pa sdom pa'i gnas/ /ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang / /sdom pa de nyid rab tu phye/ /bo la'i bde ba phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje skye mched thabs chen nyid/ /'dis ni gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pas/ /phyi rol gnyis gnyis bstan pa med/ /sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni/ /'khor lo'i

gzugs ni brjod par bya/ /sku gsum yongs su shes pa ni/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor brjod/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang / /de bzhin du yang bde chen nyid/ /skye gnas snying mgrin mgo bor yang / /sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas/ /ma lus pa yi sems can gyi/ /skye ba

gang la brjod bya ba/ /gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir/ /de las sprul pa'i sku nyid yin/ /gang gis skyed dang sprul byed pa'i/ /sku ni sprul pa can zhes brjod/ /sems ni chos kyi rang bzhin te/ /chos kyi sku yang snying gar 'gyur/ /ro rnam drug gi gzugs can gyi/ /bza' ba nges par

longs spyod brjod/ /mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo dang / /spyi bor bde ba chen po gnas/ /e ba~M rnam par rgyu mthun nyid/ /rnam smin chos kyi 'khor lo las/ /longs spyod skyes bu byed pa nyid/ /bde ba'i 'khor lo dri med nyid/ /rgyu mthun sogs pas rab phye ba'i/ /'bras bu rnam pa bzhi

zhes brjod/ /las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis/ /las la bcom ldan shes rab spyod/ /ji ltar byas pa de bzhin spyod/ /rgyu mthun zhes ni rab tu bsgrags/ /las chung 'bras bu che ba'i phyir/ /rnam par smin pa de las bzlog /rnal 'byor dag phyir dri med nyid/ /skyed pa skyes bu'i byed pa

nyid/ /gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas brtan nyid/ /chos ni smra ba 'byung ba'i phyir/ /chos kyi 'khor lor thams cad yod/ /gang phyir mgrin par kun bkur phyir/ /longs spyod 'khor lor kun bkur nyid/ /gang phyir bde chen mgor gnas pas/ /

bde ba'i 'khor lor dge 'dun che/ /sde pa zhes bya sku ru brjod/ /lto ba gnas su brjod par bya/ /skye gnas 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur/ /mngal gyi phru ma chos gos nyid/ /de bzhin ma ni mkhan po nyid/ /mgo bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag /'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyi gnas/ /sngags

kyi bzlas pa a dang ha~M/ /skye gnas 'khor lo'i rnam pa a/ /bde chen gyi yeng rnam pa ha~M/ /gcer bu skra dang kha spu bregs/ /sngags 'don skyes pa dge slong nyid/ /'di dag rkyen gyis sems can rnams/ /sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med/ /zla ba bcu yangs rnams yin/ /sems can sa

bcu'i dbang phyug go/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa'i lha mo thams cad la 'di lta ste/ spyan ma dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / tsun dA dang / par+N+Na ri khrod ma dang / 'og zhal ma dang / de dag la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang

mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis tshig 'di dag thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar bar gyur cing brgyal ba dang / skrag pa dang / sa la 'gyel ba dang / 'dar bar 'gyur ro/ /yang rdo rje can gyis lha mo de rnams thams cad la gzigs nas/ bslang ba'i phyir yang dag par

bstod pa/ sa dang chu dang rlung byin za'i/ /lha mo snod can khyed nyid la/ /gang zhig sus kyang mi shes pa/ /de nyid nga yis spro yi nyon/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rmi lam lta bu nye bar thos nas de rnams thams cad srog rnyed par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /

sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /'on kyang glo bur dri mas bsgribs/ /de nyid bsal na sangs rgyas nyid/ /lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ bden yang ma mchis zhing yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gang

gis mi shes 'jig rten pa/ /btsan dug zos pas brgyal bar 'gyur/ /rmongs spangs de nyid yid kyis ni/ /de yis de nyid yongs su gcod/ /de bzhin zhi ba'i thabs shes shing / /kye yi rdo rjer ngal bsos na/ /ma rig la sogs mi 'dzin cing / /gti mug la sogs

'ching bas min/ /rang dang rang gis rtogs pa las/ /sangs rgyas ma yin sems can ni/ /gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no/ /dmyal ba byol song dang / /lha dang lha min mi rnams dang / /bshang ba'i srin bu la sogs pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi yang / /bde ba gang phyir

mi shes pas/ /rtag tu rang bzhin bde ba can/ /'jig rten khams ni gang du yang / /sangs rgyas gzhan du rnyed mi 'gyur/ /sems ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid/ /sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan du med/ /gdol ba smyig mkhan la sogs pa/ /gsod don don du sems pa po/ /

de rnams kye rdo rjer shes na/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med/ /byis pa mi shes pas bsgribs pa/ /'di yi 'gro ba mi shes pa/ /'gro ba drug gi srid pa'i mthar/ /gang zhig rmongs pa 'khor bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying po snying rje che/ /kye yi rdo rje'i thabs rnyed pas/ /gang zhig yul rnams

rnam sbyong ba/ /de ni bla med rnyed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol ba/ sa ni puk+ka sIr bshad pa/ /gang phyir gti mug sra ba nyid/ /sku ni rnam snang nyid gsungs pa/ /ji ltar mi bskyod phyag rgya lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sems spangs nas ni lus kyis
