ni/ /mdzes pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyir rnam par snang mdzad sems/ /sku la thugs kyi phyag rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol ba/ /chu khams ri khrod mar bshad pa/ /mi bskyod khu ba'i gzugs can nyid/ /gtso bo mi bskyod phyag rgyas ni/ /ri khrod ma la phyag rgyar rigs/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /lus spangs nas ni sems kyis ni/ /gnas pa gzhan du mthong mi 'gyur/ /de phyir sems ni gti mug 'gyur/ /thugs la gti mug phyag rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ me ni gdol ba mor bshad pa/ /'dod chags phyag rgyas gdol

ba mo/ /rigs te phyag rgya gzhan min na/ /ji ltar rin chen phyag rgya lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gang phyir 'dod chags khrag bshad pa/ /khrag ni rin chen 'byung ldan nyid/ /drod ni khrag gi rang bzhin phyir/ /'dod chags ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje snying

pos gsol pa/ gang phyir g.yung mo rlung nyid de/ /don yod rlung gi gzugs can nyid/ /don yod phyag rgyas g.yung mo la/ /gtso bo phyag rgyar rigs par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /'dod chags ma gtogs phrag dog ni/ /gzhan du 'byung ba ma yin te/ /

de phyir 'dod chags phyag rgya yis/ /mkhas pas gsung mo phyag rgyas gdab/ /gang phyir gzugs ni sra ba nyid/ /dkar mo snang mdzad gsungs pa nyid/ /sngar gsungs nyid kyi rim pa yis/ /sems kyi bdag pos phyag rgyas gdab/ /de nyid rigs pas chom rkun ma/ /de bzhin ro langs

ma nyid dang / /de yi rigs pas g+hasma rI/ /ma log pa las phyag rgya'o/ /kye yi rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /snyoms 'jug gnas pa'i lha nyid la/ /sems can don phyir gtor ma che/ /de la bdag med mas zhus pa/ /e ba~M rnam par bzhugs nas ni/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa las/ /sems

can rnams kyi srog bsrung phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpas gtor ma bstan/ /oM in+da dza ma dza la dza kla/ b+hu ta ba h+ni bA u rak+kha tsan+da sudz+dza mAd bap+ba ta la pA tA le aT+Tha sa p+ba swA hA/ i dam ba ling b+huny+dza dzi g+ha phul+la d+hup+pa mAM sa biM g+ha/ am+b+ha sab+ba kadz+dza sA d+ha khan+ti khu Ni pe Da gA de/ oM

a kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+har+m+mA NAM Ang+ya nut+pan+natwA ta/ oM AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ gal te 'di'i gtor mas 'byung po thams cad mchod par byed na rnal 'byor pa rnams legs par 'gyur te/ de rnams la bde ba dri ma med pa dang / lha mo rnams dang / 'gro ba rab tu 'byor pa rnams dga'

bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'dis 'byung po'i tshogs kyi phyir rtag tu gtor ma phyin na dbang dang / mngon spyod dang / dgra'i sde 'jig pa dang / bskrad pa dang / bsad pa dang / dgug pa dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas par yang 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ phyag rgya

gang gis mkha' spyod ma/ /gang gis phyag rgyas sa spyod ma/ /gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal/ /bcom ldan ji ltar phyag rgya bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gsang gsum 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /sku gsung thugs su phye pa las/ /steng dang 'og dang

dbus gnas pa'i/ /'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par gnas/ /sa spyod sku yi phyag rgya can/ /steng zhal sku yi rdo rje ma/ /mkha' spyod 'dod chags phyag rgya can/ /'og zhal gsung gi rdo rje ma/ /thugs kyi rdo rje bdag med ma/ /sems ni bdag med tshul can nyid/ /sems ni dbus kyi

gnas su ste/ /des na bdag med ma dbus skye/ /rgyas par rab tu phye ba las/ /rigs ni rnam pa drug tu brjod/ /rnam gsum rnam pa lnga nyid kyang / /bshad kyis rnal 'byor ma nyid nyon/ /mi bskyod rnam snang rin chen 'byung / /dpag med don grub rdo rje sems/ /zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang / /

'dod chags phrag dog bde ba dag /'dis ni rim pas bsgom pa nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' spangs nas ni/ /phyi nas rigs ni rnam pa lnga/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis/ /de rjes rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /mi bskyod zhe sdang gzugs can gyi/ /thugs kyi bdag po rigs gcig nyid/ /

zhe sdang rdo rje'i byin rlabs 'di/ /rigs ni drug dang lnga ru brjod/ /kye'i rdo rje las rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsdus pa'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /gtso bo kye rdor kun sbyin pas/ /rnam kun rang bzhin bdag nyid kyi/ /dkyil 'khor

dag ni yang dag gsungs/ /rnam pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ /bde ba can na yang dag bzhugs/ /thugs kyi rdo rje'i sa bon gyis/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ste/ /phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa/ /zhabs bzhi pa la 'jigs pa po/ /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /bdag

med mas ni mgul nas 'khyud/ /phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin lha la/ /bdag med ma ni nyid kyis zhus/ /lngas yongs su bskor ba yi/ /bdag gi 'khor lo khyod bshad na/ /khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags/ /gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal/ /bdag med ma la 'o mdzad nas/ /rdo rje thod

par stsal nas ni/ /lha yi nu ma mnye mdzad de/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag rab tu dbye/ /'khor lo ji ltar sngar gsungs pa/ /do shal do shal phyed pas brgyan/ /mtshams bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ba/ /rdo rje srad bus yang dag brgyan/ /'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas/ /lhan cig skyes

dga'i rang bzhin las/ /khyod dang lhan cig bzhin ma/ /de la dbus su nga yod de/ /zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa/ /phyag ni bcu drug gis brgyan pa/ /bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa nyid/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs pa'o/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas do shal mdzad/ /nyi

mar bzhugs shing rol mor bcas/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs pa po/ /sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin/ /nyid kyi zhal nas hU~M spro zhing / /thal bas lus la byugs pa nyid/ /bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing / /dga' ba gnyis gnyis snyoms 'jug pas/ /dba' rlabs med pa'i bde ba

po/ /rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po che/ /g.yas pa la ni kun da mtshungs/ /g.yon pa dmar zhing cher 'jigs pa/ /spyi bo'i zhal ni gtsigs pa can/ /spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhis che/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin/ /grong khyer nyams dgar khyod dang

nga / /dga' bas shin tu rol ba las/ /dkar mo dbang po'i phyogs phyung nas/ /shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas/ /srub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba las/ /chom rkun ma yang phyung nas ni/ /phyung nas lho yi sgo ru ni/ /chom rkun ma ni sgo srungs ma/ /bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas/ /

ro langs ma yang phyung nas ni/ /phyung nas nub kyi sgo ru ni/ /bdud 'joms ma ni rnam par gnas/ /dga' ba chen po'i snyoms 'jug las/ /g+hA sma rI yang phyung nas ni/ /phyung nas byang gi sgo la ni/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas/ /gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba

las/ /puk+ka sI yang phyung nas ni/ /phyung nas dbang ldan mtshams su ni/ /drag po'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas/ /yang ni srub pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'tshed pa'i mtshams su ri khrod ma/ /srin po'i mtshams su gdol pa mo/ /rlung gi mtshams su g.yung mo nyid/ /de nas rdo rje

chags chen las/ /rig mar bcas pa khu bar gyur/ /sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa las/ /de nas lha mo rnams kyis bskul/ /rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs shig /buk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs/ /stong ba'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la/ /bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhed mdzod/ /

khyod med na ni bdag 'gums pas/ /kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig /stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la/ /ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod/ /dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer ba/ /stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci/ /khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas/ /gdol pa mo bdag

du ba bgyid/ /bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis/ /mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig /g.yung mo bdag nyid dran mnyam pas/ /snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig /glang po rta bong glang rnga mo/ /mi dang sha ra b+ha byi la/ /g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams la/ /gnyis 'thung

la sogs rim shes bya/ /sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni/ /me dang zla ba nyi ma nyid/ /mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid/ /g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o/ /sgeg cing dpa' bo mi sdug pa/ /rgod cing drag shul 'jigs rung ba/ /snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yis/ /gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa nyid/ /oM dang

hU~M gis rdo rje che/ /khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs nas ni/ /zhabs rnams sa la brdebs pa dang / /lha dang lha min bsdigs par mdzad/ /ga~M tsa~M ba~M g+ha~M/ sha~M tsa~M la~M Da~M/ 'di yis sa bon phyung ba las/ /bdag po'i sa bon dag gis ni/ /oM hU~M sngon po 'bar 'jigs pas/ /ma mo'i 'khor

lo grong nyams dgar/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/ /bdag med bde ba sbyin pa po/ /gtso bo 'di ltar bsgom pa nyid/ /dkar mo'i g.yas na gri gug ste/ /de bzhin g.yon na ro hi ta/ /chom rkun ma g.yas cang te'u ste/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na phag pa nyid/ /ro langs ma g.yas rus

sbal te/ /g.yon pa yis ni pad+ma'i snod/ /g+hasma rI yi g.yas na sprul/ /g.yon pas rnal 'byor lhung bzed nyid/ /puk+ka sI g.yas seng+ge ste/ /g.yon pas dgra sta de bzhin no/ /ri khrod ma g.yas dge slong ste/ /g.yon pas bsil byed de bzhin no/ /gdol pa mo g.yas 'khor lo

ste/ /g.yon pas thod pa de bzhin no/ /g.yung mo g.yas na rdo rje nyid/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub de bzhin no/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas/ /dkar mo la sogs phyag gnyis brjod/ /spyan gsum skra ni gyen du ste/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /gau rI kha dog nag

por 'gyur/ /chom rkun ma ni bcod dang mtshungs/ /ro langs ma ni gser btsos bzhin/ /g+ha sma rI ni ma rgad mtshungs/ /puk+ka sI ni dbang sngon mtshungs/ /ri khrod ma ni zla nor 'od/ /gtum mo nam mkha'i sngo sangs ma/ /g.yung mo sna tshogs pa zhes brjod/ /tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang

drag/ /gshin rje dang ni nor bdag dang / /bden bral dang ni thags ris/ /gau rI la sogs pa yi gdan/ /bo la gzhib par mdzad nas ni/ /dam du 'khyud cing 'o mdzad pas/ /bcom ldan gus pas mchod nas ni/ /bdag med ma yis sngags zhus so/ /bud med

rnams kyi dbang byed sngags/ /de bzhin gdug pa sdigs pa dang / /klu rnams sdigs par byed pa nyid/ /lha dang lha min rnam nyed pa/ /de ni nga yis bshad bya yis/ /lha mo bde ba sbyin ma nyon/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la/ /bdag gis gzhan du ma bstan to/ /

'di yi sngags kyis gang byung zhing / /rdo rje sems dpas gang mdzad pa/ /lha mo shin tu 'jigs pa ste/ /ngo mi chog pas khyod la bshad/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrug pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu bzhengs nas ni/ /rdo rje snying po dbang sbyin phyir/ /thig le mchog ni bkug pa

nyid/ /bzlas pa khri yis gsal ba dang / /sgra ring ba dang bzang ba yis/ /kye yi rdo rje sbyor ldan pas/ /btsun mo thams cad dgug par bya/ /bzlas pa 'bum gyis rnal 'byor bdag /kye yi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /'di yis las rnams thams

cad byed/ /rig byed rnams kyi dang po sbyin/ /zla phyed thig les rnam par brgyan/ /de nas aSh+TA na nA ya/ piM ga ur+d+ha ke sha brtam ne/ tsa turba sha ti ni tA ya/ de'i rjes su/ Sho Da shwab+hu dzA ya/ kr-iSh+NA dzI mU ta wa pu She ka bA la mA lA nai ka d+hA ri Ne/ A d+ha mA taH/ krUr tsit+tA ya ar d+he na du daMSh+Ti

Ne/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ka ra ya kA ra ya/ gar+dz+dza ya gar+dz+dza ya/ tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+da ya/ shoSho ya sho Sha ya/ sab+ta sA ga rA ni/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha nA gASh+Ta kA~M gr-ih+na gr-ih+na sha trU~M/ ha hA hi hI hu hU he haM ho hau haM haHphaT swA hA/ de nas lha mo de dgyes nas/ /srub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba las/ /

dam du 'khyud dang 'o byed pas/ /dkyil 'khor yid du 'ong ba zhus/ /de la ston pa ye shes che/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas/ /dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mnyam gzhag pas/ /nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzad/ /'phar ma gA cig dang sgo bzhi pa/ /sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag 'khrugs/ /

rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje srud bus rnam par brgyan/ /re khA lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /de nas bum pa brgyad po bri/ /rin chen lnga yi phye ma'am/ /yang na 'bras la sogs pa yi/ /dur khrod kyi ni so phag gam/ /de bzhin dur khrod sol ba yis/ /de dbus pad+mA 'dab ma ni/ /

brgyad pa ze bar bcas pa bri/ /snying por skyes pa'i thod pa nyid/ /mdog dkar cha ni gsum pa bri/ /dbang ldan du ni shar b+ha/ /me yi mtshams su dge slong bri/ /bden bral du ni 'khor lo bri/ /rlung du rigs kyi bdag po bri/ /shar sgor de bzhin gri gug nyid/ /lho ru cang te'u bri ba nyid/

nub tu rus sbal bri ba nyid/ /lto 'phye byang du de bzhin no/ /lha mo'i kha dog dbye ba yis/ /phyag mtshan brgyad du rab tu grags/ /dbus su thod pa dkar po yang / /sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bri/ /de nas rnam rgyal bum pa nyid/ /yal ga'i rtse mo gos bzang can/ /lto ba rin chen

lngas gang ba/ /sA lu skyes pas yongs bkang bzhag /mang du rab tu brjod pas ci/ /ji ltar de nyid bsdus pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga de bzhin bya/ /bcu gnyis brgyad gnyis lon pa yi/ /rig ma bde chen brgyad po nyid/ /do shal rkang gdub kyis brgyan nas/ /dkyil 'khor

du ni rab tu gzhug /ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang / /bu mo sring mo tsha mo dang / /de bzhin zhang po'i chung ma dang / /ma yi spun dang sgyug mo dang / /de bzhin pha yi sring mo nyid/ /rig ma brgyad du rab tu grags/ /dam du 'khyud dang 'o byed pas/ /'di rnams rnal 'byor pa yis mchod/ /

de las ga bur btung ba nyid/ /des ni dkyil 'khor bsang gtor bya/ /de rnams rnal 'byor bas btung bya/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /de la chang yang btung ba dang / /sha dang sA lu skyes pa bza'/ /de yang gos dang bral byas nas/ /b+ha gar 'o ni yang dag bya/ /des

kyang bol+la gzhib par bya/ /gar bya glu yang blang bar bya/ /bol+la kak+ko la sbyar nas/ /de la rtsed mo rtse bar bya/ /de nas thun tshod gnyis pa la/ /gos kyis mig ni bkab nas su/ /der ni slob ma gzhug pa nyid/ /phyi nas dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan/ /mtshan mo skye bo med khyim

du/ /slob dpon la sogs rab phye nas/ /dbang ni ji ltar gsungs pa nyid/ /de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /ji ltar mchod dang bstod bshad pa/ /slob ma bzang pos sngar shes bya/ /de la de nyid bstan pa ni/ /dga' bral dang po mchog mtha' can/ /thams cad rgyud du sbas pa

ste/ /mtha' yi mtha' ru phye ba nyid/ /rdo rje mchod pa rab sbyar nas/ /de la lha mo des zhus pa/ /lha de'i skad cig ji ltar lags/ /gtso bo chen pos bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /der ni thog ma dbus mtha' med/ /srid med mya ngan 'das pa

med/ /'di ni mchog tu bde chen nyid/ /bdag med gzhan yang med pa nyid/ /longs spyod kyi ni rlabs gnyis la/ /rang gi g.yas dang lag gzhan gyi/ /mthe bong dang ni srin lag gis/ /de ni rnal 'byor pa yis btsir/ /de nas ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /de las ci

zhig skye zhe na/ /gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta'am/ /lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta'o/ /mchog gi mtha' dang dga' bral dbus/ /stong dang stong min he ru ka/ /kye rdo rje las kye rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //lha mo la ni dam 'khyud cing / /bol+la

thod par bcug nas ni/ /dam du nu ma bzung mdzad nas/ /skyes pa'i sna ni gzhibs nas kyang / /tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni/ /mchan khung sen mos rma mdzad de/ /mnyam sbyor bde ba myong mdzad nas/ /phyag rgya lnga ni rab phye ba/ /bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha la/ /phyag 'tshal

don du 'khor lo 'dzin/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ /smod tshig mi nyan pa yi phyir/ /rna ba dag tu rna cha 'dzin/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa mgul rgyan nyid/ /gdu bu srog chags gsod pa spangs/ /phyag rgya bsten pa ska rags nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgyas ni/ /rtag tu lus la

phyag rgyas gdab/ /de nas rab tu bzhad mdzad nas/ /tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni/ /kye yi rdo rje zhes bya ba/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can nyid/ /de la lha mo des zhus pa/ /gtso bo cho ga gang gis dang / /de bzhin bya ba gang gis ni/ /kye rdo rje yi bris sku ni/ /byed pa bde ba

chen pos gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /'dir ni 'dri mkhan dam tshig can/ /sgrub po'ang dam tshig can gyis ni/ /bris sku 'jigs pa bri ba nyid/ /skyes pa'i thod gnas kha dog lnga/ /ro yi skra yi pir nyid kyis/ /byis sku bla ma bri ba nyid/ /gang gang skud pa

'khal ba dang / /gang gang ras yug 'thag pa yang / /de yang dam tshig can nges pas/ /dam tshig byin rlabs rnal 'byor pas/ /zla ba zla ba'i mar ngo yi/ /bcu bzhi pa la khyim dben par/ /phyed nam rungs sems kyis ni/ /chang gi btung ba cung zad las/ /lus la ni ra~M shu bsams

nas/ /de bzhin gcer bur gyur pas kyang / /'bags pa dang ni ma dag pas/ /de nas dam tshig rab tu bza'/ /bzhin snying rje ldan pa dang / /gzugs dang lang tsho skal bzang ma/ /me tog bcas shing sgrub por dga'/ /rang gi phyag rgya g.yon du gzhag /kye'i rdo rje las

bris sku'i cho ga'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas de la lha mos zhus/ /bol+la kak+ko la sbyar nas/ /tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni/ /glegs bam yang ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas/ /dgyes pas lha yis rab phye ba/ /glegs bam nga yis bshad bya yis/ /lha

mo skal ba chen mo nyon/ /sbrang chen snag tsha byas nas ni/ /mi yi rus pa'i smyu gus ni/ /glegs bam sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /gro gar dam tshig can gyis bri/ /glegs bam dang ni bris sku nyid/ /gal te skal med mthong na ni/ /skye ba 'dir ni dngos grub med/ /'jig rten pha rol spyod

yul med/ /yang dag rab sbyin ldan pa la/ /res 'ga' tsam zhig bstan pa nyid/ /glegs bam lam gyi spyod yul du/ /skra dang mchan khung nyid du sba/ /b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas/ /yang dang yang du 'o mdzad nas/ /bde chen mnyam par myong mdzad de/ /rdo rje can gyis

bza' ba bstan/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bzo' ba ni/ /nyon cig lha mo mig yangs ma/ /gang du zos pas 'dod don kun/ /sgrub pa can gyi dngos grub 'gyur/ /dur khrod ri yi bya skyibs dang / /de bzhin mi med grong khyer dang / /yang na dben pa'am rgya mtsho'i mthar/ /bza' ba 'di

ni rab tu bza'/ /de la gdan du brtag pa ni/ /ro yi gzugs can dgu dang ni/ /yang na stag gi pags pa dang / /dur khrod ras ni de bzhin no/ /dbus su kye rdo rje yi gzugs/ /ji ltar sngar bzhin gnas shes nas/ /phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu yang / /de nas rnal 'byor ma rnams

dgod/ /dam tshig mA la tin+dA naM/ /stag gi pags pa'i steng du bza'/ /'bad pas rgyal po sA lu yi/ /bza' ba der ni bza' ba nyid/ /der ni zos nas zos nas kyang / /der ni ma mo mchod par bya/ /sring mo bu mo sgyug mo dang / /gal te ma sring yin na yang / /de rnams

rtag tu legs mchod na/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par gyur/ /skyes pa'i thod chen cha gcig par/ /chang ni bzang pos yongs bkang ste/ /bla ma la dbul skal chen ma/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni rang yang btung / /pad+ma'i lag pas blangs pa dang / /de nyid kyi ni lag pas

dbul/ /yang nas yang du rab 'dud pa/ /de ltar sgrub pa po yis bya/ /kye'i rdo rje las bza' ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor mas zhus pa/ /phyag rgya chen po ji lta bu/ /kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /bde ba sbyin pas bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /shin tu ring min thung ba min/ /gnag pha ma yin dkar ba min/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa 'dra/ /de yi dbugs ni dri zhim ldan/ /rdul kyang dri zhim ldan 'gyur te/ /lte ba'i dri dang mtshungs/ /pad+ma la yang dbang mchog dri/ /skad cig pad+ma lta bu

'byung / /de yi ga pur sih+la dag /mkhas pas dri bzang mtshon par bya/ /ut+pa la yi drir 'gyur zhing / /a ka ru ni nag po mtshungs/ /dal zhing mi g.yo ba nyid dang / /snyan par smra zhing yid 'ong ma/ /skra bzang dbus su gnyer ma gsum/ /phal pas pad+ma can du brjod/ /lhan cig skyes

pa'i gzugs can ma/ /de rnyed nas ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med mas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das smon lam ji ltar gdab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rigs su skye dang dam tshig can/ /smyo med kye yi rdo rje ston/ /bla ma la gus snying

rjer ldan/ /skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog /lag pas rdo rje dril bu 'khrol/ /zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang / /btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam bzas can/ /skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog /de nas lha mo de dgyes nas/ /tshig ni 'di nyid yang zhus pa/ /skal med sems can gdul dka'

ba/ /gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dang por gso sbyong sbyin par bya/ /de rjes bslab pa'i gnas bcu nyid/ /de la bye brag smra ba bstan/ /mdo sde pa yang de bzhin no/ /de nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid/ /de yi rjes la dbu ma bstan/ /

sngags kyi rim pa kun shes nas/ /de rjes kye yi rdo rje brtsam/ /slob mas gus par blangs nas ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /kye'i rdo rje las 'dul ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas kha sbyar 'byed pa yi/ /mtshan nyid yang dag rab tu bshad/ /gang gis rnam par shes tsam

gyis/ /sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba/ /bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i rtsa ba la/ /brtul zhugs can gyi lag pas gdon/ /he ru ka mnyam rnal 'byor gyis/ /nang gi ma rungs sems kyis ni/ /'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig /bstan la gnod pa

byed pa dang / /bla ma sangs rgyas 'jig pa ni/ /bla ma thub pa la zhus nas/ /snying rjes gsad par bya ba nyid/ /ji ltar phyugs kyi gzugs mthong nas/ /khrag ni skyugs pa nyid dang yang / /'dar zhing mgo skyes grol ba dang / /kha ni 'og tu rnam par sgom/ /de yi lam du khab ni me'i/ /gzugs

can 'jug par bsam pa ste/ /snying gar byin za'i sa bon nyid/ /dmigs nas skad cig gsod par byed/ /rgyud 'di la ni sreg blugs med/ /phyag rgya bcing dang bya ba'ang med/ /rgyud chen bklags pas 'grub pa nyid/ /bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtog med dngos

grub sbyin pa po/ /srid pa sbyong ba nyams dga' bar/ /gsang ba mchog ni bshad bya yis/ /nyon cig lha mo bzhin ma/ /rin chen gzi brjid 'bar ba yi/ /phreng ba 'khrugs pa lha mo ltos/ /ma phug pas ni sbyor bral 'gyur/ /phug pas dga' ba sbyin pa'o/ /de ltar

'khor bar 'dod pa yi/ /yon tan lnga ldan rin chen nyid/ /ma dag pas ni dug tu 'gro/ /dag pas bdud rtsi lta bur 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i rnam pa he ru ka/ /'gro ba sgrol ba'i gtso bo nyid/ /gang gi gzugs kyis 'gyur ba nyid/ /de ni nga yis smra yis nyon/ /snying rje'i spyan ni

dmar po la/ /byams pa'i thugs la yan lag gnag /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yis ni/ /zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod/ /zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad/ /phyag ni stong pa bcu drug nyid/ /gug skyed kyis ni sangs rgyas lnga/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir

khro bo nyid/ /sha ni puk+ka sI ru brjod/ /de bzhin khrag ni ri khrod me/ /gdol ba mo ni khu bar brjod/ /g.yung mo rkang dang tshil bu dag /pags pa byang chub yan lag bdun/ /rus pa bden pa bzhi po nyid/ /bdag med mas gsol ba/ sngags btu ba ni

ji ltar 'gyur/ /gang gi sngags kyis skye bo yi/ /las kyi dngos grub 'gyur ba nyid/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po/ rdo rje snying po gzi brjid chen pos bka' stsal pa/ sngags ni khyod la ngas bshad kyis/ /lha mo shes rab chen mo nyon/ /dang

por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin/ /uSh+mA rnams kyi da ki pa la/ /puk+ka sIs brgyan stong pas mnan/ /mdog dkar mthar ni swA hA sbyar/ /'dis ni bzlas pa 'bum gyis ni/ /'gro ba rtag tu rengs par byed/ /dang por yi ge'i bdag po bzhag /de rjes mkha' spyod ma de nas/ /mthar ni swA hA

sbyar byas nas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang dbang du byed/ /rig byed rnams kyi dang po sbyin/ /dang po yi ni gnyis pa la/ /stong bcas mtha' ni swA hA sbyar/ /sangs rgyas kyang skrod shes rab can/ /dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin/ /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /rwa dang ldan zhing chu

mas brgyan/ /stong bcas swA hA yang dag ldan/ /mi rnams thams cad sdang bar byed/ /dang po yi ge'i dbang phyug bzhag /lnga pa nyid kyi gsum pa la/ /stong pa mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan/ /mthar ni swA hA mngon spyod che/ /yang ni yi ge'i thu bo sbyin/ /hU~M ni khrag dang 'dra ba yi/ /mthar ni swA hA

thig le mchog /dga' bzang ma sogs rtag tu 'gugs/ /gti mug rigs ni dang por sbyin/ /g+hu ni yang dag rab tu sbyar/ /mthar ni swA hA yang byas na/ /lha dang mi rnams gsod par byed/ /dang por rnam par snang mdzad bzhag /dang po nyid kyi dang po la/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang

sbyar/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa la/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan/ /yang na dang po'i rtse mo la/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan/ /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la/ /yang ni de nyid yang dag ldan/ /steng du chom rkun ma yis brgyan/ /de rjes hrIHyis rnam par sbyar/ /mthang yang

swA hA spyod pa nyid/ /ku ru kul+le'i sngags so/ /oM ni dang po bzhi pa yi/ /gsum pa chom rkun ma yis brgyan/ /mthar gzhas pa yi bzhi pa la/ /pi tsu badzra sbyar pa dang / /uSh+mA rnams kyi bzhi pa la/ /puk+ka sI yis rnam par brgyan/ /stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur nyid/ /lnga pa

yi ni gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA/ /kye'i rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /snang mdzad dang por dz+wa la gnyis/ /sbyar nas lnga ba'i bzhi pa la/ /mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po ldan/ /g+hasma rIs ni rnam par brgyan/ /uSh+mA rnams kyi bzhi pa la/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yis brgyan/ /

stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA/ phyag bzhi pa'i sngags so/ /dang por rnam snang dang po yi/ /dang po nang gi dkar mos brgyan/ /gsum pa nyid kyi dang po la/ /nang gi dkar mos rnam par brgyan/ /

nyis 'gyur lnga pa'i gsum pa dang / /gnyis pa'i gsum pa me yis brgyan/ /hU~M gi rnam pa gsum sbyar nas/ /lnga pa nyid kyi gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA/ /phyag drug pa'i sngags so/ /dang po rnam snang bzhi pa yi/ /dang po byin za yang dag ldan/ /ro langs

ma yis rnam par brgyan/ /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la/ /g+hasma rI yis rnam par brgyan/ /dang po yi dang po la/ /mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang / /rdo rje ma yis rnam par brgyan/ /k+Sha ni chom rkun ma yis brgyan/ /lnga pa nyid kyi dang po dang / /uSh+mA rnams kyi bzhi pa la/ /

rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yis brgyan/ /stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur te/ /phaT dang mthar ni swA hA nyid/ /phyag gnyis pa'i sngags so/ /bdag med dang po'i dang po dang / /gnyis pa nyid kyi dang po dang / /gsum pa nyid kyi dang po dang / /bzhi ba yi ni dang po dang / /lnga pa yi ni dang po dang / /

mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po dang / /uSh+mU rnams kyi dang po nyid/ /dang por rnam snang mthar swA hA/ /grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pa ni 'bum mo/ /mthar gnas rnams kyi gnyis pa dang / /k+Sha yi rnam pa nyis 'gyur nyid/ /hUM gi rnam pa gsum dang ldan/ /dang por rnam snang phaT nyid kyi/ /rnam

pa nang bcug mthar swA hA/ /sa sbyangs pa'i sngags so/ /dang por rnam snang de rjes su/ /rdo rje ma yi mtha' ru hUM/ /bza' ba dang btung ba byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /dang por rnam par snang mdzad nyid/ /de rjes a ka ro mu kha~M/ /uSh+mA rnams kyi gsum pa dang / /mthar gnas pa

yi bzhi pa ni/ /steng du me yis rnam par brgyan/ /d+harmA NA~M de rjes rdo rje ma/ /byin la dra nu t+pan+na twA ta/ /oM AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ /'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ /kye'i rdo rje las sngags btu ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas chos kun sdom gcig pa'i/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' zhes byas gsungs/ /bdag med ma la 'o mdzad nas/ /bzlas pa'i yul ni rab tu dbye/ /shel gyis rengs pa'i bzlas pa nyid/ /dbang la tsan+dan dmar po nyid/ /lung tang gis ni mngon spyod nyid/ /ni raM shus ni sdang ba la/ /rta yi rus pas skrod baM nyid/ /bram ze'i rus pas

'gugs pa nyid/ /glang po'i rus pas char pa la/ /ma he yis kyang gsad pa la/ /rengs pa 'o ma'i btung ba nyid/ /dbang la rang gi 'dun pas spyad/ /gsad pa la ni sih+la nyid/ /dgug pa la ni bzhi mnyam nyid/ /sdang la sA lu skyes pa brjod/ /bskrad pa nyid la gla rtsir brjod/ /

yang na mtha'i shwa dang / dang po'i shwa dang / na dang po dang / ga dang po dang / ha dang po nyid kyang de bzhin no/ /kye'i rdo rje las bzlas pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //kye'i rdo rje la dam 'khyud cing / /tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni/ /lus can rnams kyi rigs kyi gzugs/ /de la

bdag med mas zhus pa/ /b+ha gar ling ga gzhag nas ni/ /'khor lo'i 'dren pas 'di skad gsungs/ /lus can rang gi rigs bshad kyis/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma nyon/ /bud med dam ni skyes pa yi/ /gang gi srin lag rtsa ba la/ /rdo rje rtse dgu par gyur pa/ /mi bskyod pa yi

rigs mchog nyid/ /rnam snang mdzad kyi 'khor lor 'gyur/ /dpag med mgon gyi 'dam skyes nyid/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i rin chen nyid/ /las kyi rigs kyi ral gri nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa gang nag po che/ /de yi lha ni mi bskyod pa/ /rnal 'byor pa gang dkar po che/ /de yi lha ni rnam snang

mdzad/ /rnal 'byor pa gang sngo bsangs che/ /de yi lha ni don yod nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa gang ser po che/ /rin chen bdag po rigs kyi lha/ /rnal 'byor pa gang dkar dmar nyid/ /'od dpag med pa rigs kyi lha/ /rnal 'byor pa gang dkar dang ser/ /de ni sems

dpa'i rigs su 'gyur/ /skye bo rnal 'byor mthar phyin pas/ /nga rgyal mi bcag tho mi btsam/ /kun rdzob gzugs su gnas nas ni/ /de rnams bde gshegs rigs su 'gyur/ /bud med rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /ji ltar skyes pa der bzhin no/ /kun rdzob tha snyad tshul las ni/ /de yi rigs

su'ang de 'gyur ro/ /b+ha gar ling ga'i 'o mdzad nas/ /de la rdo rje che mnyes nas/ /bdag med ma yis go mdzad pa/ /lha mo rab tu mchod pa nyon/ /tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang / /bdag gi khyim gyi nang du yang / /gcer bu phyag rgya cher byas nas/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod/ /'o dang

'khyud pa byas nas ni/ /de bzhin b+ha gar reg pa nyid/ /skyes pa'i sna ni gzhib pa nyid/ /ma mchu'i sbrang rtsi btung ba nyid/ /rtag tu myos pa'i mtshan ma las/ /bo la ldan pas lag pas bya/ /khyogs dang brla zhes bya ba dang / /de bzhin shin tu bkal ba yi/ /yang yang rdo rjes 'dod pa bya/ /

steng dang 'og tu lta ba nyid/ /dngos grub rgyas pa thob pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de la ga bur btung bar bya/ /de la ga bur rgyu yi phyir/ /sha ni bza' ba nyid du bya/ /khyad par du ni chang nyid do/ /kye'i rdo rje las lhan cig skyes pa'i sbyor ba don gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig

pa'o// //de nas rdo rje can gyis dbang / /bzhi pa'i tshigs bcad bka' stsal pa/ /rdo rje rab gnas rdo rje nyid/ /che dang dril bu chen po bzung / /de ring rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur/ /slob ma bsdu ba nyid du gyis/ /ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ba/ /bdag

gis gsang ba'i dbang gis ni/ /sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur ro/ /lha mo dga' sbyin gnas sbyin me/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'ong ma/ /khyer cig khyer cig sems dpa' che/ /khyer la mchod pa dag tu gyis/ /ye shes 'di ni ches phra zhing / /rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil lta bu/ /rdul bral

thar sbyin zhi ba nyid/ /khyod rang yang ni de yi pha/ /rdo rje dang pad+ma byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni/ oM pat+mu su khAd+hA ra ma hA rA ga su khaM dad tsatwA rA nan+da b+hA ga pi shwa hU~M hU~M hU~M kAr+yaM ku ru Sh+wa me/ oM badzra ma hA dwe Sha tsa turA nan+da dA ya kaHkha ga mu khai ka ra so nA tha hU~M hU~M hU~M kAr+yaM ku ru Sh+wa me/ spyi bor ni

oM gyi rnam pa/ snying gar ni hU~M gi rnam pa/ ze 'bru la ni AH'i rnam pa'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu ma'i brtag pa zhes bya ba brtag pa sum cu rtsa gnyis las phyung ba brtag pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar mkhan po

ga ya ha d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dag /bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slar yang lo ts+tsha ba gzhon nu dpal gyis 'gyur chad pas bas shing dag par bgyis pa'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+YA Da ki nI badzra pany+dza ra ma hA tan+t+ra rA dzA kalpa nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i brtag pa/ kye rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' bems bcas dang ba dang / /go skabs med dang 'byed pa dang / /sna

tshogs rdo rje'i gzhi gnas khang / /sems can khams dang yid 'ong dang / /sems can snod dang 'jig rten dang / /sa dang sa 'og bar snang dang / /yid dang lus dang ngag dang ni/ /gcig dang gnyis dang mkha' bde dang / /drug dang lnga dang drug gnyis dang / /skye 'gro rnams ni bzhi po dang / /

gcig gis nyi shur ma tshang dang / /khams gsum ma lus pa dang ni/ /pha dang bu dang ma mo dang / /phyi rol dang ni nang dang ngas/ /btsun mo kun dang chos dang ni/ /thams cad las dang bdag med dang / /'bras bu rgyu dang bya ba zhes/ /bsgrub bya sgrub thabs rdo rje dang / /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes dang / /

chos kyi dbyings dang ma byung dang / /mkha' yi khams dang rang dbyings dang / /bdag med pa dang bdag ces dang / /dngos po med dang dngos med min/ /bde ba can dang gru gsum dang / /a skyes dang ni skyon bral dang / /rdul bral dang ni sdig bcom dang / /dba' rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin dang / /mthar

ni zhi ba'i bde rig dang / /gsang dang mchog dang dgyes pa la/ /sangs rgyas kun khyab sems dpa' ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rdo rje gur/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /lha yi bdag po gcig pu nyid/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /'bum phrag lnga bdag kye'i rdo rje/ /las

ni dkyil 'khor lngar gsungs pa/ /rdo rje can dang phan pa dang / /de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid nyid/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / /rta bdun rgyal po lnga po'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dkar mo rkun ma ro langs ma/ /g+hasma rI dang buk+ka sI/ /ri khrod gdol ba g.yung mo'o/ /rdo rje

phan pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /skam pa zhags pa nyi ma dang / /dol zlum ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin/ /me tog ma sogs mtshams kyi char/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /nyi lag ma dang mar me ma/ /rin chen sgron ma glog lag ma/ /lA s+ya la sogs mtshams char ro/ /pad+ma chos 'byung lcags

sgrog dang / /'khyud ma gar gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /gling bu ma sogs mtshams kyi char/ /bdag nyid cha byad sbyor bas so/ /rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje sgo lcags lde kyog ma/ /sgo ma dang ni gos 'dzin ma/ /de bzhin mtshams su spyan la sogs/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de rnams kun/ /

rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang bas gnas/ /snying gar g.yon bcangs sdigs mdzub ste/ /kha dog sna tshogs cher 'bar ba'o/ /shin tu zhe sdang zhe sdang che/ /gau rI la sogs rab tu grags/ /shin tu gti mug rmongs chen las/ /skam pa ma sogs cher bzung ngo / /shin tu gzi brjid cher gsal

ba/ /nyi lag ma sogs rab tu grags/ /shin tu 'dod chags chags chen las/ /pad sogs chos kyi dkyil 'khor du'o/ /phrag dog chen po sgrib chen las/ /sgo lcags ma sogs myur 'gro bdag /rgyal ba mgon po phan pa ni/ /gti mug thams cad zad par mdzad/ /rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po che/ /

rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib 'phrog /rta mgrin 'dod pa chen po ni/ /'dod chags can gyi byang chub ster/ /rdo rje mgyogs 'gro phrag dog che/ /theg pa gzhan ni rnam par spangs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /mi bskyod ye shes 'byung ba'i gnas/ /skye 'gro mi bzad mgron gnyer phyir/ /

sgrib pa lnga ni 'joms pa po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang / /'dod chags ser sna skye bo rnams/ /bsdu phyir rang gi 'khor lo la/ /rdo rje gzugs ni du ma 'dzin/ /shin tu stug pa drag po la/ /

zhi ba nye bar mi sbyar te/ /'di mkhyen rdo rje can chen ni/ /rang gis kye yi rdo rjer 'gyur/ /shin tu stong par zhen rnams kyi/ /yod min brtul zhugs 'dzin rnams kyi/ /sangs rgyas gti mug spyod don du/ /rdo rje rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /shin tu nga rgyal gdug rnams kyi/ /skye 'gro'i

nga rgyal zad par mdzad/ /rdo rje nyi ma bdag nyid rgyal/ /nga rgyal chen po'i mun pa 'joms/ /byang chub chags bral las skyes spangs/ /sems can gang zhig bde byed pa/ /chags pas byang chub rab grub phyir/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam gnas shig /

gang zhig lam gzhan nas 'gro ba/ /de rnams byang chub rab sbyin phyir/ /rdo rje mgyogs 'gro rang gtso bo/ /dbang po gang dang gang lam nyid/ /de dang de yi ngo bor 'gro/ /mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /gang dang gang gi dngos po yis/ /

skyes pa rnams kyis yid sbyor la/ /des na de yi rang bzhin 'gyur/ /sna tshogs gzugs nor ji bzhin no/ /gang dang gang gis 'dul ba yi/ /sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste/ /de dang de yi rnam pa yis/ /chos kyi bshad pa bya ba'o/ /sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba'i/ /sems can

sna tshogs rang bzhin can/ /sems ni rang gi rnam rtog gis/ /skye bo'i dri mas nag por byas/ /de bas kun tu rab 'bad pas/ /sems kyi rdo rje rnam par sbyang / /sems dag pa ni bde ba yin/ /nyon mongs dug ni thams cad 'phrog /gal te stong pa thabs yin na/ /de tshe sangs rgyas nyid

mi 'gyur/ /'bras bu rgyu las gzhan min phyir/ /thabs ni stong pa nyid ma yin/ /lta ba rnams la log rnams dang / /bdag tu lta ba tshol rnams kyis/ /bdag zhen bsam pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /stong par rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs/ /de phyir dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zhes/ /thabs ni

bde ba'i sdom pa ste/ /sangs rgyas nga rgyal rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas nyid du myur bar 'gyur/ /ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan/ /gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan/ /de phyir thabs kyis bsgrub bya dang / /de ni thabs kyi gzugs can no/ /thams cad kyi rnam pa mchog tu zhi ba sems can

'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas rdo rje khams gsum thob/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rdo rje gur/ /dam tshig mchod pa yid 'ong ba/ /'khor la rab tu bka' stsal pa/ /glu ni rdo rje can la 'bul/ /gar ni sangs rgyas rnams la 'bul/ /hi rA mchog la de bzhin bri/ /'jig rten rje la bza'

dang btung / /gos kyis mchod pa rta mchog la/ /'di rnams dam tshig dam pa ste/ /rdo rje mchod pa byas pa yi/ /rdo rje can kun mnyes par byed/ /a ka ru nag kye rdo rje/ /phan pa la ni tsan+dA na dkar/ /dmar po 'jig rten rje la dbul/ /kha che rdo rje snang ba la/ /bdun gyi rgyal po thams cad

de/ /hU~M rdo rje las byung ba'i dri/ /'di rnams dri yi rab sbyor bas/ /dam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob po/ /tsha ba kha ba rdo rjer 'bul/ /mngar ba rdo rje rtag pa la/ /skyur ba rdo rje nyi ma la/ /de bzhin lan tshwa 'jig rten rjer/ /rta yi rgyal po thams cad dam/ /bska ba rab tu brtag par bya/ /kye yi rdo

rje rdor can gyis/ /me tog mdog gnag rkang 'thung byung / /mal+li kA dang mA la ti/ /kun da rtag tu sangs rgyas 'bul/ /shing gi dbang mchog dri med mdog /snang byed la ni sbyar bar bya/ /dbang mchog dmar po chu skyes dang / /ban d+hu dmar po pa ta lar/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang la 'bul/ /rta

mchog rdo rje can la kun/ /rdo rje can gyi khru gsum ste/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa/ /snang byed la ni khru lnga nyid/ /pad+ma gar dbang drug pa ste/ /lcags kyi rgyal po de bzhin bdun/ /bza' la rdo rje nyi ma yi/ /lam du lcags kyu mchog gi dang / /gnyid la sangs rgyas mgon po yi/ /shin

tu bde la gar dbang gi/ /glu gar de bzhin rol mo'i sgra/ /sa gzhi yongs gzung dus su ni/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su bzhag nas ni/ /bdag gis rnal 'byor rab tu bsgrub/ /rdo rje'i dbang po sngon po ste/ /zla ba chu shel thub chen gyi/ /mkhar phyin skyes pa'i me tog dmar/ /nor bu dmar rgyal mkha'

mdzod kyi/ /pad+ma rA ga spyan ras gzigs/ /rta yi'ang ma ra ka ta ste/ /rin chen lnga yi rdul mtshon mchog /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur 'byung po 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so/ /dam tshig yang dag rab phye ba/ /kun tu

bzang po'i sa bon bdag /dbang po sngon po lta bu'i 'od/ /phyag bzhi 'jigs byed chen po ste/ /mdzes pa'i khro bo yi ni lus/ /dbang ldan 'byung po mnan pa ste/ /g.yas pas rigs kyi bdag po nyid/ /lag pa g.yon pas mi lpags nyid/ /gnyis po dag gis phyag rgyar sbyor/ /zhabs

g.yon brkyang bas yang dag gnas/ /cung zad mche bas 'jigs par byed/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba'i rgyan mchog ste/ /mgo 'dzings phyed du bcings par ni/ /ri yi rtse mor bsgom par bya/ /'byung po 'dul bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin du ma 'byung po dang / /gnod sbyin mo dang klu mo dang / /

mi mo lha yi mdzes ma ni/ /sgrub pa po yis nges par 'grub/ /sngags ni/ oM b+hU ta DA mar b+hU tA d+hi pa ti a k+Sho b+h+ya ki rI Ti na sar+b+ha b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsI na sA d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje chen po rdo rje can mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur stobs po che'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so/ /char chen rab tu dbab

bya ste/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsam/ /der ni klu brgyad dgod par bya/ /stobs po che ni rab sbyor bas/ /de rnams rnga ma yang dag mnan/ /char med stobs po che las ni/ /chu yi tshogs ni dbab par bya/ /kha dog nag cing chir gsal ba/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par

mdzad/ /phyag brgyad zhal ni bzhi ba ste/ /skar nyi rdo rje gdan mdzad pa/ /phyag rnams kyis ni klu bdag rnams/ /phuHzhes bya ba'i sngags zlos zhing / /hU~M dag nang du chud byas te/ /phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar bar bya/ /dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste/ /gnyis pa zla 'od bzang po nyid/ /gsum pa ser

po'i mdog lta bu/ /bzhi ba dmar po nyid du brjod/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis yan lag brgyan/ /rdo rje sems dpas rnam par brgyan/ /klu rnams kyis ni char dbab phyir/ /stobs po che ni rab bsgrub bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa rdo rje gur smra ba pos

sangs rgyas kyi de kho na dbye bar bya'o/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'o byas dang / /brgyan pa zos pa dang / /rdo rje chu 'thung nor ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas de nyid 'di rig pa/ /dag pa'i gnas ni gnas chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gang ba/ /rdo rje rin chen kun khyab pa/ /gang gyur nga yis bshad par

bya/ /phan pa'i grong khyer yid 'ong bar/ /mkha' 'gro rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /zhen pa chen po sangs rgyas kun/ /lcags sgrog rdo rjes bcing bar bya/ /dga' ldan du ni ldeg par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod pa thob/ /rgyal ba mgon po byams pa ni/ /ye shes spyan gyis rnam par

gzigs/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pas/ /rgyal po'i tshogs rnams bcing bar bya/ /gang zhig dngos grub mi ster na/ /sgrog gis bcings nas dgug par bya/ /rdo rje kyo ba dkar mo che/ /rdo rje zhags pa chom rkun ma/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog ro langs ma/ /rdo rje dril bu g+hasma rI/ /sangs rgyas

rnams ni dbang du byed/ /bzlas dang bsgom pa mngon dga' ba'i/ /dngos grub gal te mi ster na/ /de tshe mkha' 'gro ma bzhi yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni drag shul bsgrub/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur gyi rgyud kyi nang du 'bum phrag lnga bris pa yang dag par bshad par

bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni dkyil 'khor 'bum/ /rdo rje can gyi de bzhin 'bum/ /'bum gyis rdo rje nyi ma yi/ /'bum gyis rdo rje chos kyi'o/ /'bum phrag phyed kyis rdo rje ste/ /'byung po 'dul ba stong phrag lngas/ /lnga yis las ni rab rgyas pa/ /lnga yis sangs rgyas gar mkhan nyid/ /stong phrag sum cu dag

gis ni/ /ku ru kul+le brtag pa'o/ /lhag ma stong phrag lnga yis ni/ /cho ga'i rim brgyud kun gyi'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro kye rdo rje yi/ /'bum phrag lnga ni bris pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa blo dang ldan pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur sangs rgyas kyi gar gyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /gar dang glu la rab

zhen pa'i/ /sems can rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan rol pa mdzad/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan rdo rje yis/ /'dod chags can gyi byang chub sgrub/ /de nas rdo rje can 'byung ste/ /me tog snyim pas rab sbyor bas/ /sems can kun la phan ldan pa'i/ /dam tshig der ni

bshad par bya/ /sems can ji snyed pa rnams sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa sgo nga las skyes pa'am/ mngal las skyes pa'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa'am/ rdzus te skyes pa'am/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs med rnams sam/ 'du shes can rnams

sam/ 'du shes med pa can nyid rnams sam/ 'du shes med pa ba rnams sam/ sems can de rnams thams cad bdag gis kyang phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang la dgod par bya'o/ /dam tshig che bshad de nas ni/ /zur mig mig mo mngon byung ste/ /mi bskyod ye shes brnyes ldan pa'i/ /

ston pa la ni rnam par smod/ /ci khyod dam tshig hU~M zhes bya/ /thub pa chen po gzhu can yin/ /nga min snying rje'i stobs dpal ldan/ /bdag stobs bcom pa min nam ci/ /ci khyod dam tshig oM zhes bya/ /khyod ni tshangs pa thub pa rnams/ /nga min rnam par snang mdzad dpal/ /khyod ni

me bcom 'dod pa bral/ /ci khyod dam tshig AHzhes bya/ /mnga' bdag mkha' lding mkhyen nam ci/ /nga min pad+ma gar dbang dpal/ /khyod ni gar mkhan nyer bzhad mkhan/ /ci khyod dam tshig trA~M zhes bya/ /khyod ni gdugs te tsha ba 'phrog /nga min rdo rje nyi ma dpal/ /gdugs kyi rnam khyod

ji ltar min/ /ci khyed dam tshig kha~M zhes bya/ /khyod ni mkha' stong rang bzhin no/ /nga min rdo rje mgyogs 'gro yin/ /khyad ni rta ste pha rol 'gro/ /ci khyod dam tshig snying rje 'chang / /e ma chang 'tshong mdzes ma'o/ /mi g.yo bdag ming mA ma kI/ /zhang po'i grong khyer 'dzin nam ci/ /

ci khyod dam tshig zhi ba nyid/ /bud med g.yo sgyu 'dzin nam ci/ /bdag ni ma yin lha mo spyan/ /spyan yin na ni g.yo dang bcas/ /ci khyod dam tshig 'dod chags che/ /smad 'tshong ma la smrar ci yod/ /bdag ming lha mo dkar mo'o/ /ji ltar dri ma dkar ba yin/ /ci khyod dam tshig dbang

byed tshe/ /btsun mo'i pho nya min nam ci/ /bdag ming zur mig sgrol ma'o/ /sgrol mig ni bcom pa yin/ /mig g.yon bdag ni nor ldan dpal/ /de ltar ngo tsha med pas legs/ /ngo tsha med pas sangs rgyas min/ /mthong dang mi mthun myur du smros/ /de nas rdo rje mig yon po/ /smod pa

pos ni rab gsungs pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhe sdang che/ /thub pa rnam par snang mdzad rmongs/ /'dod la zhen pa 'jig rten bdag /ser sna rdo rje snang byed de/ /don yod skyon ni thams cad byed/ /'dren pa lnga ni skyon ldan no/ /sgong skyes mngal nas skyes pa'am/ /drod gsher skyes

dang mtha' 'khob bzhin/ /gzugs can rnams sam gzugs med dam/ /rdzus nas skyes pa nyid dang ni/ /thams cad sangs rgyas bya'o zhes/ /khyod kyis dang po gsungs pa la/ /khyod nyid sangs rgyas gyur nas ni/ /de rnams ji ltar rgyal ma mdzad/ /de nyid phyir na gsungs

pa/ /mnga' bdag ji ltar 'di ma gsungs/ /sems can bslus na khyod kyi gang / /sangs rgyas nyid de ngo mtshar rmad/ /'chi bdud tshe'am mu ge'am/ /phas kyi 'khor lo'i gnod pa dang / /rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang / /char med pa dang zhi ba la/ /sngags dang bsgom par

ldan par ni/ /gang zhig bdag ni rtag rol pa/ /de yi mdun du bdag 'dug ste/ /der ni du mi 'gyur ro/ /slob dpon lnga dang lha mo bzhi/ /mi g.yo bdag nyid smod pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor khang pa'i gnas nyid du/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan rol pa mdzad/ /khams gsum de bzhin

rtsa ba'am/ /ma dag pa'i yang rgyan rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gar mkhan gar/ /bde ba dga' bar byed dang bcas/ /chos 'byung grong khyer nyams dga' bar/ /rdo rje dam tshig glu yis dang / /rdo rje rkang pa'i gom pas gar/ /mthar ni rdza rnga lA s+ya sogs/ /phyag rgya chen po

rab ster ba'i/ /'di nyid 'dir ni cher gsang ngo / /rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' ji bzhin/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/ /glu sna tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra dang gar dang 'dul bar 'jug pa dang char dbab pa dang mi g.yo ba'i bdag nyid che ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i

rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ 'byung po'i gtor ma gsungs pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgom par bya/ /dbang po shar gyi 'dab mar bsam/ /mthar byed lhor ni dgod par bya/ /chu bdag nub kyi 'dab ma la/ /byang du

nor sbyin dgod par bya/ /mer ni byin za chen po nyid/ /bden bral mtshams skyong de bzhin no/ /rlung du gnas med bsam par bya/ /dbang ldan du ni 'byung po'i gtso/ /zla nyi tshangs pa la sogs dang / /tshangs pa'i ris na rim pa dang / /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don nyid dang / /

dga' ldan 'thab bral gnas pa dang / /rgyal po chen por gyur pa dang / /gzhan 'phrul dbang sgyur nyid dang ni/ /gang zhig 'phrul dga'i gnas rnams dang / /gtsang ma'i gnas su gang gnas dang / /bde ba can du 'dug pa dang / /'og min du ni gnas pa dang / /'od zer can gyi

'jig rten khams/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa dang / /de kun steng du gnas par bya/ /chos 'byung nang du son pa ni/ /stobs kyis rgyu dang dung skyong dang / /de bzhin mtha' yas nor rgyas bu/ /'jog po dang ni rigs ldan nyid/ /pad chen pad+ma bzang po can/ /lha min dmyal ba sems

can rnams/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas 'og tu'o/ /oM las tshangs ba la sogs lha/ /hUM las ma chags pa la sogs/ /AHlas stobs kyis rgyu la sogs/ /lag gnyis gdong gcig ldan pa ste/ /steng gi lha rnams dkar po che/ /dbang po la sogs nag por mtshungs/ /stobs

kyis rgyu sogs dmar po che/ /rang mtshungs rig ma lus sprad ldan/ /rdo rje dril bus lag pa brel/ /g.yas brkyang bas ni stan la gnas/ /tshangs sogs rtag pas phyag rgyas gdab/ /mchod sbyin brgya sogs rdo rje yis/ /stobs kyis rgyu sogs gar dbang gis/ /thams cad

rigs gsum las skyes pa'o/ /dkar mos dgug par byas nas ni/ /chom rkun mas ni zhags pas bcings/ /ro langs mas ni sgrog bcings la/ /g+hasma rIs ni dril bus dbab/ /de nas mchod yon zhabs bsil dbul/ /sngags ni 'di yis bsang gtor bya/ /oM AHhU~M/

phyi nas 'thor 'thung dbul bar bya/ /sngags ni 'di yis gshegs su gsol/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa/ tiSh+Tha dr-i D+ho me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ shA shwa to me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ hr-id yam+me a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me

pra yats+tsha/ sar+b+ba kAR+Ye ShA me tsit+tiM shre yaH/ ku ru hU~M hU~M ha ha ha ha hoH b+ha ga wAM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsa/ badzrI b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya satwa AHmuH/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur rdo rje ming gi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te rdo rje ming phye ba'o/ /ming gi dbang gi dus

su ni/ /slob ma bdag nyid dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba/ /skyes pa 'dir ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /bzhad pa'i rdo rje dang / sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang / mdzes pa'i rdo rje dang / rol pa'i rdo rje dang / shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / shin tu dga' ba'i myu gu'i rdo rje dang / /pad+ma rdo rje

dang / pad+ma myu gu rdo rje dang / a la la rdo rje dang / pad+ma lcags kyu rdo rje dang / ye shes rdo rje dang / yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang / yan lag med pa'i rdo rje dang / shes rab myu gu'i rdo rje dang / snying rje myu gu'i rdo rje dang / dam par dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / shin tu bde bar dga' ba'i rdo rje dang /

spyan ras gzigs kyi rdo rje dang / 'bebs pa'i rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i rdo rje dang / shes rab rdo rje dang / pha rol phyin pa'i rdo rje dang / 'dod chags rdo rje ni dag pa'i gnas su phyag rgya chen po grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i ming 'di rnams yin no/ /bud med rnams kyi 'byung ste/ rdo rje snyems ma

dang / rdo rje mtshon cha ma dang / rdo rje e ma'o bde ma dang / rdo rje bdag med ma dang / rdo rje spyan ma dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / rdo rje dkar mo dang / rdo rje sgyu ma dang / rdo rje 'bar ma dang / rdo rje 'khris shing dang / rdo rje mgyogs ma dang / rdo rje ro langs ma dang / rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje

bskor ma dang / rdo rje phreng ba ma dang / rdo rje lA s+ya ma dang / rdo rje bzhad ma dang / rdo rje 'khyud ma dang / rdo rje phye ma dang / rdo rje pad+ma dang / rdo rje 'byung ma dang / rdo rje chen mo dang / rdo rje 'dod chags ma dang / rdo rje sgrol ma dang / rdo rje do shal ma dang / rdo rje sgeg mo dang / rdo rje kong ka NA dang /

rdo rje lA ma dang / rdo rje dbugs dbyung ma dang / rdo rje rnam pa ma ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan du gyur pa/ kye yi rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rnam snang chen po dang ni rang byung dang / /rdo rje arli skems pa'i khro bo dang / /de bzhin du yang rdo rje'i

khro bo nyid/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang / /he ru ka dang snying rje'i stobs nyid do/ /rtag pa dang ni gti mug rdo rje dang / /rnam par snang mdzad dang ni thams cad skyob/ /sgyu 'phrul dang ni de nas oM mdzad dang / /sku yi rdo rje rab tu grags pa dang / /sa snying dang ni gti mug

chen po dang / /gshin rje'i gshed dang tho ba'i dbang phyug dang / /de bzhin gshegs dang shAkya thub pa dang / /sangs rgyas zhes byar rab tu grags pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma de nas rin chen bdag /de bzhin du yang rin chen rgyal po nyid/ /rdo rje gzi brjid dang ni rgyal po che/ /rdo rje

bdud zil gnon dang snang byed do/ /rta mgrin dang ni 'jig rten bdag po dang / /rdo rje chos dang spyan ras gzigs dang ni/ /pad+ma gar dbang dang ni 'dod chags dang / /'jig rten mgon por rab tu grags pa'o/ /dam pa'i rta dang rta yi rgyal po dang / /bdun gyi rgyal po de nas lcags

rgyal dang / /dam tshig rdo rje dang ni rta mchog dang / /de bzhin du yang las kyi rdo rje nyid/ /don yod dang ni don grub rgyal po dang / /rdo rje mgyogs 'gror rab tu grags pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de nas rdo rje can/ /rnam par rgyal ba phyag na rdo rje dang / /dpe med ro mnyam shin tu dga'

ba dang / /dam pa dang po bde ba chen po'o/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /dam tshig sems dpa' nor bu ni/ /'di rnams rigs ni drug tu brjod/ /'dod pa'i thar pa rab sgrub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //rdo rje snying

po mngon byang chub/ /brtag pa'i rgyal po dang po nyid/ sgyu ma'i brtag pa gnyis pa ste/ /rdo rje gar ni gsum pa'o/ /bzhi pa sna tshogs brtag pa ste/ /rdo rje brtag pa lnga pa'o/ /brtag pa drug pa stobs po che/ /brtag pa bdun pa mi g.yo mgon/ /brgyad pa gzungs kyi brtag

pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ku ru kul+le dgu/ /bcu pa 'dul ba'i brtag pa ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad bcu gcig la/ /dngos grub brtag pa bcu gnyis pa/ /sgrol ma'i brtag pa bcu gsum pa/ /rdo rje phag mo bcu bzhi pa/ /lnga pa ni gzi brjid che/ /bdag med brtag pa bcu

drug pa/ /gshin rje gshed kyi bcu bdun pa/ /hU~M mdzad kyi ni brgyad pa/ /dbyangs can gyi ni bcu dgu pa/ /sbyin sreg brtag pa nyi shu pa/ /rab gnas nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i brtag pa ni/ /nyi shu rtsa ni gnyis su 'dod/ /gtor ma'i brtag pa nyi shu gsum/ /

nyi shu bzhi pa sta gon gnas/ /mngon par rtogs pa nyi shu lnga/ /de bzhin phyag rgya nyi shu drug /byed pa nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /glu ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/ /gar gyi dbang phyug brtag pa ni/ /sum cur gcig med sum cu pa/ /brtag pa sum cu par ni bshad/ /stong phrag gsum cu'i grangs kyis

ni/ /mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /'bum phrag lnga yi rgya mtsho che/ /kye yi rdo rje 'chang gi ni/ /rgyud ni e ma rgyas bstan pa/ /'bum phrag lnga bdag kye rdo rje/ /dag pa'i snying po yongs su bzung / /rdo rje mkha' 'gros gsungs pa ste/ /'di ni rgyud kyi des pa'o/ /kye yi rdo rje

rnal 'byor rgyud/ /dang por rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad/ /phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni/ /de nyid bud med bzung phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na spros pa las bsdus pa lags/ bskal pa bzang po la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / so so'i skye bo rnams tshe thung bar

'gyur na/ ji ltar na de rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/ ji ltar na de rnams thos par 'gyur/ ji ltar na de rnams sems par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na skye bo phal pa tshe thung bar 'gyur/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ re zhig gang dag slob dpon

rnams su 'gyur ba de rnams rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag spyod pa po de rnams mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag so so'i skye bo de rnams srog chags gsod par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag bud med kyi tshogs rnams gcig tu 'dod pa la zhen

par 'gyur ba ste/ de'i phyir rgyud rnams thams cad rgyas par bstan pa ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje gsung thos nas mnyes par 'gyur zhing dgyes pa brnyes nas tshig 'di gsungs pa/ snying rje chen po kye'i rdo rje/ /da ni dur khrod chu 'gram

dang / /nags tshal skye bo med grong du/ /bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster/ /mtsho skyes rnam pa'i 'gram yid 'ong / /sku gdung zab mo'i mchod rten dang / /rkang 'thung rlon pa'i 'og tu ni/ /nga ni sangs rgyas dngos grub ster/ /tshong dus tshong rdal nyid dang ni/ /

tshong dus rnam pa'i khyim du ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma bstan pa nga / /bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster/ /glu gar rab tu 'ching ba dang / /chang 'tshong ma yi khyim du ni/ /'di ltar pad+ma gar mkhan nga / /bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster/ /rtag tu 'gro mgyogs zhon 'gyur dang / /res

'ga' lam du 'gro ba na/ /rta ni don yod bstan pa nga / /dngos grub rdo rje rnam ster ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur phyag rgya rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan yang dag par bshad pa/ sku gsung

thugs kyi brtag pa las/ /phyag rgya rnam gsum shes par bya/ /sku la lag pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /sngags bzlas pa las ngag phyag rgya/ /sems la mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yin/ /de nyid bsam gtan dkyil 'khor la'o/ /lag pa'i g.yas na skam pa ste/ /g.yon na sdigs

mdzub de bzhin no/ /mkha' 'gro skam pa ma 'jigs ma/ /gdug pa rnams kyi 'khor ba 'don/ /g.yas pa'i lag na zhags pa ste/ /gdug pa rnam bcings rnam par dgug /de 'di zhags pa ma zhes bya/ /g.yon pas gdug pa sdigs mdzub ma/ /g.yas na nya rgya zlum po

ste/ /gdug pa rnams ni dkri bar 'dod/ /'di ni rtag tu dol zlum bshad/ /g.yon pas gdug pa sdigs mdzub mdzad/ /lag pa g.yas par lcags kyu ste/ /gdug pa rnams ni dgug par 'dod/ /'di de rdo rje kyo mar bshad/ /g.yon pas bdud la sdigs mdzub ma/ /

lag pa g.yas pas nyi ma ste/ /gti mug mun pa rnam par dral/ /g.yon pas sdigs mdzub mar ni bshad/ /de ni rdo rje nyi mar brjod/ /lag g.yas mar me'i sdong snod de/ /de bzhin g.yon par sdigs mdzub bo/ /'di de rdo rje mar mer bshad/ /rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib 'joms/ /

lag pa g.yas na rin po che/ /sems can rnams la sbyin pa ster/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo/ /rin chen sgron ma 'dir ba brjod/ /glog ni lag pa g.yas pa ste/ /rnam par rtog pa'i chu 'dzin 'joms/ /de 'di glog lag mar shes bya/ /de bzhin g.yon pas sdigs

mdzub ma/ /lag pa g.yas par pad+ma ste/ /pad+ma'i 'dod chags brjod par bya/ /g.yon pas sdigs mdzub ma nyid de/ /'di ni mkha' 'gro'i pad+mar brjod/ /g.yas par b+ha ga'i pad+ma ste/ /bde ba chen po rnam par 'phel/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub mdzad ma ste/ /'di ni chos 'byung mar ni brjod/ /

g.yas pa'i lag na lcags sgrog ste/ /byang chub zhen pas kun 'ching ba/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin ma ste/ /'di ni rdo rje sgrog mar brjod/ /sangs rgyas rjes chags 'ching ba yis/ /bdag nyid 'khyud par 'dod pa ste/ /byang chub chags pas rab sgrub ma/ /de 'di rdo rje 'khyud

mar bshad/ /g.yas pa'i lag na sgo lcags te/ /ye shes kun gyi srung ba mo/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo/ /'di de rdo rje sgo lcags brjod/ /g.yas pa'i lag tu lde kyog ste/ /ye shes blangs nas gcod pa mo/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo/ /'di de rdo rje lde kyog

brjod/ /g.yas pa'i lag tu sgo mo ni/ /ye shes skyes pa ma spangs pa/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo/ /'di ni rdo rje sgrog mar brjod/ /lag pa g.yas par yol ba ni/ /rang mtshungs btsun mo srung ba nyid/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo/ /rdo rje yol ba mar ni

brjod/ /de 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dam pa'i tshogs/ /mkha' 'gro lnga ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje'i gsung thos nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te/ bcom

ldan 'das phyag rgya 'grog pa 'di ci nyi tshe ba'i dam tshig phyag rgya 'phrog pa lags sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na rdo rje

nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i lung bstan pa yod de 'di ni de'i yin te/ Dai bai ha ya sa ga ma ne'i skad kyi dbyings 'dir rnam par brtags pa ste/ thams cad kun tu nam mkha' spyod par grub pas 'di ni mkha' 'gro mar rab tu grags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'

de rnams thams cad tshig 'di thos nas dga' ba dang mgu ba nye bar skyes par 'gyur ba dang tshig 'di gsol ba/ e ma mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud/ /rgyud kun las ni phyi ma dang / /rtogs sla rtogs par dka' ba dang / /rig dang mi rig pa nyid pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod

pa la sogs pa rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskul ba'i phyir 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di la rdo rje gur rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'dir ji ltar rnal 'byor ma rnams dang mkha' 'gro

ma rnams kyis bsdu ba yin/ byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol ba/ sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa mtha' yas pa ngas srid pa las bsgral bar bya'o zhes smon lam sngon du 'gro ba'i byang chub gang du rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs na/ ci'i phyir na srog chags

rnams gsad pa dang / gcig tu 'dod pa'i btsun mo rnams spangs lags/ lta ba rnams las log rnams dang / /btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud bshad do/ /bde ba'i thabs ni mdor bsdus pa/ /gzhung nyung don ni rgyas pa ste/ /blo dman rab tu sad

byed pa/ /rgyud kun gyi ni snying por nges/ /sngags rnams kyi ni khyad par du'o/ /rdo rje nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /'di ni bshad pa tsam gyis ni/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ma nyid kyis/ /sngon du gar gyis mchod byas nas/ /rang gi 'khor lo 'di gsungs pa/ /sangs

rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /gal te rdo rje chos dang ni/ /rta mchog rdo rje nyi ma yang / /bdag gis spangs na mi 'grub ste/ /nga nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yum gyi gzugs kyis skyed par byed/ /de rnams kyi ni mdzes mang / /de la nga ni dngos grub ster/ /mig sman dang ni rkang byug

dang / /ral gris 'og bsgrub pa dang / /ril bu mkha' la spyod pa dang / /mi snang ba dang bcud kyis yin/ /rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur nyid dang / /bu mo dam pa dgug pa ni/ /bdag mnyes pas ni sgrub pa pos/ /dngos grub rdo rje rnams 'thob bo/ /spros pa rnam pa mang por ni/ /smras pas

'dir ni ci zhig bya/ /bdag spangs nges par mi 'grub cing / /byang chub med cing bsgom pa med/ /gang zhig rtag tu bdag dran zhing / /rtag tu klog cing sems pa dang / /sngags kyi phreng ba bzlas pa dang / /nga yi sku ni sgom byed pa/ /gal te sgyu ma'i tshul gyis sam/ /gal te rmi lam

'dra bar blta/ /shin tu bsgom pa'i rim pa las/ /mngon sum du ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba las/ /de yi dngos grub sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas/ /shin tu bde chen sbyor ba las/ /gang zhig bdag la 'dod ster ba/ /lus can de la smos ci

dgos/ /gang zhig nyi ma gcig bsgom pa/ /rdo rje'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba las/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dngos grub/ /ster de 'di la the tshom med/ /bdag nyid he ru kar byas shing / /rang gi btsun mo rang bsgoms nas/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor cher 'dod pa/ /de rnams la ni nga mnyes

'gyur/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan zhing / /spro ba dga' bar ldan pa dang / /glu gar rol sgra'i rnam pa dang / /'dod kun bde ba spro ba dang / /sna tshogs sgeg par ldan pa dang / /sna tshogs ro yi btung ba dang / /sna tshogs gos ni ri mo can/ /sna tshogs dri yi byug pa yis/ /gang

zhig bdag dang rtag nyal ba/ /de yi dngos grub ster ba nga / /phyag rgya chen po'i gnas na 'dug /de yi 'dod pa ma gyur to/ /oM a a i I u U r-i r-I l-i l-I e ai o au aM swA hA/ gang zhig 'dis nga skul bar byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de rnams kyi la ga tu bud med kyi sgyu ma'i bde

ba yang dag par gnas kyis 'dug go/ /rdo rje ma ni shar du sbyin par bya'o/ /lho phyogs su ni dkar mo'i gzugs can ma'o/ /nub phyogs su ni chu'i mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /byang du ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /nga dbus su bzhag ste snying po dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhig bsam par

byed pa de'i bdag mdzes ma ste/ phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig ma'o/ /gri gug dang skyes pa'i thod pas brel ba/ stag gi pags pa bgos pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ shar gyi sgor ni dkar mo chen mo'o/ /lhor

ni chom rkun ma'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor ni chu ma'o/ /de bzhin du byang du ni g+hasma rI'o/ /dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI'o/ /'tshed pa'i mtshams su ni ri khrod ma'o/ /srin po'i phyogs su ni gdol ba mo'o/ /rtag tu 'gro bar ni g.yung mo'o/ /'di rnams ni mtshams dang mtshams bral du sbyin no/ /

gang zhig bdag rab tu sgom par byed pa de'i lag mthil du phyin pa'i dpal sus kyang dbrog par mi nus so/ /thams cad kyang kha dog nag por mtshungs pa rab tu son pa'i steng du gar dang bcas pa khro mo chen mo dpa' mo/ /g.yon kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can

mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur mchog tu dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ rig ma'i dbang yang dag par bshad pa/ rang gi rig ma skyes bu'i chus/ /bum pa brgyad po thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje thugs ni rab bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje can bsam dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgoms

pa/ /der ni dbu rgyan sbyin par bya/ /thams cad sngon sbyin nges bsams rnams/ /rdo rje'i tshigs bcad sbyor ba las/ /rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa/ /snying gar rang gi lag pas bya/ /slob ma 'jig rten dbang phyug byas/ /rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur bya/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni/ /

de ring khyod ni dbang bskur 'gyur/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /bzang bsgrub phyir ni rdo rje bzung / /slob ma lcags mchog lha mo ni/ /sgrol mas 'khyud par bsam par bya/ /lag pas rdo rje dril 'khrol zhing / /rdo rje bdag pos dbang bskur bya/ /oM badzrA d+hi pa ti twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi tiSh+Tha

badzra sa ma ya stAM/ slob ma rnam snang byas nas ni/ /ming gis kyang ni dbang bskur bya/ /oM badzra satwa twa ma a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi badzra nA mA b+hi She ka ta/ kye che ge mo rdo rje/ gang gang kun gyi rang gtsor gyur/ /de de bdag nyid he ru ka /sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung ba'i phyir/ /chos kyi rang bzhin dag pa'o/ /

'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas/ /rdo rje snying po brtul zhugs brtan/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung / /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha sa ma ya staM e Sho ha~M twa d+ha ra yA mi hI hi hi hi hi hi hU~M/ kun kyang cho ga gcig pa yis/ /rtag tu bla med

mchod pas ni/ /slob ma rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin/ /phyis ni rdo rje lag nas lag /sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' chen po/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /rdo rje snying po'i bdag po'i bdag /yang na de ring dril bu sbyin/ /shes rab pha rol

phyin skyes pa'i/ /rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod/ /rgyal bas byang chub mchog brjod pa/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bzung / /dbugs 'byin thams cad byin nas ni/ /shAkya

thub par rang gyur pas/ /slob ma chen po lung bstan te/ /sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med/ /khyod ni 'chi 'jigs mya ngan med/ /de bzhin nad dang tshab med/ /bde chen theg pa chen po ni/ /'di las nga yis lung bstan bu/ /oM e Sho ha~M byA ka ro mi twa~M badzra satwa ta thA ga ta/ srid

pa'i ngan 'gro las bsgral te/ /shin tu srid pa'i dngos grub phyir/ /kye 'grub 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /ming ni rdo rje zhes byar 'gyur/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rig ma chen mo'i dbang gi dam tshig bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po ting nge 'dzin

rdo rje ston pa pos/ dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba bton te/ tshig 'di skad bka' stsal pa/ bla ma rdo rje rnams mchod cing / /bdun po rnam par dag par bya/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed nas su/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam par bsgom/ /de la sangs rgyas gnas pas mas nas/ /rnam

pa lnga ni bsgom par bya/ /dang po skyes bu bsam de nas/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro/ /dri za mnyam par zhugs pa ni/ /khu bar rjes su dran par bya/ /mtshams kyi lha mos bskul bar bya/ /'khor lo'i 'dren pa bskul nas ni/ /mig la sogs pa gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum

ni gnas gsum dgod/ /phyi nas rjes chags rdo rje ste/ /ye shes rnam par gzhug pa dang / /dbang ni rig ma brgyad rnams kyi/ /yang ni bdud rtsi myang ba dang / /lha mo brgyad kyis mchod pa nyid/ /'khor lo'i 'dren pa bstod pa'o/ /rang byin rlabs pas byin brlabs te/ /

de la yan lag drug bsgom bya/ /phyi nas yang ni dam tshig gi/ /cho ga'i rim pa yis/ /mtshan ma yang dag mtshon par bya/ /dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste/ /gnyis pa du ba 'dra ba yin/ /gsum pa me khyer rnam pa yin/ /bzhi pa mar me nyer 'bar ba/ /lnga pa rtag tu

snang ba ste/ /sprin med nam mkha' 'dra ba nyid/ /de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu/ /dngos grub nye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /phyi nas sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar/ /rmi lam rnam par skad cig 'gyur/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i/ /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /'jig rten khams

ni thams cad du/ /ji srid rdo rje'i lus can rnams/ /ye shes phung po'i blo ldan pa/ /de yi rjes su thams cad 'brang / /ji srid skye gnas las byung ba/ /khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar/ /phyag rgya chen po rab sbyar bas/ /de rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /byang

chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /tshig gi rdo rje rnam thos nas/ /dga' zhing rangs par gyur nas ni/ /smra ba'i rdo rje mdzad par ldan/ /rig ma chen mo bdag med dang / /rdo rje rnam snang mnga' bdag dang / /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen dang / /rta mchog

thub pa chen po dang / /rdo rje nyi ma gzi brjid che/ /rta mgrin mnga' bdag chen po ni/ /sku gsung thugs ni nyid dang yang / /lus kyi gong bu 'gul bar 'gyur/ /lan cig rgyal po ston pa yis/ /'phral du mngon sum byed pa po/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sku gsum

mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te tshig 'di skad gsungs so/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa/ /zhal brgyad pa la stobs po che/ /phyag ni bcu drug rnams dang ldan/ /dbang po sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /gzi brjid chen

po zhabs bzhi pa/ /sgeg cing khro ba'i gzugs can te/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas/ /rus pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste/ /dkar po dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin/ /bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan

pa ste/ /spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog /der ni rdo rje mdog nag po/ /'od zer chen po'ang bsgom par bya/ /dbang bskur ba yi gnas nyid du/ /sangs rgyas lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /glang po rta bong glang rnga mo/ /mi dang sa ra b+ha byi la/ /g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad du ni/ /gnyis

'thung la sogs rim shes bya/ /sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni/ /drod dang zla ba nyi ma nyid/ /mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid/ /g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o/ /skyes bu chen po bzhengs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /gti mug rdo rje mig la dgod/ /zhe sdang rdo rje rna ba la/ /ser

sna 'dod chags de bzhin du/ /reg dang bdag med bsgom par bya/ /phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa yin/ /sna tshogs gzugs ma btsun mo nyid/ /lag pa gri gug thod pas brel/ /srog song du ni yang dag gnas/ /sa spyod mkha' spyod ma nyid dang / /de bzhin rkang 'og

gnas pa mo/ /'di nyid kyi ni cho ga yis/ /gnas gsum du ni gnas par bsgom/ /oM mdzad rgyal po chen po ni/ /sku yi rdo rje rnam par brgyan/ /thugs kyi rdo rje rgyal po che/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas na bzhugs/ /a ni mchog gi de nyid de/ /ngag gi lam ni gsal byed

brjod/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yin/ /chos can las ni rigs gsum 'byung / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /dkar mo gzugs can bsgom par bya/ /lcags kyu sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo/ /kha dog dkar mo 'od chen mo/ /dkar mo rdo rje can zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dmar po'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /chom rkun ma yi gzugs can bsgom/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /rdo rje zhags pa mtshon chen mo/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ro langs ma ni khrag dang mtshungs/ /rdo rje lcags

sgrog nga rgyal byed/ /byang chub 'ching bar mdzad pa mo/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /de nas g+hasma rI bsgom bya/ /rdo rje dril bus lag pa bral/ /margad ut+pal 'dra ba'o/ /rdo rje sgo skyong ma rdo rje brtson ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /mtshams su lha

mo bzhi rnams ni/ /cho ga'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /byang sems bum pa ri rab dang / /me yi thab khung rgyal mtshan che/ /phyi bcas gnyis med rnal 'byor bas/ /mgon po de ltar bsgom par bya/ /'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas/ /dba' rlabs med pa'i bde ba

'thob/ /'byung ba bzhi'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po theg pa gsum gyi dam pa ston pa po/ thams cad kyi rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ dbyangs 'di gsungs pa/ hU~M las byung ba'i khro bo ni/ /rtag tu zhe sdang ldan pa'o/ /nang du ma

rungs sems kyis ni/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo badzra mung+ga ra hastA ya tsaN+Da lA k+She pa ka rA ya hU~M phaT/ de nas 'dir khro bo chen po bshad pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs shing 'dar bar gyur nas

mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa dran par byed do/ /skyes pa'i pad+ma gas chag med/ /srubs gcig pa dang srubs gnyis pa/ /rig ma bzhi yi rab sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang / /rkang rjes rdul gyi sbyor ba yis/ /rkang pas mnan cing bsdigs par bya/ /sku gsum bskyed

pa'i bsgom pa yis/ /bu mo chen mo dgug par bya/ /gshin rje gshed rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /na maHsaman+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ ma hA daN+Da d+ha ra bi bi d+ha su rA su ra mar+d+ha na b+hU ta n+ni r+m+ma tha hU~M phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i stobs po che bshad pa las byang chub sems dpa'

rnams dang / de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang 'dar bar gyur cing de dran par byed do/ /'byung po sha za nyid/ /mkha' 'gro grul bum zin pa la/ /hU~M gis dregs byas phyag rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje btsir bas bde ba nyid/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /

na maH sa man+ta bud+d+he b+ho/ hu lu hu lu/ ma hA pad+ma a mr-i tI ku ru ma hA bi ShAn AH/ btsan dug chen po dgug par bya'o/ /brgyal ba bslang ba de bzhin no/ /pad+ma'i dregs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo badzra kro d+hA a ma hA da~MSh+TA+ot+ka Ta b+hi ra wA ya/ badzra

san+do hadarbA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da lI hU~M phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po bgegs 'joms rdo rje bshad pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid mi dga' bar gyur to/ /rlung gis bteg pa po dang / rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs nas bsgrub bya de'i ming byang bzung

ste/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i rkang pa'i 'og tu dgod cing hU~M phaT ces bya ste/ hU~M gi nga rgyal byas nas rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa/ khro bo'i sngags kyis rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas rnams kyang skrod par byed do/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /shin tu legs

par gsang bar ni/ /bya ba 'di ni rab bskul bar/ /ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste/ /nyi ma bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+re b+ho/ oM ya ma daN+Da ya nI lA ya/ nI la daN+DA ya/ tu ru tu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sar+b+ba duSh+TA na mA ra ya mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po

dbyug pa sngon po skyes bu chen po bshad pas sems can thams cad dang / sangs rgyas rnams srog la the tshom du gyur to/ /brgya phrag brgyad bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang shin tu bsgom par sbyor ba'i cho gas bskul ba las gdug pa thams cad 'ching bar 'gyur ro/ /dbyig pas mnan

pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo ma hA ba lA ya/ u ts+tshush+ma krod+ha rA dzA ya sarbA nA gA nAM hr-i da ya~M tA Da ya hU~M phaT/ de nas gtum po chen po bshad pas dug gis gdong 'jigs shing stobs dang bral ba dang / skrag cing 'dar bar gyur te/ stobs po

che dran par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje stobs kyi spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /namaHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo a tsa la ka Na tseT+Ti tsaT+Ta moT+Ta moT+Ta tuT+Ta tuT+Ta/ g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya hU~M phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba skyes bu chen po bshad pas lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin chen po

brgyal te sa la 'gyel to/ /'dis ni khro bo'i rgyal po yis/ /seng ge zhon pa'i cho ga yis/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor las/ /skyes pa dang ni lha rnams khug /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hU~M/ gr-i h+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga wAn

bid+ya rA dza hU~M phaT/ rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa yis/ /khro bo chen po bshad pa yis/ /lha min bu mo klu mor bcas/ /nu ma 'dar zhing nar ba'am/ /rdo rje zhags pas nges bcings te/ /lcags kyu yis ni dral nas ni/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pa yis/ /bu mo thams cad

dgug par bya'o/ /'jig rten gsum dgug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rdo rje chos ni char sprin che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' char mchog ste/ /rdo rje nyi ma dge 'dun che/ /rta mchog tshogs ni chen po dang / /phan pa'i yang ni char sprin gyi/ /zhags pa lcags kyu'i bsgom

pa yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'gugs brjod na/ /so so skye bo smos ci dgos/ /rang gi rig ma skyes bu bsams/ /sku gsum rdo rjes rnam par brgyan/ /lcags kyu la sogs sbyor ba yis/ /bu mo bkug la bza' bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje

chen pos dgug pa'i dam tshig bka' stsal to/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ oM Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ kha ti dang ni btsag la yang / /rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las/ /zla ba nye bar chags dus su/ /khang bcug nas ni bsgrub par bya/ /ming ni bris pa tsam gyis kyang / /brgya ni gsal

bar bzlas pa yis/ /sgra ldan gnas med dbang po drag /chung mar bcas pa dgug par bya/ /dam tshig lcags kyu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bsam gtan sngags dang ting 'dzin gnas/ /rang gi rig ma skyes bu bdag /dgug pa'i gnas su gzung bar bya/ /thub

pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ na maHsa man+ta d+har+m+mA NA~M/ na maHsa man+tA saM g+hA nA~M/ oM si tA ta pa tra/ oM bi ma la/ oM sha~M ka ra/ oM pra t+yaM gi ra/ oM badzra uSh+NI Sha tsakra warti sar+b+ba yan+t+ra man+t+ra mU la kar+m+ma ban+d+ha na~M tA Da na~M kI la na~M bA ma ma kr-i te yen ke na tsi ta kr-i taM ta ta ta

sar+b+ba n+tA ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da b+hin+da b+hin+da/ tsi ri tsi ri/ gi ri gi ri/ ma ra ma ra/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ bdag nyid bsrung ba'i sbyor ba la/ /sbyor ba rgyud sogs gzhig pa la/ /dpung bar rig pa gdags byas na/ /'jig rten gsum gyis 'da' mi nus/ /khro bo chen po

'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dben pa'i nags tshal nyid du yang / /yid gnyis thams cad rnam spangs la/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni 'di bsgrubs na/ /thub pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /khro bo chen po 'khor lo'i snying po'i sngags la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin gyi le'u ste bzhi ba'o// //de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs/ /kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ba/ /yang dag nges par rab tu dbye/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgom bya/ /

sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms nas/ /rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms te/ /rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms nas/ /'dod chags rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan

rnam bsgoms te/ /rta yi don yod rab bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni rtag bsgom bya/ /thams cad rnams kyi sngags 'di yis/ /snying gar ye shes gnas su dgod/ /ye shes sems dpar rab sbyor bas/ /sangs

rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /rang sngags yi ge rdzogs pa dang / /phyag rgya dang ni phyag mtshan brtag /spro dang bsdu ba byas pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'byung gnas nyid/ /sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen po/ /gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la yang dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje rnam snang mnga' bdag nyid/ /dri la rnam gsum rnam shes nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan sangs

rgyas ni/ /rin chen phung po rab tu grags/ /ro la rnam gsum rnam shes nas/ /lha rnams la yang dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags nyid/ /rdo rje chos ni de bzhin gshegs/ /reg la rnam gsum rnam shes nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /

de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /don yod 'bras bu ster ba po/ /bsrung ba'i dam tshig dbus gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor lnga ni bsgom par bya/ /lnga lnga'i bdag nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ye shes lnga ni rnam par bsgom/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan/ /'od zer sna tshogs

kun tu khyab/ /sna tshogs las ni byed par brjod/ /thams cad bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis/ /rdul tshon gyis kyang bri bar bya/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ /phung po lngar ni rab tu grags/ /sangs rgyas mgon po'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /shar

gyi char ni rab tu grags/ /g.yas su rdo rje nyi ma yi/ /nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje yi/ /byang du rta yi rgyal po yi/ /dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /shar du dkar po chen po ste/ /lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan/ /dmar po nub kyi cha nyid du/ /btsod ni byang du yang dag ldan/ /mtshams

kyi char ni thams cad dang / /sgo yi logs dang ya phubs su/ /rdo rje chen po rnams kyis brgyan/ /sna tshogs snang ba rnams kyis mdzes/ /sangs rgyas mgon po gang nyid kyi/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su 'gyur ba ni/ /de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor brjod/ /snying po yongs bzung dkyil

'khor te/ /dkyil 'khor re re bsgom pa 'am/ /yang na bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /brgyad brgyad dbus su gnas pa 'am/ /yang na nyi shu rtsa lnga ru/ /gang tshe dkyil 'khor bsdus pa yi/ /sgor ni lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog de bzhin rdo rje nyid/ /'jug

pa'i sgo srung da god par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdus pa chen po'i dam tshig 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dom dang bya rgod de bzhin bse/ /snyug glang dang ni stag nyid dang / /spre'u dang sna 'thung ba glang 'tshe/ /rdo rje chos kyi g.yas na'o/ /khwa 'ug chu skyar seng ge dang / /mtshor

gnas de bzhin ra dang ni/ /phag dang yang dag ldan/ /g.yas min par ni rtag tu gnas/ /rma bya ma he chu srin dang / /nya yi rgyal po rus sbal dang / /'og gi rlung dang ngang skya dang / ri bong phan pa'i g.yas pa na'o/ /sbal ba thu bo sprin shugs kyi/ /kha chu mig sman

mtshungs byi la/ /g.yag dang dri ldan de bzhin bzhad/ /g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o/ /kA raN+Da dang 'khor lo dag /lug dang tsa kor dang ni/ /bye khra hor mo 'ol ba dang / /ku rar nyi ma'i g.yas na'o/ /stobs kyis rgyu dang dung skyong dang / /rigs ldan pad+ma pad bzang dang / /'jog

po nor rgyas mtha' yas ni/ /rin chen rgyal po'i g.yon na'o/ /gza' lag phur bu mjug dang / /sgra gcan mig dmar pa pa sangs/ /spen pa khyab 'jug rta rgyal nyid/ /g.yas pa nyid du rab tu grags/ /dbang po tshangs pa de bzhin drag /'dod lha de bzhin thod pa can/ /gcer

bu dang ni thags ris/ /stobs ldan zhes bya g.yon na'o/ /glo dang dbugs dang de bzhin 'bog /khong skem mdze dang rkang shu dang / /mchin pa mcher pa'i rang bzhin yar/ /glang po la sogs rab tu grags/ /lcags stegs dang ni brjed byed dang / /khrag rdo gcong nad rgyal

po dang / /gzhang 'brum skran dang bkres nad dang / /mis ser don la sogs pa'o/ /rdzi ma byi dang so nad dang / /mkhris pa khrag dang de bzhin rlung / /bad kan 'dzag dang lus skam dang / /skya rbab 'bras ni rma bya sogs/ /rkang bam tshil nad rlig skrangs dang / /rgyu ma 'phel dang gsud

pa dang / /chad pa rims dang rab gas ni/ /kA raN+Da sogs rab tu grags/ /rlung mkhris de bzhin ma zhu ba/ /sgrib g.yogs rab rib gcin sri ba/ /gzhogs phyid na dang lkog 'bras dang / /rlung rgyas gza' lag la sogs pa'o/ /mi yi 'gro ba dam pa ni/ /ra ba mchog de lta bu 'gro ba/ /thams

cad nad kyis khab mthong nas/ /sangs rgyas ldar ni cher grags pa/ /bdag gi lus la gzhug par bya/ /sems can rnams la gdungs ma gyur/ /nad rnams zhi phyir sangs rgyas ni/ /glang po la sogs nad 'dzin to/ /de ltar bsgom par gyur pa la/ /nad med ru dza trang grum med/ /
