'chi med nges par bya d+hi med/ /nga rgyal med cing gti mug med/ /bkres pa med cing skom pa med/ /sdug bsngal ngan 'gro de bzhin med/ /lha dang lha min mi rnams sam/ /gang gis kyang ni nad byed min/ /nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dbugs dbyung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste

lnga pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po lus thams cad 'dzin pa po mkha' 'gro ma'i yid 'phrog bas tshig 'di bka' stsal pa/ sems kyi rjes dran dmigs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /sems kyi rin chen bsams nas ni/ /chos ni rjes su dran pa

bsgom/ /las rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /'khor lo chen po rab bsgom bya/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab ste/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms nas/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis phyag rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje rnam snang bsams nas ni/ /phyag rgya bsgoms

pas phyag rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /rin chen phung po rab bsgom bya/ /chos kyi phyag rgya rab sbyor bas/ /las kyi rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab/ /zhe sdang rgyal po rgyal po che/ /skyon rnams thams cad zad par mdzad/ /spro zhing bsdu bar bsgom par bya/ /bsdu ba yang ni yang

dag bshad/ /sangs rgyas mgon po rab bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgom bya/ /sems ni rin chen rin po ches/ /bdud kyi skyon rnams zad par mdzad/ /sems kyi char sprin sbyor ba yis/ /

yang ni bsdu ba bstan par bya/ /chos kyi rgyal po gti mug che/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i gzugs can de/ /thun tshod bzhir ni byin brlabs pa/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sems ni 'gro mgyogs ltar bsams nas/ /gzhal med 'bras bu stsol ba'o/ /rta mchog

char sprin chen po yis/ /bsdu ba yang ni bsgom par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis spro ba dang bsdu ba'i dam tshig chen po de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sems kyis rnam par bsgom par bya/ /rnyog med dkyil 'khor dbus gnas

par/ /sku yi yi ge rnam par bsgom/ /khrag gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sems kyi rin chen yi ge dgod/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dbus gnas par/ /gsung gi yi ge rnam par bsgom/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /don yod yi ge'i gzugs can te/ /sku

gsum mi phyed bsgom pa yis/ /ye shes rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mi phyed pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rnam snang la/ /rin chen sems kyi rin po che/ /pad ma bzang po 'dab ma dmar/ /shes rab ral gri don yod kyi/ /shes rab rnon po'i rang bzhin gyi/ /rnam rtog ri bo

bcad nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po ldan par 'gyur/ /dpag tshad bye ba brgya par ni/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /phan pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang yang / /rin chen phung po 'od chen dang / /chos kyi phung po mgon chen dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje las/ /sna tshogs 'od zer

cher 'bar ba/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis rnam par brgyan/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis gang / /thams cad du ni sna tshogs gzugs/ /mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya/ /mtshams kyi lha mo'i sbyor

ba yis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho rab bsgrub bya/ /dam tshig 'khor lo bcug pa yi/ /ye shes rdo rje chen po 'bar/ /sangs rgyas kun mnyam rnal 'byor bas/ /skad cig la ni gnyis med 'gyur/ /ru dwA k+sha dang dung bse ru/ /bu yi 'tsho ba pad 'bras dang / /mu tig la sogs byi ru sogs/ /

bsam gtan ldan pas sngags bzlas bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang rang btsun mo/ /mngon sum du ni bya ba'i phyir/ /sngags ni snyan gsan 'bebs par brjod/ /dper na skyes chen la la zhig /skad kyi nga ros bos pa na/ /thos pa tsam gyis 'ongs gyur

pa/ /de ltar skad cig sangs rgyas gshegs/ /'jig rten khams ni stong phrag dang / /nam mkha'i khams kyi mkha' gro 'du/ /phyag rgya chen po'i bde gnas kyi/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /de rnams sngags rig drung na gshegs/ /rdo rje spyan gyis rnam par gzigs/ /

gang gis sngags kyi rim thob pa/ /e ma de yis byang chub 'thob/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang / /sngags kyi spyod pa dang por 'dzin/ /rdo rje sngags ni rab sbyor bas/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes 'thob/ /de ltar shes pa'i sangs rgyas te/ /sngags kyi spyod

pa'i rim gnas pa/ /'bras bu nyid la mi gzigs te/ /de ni sangs rgyas mnyam par brjod/ /sangs rgyas nga rgyal dmigs nas ni/ /chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal ba/ /gang zhig bsgom pa de bas na/ /sems can sangs rgyas mnyam par gyur/ /'jig rten ji ltar sangs rgyas te/ /

ji ltar chos ni rnyog med pa/ /sems can khams ni de ltar bshad/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med/ /ngan par brtags pa'i rnam rtog gis/ /rin chen sems ni dri can byas/ /sems dag pas ni dag par 'gyur/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mi 'jig pa/ /nam mkha' ji bzhin de bzhin

sems/ /sems kyi rin chen bskul ba las/ /sems nyid bsgom pa sangs rgyas te/ /skye bar sangs rgyas dam pa nyid/ /rin chen sems las phyir gyur pa'i/ /sangs rgyas med cing gang zag med/ /rnam par shes pa'i gnas don nam/ /phyi rol gyur pa cung zad med/ /

yid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste/ /'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal po che/ /sems gcig gis ni thob par 'gyur/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg bya'i rang bzhin te/ /chos kyi dbyings ni mchog tu zhi/ /'di ni rin

chen mchog tu brjod/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /'du byed dang ni rnam shes nyid/ /'di dag thams cad sems las skyes/ /thub pa 'di ni gzhan mi 'gyur/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/ /'dod yon 'bras bu rab ster ba/ /sems kyi de nyid rang bzhin dag /

sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ster/ /de nyid phyir na sangs rgyas kyis/ /sems kyi rdo rje bskul ba yi/ /zab mo'i rnam pa nges ldan pa'i/ /phyed par dga' ba'i dngos grub ster/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po snang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas rdo rje chen po rdo

rje can mkha' 'gro ma'i gur bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas gnas ni rab rdzogs dang / /rnam pa lnga bo bsgom pa dang / /kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin dang / /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgrub dang / /

dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dgod pa dang / /mchod bstod bdud rtsi la sogs pa/ /rim pas rjes su bsgom par bya/ /rnal 'byor yan lag drug tu 'dod/ /oM sar+b+ba tathA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de skad ces

bka' stsal to/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a mr-i ta swA da badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta stu ti badzra swab+hA pa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis

de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dzA badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rta mchog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra sA b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin

gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spros pa dang ni bsdus pa'i sku/ /rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad che/ /chos dbyings yi ge las bskyed pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas gnas dgod bya/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a ni la ya badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ /rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /'byung bzhi'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor nyid/ /de yi steng du sangs rgyas bsam/ /spros nas gzhal yas gnas dgod bya/ /rdo rje lta bu mi phyed phyir/ /des na mi bskyod bsgom par bya/ /ma skyes

rjes su dran pa las/ /rnam par snang mdzad phan pa nyid/ /rin chen rnams kyi mchog gi mchog /'di ni rin chen sems su bshad/ /rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che/ /'dod chags mtshan nyid 'dzin pa las/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug pa'i/ /sems ni 'dod chags

zhes byar bshad/ /gang phyir 'bras bral mi 'grub ste/ /de phyir don yod rab tu grags/ /rig ma mdzes ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste/ /gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang / /gsum pa shes rab ye shes te/ /ji ltar lus ni de bzhin

gshegs/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bris nas ni/ /dam tshig khu ba'i cho ga yis/ /ha~M dang bsam gtan bskyed byas nas/ /de tshe dbugs dbyung sbyin par bya/ /mkha' 'gro lnga dang ldan pa dang / /dam tshig lnga yis bkang ba dang / /mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs ldan pas/ /rdo rje sa bon

rab sbyor bas/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar byas nas/ /slob ma rtag par nges bsams te/ /rgyun gyi rigs kyi ming gis ni/ /slob ma rdo rje can dbang bskur/ /spyan dang bdag mo sgrol ma dang / /dkar mo la sogs bdag gzugs kyi/ /rdo rje btsun mo rab sbyor bas/ /rdo rje bla

med bshad par bya/ /bla na med pa'i de nyid 'di/ /gnyis su med cing yi ge med/ /chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal byed/ /bde ba bzang po'i ro myang gis/ /sgrib pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ga dang ha zhes bya ba dang / /dang po mthar yang shwa ldan pa'i/ /rab tu

gsal ba dam pa nyid/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba/ /cho gas rdo rje bdud rtsi myang / /'di dag zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas kun mnyam rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje dang ni mnyam par 'gyur/ /nad rnams thams cad rab tu zhi/ /de ni gzi brjid lus chen po/ /'jig rten kun

gyi yid 'phrog pa/ /phas kyi rgol ba kun las rgyal/ /'jig rten kun gyi bdag pos brgyan/ /lha rnams kyis ni 'dren par brjod/ /mkha' 'gro lnga yi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /chos kyi zas ni zab po/ /dam tshig chen po'i bsam gtan zos pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

to/ /mi bskyod brten pa'i rnal 'byor ba/ /nad rnams thams cad rnam par spangs/ /rtag pas mdangs ni chen por ldan/ /rdo rje nyi mas rgas pa med/ /rdo rje chos ni bsten pa yis/ /bud med kun la longs spyod do/ /don yod rgyal po chen po ni/ /rdo rje srog gi yan lag

'byung / /don kun sgrub cing dpal dang ldan/ /des ni rnal 'byor bar ni brjod/ /mi bskyod btung ba'i sbyor ba las/ /stong phrag lngas ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /phan pa yis ni khri ru brjod/ /rdo rje nyi mas rdo rje'i 'bum/ /tshe dpag med kyis dpag med dang / /bdun gyis nam

mkha' ji srid bshad/ /rdo rje nyi ma dpag med dag /'khor ba'i sgrub thabs rtsa ba nyid/ /'di dag bsten pas rnal 'byor pa/ /kun tu bzang po 'dra bar 'gyur/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ye shes/ /'di ni rdo rje nyi mar brjod/ /chos rnams thams cad kyi ni gnas/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can nyid do/ /thabs dang shes rab 'phel mdzad pa/ /khams gsum dag ni thams cad du/ /sa dang sa 'og bar snang la/ /khrag dang khu bas khyab pa'i lus/ /rigs kyi dbang phyug gis 'di gsungs/ /sen

mo ba spu de bzhin gshegs/ /khams dang khu ba snang mtha' yas/ /lpags dang khrag la gzi brjid che/ /tshil dang rkang la rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /rtsa dang sha la bdun rgyal po/ /'di rnams la ni sangs rgyas lngar/ /rdo rje mkha'

'gros rnam par bshad/ /sa yi khams ni rnam dag pa/ /spyan ni 'khor lo mdzes ma nyid/ /rdo rje btsun mo dang ba ste/ /pad ma'i bu mo tsha ba nyid/ /sgrol ma rlung ni rnam dag pa/ /rdo rje btsun mo bzhi rnams ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya'o/ /gur gyis de rnams bka'

stsal to/ /sngags thams cad rnam par dag pa bdud rtsi lnga mchog tu byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te le'u bdun pa'o// //khyod ni zhe sdang rdo rje yongs skyong ba/ /thugs dang chos ni shin tu rnam dag pas/ /lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/ /

puk+ka sI ni bdag la myur du gzigs/ /rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten don gyi phyir/ /stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod/ /khyod ni gti mug rdo rje yongs skyong ba/ /sku yi bdag po chos kyi gzugs brnyan gyis/ /lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/ /mgon po

ri khrod ma la myur du gzigs/ /rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du/ /stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod/ /khyod ni 'dod chags rdo rje yongs skyong ba/ /gsung dag legs par so sor rtogs pa yis/ /lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad

pa/ /gtum par ldan pa bdag la gzigs par mdzod/ /rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du/ /stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad yongs skyong ba/ /gzugs kun nan tan thams cad mnyam nyid kyis/ /lha yi lus ni

yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/ /Dom bi bdag la mgon pos myur du gzigs/ /rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du/ /stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod/ /thams cad bzhengs par mdzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /'khor lo can rnams thams cad kyi/ /

'dis ni bskyed par 'gyur bar ni/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po 'di skad gsungs/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta khe tsa rI badzra swa b+hA wa at+ma ke ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta b+hU tsa rI swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA tA la wA si nI badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ sku

gsung thugs kyi chos rnams kyi/ /byin brlabs gnas su brtag par ni/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya/ /'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /phyag rgya chen por rab sbyor bas/ /sku yi rin

chen sbyang bar bya/ /bsam gtan rdo rje bsams nas ni/ /sems kyi rin chen rab sgrub byed/ /rdo rje bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis/ /ngag gi rdo rje dri ma med/ /gti mug rdo rje rab sbyor bas/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa sbyang / /zhe sdang rdo rje bsam pa yis/ /sgra yi sgo yi bsam

pa'o/ /sna ni ser sna rdo rje yis/ /ro drug 'dod chags rdo rje yis/ /lus ni phrag dog rdo rje yis/ /yid ni kun du bzang po yis/ /de nyid mkha' 'gro bdag med ma/ /'di rnams kyis ni rnam par sbyang / /gal te 'gal ba yod pa ma yin yang / /de tshe rgyal ba'i dngos po sbyong

ba yod/ /kun rdzob bden par yang dag gnas nas ni/ /'khor lo gzugs kyi chos tsam rnam par bsgom/ /chos kyi dngos po ma byung spyad pa las/ /gang zag thams cad rnam spangs 'jig rten pa/ /'jig rten 'gro bar bsam par mi nus te/ /chos kyi tshul gyis thams cad

rnam par dag /tshig pa rnams kyi gdung dang dug khyab pa'i/ /lus kyi sman ni gzhan gyi dug nyid de/ /ji ltar chu ni rna bar zhugs pa la/ /yang ni chu ni thabs su 'gyur ba nyid/ /ji ltar rlung gis dkrugs pa'i sems rnams kyi/ /de bzhin mkhas pas mon sren gre'u bzhin/ /

'dod chags kyis kyang rmongs pa yi/ /skye bo 'dod chags me yis gdung / /'dod chags kyis bskyed 'jig rten pa/ /'dod chags med pas zad par 'gyur/ /'dod chags rdo rje yongs shes pas/ /yid ni rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /'dod chags zhags pas 'ching ba yis/ /

'jig rten chags pas khyab par brjod/ /'dod chags bral ba'i mngon byang chub/ /'dod chags mthar phyin rnams mi 'dod/ /de nas rdo rje sgrol ma yi/ /sgrub thabs sbyin sreg las kyi ni/ /cho gas 'dod don thams cad ni/ /sgrub thabs yang dag rab bshad bya/ /de la 'di rnams

ni sngags kyi rkang ba yin te/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hAs twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tut+ta re tu re sarba duSh+TAn+ma ma kr-i te dzaM b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+TAM stam+b+ha ni tA re swA hA/ ma mo

dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /lha mo sgrol ma bsgom par bya/ /phyag brgyad zhal ni bzhi ba ste/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /gser gyi kha dog 'dra bar bsgom/ /gzhon nu ma yi mtshan nyid 'bar/ /rdo rje nyi mas dbang bskur ma/ /sangs rgyas bzhi yi dbu

rgyan can/ /lang tsho la ni bab pa'i lus/ /g.yo ba gser gyi rna cha ma/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /'od zer dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje zhags pa de bzhin dung / /g.yas pas mda' ni 'gengs pa'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu ut+pa la/ /sdigs mdzub g.yon

pas 'dzin pa mo/ /rdo rje skyil krung sbyor ba yis/ /gnas gsum pa ni bsgrub par bya/ /shar du me tog sgrol ma ste/ /kha dog dkar zhing yid 'ong ma/ /yi ge oM las skyes pa'o/ /me tog phreng bas lag pa khyab/ /phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig ma nyid/ /rgyan rnams

kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas su bdug spos sgrol ma ste/ /mdog gnag mdzes pa'i gzugs can ma/ /spos dang dung gis lag pa brel/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /nub tu mar me sgrol ma ste/ /mar me sdong bus lag pa khyab/ /mdog ser rnam par

rgyan chen mo/ /g.yo ba gser gyi rna cha ma/ /byang du dri yi sgrol ma ste/ /dri yi dung gis lag khyab pa/ /khrag gi mdog ltar lha mo ni/ /dkyil 'khor snying po bsgom par bya/ /lcags kyu la sogs rab dbye bas/ /der ni sgo yi srung ma bsam/ /steng du gtsug tor rnam rgyal ma/ /

'og tu gnod mdzes ma rab bsgom/ /'khor lo klu zhags bsnams nas ni/ /spro zhing sngags ni bzla bar bya/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ yi ge bcu yis lha mo bcu/ /pha rol phyin bcu la gnas ma/ /'bras bu thams cad rab bsgrub phyir/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya/ /

sngags ni mchog dang phul tu phyin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad ma/ /bklags pas 'gyur byed drag po ste/ /rdo rje gur gyis bshad pa'o/ /sngags 'dis gos kyi thu bar bdun/ /mngon par bsngags pa bya ba ste/ /mdud pas bcings te nags tshal du/ /'gro na'ang

sus kyang mi 'khyer te/ /stag dang chom rkun dang chu srin sna 'thung dang seng ge dang sbrul dang mche ba can dang ma he dang / /dom dang snyug glang la sogs dran pa tsam gyis nyams shing yib bo/ /sngags 'dis ut+pa la la sbyin sreg ji srid du/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad ji tsam gyis bsku bar

bya ste/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re ma mu kaM me wa sha mA nA ya swA hA/ yang sngags de nyid kyis khwa'i sgrol lan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su bzlas te/ dgra'i khyim du sbas na/ nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par byed/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re tsa la bra tsa la shI g+hAM gA mi ni de wa da t+taM uts+tsha Ta ya hU~M phaT/ de nas

gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kA b+hi d+hA nAM ku mA rI ma h+ya mud+bA hi na s+yAH pi tA pra yats+tsha tu me swA hA/ spra tshil dang gtum pa'i sa bon dang / myos byed dang a sho ka'i lo ma dang / me tog sreg blugs bya zhing / mar dang sbrang rtsi bu ram du bcas pa stong phrag

lnga'i sbyin sreg ni bu mo'i dngos grub la rab tu bsngags te/ nyi ma bdun gyis de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas rang 'dod pa'i bu mo thob bo/ /de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kA b+hi d+hA nAM swas+thA nA ta A kar Sha la man+ti ge dzaH/ sngags 'dis pa da ra'i tsher ma stong

phrag lngar byung gi me tog dang sbrags te sreg blugs bya bar brjod pa 'di byas pas skyes bu skyong ba rnams kyi bu mo yang 'gugs par byed do/ /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba zla mtshan 'dzag pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das ma phyag gnyis ma/ zhal gcig lag pa lcags kyu dang /

ut+pa la dang zhags par bcas pa rnam par bris te/ de'i mdun du mchod pa byas te/ /me tog 'di rnams bzang zhing dge zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchod nas phyi nas bsgom pa dang ldan par sngags bzlas so/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kI ma me pasi taM swa b+na ka tha ya hU~M phaT/ stong phrag

lngas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhags pas mgrin par bcings te/ lcags kyus drangs nas bsgrub bya rkang pa'i 'og tu bsams te/ khol mo'i tshul gyis spyad par bya'o/ /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags par bya ste/ bdag gi mig

gnyis mig sman gyis bsku bar bya zhing rgyal po'i rigs kyi drung du 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po slob ma dang 'dra bar gus par byed cing 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / bka' drin stsol zhing snyan par rjod par byed pa dang / bran du yang dag par 'gro zhing khros pa yang dbang du 'gyur ba ste/

'di ni mngon sum du mthong ba dang ngo mtshar dang bcas pa'o/ /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ kha gnyis pa'i so dug thal bar byas la/ ba kha dog dmar mo'i mar dang / arka'i shing bal las sdong bu rab tu sbar la mig sman

bsdu bar bya'o/ /mig sman rdo rje nyi ma dang / rdo rje chos dag mnyes la rdo rje rta mchog gis bdug par bya'o/ /thal ba dang lhan cig mig la bsku bar bya ste/ rdo rje mig gis gang bltas pa de/ gal te pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug mi 'bab na de'i tshe bdag sgrol ma ma lags

te/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bkrongs pa lags so/ /de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur ba byis pa so med pa'i lce blangs la/ sgrol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas bung ba'i rgyal po'i rtsa ba dang / ba lang gi gi wang lhan

cig byas pas dpral bar thig le yongs su bzung ste/ gang bltas pa de dbang du byed do/ /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba lto ba'i srin bu la gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags pa bya ste/ rdo rje dang lhan cig so rtsis byas la byin te/ sbyor ba mchog zos pa na mi spong ba dang /

gzhan du mi dga' ba dang / gzhan du mi 'gro ba dang / rang gi bdag po yang spong ngo / /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba mar khu chen pos nye bar byugs la/ sgrol ma'i gzungs bzlas la de bsgom par bya'o/ /bzlas pa'i mthar sA lu btags pas 'dag gu'i dri ma la khu ba

byas te/ gang la byin pa de lnga por yang mi spong ngo / /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba zla ba la nye bar chags pa'i dus su sgrol ma'i gzungs zlos shing bsnyen pa byas la de las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug blangs te/ dung gi thal ba dang mnye bar bya zhing rab tu dregs ma nyid la sbyin

te/ ji srid du lnga por yang rjes su 'brang ngo / /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs kyis ma dan pha la la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu des rta mgrin dang lhan cig pas bskus na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu

mu ka s+ya ban+d+ha na muk+ti ku ru muHswA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di arka'i lo ma la bsgrub bya'i ming nang du bcug par bris la ne'u le'i khung bur sbas na bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'byung gnas yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya'o/ /gang

gis bsgoms pa tsam gyis phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo phyag gnyis ma/ zhal gcig ma/ sku mdog dkar ba yid 'phrog ma/ skra phyed du li pa/ chu skyes shin tu dkar ba la yang dag par gnas ma/ lag pa g.yas par pad ma mdog dkar ba

yang dag par bsgoms shing / g.yon na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rdo rje skyil krung du gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom par bya'o/ /oM las skyes ma/ mchog tu dga' bar byad ma/ dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed

nas ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya zhing rnal 'byor zla ba drug tu goms pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo bdun du sbyor bas bstan bcos thams cad shes par byed do/ /'bum bzlas pa'i sbyor bas nyi ma re re la tshigs bcad brgya brgya byed par 'gyur ro/ /

rab tu 'bad pa med par gzhung brgya yang 'dzin par byed do/ /de la sngags kyi rkang bar gyur pa/ oM pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la me d+hA bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri bud+d+hi bad+d+ha ni swA hA/ khwa mi zer ba na/ sngags 'dis bdun du mngon par bsngags par byas te/ ma bslangs pa'i sings

po skyur po la lan bdun du sngags kyis btab par bya zhing / ji srid zla ba drug tu gang 'thung ba de shes rab chen por 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ /mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya/ /de yis nye bar bsten pa'i sngags/ /sgrub pa po yis nges par 'grub/ /dal zhing zab mo'i

chos dang ldan/ /rig pa kun la mkhas dang bcas/ /sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor sngags shes shing / /rab gnas gtor ma'i pha rol son/ /de nyid bcu ni rnam par rig /nyan thos spyod pa srung ba bo/ /sngags spyod rim pa gus pa dang / /gzugs ldan mthong na dga' ba dang / /dkyil

'khor 'dri zhing bzlas par ldan/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'joms pa po/ /sngags dang lus skyob sbyor ba yis/ /'jig rten rnams ni bde bar byed/ /de ldan bla mas bcas nas ni/ /gang gis kyang ni smad mi bya/ /skye bo bla ma smod pa gang / /dmyal ba chen por 'tshed par 'gyur/ /

ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dang bor mchod/ /rdo rje gur gyis 'gro ba yis/ /de ltar bla ma'i nan tan bya/ /bla ma'i grib ma bud med dang / /lham dang stan dang mal stan rnams/ /rmongs chen gang zhig 'gong byed na/ /skyes pa de ni spu grir

ltung / /legs par dbang bskur slob ma gang / /bla ma'i bka' las 'da' byed pa/ /'jig rten 'dir ni 'on par 'gyur/ /'jig rten pha rol dmyal bar gnas/ /g.yo dang sgyu yi sbyor ba yis/ /gyis mi nus smra ba las/ /khong skem mdze nad chen po can/ /

dmyal ba la sogs skye bar 'gyur/ /de ltar shes pa'i slob ma yis/ /bla ma'i bsnyen bkur pha rol phyin/ /bla ma'i bka' ni rab bsrungs na/ /dngos grub rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /tshogs kyi zas ni rtag tu bya/ /zhi ba la sogs rab tu bskul/ /snga bar dge 'dun

chos ston bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas yang mnyes bya/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing / /de yi rjes su tshogs kun la'o/ /bdag gi las ni brtsams nas ni/ /cho ga 'dis ni bsgrub par bya/ /yan lag rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan/ /rdo rje rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje

dril bu blangs nas ni/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor ma dang / /me tog bdug spos mar me dang / /de bzhin dri yi dung sogs g.yas/ /g.yon du sngags kyi mchod yon snod/ /mdun du bzed snod gzhag par bya/ /zhabs bsil gong ma'i cho ga yis/ /me tog

spos sogs rim pa bzhin/ /lA s+ya la sogs mchod pa yis/ /mchod par byas na bzang por sbyin/ /me tog sgyur ba'i tshul gyis dang / /dri ni 'thor ba'i tshul las dang / /sdong pos mar me'i mchod pa dang / /byug pa'i lus kyis rjes su dris/ /lA s+ya'i lag pa lA s+ya ste/ /

phreng bas phreng ba'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /glu yis hUM gi dam tshig glu/ /brla bskums pas ni gar nyid de/ /mchod pa 'di rnams bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mchod pas mchod/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur/ /bzlas dang bsgom

pa mngon dga' zhing / /rtag tu 'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bka' ji bzhin/ /'di rnams bla med mchod pa'o/ /me tog spos sogs mngon sum du/ /'jig rten spyod par gnas pa yis/ /sna tshogs mchod pa mchog nyid min/ /de nyid byang chub yan lag

min/ /dkar po zhi bar byed par brjod/ /ser po rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs la/ /dbang dang dgug par dmar po ste/ /tha ma'i las la nag po'o/ /zhi ba la ni me tog dkar/ /ser po rgyas pa'i rdo rje la/ /me tog nag po tha ma la/ /dbang dang dgug la dmar po bzang / /rnal 'byor

pa gang dbang bskur med/ /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang / /gang zhig rab gnas ma mthong dang / /gang zhig sbyin sreg ma byas pa/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ /de yi dngos grub mchog nyid med/ /gang gis slob dpon gsol ma btab/ /'dir ni rigs su skye ba med/ /

sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya/ /gang gis byang chub ma thob na'ang / /'khor los sgyur ba'i gnas su de'i/ /skye zhing skye bar skye bar 'gyur/ /yang na sa yi bdag po nyid/ /dag pa'i gnas su mngon par 'gro/ /bde ba can dang mkha' 'gro dang / /dga' ldan du ni blo ldan

skye/ /'jig rten 'dir ni gang 'grub pa/ /sangs rgyas de ni ci zhig smos/ /khams gsum bdag po chen po nyid/ /'chi med rgas pas khyab pa med/ /tshangs pa brgya byin de bzhin drag /sgra gcan med dang rlung dang ni/ /'dod pa'i lha dang thong ldan nyid/ /'di rnams de yi 'khor du 'gyur/ /

lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lha ma yin dang mi/ /mi'am ci dang mkha' spyod gang / /de rnams 'khor 'gyur the tsom med/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /'khrungs dang byang chub byed pa dang / /de bzhin du ni lhar gshegs dang / /khyim

nas 'byung bar byed pa dang / /rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa dang / /skye ba yongs su len pa dang / /yongs su mya ngan 'das pa ston/ /'dul ba'i 'jig rten mthong nas ni/ /'di ni gzugs ni du ma byed/ /sangs rgyas sems can skyabs bzhed pas/ /sangs rgyas gar ni rol pa mdzad/ /ri bong

stag dang seng ge dang / /glang po rnams kyi rigs su yang / /snying rjes phan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /phyag rgyas grub pa skye bar 'gyur/ /bud med sgyu ma'i spros pa yis/ /'dod chags can la chos gsung ngo / /bud med sgyu ma sangs rgyas nyid/ /sgyu ma thams cad sel bar

byed/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gzugs su/ /bud med rtag tu yang dag gnas/ /sgyu ma chen mo gnas 'dug nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ster/ /g.yo zhing dad che ngo tsha med/ /rtag tu 'dod chags pha rol 'gro/ /dngos grub kyang ni rab tu ster/ /gzugs dang yon tan nor la

yang / /'dod pa gang yang btsun mo med/ /rdo rje 'dod chags yid 'dod pas/ /rang gi bde ba myang bar ldan/ /skyes bu tshul khrims ldan pa dang / /bde gshegs bka' las mi 'da' zhing / /bla ma bsnyen bkur snying rje can/ /kye yi rdo rje rab phye ba'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma

bdag med ma gtso mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ zhe sdang rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gti mug rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ser sna rdo rjes bdag la skyobs/ /'dod chags rdo rjes bdag la stsol/ /yid dang phrag dog chen po dang / /

rdo rje kun gyis dam tshig la mgon/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po/ /rdo rje can kun dgyes par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig la gnas te/ dbyangs 'di gsungs pa/ thig skud sar pa mdzes par ldan/ shin tu tshad ma gtsang

ma yis/ /he zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya/ /de la 'di ni slob ma chen po'i gsol ba gdab pa'i dam tshig go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /dkyil

'khor 'dren pas bshad du gsol/ /dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje la gsol ba gdab pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nga ni snying rje stobs dpal ldan/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sbyar ba bo/ /rdo rje yis ni gsal ba'i lus/ /sku gsum las ni skyes pa spro/ /gal

te la la 'da' byed na/ /'jig par 'di la the tsom med/ /lus srul po dang kha cig gang / /bde chen ye shes 'byung ba dang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin skyes/ /zur gcig bgegs ni chen po rnams/ /'khor lo yi ni brgyad nyid kyi/ /cha yis sgo ni rab

tu grags/ /sgo khar lha yi snam bu ni/ /sgo yi tshad kyi tshad du bya/ /sgo yi phyed kyi cha ru ni/ /ya phubs dang ni 'gram nyid do/ /rig byed nyid kyang de bzhin bya/ /dra ba'i snam bu rig byed phyed/ /dang por tshangs pa'i thig dang ni/ /gnyis par mtshams kyi thig dang yang / /

gsum par ngos bzhi yi ni bzhi/ /thig ni rab tu gdab par bya/ /tshangs thig cha gnyis bor nas ni/ /cha drug tu ni gdab par bya/ /de nas sgo yi tshad bor nas/ /dgu yi char ni rab tu gdab/ /de la 'di ni sa sbyang ba'i dam tshig go/ /a~M kha~M hU~M bU~M/ de la 'di ni ye shes

spyan drang ba ste/ oM me di ni badzrI b+ha ba badzra ban+d+ha hU~M/ de la 'di ni thig gdab pa'i dam tshig ste/ oM sa ma ya sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ de la 'di ni rdul tshon bri ba'i dam tshig ste/ /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni thar bar byed/ /kye yi rdo rje rgyal po ches/ /dkyil

'khor dam pa bzhengs par bya/ /dbang ldan du ni sha ra b+ha/ /me yi mtshams su dge slong bri/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bden bral du/ /rlung du rdo rje bri bar bya/ /lcags kyu shar du bri bar bya/ /lho yi sgor ni zhags pa nyid/ /nub sgor de bzhin lcags sgrog ste/ /byang du rdo rje dril bu'o/ /dbus

su thod pa dkar po ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bris/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos sbyin sreg gi grong khyer rab tu phye ba/ rdo rje thab khung sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje'i bsreg rdzas sbyor ba las/ /zlum po zhi bar byed par brjod/ /rgyas par ra ba'i rdzing bu'i gzugs/ /dbang ni zla ba phyed

pa 'dra/ /dgug pa la ni lcags kyu'i dbyibs/ /gsad dang zhe sdang las la ni/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa'o/ /de bzhin skrod byed skal ngan dang / /yan lag nyams pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /tsan+dan a ka ru shing dang / /gzhan yang dri yi rkang 'thung gis/ /sbyin sreg

yan lag me sbar nas/ /phyis ni yang ni dgug par bya/ /oM e h+ye hi ma hA b+hU ta de ba r-i Shi dwi dza sat+ta ma gr-i hI twA A hu tiM A hA raM a smin san+ni hi to b+ha la/ lcags kyu nyid kyis dgug par bya/ /zhags pa nyid kyis gzhug bya zhing / /lcags sgrog gis ni zhabs dag bcing / /

dril bu 'khrol bas dbang du bya/ /lAs+ya la sogs mchod pa brgyad/ /mchod yon cho ga byas nas ni/ /mar la sogs pa'i sbyor ba las/ /yang ni me ni mnyes par bya/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje mchod yon gyi dam tshig ste/ /oM bra wa ra san+kA ra pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ de la 'di ni zhabs bsil

gyi dam tshig ste/ oM sarba pA bad ha na badzrA ya badzra sa twa s+ya sarba pA baM da ha da ha swA hA/ de la 'di ni bsreg rdzas thams cad 'chu ba'i dam tshig gi sngags te/ oM badzrA na la ma hA b+hU ta dz+wa la ya/ sar+b+ba b+ha smIM ku ru sarba duSh+TAn hU~M phaT/ dri sh+ya/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ sa ma ya s+t+waM a ha~M/ phyi nas rang 'dod

pa'i lha spyan drangs te/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn+ni hab+ha k+t+ya nus ma ye na tsa ar+g+han+tu saM pra tI ts+tshe daM pU dzAM tsA d+ya pra sid+d+ha me/ de la 'di ni dgyes pa'i dam tshig ste/ oM kr-i to baHsar+b+ba sa twA r+thaH sid+d+hirda twA ya thA nu gA gats+tsha d+hAM bud+d+ha pi She yaM pu na rA ga ma nA ya muH bzhengs pa dang las sna tshogs kyi sbyor ba dang

sbyin sreg gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rab gnas ni/ /'jig rten tha snyad la gnas te/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya/ /dang por re zhig rig ma 'dzin/ /dril bu 'khrol bar 'dod pa dang / /rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i

sbyor ba las/ /g.yas par rdo rje gsor ba dang / /srod thun skad ni chag pa na/ /gos kyis mgrin pa bcings pa dang / /rin chen spyan gyis yongs gang ba'i/ /bum pa sta gon gnas par bya/ /oM de wa pi tsu badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM mo ha ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM dwe Sha ra ti ab+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM

rA ga ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM badzrar ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM badzra gau rI A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ oM badzra tso rI pra be sha ya hU~M/ oM badzra bet+tA lI ban+d+ha ba~M/ oM badzra g+hasma rI wa shaM ku ru hoH/ 'di ni ye shes dgug pa'i cho ga'o/ /shun pa lnga dang ba byung lnga/ /khyad par du yang dri lnga dang / /lus bshal ched du blug par

bya/ /mchod yon la sogs sngar bzhin bya/ /yang na de nyid sbyor bar bya/ /snga bar blugs shing byin gyis brlab/ /mig la sogs par gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod/ /dbang ni rang gi rigs nyid kyis/ /mchod pa la sogs rim pas brtsam/ /rang gi snying nas

ye shes bsam/ /sangs rgyas bzhugs par bsang gtor bya/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba yis/ /rim pas mchod pa'i lha mo spro/ /byang chub sems mchog bsams nas ni/ /sangs rgyas bstod pa yang dag brtsam/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /stong ba snying rje tha dad med/ /khyod

ni rnal 'byor ma tshogs yongs su bskor/ /khyod ni nyid kyi thugs kyis mchog brnyes pa/ /khyod kyis rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba kun bsgrubs shing / /snying rje'i thugs kyis sems can sad mdzad pa/ /sgyu ma'i spros pas rdo rje 'phen mdzad pa/ /he ru ka dpal rdo rje yid kyis dgyes/ /rdo rje se gol

sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sgom pas bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje yi ge blangs nas ni/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje phung po rnam par bsgom/ /de nas rdo rje 'chod pa bsam/ /rdo rje lce yi sbyor ba las/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rjes bcug nyid/ /rdo rje'i sngags

kyis bsang gtor ba/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i ro myang ba'i rdo rje de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son par/ /rtse mo lnga pa bris pa yis/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /stobs kyis sangs rgyas phur bus gdab/ /chos 'byung grong

khyer yid 'ong bar/ /rdo rje mdzub mo'i sbyor ba las/ /gal te dngos grub mi ster na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gsad par bya/ /oM du ru du ru/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ hU~M hU~M/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phur bus gdab pa chen po rdo rje de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /

rta mgrin rnam par bsgom par bya/ /dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje chos/ /phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba las/ /pad ma dmar po spyi bor 'dzin/ /sku mdog dmar po stobs po che/ /gos dkar gnyis med sbyor ba las/ /bcu drug phyag gis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas pa'i zhal ni nag po ste/ /g.yon

pa zla mdzes dri ma med/ /dang po dmar po shes par bya/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa/ /rdo rje chos ni gzi brjid che/ /'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas/ /bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa'o/ /ma mo'i

dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya/ /dbu rgyan rdo rje 'dzin pa bsam/ /sku mdog dkar po gzi brjid che/ /phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa/ /zhabs bzhi pa ste 'jigs pa po/ /chos kyi 'khor lo spyi bor 'dzin/ /'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pa/ /

spyan dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /dang po'i zhal ni dkar po ste/ /nag po dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje nyi ma rnam par bsgom/ /cod pan rin chen

'dzin par bsam/ /rdo rje gzi brjid 'od po che/ /phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa/ /zhabs bzhi ba ste 'jigs pa po/ /sems kyi rin chen spyi bor 'dzin/ /btso ma gser ltar gzi brjid che/ /dang po'i zhal ni ser po ste/ /g.yas pa sngon po 'dra ba'o/ /g.yon pa zla 'od

bzang po ste/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rta mchog rnam par bsgom par bya/ /dbu rgyan ral gri 'dzin par bsam/ /ma rgad ut+pal mtshungs pa'o/ /zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi ba/ /bcu drug phyag gis rnam par brgyan/ /

dang po'i zhal ni sngo bsangs te/ /rta yi gzugs te 'jigs pa po/ /g.yas pa kha dog nag po ste/ /g.yon pa zla mdzes dri ma med/ /ral gri dngos grub spyi bor 'dzin/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /rdo rje nyi ma rta nyid kyi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni sgrol ma'i gzugs/ /lha mo rnams kyi phyag

gnyis brjod/ /gri gug dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /kye rdo rje la dkyil 'khor mchog /ral gri dag ni rtag pa nyid/ /phan par me long de bzhin no/ /rta mgrin la ni gos bzang ste/ /rdo rje nyi ma la ni gser/ /rta mchog la ni 'gro mgyogs te/ /mchog tu phan pa nyid kyi yon/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu

'dod pa yis/ /bla ma la rtag rgyun du 'bul/ /skal bzang rdo rje sems dpa' bdag /skal bzang thub pa rnam snang mdzad/ /skal bzang dpal ldan 'jig rten dbab/ /skal bzang nyi ma bdun rgyal po/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sku gsum mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa pos mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin

pa'i dam tshig mchog gsungs pa/ /oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/ marda marda/ badzra d+h+r-ika phaT swA hA/ de nas sngags chen bshad pa na/ rdo rje skye ba snying rje che/ /'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas ni/ /rdo rje'i dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyi rnam pa'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs te/ rta mgrin gyi sngags 'di gsungs pa/ oM badzra d+har+m+ma sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hu lu hu lu/ oM A ro lika phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam na/ /rdo rje chos ni gags chen po/ /'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas ni/ /chos kyi dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ phan pa'i sngags 'di gsungs pa/ oM shA shwa taM pa ra ma shA shwa ta e h+yi hi dzi na dzika phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang de bzhin gshegs/ /brgyal zhing

'jigs par gyur nas ni/ /de rnams sangs rgyas dngos grub stsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen nyi ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje gzi brjid kyi sngags 'di gsungs pa/ oM badzra sUR+Ya ta mo bi d+ha ma nas ma yang s+t+wa ba haM rat+na d+h+r-ika phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di

ni bshad tsam gyis/ /rdo rje gzi brjid 'od po che/ /'jigs shib brgyal par gyur nas ni/ /nyi ma'i dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bzhugs te/ rta mchog rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /phuHphuHphuHhi hi hi pradz+nya d+hI ka phaT

swA hA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis/ /rdo rje don yod rigs byung ba/ /'jigs shing brgyal bar gyur nas ni/ /de rnams don yod dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zlum po ste/ /rdo rje can gyi zla phyed mtshungs/ /rdo rje chos kyi pad+ma 'dra/ /nyi ma'i yid bzhin nor bu

bzhin/ /rta mchog ces bya de yi ni/ /thams cad du ni gru gsum mo/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /phan pa'i phyag rgya nyid dang ni/ /rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che/ /rin chen tog gi 'od byed ma/ /don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya che/ /rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par ldan/ /stag

gi pags pa mnabs pa dang / /dbu skra thod pa phyed pa ste/ /mchod par brtson pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /chags pas mig dmar mthong nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba las/ /chags pa'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /las sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //

de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis/ /spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /rdo rje spyod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje phyag rgya yang dag brtsam/ /me tog 'bras sogs kyis brgyan pa/ /nags chen po yi mtha' nyid du/ /sems dpa' chen po 'gro par bya/ /nags tshal du ni slongs mos rgyu/ /zas ni

bzang pos brgyan pa nyid/ /de rnams 'jigs shing skrag nas ster/ /nags tshal bdag po'i rigs kun ni/ /rdo rje can te 'khor du 'gyur/ /skyes pa dang ni skye ba kun/ /skye bo gang zhig skye 'gyur ba/ /gti mug rdo rje'i sbyor ba las/ /rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /khams

gsum la ni nyams dga' bar/ /sgra ni gang zhig rab grags pa/ /rna ba'i drung du gnas pa bzhin/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i sbyor ba las/ /drang srong mngon par shes pas thos/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /mtshon ka lta bu'i mtshan nyid ni/ /lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /rdo rje'i

sems kyis shes par 'gyur/ /skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu/ /rang gi rigs ni stong phrag gcig /rdo rje sbyor bas dran 'gyur te/ /nyi gsum lon bzhin dran par 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba du ma yis/ /'dis ni snang bar byed par 'gyur/ /mngon shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas mngon

shes thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje skye mched rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //phan pa nyid kyis zhi ba ste/ /rdo rje nyi mas rgyas pa'o/ /rdo rje chos kyis dbang zhes bya/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsang par bya/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba ste/ /dbang ni yang dag brtsam par bya/ /rgyas

pa'i sems kyis rgyas bste/ /rin chen char sprin rab bsgom bya/ /rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bu mo bkug nas spyad par bya/ /me yi char sprin 'bab pa dang / /gdug pa'i sems kyis gsad par bya/ /'phrog pa las ni dkar mo ste/ /skye gnyis pa las tshangs ma nyid/ /dpal mo

sred med pu las kyang / /ma bcag pa las ra m+b+ha nyid/ /dga' ma chu srin rgyal mtshan las/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /de rnams thams cad nye bar spyad/ /shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis rtse/ /'dod pas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar ni swA hAs zhi ba ste/ /rgyas pa'i dus su bau

Sha Ta/ /mthar ni hU~M phaT bsad pa la/ /dbang dang dgug la dzaHdang hrIH/ las thams cad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rdo rje gur/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab bsgrub phyir/ /thub pas tshig 'di bka' stsal to/ /me tog 'bras bus

brgyan byas pa'i/ /ri khrod dang ni sman ljongs su/ /rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /bla ma sangs rgyas mchod par bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang / /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung / /sangs

rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la/ /byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi/ /rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can thams cad bdag gi mgron du gnyer/ /byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par

bgyi/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /tshangs pa'i gnas ni bzhi po yis/ /sems kyi ngal ni bso bar bya/ /phyin nas byang chub sems gnas te/ /rdo rje bsrung ba'i dam tshig go/ /bden dang par spyad pa yi/ /brtag pas nye bar mi gos te/ /ma skyes pa yi sbyor

ba yis/ /skye ba 'dir ni rab tu brjod/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /hU~M ni bcu yi sbyor ba yis/ /khro bo bcu ni rim pas dgod/ /gshin rje mthar byed shes rab mthar/ /pad+ma mthar byed

'gegs mthar byed/ /Tak+ki khro bo dbyug pa sngon/ /mi g.yo ba dang stobs chen dang / /gtsug tor gdugs ni dkar po dang / /rdo rje zhabs 'og gnas pa ni/ /bdud rtsi sbyor bas thams cad du/ /khro bo'i sgom pas bsgom par bya/ /dpag tshad brgyar ni khyab pa ru/ /bsams nas

bgegs ni bskrad par bya/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /yang ni chu ni bsgom par bya/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor

dbus gnas par/ /brtul zhugs can gyis dbang chen bsgom/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par bya/ /b+h+rUM las gnas ni bsams nas su/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor de brtag bya/ /rnam pa lnga ni rab brtag bya/ /ye shes lnga las byung ba yi/ /sems dpa'i

gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /rig ma'i skyes bu bsgom par bya/ oM d+harmA d+hA tu badzra swab+hA pa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ rdo rje bzhengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /mig la sogs par gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod/ /thugs kyi rdo rje

mkha' spyod ma/ /gsung gi rdo rje sa spyod ma/ /sku la zhabs 'og gnas ma ste/ /hU~M AHoM las byung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi snying por bya/ /rdo rje dkar mo chu bdag ma/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdag med ma/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i gnas mnan cing / /dkyil 'khor snying por bsgom par bya/ /

dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma/ /g+hasma rI ni sgo srungs ma/ /puk+ka sI dang ri khrod ma/ /gdol pa g.yung mo mtshams su dgod/ /steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes bshad/ /'og tu de bzhin sa spyod ma/ /dbus su bdag med mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom/ /byang chub rdo rje

sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod pa che stsal pa/ /bdag kyang rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/ /khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi/ /gnas las byung ba stsol par mdzad/ /ye shes kyi dbang

la gsol ba gdab pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rig ma'i skyes bu dbang chen la/ /cod pan rang gi lhag pa'i lha/ /des ni dkyil 'khor dbang dang ni/ /bstod dang mchod pa la sogs bya/ /ye shes gzhug pa de bzhin yang / /lce yis rdo rje bdud rtsi myang / /nang du brjod

pa'i sbyor ba las/ /brtul zhugs can gyis sngags bzlas bya/ /rnal 'byor ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rang rang gi rnam par rtog pa skyes par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar

na rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud ces spyad par bgyi/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs/ /rnal 'byor ma zhes mngon par brjod/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba las/ /gang phyir de nyid bsten pa yi/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rdo rje gur/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud ces

bshad/ /pha rol phyin pa kun gyi thabs/ /bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /dga' mdzes mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mtsho/ /mkha' dang gser gyi char pa dang / /dga' chen ma dang g+hasma rI/ /shin tu dgyes rol gsang yid 'phrog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro phan rgyud brgyad/ /

kye yi rdo rje dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kun/ /gsang mdzod rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba dang / /'khor lo sdom pa gur dang 'byung gnas ni/ /rnal 'byor ma rgyud drug tu rab tu grags/ /skyes bu rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor rgyud ni yang dag bshad/ /btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir/ /

rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud bshad do/ /dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud/ /bya min rnal 'byor de ltag la/ /sems can mchog la rnal 'byor mchog /rnal 'byong gong med de lhag la/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ re zhig bdag cag gis

spyod yul rnams ni 'tshal na'ang / sems can gzhan rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /stong pa snying rje tha dad med/ /gang du sems ni rab bsgoms pa/ /'di ni sangs rgyas chos dang ni/ /dge 'dun

gyi yang bstan pa'o/ /mu stegs can sun dbyung ba dang / /rgol ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang / /rang gi sde'i gzhung brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bdag gi byang chub thob phyir dang / /gang phyir gzhan dag bsgral ba'i phyir/ /des na sangs rgyas chos dang ni/ /dge 'dun

gyi yang bstan pa'o/ /bdag 'dzin zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /chos dbyings bdag nyid sgrub thabs ni/ /thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yis/ /des ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rgyal ba'i sras po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung 'di thos nas

dga' bar gyur te/ tshig 'di skad smras pa/ e ma kun tu bzang po yi/ /bstan pa nam mkha' las byung ba/ /nam mkha'i dbus su sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho nyan par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni/ /bde ba chen po rnam 'phel bas/ /dam tshig thams cad bshad

par bya/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /bde dang rangs shing gar dang ni/ /glu dang rol mo'i sgra byed pas/ /dri dang phreng ba byug pa yis/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu 'grub/ /ji ltar bde bar bde bzung nas/ /ji ltar 'dod par spyad par bya/ /ji ltar gnas su gnas nas

kyang / /yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /bza' dang btung ba'i sbyor ba dang / /bzang po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yis/ /nyi ma gcig tu bskul ba yis/ /dam pa'i de nyid 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig myang / /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag tu bla

ma la yang dbul/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /ji ltar mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /rdo rje 'dzin bzhin bla ma nyid/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mdzod chen po/ /ji ltar thub pa rdo rje chos/ /ji ltar mgon po bdun rgyal po/ /de ltar rdo rje slob dpon brjod/ /de bas 'bad pa thams

cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon bla ma che/ /dge ba mchog tu gsal ba po/ /nam yang smad par mi bya'o/ /rdo rje sdom pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po rdo rje gsor bar bzhed pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma bdag med mas 'khyud pas

bzang po spyod pa dbye bar bya'o/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su bzhag nas ni/ /ji ltar 'dod par 'dod pa yis/ /rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur ba nyid/ /dogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /dri lnga yang dag blangs nas su/ /rdzas lnga dang ni bsre bar bya/ /lcags gsum gyis ni dkris nas ni/ /

ril bu'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /gur gum a ka ru ldan pa/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /ril bu kha ru bcug byas nas/ /nyi ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sha lnga dang ni ldan pa ru/ /lcags gsum gyis ni dkris nas ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma rab sbyor bas/ /nyi ma gcig gis

'grub par 'gyur/ /tsan+dan dmar po kha che dang / /dga' ba sbas par sbyar ba ni/ /lcags gsum gyis ni dkri byas pa/ /rta yi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po rnam bsgoms nas/ /tsa na'i rus pa'i tshad tsam las/ /gu gul lcags kyis dkris pa ni/ /mgon po'i

rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /ril bu sgrub thabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /klu yi rgyal po'i mgo bsregs nas/ /rang byung khrag gis bsgo bar bya/ /rdo rje phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mig sman rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /bla ma'i sa bon ldan pa dang / /stag gi pags pa'i tshil

bus mnye/ /sku yi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rkang pa'i byug pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /yan lag med pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus/ /dbang po'i brag phug 'gram du ni/ /rdo rje rkang 'og rnal 'byor gyis/ /lha yi bu mo rab bsgrub bya/ /oD+yan yul du nye ba na/ /a mra 'bras chen po yi ni/ /

rdo rje gnod mdzes sbyor ba yis/ /rkang 'og rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /yang nas yang du bskul bar bya/ /de nyid dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mtshungs/ /rdo rje gnod mdzes sku chen po/ /phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa nyid/ /

sdigs mdzub klu yi zhags pa dang / /kha dog nag por bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad blangs nas ni/ /rnam pa thams cad bsgom par bya/ /mi bskyod pa yi yang dag mnan/ /phuHzhes bya ba'i sngags brjod do/ /rab tu byug pa dang mig sman rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung thos nas/ dga' zhing mgu ba skyes par gyur te tshig 'di skad smras so/ /e ma'o rdo rje e rdo rje/ /e ma rdo rje'i bstan pa ni/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa la/ /gang phyir dngos grub rab gnas pa/ /snying po

med pa'i chu shing la/ /ji ltar snying po'i 'bras zhim pa/ /de ltar snying po med lus la/ /dngos grub 'bras zhim de bzhin no/ /nam mkha' 'byung po thams cad dang / /chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te/ /sems ni nam mkha' lta bur dag /dag pa'i sems ni mchog tu bde/ /don dam

dbang po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /sems las phyi rol gyur pa med/ /gzugs sogs so sor 'dod pa yis/ /sems nyid du ni 'dod par bya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji ltar sems stong la

sems las phyi rol gyi don sems mi stong pa rab tu 'byung zhes bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ /thog med srid pa'i bag chags kyis/ /phyi rol don ni rnam par brtags/ /sems kyis thams cad rnam par brtags/ /sems ni kun tu 'gro bar brjod/ /byang chub sems

rab tu 'byung ba bstan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /shin tu bzhin mdzes mig yangs ma/ /si h+la ga bur 'byung ba'i gnas/ /pang du bzhag par byas nas ni/ /skra nas gzung bar yang dag brtsam/ /rdo rje'o yis 'o byas shing / /rdo rje nyid pas mnye bar bya/ /rdo rje 'khyud pas yang dag

blang / /rdo rje ma mchu rab btsir bya/ /rdo rje mdzub mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gnas ni rab bskul bya/ /rdo rje sems ni phyung ba yis/ /rdo rje lce yis yang dag bza'/ /phyin nas de yi bde can du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje 'chi ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje mchod pa yang dag brtsam/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba la/ /sems ni brtul zhugs can gyi dbrog /pad+ma me tog ldan pa yi/ /pad+ma dmar pos mchod par bya/ /pad+mas mnyes pa'i rdo rje can/ /pad+ma dmar pos khyad par du'o/ /dri lnga'i rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /rgyal mtshan ga bur mchod pa ni/ /'di ni brtson

'grus bde chen dang / /stobs dang rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / /mthong ba nyid kyis bskul ba yis/ /'jig rten 'di ni dbang du byed/ /gang gis dkon mchog gsum bsad dang / /gang gis sems can bsad byas dang / /gang gis slob dpon smod pa dang / /sangs rgyas lam la 'phya ba rnams/ /lcags kyu yis ni

yang dag dbug /lcags sgrog gis ni rkang pa bcing / /zhags pas mgrin pa dam par bcing / /rdo rje bdag gis dgug par bya/ /mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas bsams nas ni/ /de rnams dpang por gsol bar bya/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas dpa' bo dang / /rdo rje sems dpa' bkrongs pa ste/ /

'di de sdig pa chen po can/ /mnar med 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de/ /'di ni dmyal ba chen por ltung / /de ltar bsams nas gsad par bya/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni bsams nas su/ /nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje dbyug pas brdungs byas nas/ /rdo rje can gyi gnas su skye/ /

lcags kyu la sogs mi nus na/ /zan gyis kyang ni 'du bya zhing / /de nyid kyis ni gzugs bsams nas/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor nyid du gzhag /Tak+ki'i rgyal po lcags kyu ste/ /dbyug sngon can la rang gi ming / /stobs kyi rgyal po rtse gsum pa/ /mi g.yo gri rtse'i dkyil 'khor can/ /rnam

par rtog pa chen po gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis/ /thams cad dbugs dbyung rab gsol bas/ /dam tshig rdo rje bsrung don du/ /sbas pa'i spyod yul 'di gsungs pa/ /rdo rje khro bo'i skyes bu che/ /thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /snying

gar g.yon pa'i khu tshur 'dzug /g.yas na rang gi mtshon cha 'phyar/ /gshin rje gsod pa'i dbyug to can/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje dbyug /rta mgrin la ni dbang mchog dmar/ /mi phyed bdud rtsi'i thab sbyor las/ /Tak+ki'i rgyal po lcags kyu ste/ /dbyug sngon can la rang gi ming / /stobs

kyi rgyal po rtse gsum pa/ /mi g.yo yi ge'i dkyil 'khor rtse/ /tsha skyabs dkar po rgyal po la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /gtun shing rdo rje rkang 'og la/ /zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa'o/ /dbang po sngon po'i rnam pa ltar/ /mthar byed rnam par bsgom par bya/ /gzhan gyis

mi thub rdo rje ni/ /'jigs byed zla ba'i nor bu 'dra/ /pad+ma'i khro bo dmar po che/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid nag /mtshams kyi khro bo chen na gcig /spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa mtshan/ /gshin rje rnam snang nyid kyis te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbyug pa can/ /pad+ma'i khro bo rnam gzigs rjes/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' thabs sbyor la/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya/ /'og tu pad+ma'i gdan bsams nas/ /khro bo bcu rnams rab bsgom bya/ /ye shes rdo rje rang dngos su/ /bcu phyed dkyil 'khor bdag nyid de/ /bdud rnams zhabs kyi 'og bsams nas/ /

dkyil 'khor lnga po bsgom par bya/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo gzi brjid che/ /bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba ste/ /'khor zhing rab tu mi g.yo bar/ /dpag tshad lnga brgya'i tshad tsam mo/ /bsrung ba'i dam tshig stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan dpa'

chen po/ /rang gis byin brlabs rim gnas te/ /rang gis byin brlabs rnal 'byor gyis/ /de nyid las ni bshad par bya/ /snying gi dbus su zla bar 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan zla bar ma bcos pa/ /sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag khyab/ /de las rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje bdag med mkha'

'gro ma/ /cho gas bskul bas bsgom par bya/ /mkha' 'gro sna yi mthar gnas pa/ /yungs kar tsam du rnam par bsgom/ /yungs kar la ni 'gro ba kun/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ /de ltar sgom par byed pa yi/ /rang gi byin rlabs rab tu 'grub/ /gzugs sgra de bzhin

dri dang ni/ /ro dang reg bya mngon 'dod pa/ /der ni rnal 'byor nyid kyis ni/ /mi 'dzin de phyir bdag gzhan med/ /ji ltar rdor pad las byung ba/ /zhi ba'i bde ba'i rnam par 'dod/ /dba' rlabs med cing snang ba med/ /rnam rtog med cing yi ge med/ /myos byed cung zad rab 'thungs pa'i/ /

bdag gis bdag nyid mi rig go/ /dga' bral dga' bdag gi mthar/ /rtog pa'i dra ba rnam par spangs/ /'gyur med 'khrul pa las 'das shing / /kye yi rdo rje rnam par gsal/ /bems min rnam pa he ru ka /rnam pa rnams mas kyis yongs su bskor/ /rang nyid mgon po he ru ka /de yis bdag

nyid mi rig cing / /de yi dus na thams cad rig /'byung po 'gro dang 'ong ba ni/ /rang gis kun mkhyen lta bur gzigs/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras po dang / /yan lag kun dang bu ga kun/ /mgo bo dra ba'i skud par bcas/ /lus ni yod min ltar gzigs shing / /skad cig kye'i rdo rje'i

gzugs 'dzin/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mi dmigs shing / /mtshan ma med cing ma byung dang / /gos pa med cing 'khrul pa med/ /sgrib pa lnga ni rnam par spangs/ /ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan ni/ /rtogs nas bde ba rnam spangs pa/ /de bzhin bdag nyid he ru ka'i/ /rnam pa lta bur gsal

bar mthong / /de nyid don dang dbang po dang / /phung po nam mkha' lta bur yod/ /lus ni bde ba nyid brjod cing / /'du byed rnams kyis zil mi gnon/ /gzugs ni mig gis mi 'dzin te/ /sgra ni thos pa po yis min/ /lce yis ro ni mi tshor te/ /dri ni sna yis kyang ma yin/ /reg bya lus kyi gong

bus min/ /'on kyang bde chen tshul las ni/ /bud med bzang mo mthong bas bde/ /rna bas glu yi bde bas bzang / /snom pas dri yi bde ba che/ /skye gnas reg pa'i bde chen dang / /ro yi btung ba'i sbyor ba las/ /gang gis bde ba 'gog par byed/ /bde ba chen pos 'gro ba khyab/ /bde ba ma

gtogs mi shes so/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang btsun mo bzang / /sangs rgyas lnga dang du ma ni/ /bde bar phyin cing rnam par sad/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi bde ba chen po'i tshig thos nas tshig 'di skad smras pa

phal ba'i rnam rtog gzhom pa'i phyir/ /bsgom pa yang dag rab tu grags/ /phal pa'i gnas skabs gzhom pa'i phyir/ /bsgom pa yang ni sgom pa min/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtogs pa de bzhin te/ 'on kyang mi gtsang ba'i tshad mnyam par sbyang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku gzugs bsgom par bya'o/ /phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus can bsgom pa'i thabs kyi dgos pa nyid de ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po dgos pa yod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ming ci lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka'

stsal pa/ sangs rgyas nyid do/ /sangs rgyas nyid ce lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /de ci lags/ lus can 'di ni bden pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar nga ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad

cus brgyan pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mi 'dra ba'i phyir bsgrub pa yin no/ /phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das bems po lags sam/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ nga nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes so/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes de ci lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal

pa/ bden pa ma yin pa dang / pa ma yin pa dang / rgyu ma yin pa dang / skye ba ma yin pa ste/ de ltar nga nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / nga nyid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang / nga nyid bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang / de ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /

de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam pa dang bral ba'i byang chub de skad ma smra shig /nga nyid dngos dang dngos med nga / /dang po'i de bzhin gshegs par brjod/ /gzugs dang gzugs med ldan pa'i mchog /zab mo zhi ba'i chos dang ldan/ /sems dpa' chen po he ru ka/ /

bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor nga / /bde chen las ni bems min nga / /'jig rten kun rdzob bems po nga / /skyes pa bud med ma ning dang / /'gro ba nga yis yang dag khyab/ /de phyir 'dus pa zhes bya nyid/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho bdag gis bshad/ /rdo rje can dang byang sems rnams/ /

ma ning gnas su yang dag 'grub/ /gang zhig lha mo bdag med de/ /rang bzhin gyi ni btsun mo yin/ /sangs rgyas he ru ka nga yin/ /de nyid phyir na ma ning ste/ /'gro ba'i dngos po gnyis mthong nas/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid dang / /shin tu mnyam sbyor rnal 'byor gyis/ /mi bskyod med cing

bdag mnga' med/ /dam pa'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'dod pa bde ba chen po rdo rje yan lag med pa shin tu dga' ba chen pos tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ phyag drug pa dang sgeg par bcas/ /zhal gcig

ral pa 'dzin pa dang / /brgyad gnyis lo lon sor mo ni/ /rdo rje yan lag med pa 'grub/ /dpa' bo'i g.yas par mda' nyid de/ /lag pa gnyis par ral gri nyid/ /gsum par me long rig par bya/ /lag pa g.yon par gzhu nyid de/ /gnyis pa la ni dbang mchog nyid/ /ka~M kel+la yi yal ga

ste/ /phyag drug nyid du bsgom par bya/ /zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas par ni/ /bu mo'i snying gar bsams nas ni/ /rdo rje btsun mo 'grub par 'gyur/ /mnga' yis 'o ma 'dzin pa 'bigs/ /a sho ka yis snying gar brab/ /ral gris skyes ma bsdigs par bya/ /de nas me long

bstan par bya/ /gzhu yis rkang pa bcings nas ni/ /ut+pal zhags pas dgug par bya/ /skra grol 'ong bar 'dod pa dang / /snyan pa'i skad ni rab tu smra/ /ha dang si ni byed pa mo/ /rangs shing yan lag tshad mas brgyan/ /kha ni so rtsis gang ba dang / /'dod pa stobs dang bral ba bsam/ /

rdo rje mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mi 'gyur sems kyis rjes chags bya/ /'dod pa'i sngags ni ma bcos pas/ /de yi snying ni bskul bar bya/ /oM A mu kA mA kar Sha ya many+dzu g+ho Sha hrIHdzaH/ de ltar bsgom par byas pa yis/ /'jam pa'i mgon po'i btsun mo ni/ /sgrub pa po la 'dod pa

dang / /dbang du byed cing 'ong bar 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed kyi sbyor ba yis/ /bzlas pa khri yi sbyor ba las/ /g.yo ba gser gyi rna cha ma/ /shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis bsgrub/ /ha~M gi sa bon las skyes pa/ /thams cad rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /chang gi btung ba'i rab sbyor bas/ /

rdo rje yan lag med pa bsgrub/ /ma bcos mchog gi sa bon ni/ /bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin can/ /bde ba chen po mchog tu zhi/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/ /'di ni srog ni chen po ste/ /mchog tu dga' ba mdzes ma nyid/ /bde dang sdug bsngal rtag tu de'i/ /dran

pa de ltar rab tu grags/ /mya ngan 'dod chags de bzhin gdungs/ /dga' dang dga' bral de bzhin no/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /de nyid dbyangs yig drug par brjod/ /zla ba phyed pas yang dag ldan/ /thig les mgo bo nyid du mchod/ /sems can gyi ni kun gzhi ste/ /rgyud

rnams kyi ni khyad par du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems chen po'i rdo rje sa bon gyi yi ge thos nas sems bsgrub pa gsal ba nye bar gyur nas tshig 'di dag gsungs pa/ sems dpa' med cing sgom pa med/ /

sngags med lha yang med pa ste/ /sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba/ /'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bsod nams med cing sdig pa'ang med/ /byang chub med cing sangs rgyas med/ /ye shes lnga ni sbyor ba yis/ /byang chub

sems ni brtan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sngags med bzlas pa'ang yod ma yin/ /'gro ba gsum po thams cad med/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /bsgom pa dang ni bsgom pa med/ /bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i dam

tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun rdzob 'jig rten pa yang yod/ /dpyad na gang du 'jig rten pa/ /rtag tu 'jig rten pa nyid 'khor/ /'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ma skyes pa dang mi dmigs pa/ /

mi phyed nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /zab cing zhi ba'i rang bzhin ni/ /'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ral gri'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sgyu ma ji ltar me long ltar/ /nam mkha' ji ltar bde ji ltar/ /ji ltar dngos po yongs shes pa/ /'di ni

byang chub rim bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma bdag med mas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /stong nyid dri med dam pa'i gnas/ /rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid/ /ji srid ma zhig bar du ni/ /sems kyi rang bzhin bsgom par gyis/ /mA ma kI'o/ /srid med mya

ngan 'das pa med/ /'di de bde chen rdo rje ste/ /gang zhig yid kyi sgom pas bsgom/ /de ni mchog gi sgom pas bsgom/ /spyan gyi'o/ /sngags dang yi ge rnam par spangs/ /'di ni sems med thig pa med/ /'di de dam pa'i bde chen te/ /bri ba med cing gang ba med/ /gos

dkar mo'i 'o/ /gzugs brnyan rang bzhin ji lta bar/ /de ltar dngos po bsgom par bya/ /stong nyid dri med mchog gi gnas/ /de ni bsod nams sdig pa med/ /sgrol ma'i 'o/ /ji ltar chu nang zla ba de/ /bden min pa min pa ltar/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi/ /

lus kyi rang bzhin rnyog pa med/ /'khor thams cad kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs byed pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ mda' gzhu char 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /muHts+tsha Di dang

ser rna yis/ /chang gzung khu tshur bzung ba yis/ /g.yon ni 'dod pa'i khu tshur gyis/ /bsdams pas dgra rnams bsdigs par bya/ /yan lag kos kor bzung nas ni/ /mtshon pa'i khu tshur bzung nas ni/ /hU~M gis mda' ni gtang bya zhing / /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bsdigs

par bya/ /brla ni bskum par byas na ni/ /lus ni dbugs kyis dgang bar bya/ /lus la khu tshur bzung nas ni/ /brang ni rgyas pa nyid du bya/ /sems dang dmigs ni 'ben la bya/ /hU~M gis kha ni dgang ba dang / /g.yas brkyang la sogs sbyor ba yis/ /gshin rje srin po gsad

par bya/ /'dir mang brjod pas ci zhig bya/ /kun rdzob tu ni bsdus pa tsam/ /gzhu yi rig byed rtsa ba gang / /de ni rdo rje 'dzin spyod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rol mo'i sgra zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rol mo'i sgra'i sgeg pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs

rdo rje las byung ngo / /tha hi thiM hiM/ tha ka tha ka/ thu ka thu ka/ tho ho tho ho/ ba hi ba hi/ diD+haM diD+haM/ kra ka kra ka/ tha ka tha ka/ Di hi Di hi/ ta Da wa ta Da wa/ cha lang dang ni rnga dang yang / /rdza rnga kha cig pi wang rgyas/ /mngar ba can dang gling bu dang / /rgyud gsum ka ra ta ka ni/ /rnam gsum

rdung bas brdung bar bya/ /chung ngur brdungs pas rgyal ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor gsol gdab la sogs pa/ /mchod pa 'di ni bla na med/ /rang gi tshigs bcad mang po ni/ /bstan pa 'dis ni ci zhig bya/ /ji snyed rol mo'i bstan bcos su/ /de ni rdo rje rol mo'i sgra/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

dri bzang po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bdug spos kyi mchod pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /tsan+da na nyid dang gur gum dang / /brag zhun de bzhin 'dod ma ni/ /'di rnams rdzas ni bdug spos che/ /he ru ka la rab tu

dbul/ /ka co ra dang ku ma nyid/ /de bzhin du yang skra sgra nyid/ /gdug byed snying po 'di rnams ni/ /phan pa la ni sbyor bar bya/ /kun tu ru dang po la ka /lte ba sen mo ni/ /rin chen rgyal po'i bdug pa 'di/ /kun la mi 'jigs gur gum dang / /sha trI yi ni shathI dang / /sha li

dzi dang sha li ka/ /'jig rten mgon gyi bdug pa 'di/ /rtag tu rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs/ /sna tshogs dri ni khyad par du/ /sna tshogs rdo rje mchod pa las/ /bdun gyi rgyal po mchod pa 'di/ /kun tu stobs kyis bsgrubs pa ste/ /ji snyed dri yi bstan bcos su/ /gong bu'i dum bu'i bdug

pa mchog /de kun phyag na rdo rje yi/ /rdo rje'i mchod par rab tu grags/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gom pa rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje gar 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /gus bcas dang por sgeg par ldan/ /

dang po brtse bcas rjes rgyu bas/ /rkang stabs brgyad du cho ga yis/ /rdo rje gom pas rol pa bya/ /me tog snyim pa'i sbyor ba dang / /spos kyi yal ga'i sbyor ba dang / /mar me sdong bu'i lag tshul dang / /yar ni byug pa'i lus dang ni/ /mig lag de bzhin brla nang dang / /rkang pa'i ngos su bskor ba ni/ /

brdung ba'i sbyor bas rol pa bya/ /de bzhin du yang g.yon pas so/ /de nas rgyun gyi gar byas nas/ /g.yon pas yang ni gar bya zhing / /myur du brdungs pas de bzhin gar/ /byas mas 'khor lo lta bur bskor/ /phyi nas gru bzhi dgar bar bya/ /phyi nas 'dod pa'i lag pas bskor/ /sa la pus ni gnyis

btsugs nas/ /lag pas mchod rten legs par bya/ /ji snyed gar gyi bstan bcos su/ /byed pa'i cha lugs brjod pa ni/ /de snyed rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /sgeg pas byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje mnyes par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar dmigs nas/ /bzang po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /thams cad 'byor pa'am dmigs nas ni/ /bems po'i gnas su sreg blugs bya/ /shar lho

byang dang nub phyogs su/ /phyogs gnas rnams ni dga' bar bya/ /phyogs bral rnams su lha mo rnams/ /dam pa'i tshe yis mchod par bya/ /yid kyis mar khu bsams pa dang / /'bras so chag med 'bras dang ni/ /'bru dang zho yi zan dang ni/ /til dang de bzhin mnyam pa'i

shing / /dUr ba rab tu gzhon pa nyid/ /bsam gtan rdo rje sbyin sreg bya/ /de la 'di ni sngags kyi rkang pa yin te/ /oM ag na ye swA hA/ mar gyi'o/ /oM sar+b+ba pA baM da ha na badzrA ya badzra sa twas+ya sar+b+ba pA paM da ha nA ya swA hA/ til nag po'i'o/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ 'bras

ma chag pa'i 'o/ /oM sar+b+ba saM pa di swA hA/ zho dang zan dam pa'i 'o/ /oM badzra bi dzA ya swA hA/ 'bras so pa'i'o/ /oM ma hA be gA ya swA hA/ nas kyi'o/ /oM ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ mon sran gre'u'i'o/ /oM badzra g+hasma rI swA hA/ gro'i'o/ /oM badzra A muShe swA hA/ dUr ba gzhon

nu'i 'o/ /oM badzrA pra ti ha ta pa dz+wa ya swA hA/ ku sha'i'o/ /oM badzra ya dz+nyA ya swA hA/ u dum bA ra'i'o/ /oM bod+hi br-i k+ShA ya swA hA/ byang chub kyi shing gi'o/ /oM badzra la tA ya swA hA/ pa la k+sha'i'o/ /oM badzra ku be rA swa hA/ n+ya gro d+ha'i'o/ /oM ha sa ka rA ya swA hA/ a mra'i'o/ /tsam pa a

sho kA ya klu/ /ka dam+pa dang srid sgrub nyid/ /ji ltar rnyed pa bzlas byas nas/ /me tog 'dis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /rgun 'brum a mra sbrul 'jig dang / /kha 'dzag skyes ma brtse ma ni/ /'khor lo lnga yi mchog rim pas/ /'bras bu rnams kyi sbyin sreg bya/ /sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi nyid/ /

dkyil 'khor lnga yi bsgoms pa yis/ /'dis ni rdo rje mnyes par 'gyur/ /ye shes me ni rab dgyes bya/ /rgyal ba phan pa mnyes pa dang / /gser gyi mnga' bdag mnyes pa dang / /pad+ma gar dbang mnyes pa dang / /lcags sgrog bdag po mnyes pa dang / /tshangs pa brgya byin dbang chen

dang / /khyab 'jug rlung dang me chen dang / /thong ldan nyid dang 'dod lha dang / /zla ba nyi ma gdon gzhan dang / /sa ni zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / /lus ngan de bzhin mtshams skyong dang / /chos rgyal dang ni klu dang ni/ /dri za lha min mi'am ci/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa'i lha/ /

'og min du ni gnas pa dang / /gang zhig rgyal tshan gnas pa dang / /gzhan 'phrul dbang sgyur nyid dang ni/ /'phrul dga' yi ni rnams dang / /gang zhig dag pa'i gnas son dang / /'od zer 'jig rten khams gnas dang / /mi mjed khams su gnas pa dang / /gling bzhir

gnas pa'i sems can dang / /gang zhig khams gsum gnas pa dang / /snod ldan sems can 'jig rten dang / /lcug ma'i tshogs dang rtswa sogs dang / /gang zhig rab dga'i sar gnas dang / /pha rol dri med gang phyin dang / /'od 'phro can du gnas pa dang / /mi g.yo'i gnas su byas

pa dang / /gang zhig chos sprin rjes song dang / /gang zhig sbyang dkar son pa dang / /gang zhig ring song thob pa dang / /'od byed du ni gnas pa ste/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po dang / /'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad po dang / /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos nyan/ /rwa ni ral gri'i gzugs can dang / /

rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bdag /shAkya seng ge mnyes byas nas/ /dmyal ba byol song dang / /lha dang lha min mi rnams ni/ /sbyin sreg cho gas dgyes pa nyid/ /de nyid tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po rgya mtsho rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su chags pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dam tshig la gsol ba gdab pa 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa ni/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i bsgom pa ste/ /de yi mgo bo'i

sna rtse la/ /phyag 'tshal yid bzhin nor bu ste/ /sbu gu'i nang du phaT kyis ni/ /ye shes ma lhung yang dag gnas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis dgyes par mdzod/ /'di ni phyag rgya'i cho ga las/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snyems byas nas/ /gnas ni

thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'dug nas/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bdag /shAkya seng ge snyems byas nas/ /rgyal po thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i gnas 'dug nas/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bdag /kun gyi rgyal po thob par 'gyur/ /

rdo rje gzi brjid ting 'dzin ldan/ /dam tshig phyag rgya sbyor ba yis/ /gnas gsum po yang bsgrub par bya/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug bdag /chos kyi phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas/ /rta mchog

rim pas gnas nas ni/ /dam tshig phyag rgyar sbyor ba yis/ /sgrol ma'i dngos grub rab bsgrub bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gar gyi 'dod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje gar mdzad pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /g.yon pa brkyang ba dang

g.yas pa brkyang ba dang / mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang / rdo rje'i rkang stabs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sna tshogs thams cad dang / rus sbal gyi rkang stabs dang / bung ba'i dra ba dang / rgya mtsho'i bskyod pa dang / ri bo'i mchog dang / mdzes pa'i gom pa dang / khro bo'i gom pa

ste/ rkang stabs kyi dgod pa'o/ /ral gri'i lugs dang / 'khor lo'i tshul dang / rin po che'i tshul dang / pad+ma'i lag pa dang / ral gri'i tshul dang / mdung gi tshul dang / gzhu'i tshul dang / dbyug pa'i tshul dang / dbyug to'i tshul dang / gtun shing gi tshul dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i tshul dang / /

kha bcu pa'i tshul dang / ral gri bu mo'i tshul dang / sna tshogs dbyug pa'i tshul dang / mdung thung gi tshul dang / gong bu skyong ba'i tshul dang / 'phan gnyis pa dang / 'phan gsum pa dang / me tog gi tshul dang / bdug spos kyi tshul dang / mar me'i tshul dang / dri'i tshul dang / lA

s+ya'i lag pa dang / phreng ba'i lag pa dang / glu'i lag pa dang / gar gyi lag pa dang / gling bu'i lag pa dang / pi wang gi lag pa dang / rdza rnga'i lag pa dang / ku muN+Da'i lag pa ste/ lag pa'i dgod pa'o/ /rdo rje skyil krung dang / pad+ma'i skyil krung dang / pad+ma'i 'dug stangs dang / bzang

po'i 'dug stangs dang / skyil krung phyed pa dang / bkra shis kyi 'dug stangs te 'dug stangs kyi dgod pa'o/ /sgeg pa'i nga ro dang / dpa' bo'i nga ro dang / mi sdug pa'i nga ro dang / dgod pa'i nga ro dang / drag po'i nga ro dang / 'jigs su rung ba'i nga ro dang / zhi ba'i nga ro dang / rngam

pa'i nga ro dang / snying rje'i nga ro dang / drug gi rjes su skyes pa'i glu dang / drang srong gi rjes kyi glu dang / dri za'i rjes kyi glu dang / bar ma'i rjes kyi glu dang / lnga ba'i rjes kyi glu dang / blo gsal gyi rjes kyi glu dang / 'khor nyan pa'i glu'o/ /nyung ngu'i dbye ba dang / sgrol ma'i dbye ba dang /

'jig pa'i dbye ba dang / gang ba dang / phyed phyi ba dang / rnam par 'dre ba dang / 'dod chags gnyis mtshungs par byed pa dang / 'dod chags gsum mtshungs par byed pa dang / lkog ma nyed pa dang / rkan nyed pa dang / lce nyed pa dang / so nyed pa ste glu dgod pa'o/ /sa gzhi yongs bzung

dus su ni/ /dam tshig 'di ni rab bskul pa/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya/ /'di ni dam tshig rim pa'i mchog /me tog 'di rnams bzang zhing dge/ /dag pa'i skye gnas las dge ba/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /tshal dag ro yi

phan pa dang / /gang zhig dri dang bdug spos mchog /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /srin po 'joms shing dag byed pa/ /dge zhing mun pa rnam sel ba/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par

mdzod/ /'di ni dri bzang dge ba ste/ /dag pa'i skye gnas las dag pa/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /oM badzra g+haN+De aH/ dril bu blang ba'i sngags so/ /oM ma hA badzro hU~M/ rdo rje gzung ba'i sngags so/ /dngos po sna tshogs rnam par phye

pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rdo rje'i gur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas la/ /tshig ni 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /rdo rje las skyes rang bzhin can/ /lag par thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ /bsams nas spro

zhing bzlas pa'o/ /phyag bzhi pa ni nyid dang yang / /zhal gsum rdo rje las byung ba/ /dkar po dmar po de bzhin sngo/ /phag mo lhan cig mnyam sbyor ba'o/ /phyag drug pa la kha dog gnag /lcags sgrog ma dang lhan cig sbyor/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa can/ /zhal gsum nyid du sbyor bar

bya/ /mdog dmar phyag ni bzhi pa dang / /zhal gcig me dang dbang byed ma/ /rdo rje chos kyi gnas mnan ma/ /'di ni ku ru kul+ler brjod/ /'di ni sngags brjod pa'o/ /btsun mo chos la gnas pa ni/ /khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag gis ni/ /dus gcig pa yi dus su ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni 'di thos

nas/ /rgyas pa nyid du rab tu dbye/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa ste/ /dus gcig dus ni gcig na'o/ /bdag gis bcom ldan spyan sngar te/ /btsun mo'i chos su rnam rgyas pas/ /lta stangs dgug dang brda chen dang / /don byed dus dang char sogs dang / /lam gyi de nyid las skyes pa/ /thub pa

chen po 'jig rten mgon/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /mchog sbyin dang ni pad+mas brgyan/ /pad+ma'i gdan la yang dag gnas/ /dbu rgyan rdo rje chos dang ldan/ /ma~M gyi de nyid las skyes pa/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni ser po ste/ /yan lag mchog sbyin ut+pal brgyan/ /mi bskyod rdo rje spyi bor

'dzin/ /hU~M gi ye shes las byung ba/ /lag pa ral gri sdigs mdzub nyid/ /ma he chen po'i rgyab tu ni/ /dpa' bo g.yon brkyang pa yis gnas/ /khro bo'i gzugs can 'jigs byed pa/ /kha sbyar mdun du mi bskyod 'dzin/ /hU~M gi ye shes las byung ba/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad rdo rje can/ /rdo rje dril

bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /lag pa gnyis kyis phyag rgya bcing / /rkang pa g.yon nyid brkyang ba yis/ /'jigs byed mnan pa yi ni lus/ /spyi bor rdo rje'i rigs bsams nas/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal dran par bya/ /twA~M gi yi ge las byung ba/ /mchog sbyin dbang mchog mtshon cha ste/ /lha mo lnga

pa lta bu nyid/ /rtag tu bzang po'i 'dug stangs gnas/ /sna tshogs pad+mar yang dag bzhugs/ /spyi bor don yod 'dzin pa po/ /sgeg mo chen mo skal bzang ma/ /sgrol ma'i gzugs can bsgom par bya/ /ma~M gyi yi ge las byung ba/ /mchog sbyin a sho ka 'dzin ma/ /nyi ma shar ba lta bu ste/ /

rnam snang dpal ni spyi bor skyes/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi sbyor ba yis/ /'gro mgyogs bdun gyi shing rta mnan/ /yan lag sgeg pa'i ro yis brgyan/ /'od zer can ni bsgom par bya/ /tsu~M gyi yi ge las byung ba'i/ /ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od/ /snying gar rin chen snyim par

gnas/ /mdzes pa'i tshul gyis yang dag bzhugs/ /lha mo sna tshogs pad gdan can/ /phan pas mgo bo mnan pa ste/ /byang chub sems ni 'dzag 'bab pa'i/ /lha mo stobs dang bral ba bsgom/ /baM gyi yi ge las byung ba/ /nor 'dzin shin tu kha dog ser/ /lag pa mchog sbyin 'bras snye ma/ /

rdo rje skyil krung sbyor ba las/ /yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas brgyan/ /spyan ni shin tu sgeg par ni/ /gnod sbyin rgyal mo bsgom par bya/ /nor gyi bdag po mtshungs par 'gyur/ /dza~M gi yi ge las byung ba/ /nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba bsgom/ /kha dog ser zhing g.yas pa na/ /

mchog sbyin rin chen ne'u le ste/ /rin chen 'byung gnas rdo rje yis/ /spyi bor dkyil 'khor rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen char ni bsam par bya/ /skyor gang rdo rje chur gzhug bya/ /pra~M gyi yi ge las skyes pa/ /lus ni dkar zhing yid 'ong ma/ /lha mo ral gri'i 'khor lo 'dzin/ /spyi

bor phan pas mnan pa'o/ /rang gi ming po'i dus lta bur/ /dkyil 'khor gnas su yang dag 'dug /nam mkha'i gnas nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /'byung bar rnam par bsam par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po sngags sna tshogs nang du chud pa rdo rje zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsal bar mdzad pa/ oM ma Ni pad+me hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM many+dzu ya muHswA hA/ oM hrIHSh+k+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ oM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ oM mA re ts+yai ma~M swA hA/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun de

swA hA/ oM bA su d+hA re ma hA bA su pr-iSh+Ti pA ha ni bA su swA hA/ oM dzaM b+ha la dza len drA ya swA hA/ oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzri Ni ma hA pra ti sa re hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ 'jig rten mgon gyis nad rnams zhi/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis blo gros bzang / /gshin rje gshed kyis bsrung / /lha dang lha min hUM mdzad

kyis/ /sgrol mas 'jig rten dbang du byed/ /'od zer can gyis chom rkun 'jig /tsun+dA sems can thams cad ni/ /dgug pa yi ni cho gar brjod/ /dzam+b+ha la dang nor sbyin bdag /nor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs su 'dod/ /bud med gang zhig bu shi bas/ /so sor 'brang ma rtag dran bya/ /
