skra ni grol ba mo/ /he ru ka la 'khyud gnas ma/ /de ltar pha rol phyin lha mo/ /kha dog dmar po rnam gsal ma/ /zhal ni shin tu rnam 'gyur ba/ /cung zad mche ba gtsigs 'jigs ma/ /g.yas na cang te'u gri gug ste/ /g.yon na kha T+wAM thod pa'o/ /rang gi lus

skyes 'od zer gyis/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo bskul bar bya/ /de yis bskul ba tsam gyis ni/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin las/ /'dzag 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /'dzag pa de las rnal 'byor ma/ /brgyad po bu mo rnams kyi mchog /mchod pa sna tshogs

'dzin pa yis/ /mgon po he ru ka mchod do/ /rdo rje mgon po'i shar gnas pa/ /rdo rje mche ba ma yis ni/ /thod pa khrag gis bkang bzung ste/ /gzi brjid chen po gsol bar mdzad/ /rdo rje pho nya bdag nyid che/ /dbang ldan du ni cang te'u brdung / /rdo rje gdong

ma dri snod dang / /me yi phyogs su rnam par gnas/ /rdo rje can ma grags chen mo/ /mchod yon snod bcas bde na bral na/ /rdo rje gtsigs ma lho yi ni/ /phyogs na rnga bo che 'dzin gsungs/ /rlung du rdo rje lte ba ma/ /ri bong can gyi snod 'dzin no/ /nub tu rdo rje

'jigs ma ni/ /ce spyang phyag na 'dzin par gsungs/ /byang du 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ /lha mo'i chags pas gtso bo mchod/ /de ltar he ru ka bsams nas/ /rnal 'byor ma ni brgyad kyis mchod/ /sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom/ /sna tshogs rol mo

mchog gsungs dang / /dri zhim lnga dang me tog spos/ /'di dag gis ni gtso bo mchod/ /mchod yon zhal bsil de bzhin khrus/ /glu yi mchog ni rnam mang pos/ /mgon po khrag 'thung bdag nyid che/ /'di dag gis ni mchod par bya/ /dpa' bo

rdzogs par mthong nas ni/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo las ni 'dzag /'dzag pa de las rnal 'byor ma/ /rnam mang brtse ba cher ldan pa/ /bder gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/ /sna tshogs pa yi na bza' mnabs/ /gzugs

ni lang tsho gzhon pas brgyan/ /lo ni bcu dang gnyis lon pa/ /phyag g.yas byang chub sems bkang ba'i/ /bum pa a mra'i lcug bcas bsnams/ /zhal ni rab bzhad dang ba yis/ /he ru ka ni rgyal gyur cig /rgyal gyur cig ces 'di ltar smra/ /mgon pos

mdun du bltas nas ni/ /dbang bskur mchog ste gsol ba gdab/ /brtse dang ldan pa'i grags chen mo/ /'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag /dbang bskur ba yis bdag bsgral phyir/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor mas khrus shig /dper na bu tsha med pa'i khyim/ /shi ba

tsam gyis stong pa nyid/ /de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni/ /ye shes kun gyis stong pa nyid/ /dper na pi bang sbyor kun tshogs/ /rgyud dang bral na brdung mi rung / /de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni/ /sngags dang bsam gtan 'grub mi 'gyur/ /rmongs pa gang

zhig dbang med par/ /bdag ni dbang bskur zhes smra ba/ /ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar/ /slob mar bcas te dmyal bar 'gro/ /de ltar shes bya rnal 'byor mas/ /slar yang bdag la dbang bskur cig /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te/ /thal mo sbyar nas

gsol ba gdab/ /gal te dbang bskur med na ni/ /he ru ka yi bdag gyur cing / /de nas rnal 'byor ma de rnams/ /rgyal gyur rgyal gyur zhes smra zhing / /bcom ldan dbang bskur khrus gsol lo/ /phyi nang gsang bar bcas pa yi/ /dbang bskur tsam gyis nam

mkha' yi/ /khams nas rnga yi sgra grag cing / /me tog tsan+dan char 'bab 'gyur/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma de rnams/ /rtsa ba'i 'khor lo la ni thim/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las lha bskyed pa dang /

dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas nor rgyas la sogs pa'i klu rnams kyis phyag na rdo rje la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ci yi phyir na bdag cag rnams/ /'od zer gyis ni 'tshal te mchis/ /bcom ldan bdag la bshad du gsol/ /de nas

phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen pos rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nor rgyas la sogs bdag nyid che/ /klu rnams ci phyir dgug pa lags/ /rnal 'byor chen po bdag la gsungs/ /de nas sna tshogs sde ma'i snying gi 'od zer gyis

klu thams cad kyi snying gdang spyi bo'i mthar thug par zhugs te/ tshim par byas nas slar log go/ /de nas klu de rnams thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha mo bka' ni ci zhig gsol/ /kyai lags ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ /gsungs

pa/ mu stegs la sogs mkha' lding sngags/ /ye shes las byung ji lta bu/ /dus su zin pa ji ltar yin/ /ji ltar dug ni skye bar 'gyur/ /sbrul gyis zin pa tsam gyis ni/ /slar yang sems can 'chi 'gyur zhing / /zhus pa/ khyab 'jug dbang phyug

sogs lha dang / /tshangs pa tshangs pa mdun na 'don/ /de rnams la ni 'chi 'pho mchis/ /dug gi nyes pas gnod par 'gyur/ /de ltar dus su zin ces smra/ /sbrul gyi dug ni sel ba med/ /de bzhin sbrul la dug ni yod/ /sbrul zin 'tsho'am mi

'tsho ba/ /bde byed la sogs rdzu 'phrul che'i/ /lha de rnams ni de ltar smra/ /ston pa stong nyid nges gsung ba/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa la/ /sbrul gyi dug ni ji ltar yod/ /gang gis 'dzin cing gang zhig 'dzin/ /

dus dang dus min ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar spyod cing ji ltar bsdu/ /gang phyir 'dzin cing gang du 'dzin/ /sems can dug zin mi 'chi ba/ /stong nyid smra ba'i nges pa yin/ /'dod chags gti mug stong pa nyid/ /grags chen yul ni stong pa nyid/ /yul gyi rang

bzhin dri ma med/ /dri ma dang bral ji ltar dug /sbrul gyis kyang ni ci zhig byed/ /tha mal pa yi yul ni sbrul/ /yul gyi nyes pa dug nyid do/ /lha rnams yul rnams kyis ni bsgribs/ /thams cad dus su zin pa yin/ /yul gyi nyes pa sbyangs pa nyid/ /ston

pa longs spyod gos mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /'dod kun nye bar longs spyod bya/ /ri skegs sbyor ba rnyed dka' dang / /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ldan pas/ /'dir ni klu rnams thams cad lhags/ /de phyir rab nges lha mo kye/ /dus zin tha chem

med pa ru/ /blo med mu stegs can de smra/ /'di ltar smras te klu rnams kyis/ /sna tshogs sde la phyag 'tshal te/ /rang rang gi ni gnas su dong / /de nas bcom ldan 'das mas yul gyi nyes pa spong ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ o~M shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ /

stong dang stong min mtha' dag bcas/ /sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur gcig /'jig rten mtha' dag gyis bcings/ /kyai lags bshas mo 'di ltar ltos/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen pos bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhabs la spyi bos gtugs

te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ri skegs sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba/ /lha mo yis ni bshad du gsol/ /sems can don la gcig tu 'bad/ /de ru bdag la ltad mo mchis/ /gsungs pa/ dkyil 'khor med par sbyin mi bya/ /slob ma bsdu bar mi bya'o/ /gtso bos ji

ltar gsungs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor las ni smra bar bya/ /mtho lnga pa yis bzung ste/ /khor yug tu ni gru bzhi'o/ /de yi phyed kyi zlum po la/ /brgyud las 'dam skyes 'dab ma brgyad/ /o~M hU~M hrIHhU~M kha~M hU~M a hU~M tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Tha yed/ sa sbyang ba'i sngags

so/ /badzra he ru ka badzra sa ma ya hri sar+b+ba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA pra b+ha~M dza ha hU~M ru lu ru lu b+h+yo hU~M hU~M phaT/ sa sbyang ba'i dus su gtor ma gtang ba'i sngags so/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na i dam sU tra tiSh+Tha mA tsa la he he bud+d+ha ka pA la badzra he ru ka hU~M hU~M Tha Tha/ sngags 'dis lan bdun du

srad bu la mngon par bsngags par bya'o/ /thig skud kyi sngags so/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /kha khyer snam bu spangs pa la/ /ba dan rnam pa brgyad kyis brgyan/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdul tshon gzhan dang

'dres med pa'i/ /rdul tshon dmar por rdzogs par bya/ /de ru bum pa bzhi po rnams/ /grwa dang grwa ru rnam par bzhag /bum par mtshan ma bri bya ba/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M ga/ /gri gug dang ni cang te'u dang / /cang te'u gnas su rdo rje bri/ /rdo rje'i steng du 'dam skyes te/ /

de ltar bum par bri byas nas/ /chu yis yongs su dgang bar bya/ /bum pa la ni ras kyis brgyan/ /rin chen rnam pa lnga gzhug cing / /bum par kun nas 'bru lnga dang / /a mra'i lcug mas dag pa par bya/ /de nas 'o ma'i snod bzhag ste/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo chen gyis/ /

sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor dang ldan/ /pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma ste/ /nyi ma'i steng du hU~M yig bsam/ /hU~M gyur pa las rdo rje ni/ /sngon po hU~M gi bdag nyid skyes/ /hU~M dang rdo rje byung dpa' bo/ /he ru ka ni bdag nyid che/ /sku mdog sngon po phyag bzhi pa/ /gtso bo chen po zhal gcig pa/ /

g.yas na gri gug thod pa ste/ /g.yon na kha T+wA~M rdo rje'o/ /sku la mi yi rus pas brgyan/ /klu rnams skrag par byed pa po/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs/ /gcer bu 'jigs byed rang bzhin te/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /dbu skra ser zhing gyen du 'bar/ /

thod pas spyi bo brgyan byas pa/ /sa 'og bdun ni 'khrug par byed/ /dpa' bo de ltar bsam par bya/ /phyis ni phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /o~M dang hU~M dang kha~M dang swa/ /yi ge yongs su gyur pa las/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rnam pa bzhi/ /sna tshogs sde ma 'dod can ma/ /sa

'og gnas ma rab bzang ma/ /lha mo de dag mdog sngon mo/ /grags chen zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bzhugs/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /g.yas na gri gug thod pa 'dzin/ /g.yon na kha T+wA~M cang te'u/ /rus rgyan

lha mo kun 'jigs ma/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /stag gi pags pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /skra ni ser po gyen du 'bar/ /thod pa'i phreng bas spyi bor brgyan/ /de rnams mgo rgyus phreng ba can/ /lha mo'i 'od zer spros gyur pas/ /klu rnams skrag par mdzad

pa mo/ /phyogs kyi 'dab bzhugs cher bzhad ma'o/ /blo ldan mtshams kyi 'dab bzang la/ /nyi ma bzhi la hU~M yig bzhi/ /hU~M yig so sor gyur pa las/ /chang 'tshong ma dang 'byung po ma/ /bzhin bzang nam mkhar 'gro ma ste/ /mtshams kyi 'dab mar gnas lha mo/ /

kha dog ser mo grags chen mo/ /thams cad na bza' ser po mnabs/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnas/ /zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/ /klu brgyad rgyan byas lha mo ni/ /g.yas na gri gug cang te'u 'dzin/ /g.yon na kha T+wA~M thod pa'o/ /sku las

'od zer ser po 'phro/ /shin tu sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan/ /cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /thams cad gar byed skra ser ma/ /klu rnams skrag par skyed byed ma/ /mtshams kyi cha ru rnam par gnas/ /de nas bsam par bya ba ni/ /slob dpon he

ru kas rang gi lus las skyes pa'i 'od kyis phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dag par reg par byas nas slar log ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dag par reg pa'i 'od zer las lha mo'i tshogs yang dag par spros pas he ru ka dang rnal 'byor

brgyad lhan cig tu bkrus so/ /bkrus pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cod pan du gyur to/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs par mthong nas ni/ /slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis/ /phyis ni gtor ma gtang bar bya/ /khyad par du ni 'o ma'o/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ldan

pa'i/ /shes rab can gyis chang btung zhing / /mar me bzhi ni dbul bar bya/ /'bras bu bzhi yang dbul bya zhing / /de nas slob ma blo chen gyis/ /ras zung gsum ni dbul bar bya/ /der ni gdan yang bstabs par bya/ /slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis/ /de ru

rnal 'byor ma mchod do/ /blo gros chen po thugs dgyes pas/ /sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshim bya/ /mgu bar sems pa'i yid kyis ni/ /'khor lo khyad par che bya ste/ /phyis ni slob dpon brtse chen bdag /phyi rol sa ru byung

nas ni/ /bde ba yi ni gdan bzhugs te/ /slob mas maN+Dal gsum byas la/ /bla ma me tog sna tshogs mchod/ /zhabs la spyis gtugs 'di skad gsol/ /ston pa bcom ldan bla ma kyi/ /sems can don la gcig brtson pa/ /nam mkha' lding bzang sbyor ba dang /

sha ri ka yi sbyor ba 'tshal/ /dus su zin pa bzlog pa yin/ /sems can don ni bzang po 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /ston pa chen pos de dag gsungs/ /bdag gi the tshom bzlog pa dang / /sems can don ni mthar thug bgyi/ /brtan pa dang

ni rgyu ba dang / /yan lag skyes dang bcos ma yi/ /dug rnams dug med par bgyi zhing / /sems can thams cad 'tsho bgyi pa/ /bla ma chen po de dag gsungs/ /de nas slob dpon brtse ba yis/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i thugs kyis ni/ /khrag 'thung go 'phang gnas pa yi/ /

slob ma la ni so shing sbyin/ /so shing sngags ni sbyin par bya/ /o~M hU~M he b+ha ga ba ti mu la~M pa ri shud+d+ha~M ku ru swA hA/ lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas la/ /so brud nas ni kha bshal te/ /slob ma lhag par gnas par bya/ /rang gi lag pa byug bya zhing / /me tog gis kyang

dkri bar bya/ /mgrin pa lag par zla ba bsam/ /zla ba'i zer gyis phyogs bcu yi/ /sangs rgyas spyan drangs gdon mi za/ /sangs rgyas tshogs kun zla bar blta/ /grags chen thams cad rab zhugs shing / /zla ba zhu bar gdon mi za/ /slob dpon bsgoms pa'i

nus pa yis/ /slob ma'i mgo ru lag bzhag ste/ /lhag par gnas pa'i gsang sngags bzlas/ /oM sar+b+ba bud+d+ha a tra a mu ka s+ya kA ya ma d+d+hiSh+Tha na/ yan+tu ma tsa la ma tsa la tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ha ra ha ra/ bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tra ba tra ba b+ho b+ha ga wAn+tA sar+b+ba bud+d+ha ka pA li badzra s+ya ka taM ma

la ya shI g+h+raM ku ru ku ru hU~M hU~M ha ha/ sngags 'dis lan bdun du bzlas pas lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis de'i lus la yang dag par byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /lhag par gnas pa tsam gyis rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klu rnams skrag cing dug gi bum

pa yang 'dor ro/ /nor rgyas la sogs pa'i klu stobs po che rnams dpyod par 'gyur ro/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i/ /lhag par gnas pa tsam gyis ni/ /'di lta'i sdug bsngal thob 'gyur na/ /mkha' lding rtogs pa'i sems can gyis/ /bdag ni ji ltar

'gro bar 'gyur/ /de ma thag tu slob dpon gyis/ /dkyil 'khor nang du me tog ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dbul bar bya/ /sna tshogs spos dang lha bshos dbul/ /dung chos zangs chos snod dag ni/ /many+dzi'i steng du gzhag par bya/ /mchod yon gyi ni dan ched du/ /

bum pa rnams la lhag gnas bya/ /khrag 'thung go 'phang gnas pa yis/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskor ba yi/ /khrag 'thung rnam par spyan drangs te/ /dkyil 'khor ji bzhin yang dag ldan/ /mdog dang mtshan mar ldan pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs

rnams sa bon gyi/ /'od zer gyis ni rnam par bsam/ /bdag nyid chen po grags chen po/ /bum pa ru ni zhugs tsam gyis/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor zhu bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems dang ni/ /slob dpon gyis ni 'di ltar blta/ /de nas zangs

ma'i snod du chu blugs shing dung phor chus bkang ste/ /man+dzi'i steng du gzhag par bya'o/ /yang phyir byung nas slob ma'i don du bdag nyid kyis ras kyis mig dgab par bya'o/ /ras gsum gon par gyur pa'i slob ma phyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bzhag la chus gtor te sngags

bzla'o/ /ab+hiShiny+tsa n+hu mAM sarba yo gi ni ma ku to a tra a tiSh+Tha yan+tu/ a tsan+tu hU~M swA hA/ cod pan byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /de nas slob dpon gyis kyai khyod su zhes smra'o/ /slob mas bdag ni rgyal ba'i sras zhes smra'o/ /de'i rjes su dkyil 'khor gyi dbus

su me tog lan gsum du gtor la/ mig ras bsal te/ dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o/ /o~M he ru ka badzra buSh+pa yaM pra tI ts+tsha hU~M/ dbus su'o/ /o~M ci tra se nA puSh+pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ shar du'o/ /o~M kA mi nI puSh+pa yaM pra tI ts+tsha hU~M/ lho'i 'o/ /o~M pA tA la bA si zhi puSh+pa yaM pra

tI ts+tsha hU~M/ nub tu'o/ /o~M su b+ha dre puSh+pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ byang du'o/ /o~M sho N+Ni ni puSh+pa yaM pra tI ts+tsha hU~M/ mer ro/ /o~M bud+hI ni puSh+pa pra tI ts+tsha hU~M/ bden bral du'o/ /o~M tsa tu ra b+ha dra puSh+pa pra tI ts+tsha hU~M/ rlung ngo / /o~M A kA sha bA si ni puSh+pa pra tI ts+tsha hU~M/ dbang ldan du'o/ /de nas dkyil

'khor gyi lha'i sku mdog ji lta ba dang / mtshan ma la sogs pa de bzhin du slob ma la bstan par bya'o/ /yang dung phor blangs te chu btung bar bya'o/ /de 'thungs pa tsam gyis klu thams cad skrag cing skyo bas dug skyugs par 'gyur ro/ /brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug gang yin pa

dang / gzhan yang sbyar ba dang / nye bar sbyar ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / mda' dug dang / byug pa'i dug dang / dgra rnams kyis gang sbyar ba dang / /bud med rnams kyis gang sbyar ba'i dug de rnams nye bar 'pho bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te klu yis zin pa yang / /de ru de ni nges

bar 'gro/ /gzhan yang sbrul gyi dug kyang rung / /chu ni 'thungs pa tsam gyis kyang / /de dag thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de yi phyir na dug gi chu/ /'di ru btung bar the tshom med/ /de nas slob ma dri bar bya/ /'dir ni sha li kar byed cing / /mkha' lding shes

pa'i slob dpon 'gyur/ /bsam pa rnam par dag shes nas/ /phyis ni bkas gnang sbyin par bya/ /stong ngam brgya ru gsol ba gdab/ /de nas sngags kyi man ngag sbyin/ /ji srid sprul gyis zin dus dang / /ji srid mkha' lding rigs yod par/ /de srid de dang

de las kyang / /ji srid dus su zin med par/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /de srid 'bad rtsol bya ba min/ /dus zin 'chi ba'ang shes bya ste/ /nam mkha' lding gi bya ba bya/ /dus su zin no zhes smra ba/ /de srid rnal 'byor che 'di yis/ /de ru las

ni brtsam par bya/ /bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing / /rnal 'byor ma brgyad yang dag ldan/ /blo ldan sngon gsungs gsang sngags kyis/ /phyis ni gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /der rjes dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /gnas

dgu ru ni mchod par bya/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod byas rjes/ /mnyam par bzhag pas las rnams brtsam/ /gang du rdzu 'phrul che klu yod/ /de ru sems bzang 'od zer spro/ /klu rnams kyi ni snying skams pas/ /ci zhig bgyi'o zhes ni smra/ /gsungs pa/ lha

mo sna tshogs sde ma yis/ /sangs rgyas thod par sngon du gsungs/ /kye kye grags pa che ba'i klu/ /song ste 'dir dus zin gyur pa'i/ /dus zin 'dzin pa bzung ba med/ /dug med sbrul yang med pa'o/ /gang phyir dogs pas rmongs gyur pa/ /de phyir skye bo rnams

'chir 'gyur/ /de nas 'od zer slar log ste/ /snying ga ru ni thim par 'gyur/ /yang ni sems ni mnyam gzhag pa'i/ /slob dpon gyis ni ngo mtshar bstan/ /de nas sa la ma lhung ba'i/ /lci ba blangs te 'dab chags ri skegs gnyis bya zhing snod dkar

po byas te/ ro bsregs pa'i sol ba la gzhag par bya'o/ /ro bsregs pa'i sol ba las snag tsha byas te/ sems can gyi don rig pas dben par sngags bri bar bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hri tat+Tha pa yab+ho sha li ka na ya nA bud+d+ha ka pA la badzra s+ya Adz+nyA ma la~M g+ha ya hU~M hU~M sa ran+tu

sar+b+ba da DI ka pha ti ka tse te/ man+ng+hu g+hi di sar+b+ba dzi i na su nan+ti ba ya ga re re kar ko Ta ka pra b+hI ta ya nA ga rA dza na spu tan+ti murda na re res spya/ a bas spya ma tsa la ha ma bu la ha dza i tsa la ha bu la ha re re b+ha ru kri pra b+hI ta yanA ga rA dza na u ha pu Ta Ta mu d+hi pra na dza i zhes pa ni sha li ka'i snying po'i

sngags so/ /de nas blo chen rnal 'byor pas/ /sems ni shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ /yongs rdzogs sha li ka byas la/ /pho dang mo ru brtag par bya/ /snag tsha yis ni bri bar bya/ /mig gi sngon du mi gzhag cing / /sha li ka bzang pos phyogs blta/ /de

nas lcug ma sngags kyis bsngags/ /o~M haM ha la khyab 'jug gi sa bon no/ /o~M ba~M tshangs pa'i sa bon no/ /o~M sa~M zhes pa ni zhi byed kyi sa bon no/ /o~M ha ha ha ha ha ha ha~M swA hA/ mngag pa'i sngags so/ /'di lta bu yi sngags kyi mchog /stong gsum na yang rnyed par dka'/ /

lan bdun bsngags pa tsam gyis ni/ /'gro bar 'dir ni the tshom med/ /klu rnams skrag par byed pa yi/ /mkha' lding nyams dga' song nas ni/ /klu yi gnas su zhugs de'i tshe/ /mkha' lding bye ba'i stobs dang ldan/ /nas kyang ni gshog rlung gis/ /stobs

po che yi klu rnams skrag /mtho ris mi yul sa 'og dang / /gang yang gzhan na gnas pa dang / /gzhan yang rung ste de thams cad/ /skrag nas ci bgyi zhes ni smra/ /klu gang gis zin pa de gal te yang shin/ bdag nyid chen po sha li ka mthong ma thag long bar 'gyur ro/ /

klu dang sbrul de dag gis sha li ka la 'di skad gsol to/ /kyai sha li ka gzhan du gsung bar ma mdzad cig /de ltar thos nas sha li ka mgu ba'i sems kyis dug gis zin pa'i mdun du sbrul long ba khyer te 'jog go/ /de nas slob dpon gyis bltas te/ sa'i gong bu blangs

la sha li ka mngag pa'i sngags kyis sbrul long ba la bsnun na/ /skad cig de nyid la de'i mig 'bye bar 'dir som nyi med do/ /dus su zin pa 'byel te shi ba sbrul gyis mthong nas de'i lus la 'gro ba dang 'ong bar byed pas dus su zin pa dug med par 'gyur zhing / dga' ba'i sems

kyis ldang ngo / /zin pa langs pa tsam nyid na sha li kas sbrul bzung ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /skad cig ma de nyid la slob dpon gyis stong pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgom par bya'o/ /stong pa dri med kun rang bzhin/ /chos rnams stong pa'i rang bzhin kyai/ /gang gis 'dzin cing

gang zhig 'dzin/ /mtha' dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin kyai/ /dngos po ma lus pa mtha' dag dang dug kyang stong pa nyid du sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud las gsungs te/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi mthar thug par ji srid du lus ma zhig pa de srid du slob dpon gyis yang dag par brtsam par

bya'o/ /de ltar slob ma la rjes su gnang ba byin nas phyis lung bstan par bya'o/ /des lan brgya 'am stong du gsol ba btab nas/ dug 'joms pa'i sngags bstan par bya'o/ /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li ni a hU~M/ /dug bza' ba'i sngags so/ /de nas gzhan yang don du

gnyer ba'i sems can de rnams thams cad la dkyil 'khor bstan te/ dung phor gyi chu 'thungs pa des na dug med par 'gyur te/ sbrul gyis mi 'dzin no/ /gal te 'dzin na de'i tshe klu 'chi bar 'dir the tshom med do/ /de ltar slob ma sha li ka'i sbyor ba la mngon par brtson pa la

bkas gnang ba byin te/ grong gang du gnas pa der dug gis 'dzin pa med do/ /gal te yod na de'i tshe klu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar thos nas slob ma rdo rje'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gang ci yang rung ba'i yon der dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi sar byung

ste gtor ma gtang bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyis gshegs su gsol te/ /o~M bud+d+ha ga pA li ni hrIHu tiSh+Tha gats+tsha hU~M gats+tsha hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /chu

yi sbyor ba bla med pa/ /gang gis byin pa tsam gyis ni/ /dug gis zin pa 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /nyi ma bdun na 'chi ba dang / /gzhan yang dug gis nyams pa rnams/ /chu ni byin pa tsam gyis ni/ /'di ru 'tsho bar the tshom med/ /sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor byas nas

ni/ /gnas dgu rnams su mchod par bya/ /dung phor chu yis bkang byas pa/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya/ /de nas brtse ba chen po yi/ /bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa yis ni/ /rang gi lag pa g.yon pa la/ /zla ba yi ni khyad par bsam/ /bcu drug cha las

yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /dri med dge ba'i lus can te/ /de'i dbus sa bon mi shigs dge /kha dog dkar po'i lus can no/ /lag des snod kyi kha bcad de/ /de nas gsang sngags bzla bar bya/ /oM sar+b+ba piSha ha ra ha ra hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags 'dis lan bdun

gyi bar du mngon par bsngags te/ mi shigs pa dang lhan cig zla ba zhu bar gyur nas chu'i nang du thim ste/ chu dang zla ba gcig tu 'dres pas shin tu dkar por 'gyur ro/ /gal te dug gis zin pa ma shin de'i tshe chu blud do/ /yang na shi ba yin na mgo nas rkang pa'i mthar thug

par lan gsum gsum du chu rgyun mi 'chad par blugs na langs par 'dir the tshom med do/ /de nas chu blud na rnal mar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las sha li ka'i sbyor ba dang / chu'i sbyor ba'i le'u

ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /shin tu rnyed dka'i bcud len le'u/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchog /rnal 'byor ma yi gong na med/ /gzhon nu ma dang sha ri ka/ /grub ma byis pa can ma dang / /de bzhin thod can

ma'o/ /'di dag sman ni chen po lnga/ /sangs rgyas lngas kyang rnyed par dka'/ /'di dag zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /bskal ba bye bar de 'tsho'o/ /gzhon nu ma ni zla drug tu/ /de bzhin sha ri ka zla gsum/ /grub ma zla ba gcig tu'o/ /byis can ma ni zla phyed gnyis/ /

thod pa can yang zla bar te/ /tshe 'phel ba yi mchog yin no/ /bya rog ma ni bya rog gzugs/ /glang po ma ni ngang pa'i gzugs/ /drod ma drod kyi gzugs can te/ /sdob sangs dkar mo sngon mo'i mig /kha sbyar sbyor ba'i dus su ni/ /mig las byung ba'i rdzas

gang yin/ /sman de'i ming ni gzhon nu ma/ /'di ru bstan par som nyi med/ /de yi pad+ma las byung rdzas/ /rtsa yi nang na rnam par gnas/ /ge sar sbas pa'i spyod yul te/ /sman ni sha ri ka ru gsungs/ /me tog ldan pa'i bu mo gang / /kha dog nag mos rab

mdzes ma/ /gang du thabs shes gnyis 'dus pa/ /de yi kha sbyar sbyor las byung / /sman de'i ming ni grub mar bshad/ /sangs rgyas tho pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bud med rab mdzes mnyams dang / /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /mi phyed nye bar spyad pa yi/ /de

las dang por byung ba'i rdzas/ /sman de byis pa can no zhes/ /bdag nyid chen po'i lha mos gsungs/ /lhan cig skyes dag byung ba'i rdzas/ /mchog chen mar khu dag dang ni/ /bsre 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /sman de'i ming ni thod can mo'o/ /zla ba nyi ma'i sbyor

ba yis/ /bya bar 'dir ni the tshom med/ /zla bas zla bar nyi mas nyir/ /de lus skra dkar gnyer ma zhi/ /ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar/ /de yi tshe ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /sman 'di grub pa tsam gyis ni/ /dag pa'i lus su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dngos po gang

dang gang yang rung / /lcags dang zangs ma'i snod dag la/ /dngul ni byugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /dngul dang gser du 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /dgongs bshad shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /rgyud gzhan du ni rab sbas pa/ /'bad pas de 'dir

rab gsal bya/ /dri chu ye shes rdo rje ste/ /dri chen rdo rje bzang po nyid/ /khrag ni mar me rdo rje yin/ /khu ba rdo rje'i thabs byung nyid/ /sha ni chos kyi rdo rje yin/ /de lnga rnal 'byor ma yi mchog /gang gi dam tshig rnyed dka' ba'i/ /thabs 'dir bdag

gis bshad par bya/ /ba lang sha ni 'bar ba ste/ /khyi yi sha la spro bar gsungs/ /rta yi sha la bza' bar bshad/ /glang po'i sha la zhu bar gsungs/ /sha chen la ni bzang por bshad/ /de lnga rnal 'byor mchog tu gsungs/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma ldan par/ /

gal te gcig tu byed nus pa/ /de che rnam rtog de thams cad/ /'jig 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /zan la bsod nams zhes bya ste/ /tshod ma la ni sdig pa nyid/ /ro la shin tu rnyed dka' gsungs/ /byis pa la ni 'gal ba nyid/ /g.yung mo la ni bzang mor

gsungs/ /rus pa'i phreng la rdzas zhes bya/ /skyes bu la ni rdo rjer gsungs/ /bud med la ni snod bzang nyid/ /dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor la/ /gzi brjid phreng chen de bshad do/ /rab chags shin tu mthong ba nyid/ /'khyud pa la ni chos zhes brjod/ /'dri

ba la ni mar me'o/ /shin tu 'dri la me zhes bya/ /'gro ba la ni phreng can ma/ /'ong la shin tu phreng can ma/ /myur ba la ni byug ces bya/ /dpa' ba la ni bzang de brjod/ /pad+ma rtse 'jo phreng can ma/ /sngags kyis mtshan ma rab nges zhe'o/ /ljags la lce 'og ces bya ste/ /

so la bza' bsnal ba de/ /mig la rol rtsed mu tig rna/ /gsang ba'i yul la rnyed dka' zhe'o/ /'di dag bshad do lag chen po/ /'jig rten gsum na rab rnyed dka'/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /med par phan tshun smra mi bya/ /'on kyang bshad chen de

nyid 'di/ /gcig la gcig gis smra bar bya/ /rgyud rnams thams cad du sbas pa/ /rgyud 'di ru ni gsal bar byas/ /nye 'dun grong mtha' lhan cig zhe'o/ /'dus pa phyi rol zhes su gsungs/ /nye ba'i 'dus pa nang de bzhin/ /gnas la 'bras bu zhes su

gsungs/ /nye ba'i gnas la shing nyid do/ /grong mtha' la ni sa bon gsungs/ /nye ba'i grong mtha' myu gu'o/ /tshogs pa la ni sdong bur gsungs/ /gcig pu la ni 'dab ma ste/ /stong pa la ni rtsa bzhi'o/ /de ltar dgongs pas bshad pa ni/ /bde gshegs

rnams kyis mi mkhyen no/ /spyan ma la sogs rnal 'byor ma/ /rnams kyis khong du mi chud cing / /byang chub sems dpa'i yul min zhing / /bla ma gus pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /spros pa thams cad spangs nas ni/ /rdzas la chags par mi bya'o/ /shin tu song sgom

rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang phrag dog med/ /gti mug dang ni nga rgyal spangs/ /nyon mongs thams cad rnam par spangs/ /za 'thung de bzhin glu len na/ /shin tu spros pa spang bar bya/ /bde bas dga' ba nyid dang ni/ /shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid

gsungs/ /bla med de nyid zla phyed kyis/ /'grub par the tshom med pa'o/ /kyai lags grogs mo 'gro kun gang / /mtha' dag dri ma med pa yi/ /blta dang bral la skye bo ltos/ /gsog gsob rang bzhin bslu ba/ /pad rtsa'i grib ma lta bur ltos/ /dbang

po lnga ni sgyu 'dra zhing / /lnga phung dag pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni bsgoms pas 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las sman bzang po dang / dgongs pa bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ /

de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa mchog gsang bar/ /thabs dang shes rab sgrub pa yis/ /gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba/ /shes rab pad+ma'i nang dbus su/ /dpag tshad bye ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /sum brtsegs dag pa'i bdag nyid lus/ /

'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus gnas par/ /mkhas pas slob ma bzang dbang bskur/ /gal te byang chub bla med 'dod/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bya ba min/ /lha rnams bshig pa tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa chen po skye bar 'gyur/ /des

na rdul tshon tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin lha rnams dag mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang / /de bzhin pad+ma ral gri nyid/ /byas nas slar yang 'jig byed pa/ /skyes bu tha shal dmyal bar 'gro/ /gang gis sangs rgyas spyan drangs shing / /gang gis

gshegs su gsol ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' byon pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa rnams/ /gang na'ang byon pa ma yin no/ /dri ma med cing dag pa'i lus/ /gang gis spyan drangs gshegs su gsol/ /de nyid kyis na brtag med par/ /de

bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag bya/ /lo bcu gnyis pa'i bu mo ni/ /tshul khrims mnyams chags chung ba'i/ /thos dang ldan zhing grags chen mo/ /nad med snying rje dang ldan ma/ /sems can don la gcig nan tan/ /dgod cing pad+ma'i spyan dang ldan/ /

zla ba'i cha 'dra gdong mdzes ma/ /mu cor mi smra brtan zhing dul/ /des na slob ma blo chen po/ /shin tu dad pa'i sems dang ldan/ /'dod med dbang po dul ba dang / /chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs/ /sems can don la shin tu sbyor/ /gti mug zhe sdang

phrag dog spangs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /de rnams la ni de nyid bshad/ /gsang ba phyi yi lnga dang ni/ /bdun dang bcu bzhir bshad pa dang / /gnyi ga gcig tu 'dus pa'o/ /gsang ba'i de nyid bshad par bya/ /slob ma legs dang ldan

pa dang / /brtse ldan sems gzhan med pa yis/ /gser ni 'bum phrag bcu drug dang / /sa gzhi yul 'khor ldan pa dang / /glang po bud med dam pa dang / /ral gri 'khor lo rta dang ni/ /yongs 'dren skyes bu rin chen rnams/ /sbyor dang ldan pa'i sems kyis

ni/ /der ni bla ma dbul bar bya/ /shin tu dri med sems kyis ni/ /de nas 'dir ni gsol ba gdab/ /'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag /dpung gnyen khyod kyis bsgral du gsol/ /bdag ni rtsol chung skal dman zhing / /sangs rgyas chos ni rnam par spangs/ /kyai

kye ston pa bla ma che/ /mgon po khyod kyis brtse bar mdzod/ /de ltar gsol 'debs tshig gsan nas/ /de ru bla ma mi gsungs bzhugs/ /man ngag 'di yi cha dag ni/ /glegs bam rnams las spyod yul min/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gang la

gang gis brgyan/ /mtshan ma'i don gzhan gar bkod kye/ /su yis sangs rgyas spyan drangs kye/ /'gro ba 'dra'i som nyir lhung / /mtha' dag stong pa gos med kye/ /chu nang zla ba ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor pad dbus gnas/ /kye lags rnal 'byor

ma tshogs ltos/ /der ni he ru ka gcig dang / /thams cad skyed par byed pa yin/ /'gro kun rmi lam bslu bas na/ /gti mug las ni bskyed pa ltos/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las dkyil 'khor

'jigs pa bri ba dang / slob ma dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /ri dang phug dang tshang tshing ngam/ /yang na dur khrod dag na ni/ /gdod nas grub pa'i gnas su'am/ /'on te rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag tu/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bla

med bri/ /rdul tshon sngon po ni ro bsregs pa'i sol ba las bya'o/ /rdul tshon dmar po ni dur khrod kyi so phag las bya'o/ /rdul tshon ljang khu ni nim pa'i 'dab ma las bya'o/ /rdul tshon dkar po ni mi'i rus pa'i phye ma las bya'o/ /rdul tshon ser po ni yung ba'i phye ma las bya'o/ /de ltar

rdul tshon lnga rnams kyis/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /pho brang rigs gsum zlum po la/ /rdo rje gsum gyis yongs su bskor/ /phyi rol gru bzhi lham pa yi/ /sgo bzhir rtab bas rnams kyis brgyan/ /ba dan rnam pa bzhi yis brgyan/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas

spras/ /phyi rol kha khyer dag pa dang / /rin chen pha gur yang dag ldan/ /pad+ma nyi ma nyi shu lnga'i/ /gdan rnams kyis ni shin tu mdzes/ /de yi dbus chud sa bon ni/ /yi ge hU~M gi rang bzhin sngo/ /skad cig tsam gyis he ru ka/ /sku mdog sngon po grags chen po/ /

g.yas na cang te'u gri gug ste/ /g.yon na kha T+wA~M thod pa'o/ /skyil krung phyed pas 'jigs chen po/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan cing / /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /dbu la sna tshogs rdo rje mnan/ /zla ba

phyed pa 'dzin pa'i lha/ /sku la thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs/ /dpa' bo phyag bzhi phyag mtshan 'chang / /shin tu hU~M sgrogs 'jigs byed pa/ /gar gyi stabs kyis rnam par bzhugs/ /mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba can/ /mchod phyir thod pa 'chang ba bo/ /thod pa gti mug

rnam dag pa/ /phreng ba brgyud pas brgyan pa'i lha/ /mgul do dang ni 'khor lo dang / /rkang gdub dang ni dpung rgyan dang / /gdu bu rked pa'i ska rags dang / /dpa' bo rna cha mchog gis brgyan/ /'di 'dra'i gzugs can gtso bo ni/ /hU~M zhes zlos par byed

pa'o/ /de las byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid rnams/ /sku mdog sngon mo grags chen mo/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis thod pa 'chang / /so so yi ni ming ji bzhin/ /de rnams ming ni rab tu bshad/ /

phreng bzang ma/ 'dod can ma/ 'jigs ma/ thub dka' ma/ dge ba'i ska rags can ma/ gzugs can ma/ rnam rgyal ma/ 'byung gnas ma/ thod can ma/ mtsho chen ma/ byed ma/ gsod ma/ sgrol ma/ 'jigs ma/ mthong ma/ mi pham ma/ dge ma/ 'dzur

byed ma/ dus mtshan ma/ grags chen ma/ mdzes sdug ma/ nor 'dzin ma/ skal bzang ma/ grags mthong ma'o/ /'di lta bu yi dkyil 'khor mchog /kha dog rnam pa lnga yis brgyan/ /de yi dbus gnas lha mo ni/ /he ru ka la bde ster ma/ /skyil krung phyed

pa'i gar byed ma/ /mi yi rus pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /lha mo 'od zer dpag dga' zhing / /skra ser gyen du 'bar ba ste/ /hU~M gi bdag nyid las skyes 'jigs/ /zhal nas khrag ni 'thor byed ma/ /dkar mo nag mo ljang khu ma/ /thams cad khu ba ldan gyur ma/ /

lha yi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid gsungs/ /bdag nyid he ru ka gzugs la/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i lha mos mchod/ /thod pa bdud rtsi lngas bkang ba/ /he ru ka yis btung bar bya/ /de yis 'thungs pa tsam gyis ni/ /'gro ba'i bla ma bdag nyid

che/ /gtso bo las gzhan tha dad gzugs/ /rnal 'byor ma kun de dang 'dra/ /de ltar he ru ka mgon pos/ /rnal 'byor ma kun spyad par bya/ /thams cad spyad pas zhu gyur te/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gnas/ /de ni zhu bar mthong nas ni/ /shin tu srid pa

bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /sgo yi rnal 'byor ma yis bskul/ /ci ste 'jig rten snyan mnan na/ /ci phyir khyod ni mi dgyes gyur/ /gal te khyod bdag tshig gsan na/ /mi dgyes gyur pa mtha' dag thong / /srid 'jigs skye bo kun lhung bas/ /stong pa'i thugs ni ma mdzad

par/ /nyid kyi dgongs pa kun bsgrubs kye/ /rnal 'byor ma yi grogs po bzhengs/ /gal te sngon gtso tshig gsan na/ /'bras bu yal bar ma dor cig /khyod mi snang na 'gro ba yi/ /skye bo mtha' dag gdung bas non/ /log pa'i nga rgyal ma mdzad par/ /stong pa'i rang

bzhin spangs nas ni/ /khyod kyis dngos med kun thong la/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs la spyod/ /rnal 'byor ma ni bzhi po yis/ /'di lta bu yi glu yis bskul/ /sngon bzhin mdog dang mtshan sogs ldan/ /kun nas rnal 'byor ma rnams bskor/ /'jigs pa 'khor ba

sgrol byed pa'i/ /dpa' bo chen po 'di bzhengs so/ /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ dkyil 'khor dang he ru ka bskyed pa dang sgom pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas yang dag rab bshad bya/ /sbyin

sreg dkyil 'khor mchog bzang po/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod de/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs/ /shing gi sbyin sreg mi bya zhing / /'bras dang 'bru rnams kyis kyang min/ /blo ldan gal te zhi 'dod na/ /me tog gis ni sbyin sreg

bya/ /me tog lnga bo mchog chen dang / /'o mar yang dag ldan pas bya/ /gal te zhi ba'i sbyin sreg 'dod/ /zhi ba'i gzugs sogs ldan pa yis/ /zhi ba'i thab khung gru bzhi pa/ /zabs dang rgyar ni mtho gang ba/ /kha la rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /dkar po rtse mo 'dus

pa bri/ /rdo rje rtse gsum sngon po ni/ /zhi ba hU~M bdag 'khor bar ni/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo la/ /gru gsum pa yi yi ges brgyan/ /e ba~M ma yA mchog chen gyi/ /lte ba ru ni bskyed par gsungs/ /rtse gsum 'jigs pa'i rdo rjes bskor/ /rdo rje'i nang du pad+ma

ste/ /pad+ma'i dbus su nyi ma bsam/ /nyi ma'i dbus su yi ge hU~M/ /kha dog dmar po'i 'od chen po/ /mtshams dang mtshams su rdo rje ni/ /rtse dgu ser po bri bar bya/ /bdag nyid he ru kar blta ste/ /phyis ni sbyin sreg yang dag brtsam/ /shes rab can gyis me yi lha/ /

sngags 'di yis ni spyan drang ngo / /o~M sar+b+ba de bA hu ta pra d+he ni a~M bi kalbe su da ha da ha ne da ha da ha dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ ya tri kun+ne a d+hiSh+Tha ya/ a d+hiSh+Tha ya/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ki li ki li/ ha he ho ha~M hraHhriHhU~M swA hA/ me lha spyan drang pa'i sngags so/ /sangs rgyas

thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /shes rab can sngags lan bdun bzlas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs shing / /mdog dkar du ba dang bral ba'i/ /me lha rgyal dbang byon nas kyang / /thab khung gi ni dbus su bzhugs/ /de nas blo ldan sbyin sreg bya/ /de ru sol ba gzhug

bya'o/ /a shwat+tha dang n+ya gro dang / /u dum bA ra ra ka ti/ pa la sha ste shing lnga las/ sol byas du med 'bar ba'i me/ blo ldan thab khung dbus su gzhug /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /pad+ma brgya ni rtsa brgyad dang / /de bzhin ut+pa la nyid dang / /ku mu da

dmar dri zhim 'dra/ /ka ra bI ra gzhan nyis 'gyur/ /byas te bsregs pas zhi bar gsungs/ /sbyin bdag mdun na 'dug pa la/ /de tshe du ba dbab par bya/ /mkhas pas gsang sngags 'di bton zhing / /pad+ma mar sbags bsreg par bya/ /o~M pad+ma rA dze ag+ni pra Ni ya

a mu ka s+ya shAn+ti~M ku ru swA hA/ mkhas pa yis ni sngags bzlas te/ /ut+pal 'o mas sbyin sreg bya/ /o~M g+ha g+ha g+hA ta yag+hA ta ya te dzo rA dza bi nA ya shAn+ti~M ku ru swA hA/ mkhas pa bde gshegs kun bdag gis/ /gur gum ku mud sngags bsreg /o~M su puSh+pe su ka ra tsa le dz+wa la nI ye shAn+ti~M

ku ru swA hA/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /dri zhim tsan+dan sbyin sreg bya/ /o~M d+ha me ma hA me rA dze da ha da ha sarba big+h+na~M shAn+ti~M ku ru swA hA/ ka ra bI ra dri zhim mar/ /mkhas pas sngags rgyal bzlas te bsreg /oM kA li su kA li ka rA la rA tri sar+b+ba pA pa~M da ha da ha shan+ti ku ru swA hA/ /

me tog re re re re la/ /gsang sngags rgyal po lan re bzla/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bla med pa/ /'jig rten gsum na rnyed par dka'/ /me ni 'o mas zhi bar bya/ /de nas gzhan yang rgyas pa yi/ /sbyin sreg khyad par bshad par bya/ /rgyas la thag khud zla ma po ste/ /chu yi dkyil

'khor ltar snang ba/ /zabs dang rgyar ni mtho gsum ste/ /kha dog ser por rnam par bsam/ /de dbus rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ /sngo bri de steng pad 'dab brgyad/ /bdag nyid he ru ka rnam pa/ /khro ba'i sems kyi bdag nyid kyis/ /shing bsreg pa yi sbyin sreg bya/ /gal te

rgyas pa mchog 'dod na/ /a mra ka n+tha pa la dang / /arga bil ba du du ra/ /shin tu rnyed dka'i shing lnga las/ /sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam du/ /slob dpon gyis ni gzung bar bya/ /ma gsam skams ma bcad cing / /bu ga can gyi shing spang ngo / /de yi dbus su

sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bsam/ /re re la ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bgrangs te de nas sbyin sreg bya/ /bdag nyid he ru ka yi tshul/ /sku mdog nag po 'od chen pos/ /mar dang yam shing thams cad ni/ /sngags bsregs 'dir ni the tshom med/ oM

ga ga nig ga na bi lo ka ne hU~M phaT/ te dzo rA dzA puSh+Ti~M ku ru swA hA/ shing rnams kun gyi sngags 'di yis/ /re re bzhin du sbyin sreg bya/ /phyis ni ser bo'i tshus zhi bya/ /'di lta'i rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg ni/ /'jig rten gsum na rnyed par dka'/ /rgyud gzhan rnams su spas pa ni/ /

rgyud 'di ru ni gsal bar byas/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /dbang du bya ba'i sbyin sreg mchog /thab khung gru gsum dmar po la/ /zabs dang rgyar ni sor mo brgyad/ /de dbus pad+ma 'dab brgyad dmar/ /zla ba dmar la sogs pas brgyan/ /grwa grwa ru ni

rdo rje dmar/ /bdag nyid he ru kar bsam pa/ /dmar po ltar snang chags pa'i bdag /rdo rje dmar po thod pa bsnams/ /yongs su gang ba'i khrag nyid kyis/ /khams gsum pa la rjes su chags/ /a sho ka yi yam shing dang / /go ro tsa nar ldan pa ni/ /blo ldan brgya rtsa

brgyad bsregs te/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag sngags ni gdon/ /o~M a sho ka ni su ra ke a nu rA ga ya trai lo kya ba sha~M ka rI trai lo kyaM bA shA mA na yA hrI swA hA/ nyin bdun sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/ /khams gsum dbang du 'gyur ba yin/ /chu ni dmar por me zhi bya/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad

pa/ /mngon spyod dang ni gsad pa mchog /zla ba phyed pa'i cha 'dra'i thab/ /zabs dang rgyar ni khru gang tshad/ /'jigs chen mdog ni ljang khu'o/ /grwa grwa ru ni rdo rje bri/ /dbus kyis gzhi stong pa ru/ /blo ldan sha lngas sbyin sreg bya/ /gsod pa yi ni sbyin sreg mchog /mngon spyod

gsod pa ru ni gsungs/ /dgra kun bsnun cing zlog par byed/ /dgra bo thur du kha bltas shing / /kha nas khrag ni skyug pa nyid/ /sha yi dbus su bsam par bya/ /seng ldeng sol bas me bya ste/ /med na 'ba' 'bo la nyid kyi/ /'ba' 'bo tsher mas sha phug ste/ /brgya rtsa

brgyad du sngags kyis bsreg /o~M mA ra ya mA ra ya kI la ya kI la ya sar+b+ba sha truM nA na sha ya hU~M phaT/ bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing / /sku mdog sngon po thugs 'khrugs pas/ /dgra rnams thams cad brlag par ni/ /skad cig de la the tshom med/ /phed mdzad 'jigs shing 'jigs par

byed/ /ha ha zhes mdzad 'jigs par mdzad/ /gdug pa thams cad gsod par ni/ /sbyin sreg tsam gyis the tshom med/ /'di lta'i bsad pa'i sbyin sreg dang / /mngon spyod kyang ni rnyed dka' ba/ /rnal 'byor lha mos rtogs min na/ /sngags skyes phal lta smos ci

dgos/ /de phyir sangs rgyas thod pa yi/ /rnal 'byor nga rgyal dang bral bas/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems/ /lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'/ /ljang khu'i chu yis me zhi bya/ /gang gis bsregs shing gang zhig bsregs/ /gang gi zhi ba gang zhi ba/ /gang gis

rnam rtog kun bcom pa/ /de yis sems ni mgu bar byed/ /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /spyod pa'i le'u shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /

bud med shin tu mchog gyur dang / /rnal 'byor gang gis spyod kun byed/ /dngos grub brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /de nas spyod pa yang dag brtsam/ /sems can dngos grub gang gang 'dod/ /de de'i dngos grub rtag tu ster/ /lag pas thod pa gzung byas te/ /gcer bu skra

grol gyur pa yi/ /brtul zhugs can gyis spyod pas 'khyam/ /gang dang gang tshe de tshe der/ /rtag tu spyod pa thams cad bya/ /rgyan rnams kun las rnam grol zhing / /nam mkha' dang mtshungs gyur pa yi/ /shes rab can gyis khyim khyim du/ /slong mo bya bar the tshom

med/ /yid dang mthun pa kun blangs na/ /bsam gtan gnas su the tshom med/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis bsams nas ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi slong mo blang / /chos la gzhol pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /thod pa'i steng du gzhag pa yi/ /rdzas ni de nas bza' bar bya/ /rdzas

ni zos ma thag tu yang / /khyim khyim thal phung shing drung dang / /gang du gang tshe der de'i tshe/ /gang gis dga' ba'i sems de yis/ /blo gros chen po gnyid log phreng / /'di lta'i spyod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya chen po nges par thob/ /de ltar yang rgyud las gsungs pa/ /gang

du ji ltar der de ltar/ /gang gis de yis sangs rgyas te/ /rang gi rnam rtog dag gis nyams/ /mtha' dag rang bzhin rnam par dag /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las spyod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas

yang dag rab bshad pa/ /gcig tu sems can don rab nges/ /gser du nges par byed pa'i le'u/ /slob dpon la ni rab dang bas/ /mu tig dang ni nya phyis dang / /dngul chu dang ni byi ru yis/ /gang gis sems can nor ldan 'gyur/ /'di ni phyi yi

sman min te/ /shun lpags lo ma ma yin zhing / /dngul chu bcud len ma yin te/ /mu zi lhang tsher ma yin zhing / /lcags dang zha nye zangs ma min/ /lcags gzhan dag ni ma yin te/ /grub pa'i sman gyi mchog yin no/ /'di lta bu yi tshig thos nas/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs po

ches/ /zhabs kyi rdul gyi cha btud nas/ /sems dpa' gcig tu dad brtan pas/ /lha mo legs so zhes ni smra/ /sman gyi mchog ni gang yin zhing / /dngos grub kyang ni ji lta bu/ /gus pa yis ni nyan par 'tshal/ /lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs/ /grub pa'i

sman gyi mchog gang lags/ /gang gis sems can nor ldan 'gyur/ /tshe 'phel ba la brtson pa gang / /sngon bsnyen ltos pa med pa yis/ /sman chen grags pas 'grub pa gang / /gang gis rdzas rnams mang por 'gyur/ /mo sham bu dang ldan 'gyur gang / /yang dang yang du

mi 'chi zhing / /shi nas yang dag 'tshor 'gyur ba/ /lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs/ /bka' stsal pa/ khyim 'di nyid du gnas pa yi/ /sman chen po yis 'grub pa ste/ /de yang snod bzang mchog la 'grub/ /byis pa rmongs pas mi shes so/ /bdag don gcig pu la

'bab cing / /kye ma gcig tu dka' 'bad pas/ /ji ltar sems can don 'grub 'gyur/ /snod bzang la ni gnas pa'i bcud/ /ze'u 'bru gsang ba'i spyod yul te/ /ro bcud rtsa yi nang gnas pa'i/ /sman chen ro bcud ma ru brjod/ /gang gis lcags ni gser 'gyur ba/ /gcig

gis kyang ni grangs med 'gyur/ /'di lta bu yi sman chen mchog /ro bcud ma ni de bzhin gnas/ /rab 'byor cho ga sngon 'gro bas/ /sman gyi mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /der ni yang dag sbyor bshad/ /dad pa brtan pa yis ni nyon/ /me tog ldan pa'i bud med gang / /gzhon

nu kha dog nag po ste/ /rgyud 'di thos pa dang ldan zhing / /ngo tsha med cing ltos med ma/ /'dod pa chung zhing sems can brtse/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bsten cing / /rtag tu rab sbas btsog med ma/ /'di lta'i bud med rab blangs te/ /sman chen mchog ni yang dag brtsam/ /

skyes bu shin tu chags che zhing / /myur du byang chub sems 'bab pa/ /gang yin de la dngos grub med/ /'di lta bu yi sman chen po/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang rab rnyed dka'/ /shin tu brtan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /blo ldan bud med de rnams bsten/ /de ltar yang zhes

gsungs pa/ rab tu brtan pa gtso bo'i gnas/ /zhes ni sgrub pa po rnams smra/ /de phyir brtan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /snod bzang 'bras bu bskul bar bya/ /der ni me tog ldan bud med/ /gser gyi sbyor ba rnyed dka' brtsam/ /grub pa'i bcud kyis byugs pa yi/ /zla ba

rang gi snying khar bsam/ /sngon du ri yi rgyal pos brgyan/ /der ni yi ge hrIHsa bon/ /sems can don la gcig tu 'bad/ /blo ldan dgos pa yang dag brtsam/ /zangs ma'i dngos po srang gcig bcas/ /zlum po snod bzang la bcug ste/ /g.yon pa bskum

ba'i g.yas zur gzhag /med na lcags kyang bya ba yin/ /brtan pa'i sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni/ /de nas blo ldan las rnams brtsam/ /ri rab zla ba sa bon rgyal/ /zhu 'gyur the tshom med pa yin/ /snod bzang der ni ngal bsos pas/ /'bo ba'i sbyor bas 'dzag pa

nyid/ /bzang pos myur du rab blangs te/ /mkhas pa yis ni byug par bya/ /rdog po byugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /me yi nang du gzhug bya zhing / /de nas shes rab can bltas na/ /gser du 'gyur ba the tshom med/ /de ni mi sha gcig gis ni/ /srang brgya ru ni 'gyur ba yin/ /

de ltar gser gyi sbyor ba mchog /'jig rten gsum na'ang rnyed par dka'/ /gal te sman chen tshad min na/ /de tshe sangs rgyas tshad ma yin/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'dir/ /dngos po gang dang gang gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de dag thams cad

bden par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'di tshad min smra ba'i/ /blo gros chen po thos ldan pa/ /ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar/ /de dag thams cad dmyal bar 'gro/ /sman 'di tsam gyis ma grub na/ /chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / /bla

med rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /de dag thams cad par 'gyur/ /mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang / /sems can sangs rgyas chos la 'tshe/ /sman gyis mchog ni 'grub 'gyur ba/ /sdad cig de la the tshom med/ /sems can don la gcig tu 'bad/ /sgom

ldan 'grub pa lta yi smos/ /sman mchog gser dang dngul du 'gyur/ /ji srid sangs rgyas ye shes yod/ /mi ni bskal ba bye bar 'tsho/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /mo sham rnams kyi bu med pa/ /yang dag sbyor bas bkrus tsam gyis/ /skad cig de la

bu ldan 'gyur/ /sngon gyi gtso bos ji skad gsungs/ /khrus kyi cho ga rab tu bshad/ /kha dog lnga yi rdul tshon nam/ /yang na rdul tshon dkar po yis/ /dpag dka' skrag par byed pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/ /der ni bum pa lto che ba/ /zlum

po bzhi ni gzhag par bya/ /shes rab can gyis chu yis dgang / /ras kyis kyang ni dkri bar bya/ /rang gi khrag gis mtshan ma bri/ /bud med mo sham de yi ni/ /khams kyi gtso bo blangs nas ni/ /mkhas pas bum pa'i kha la byug /de nas khrag 'thung go 'phang la/ /

gnas pa bsgom pa'i mchog ldan pas/ /nag po dmar mo 'jigs chen po/ /rdo rje hU~M las pad dag byung / /'jigs pa'i me ltar 'jigs byed pa/ /zhal gcig ba la phyag bzhi pa/ /bla ma 'jigs pa'i gar byed cing / /mkhas pas hU~M ni sgrogs bzhin pa/ /blo ldan

bum pa'i nang du bsam/ /de nas ral gri 'dzin pa yi/ /skyes pa bzhi po grags chen po/ /khro bo gzhan gyi sems dang ldan/ /'jigs chen skyes bu de rnams kyis/ /ral gris nam mkhar bsnun cing gsod/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba dang / /'di lta bu yi sbyor ldan pas/ /

de bzhin du ni bud med bkru/ /skad cig de la bkrus tsam gyis/ /bud med bu dang ldan par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las sman chen po khyad par can dang / mo sham gyi khrus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu

pa'o// //de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /mkha' lding sbyor las byung ba'i le'u/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i cho ga yis/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /blo ldan he ru ka dang ni/ /kun nas rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskyed/ /mtshan ma phyag sogs

sngon gsungs bzhin/ /kha dog dkar po 'ba' zhig nyid/ /phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma dkar zhing / /mtshams kyi dmar po nyid yin no/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i cho ga yis/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab/ /bum pa rnam pa bzhi po la/ /sngon gsungs phyag

mtshan bri bar bya/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyis ni slob ma rjes su gzung / /sngon gyi cho gas gsol btab ste/ /sbyin dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / /de nas dkyil 'khor mchod par bya/ /slar yang gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /slob ma rjes su gzung bar

bya/ /sa stengs na ni dus zin la/ /cung zad gso bar mi nus te/ /nam mkha' lding can gyis btang zhing / /dus su zin ces smra ba ni/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /blo ldan de nas las brtsam mo/ /bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing / /kun nas rnal 'byor ma

brgyad de/ /de kun sku ni dkar po ru/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya/ /'bras btags rang bzhin blangs nas ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa gnyis bya'o/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yis/ /de yi lag par ral gri sbyin/ /de yi snying gar sngags bzhugs pa/ /'dab

ma gang dang gang de la/ /mar khu che byas snag tsha dang / /mkhas pas sngags ni bri bar bya/ /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA le ni hrIHo~M ka pA la ni badzri Ni aH bi d+h+waM sa ya sar+b+ba nA ga na u da pa ya d+ya d+ha ra ni/ bi b+ha ba ya ka la da sha na/ b+ho b+ho b+ha ga pa ti/ bud+d+ha ka pA la nI/ sar+b+bA na Na k+Sha ya~M ka

rI ha ha ha swA hA/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags so/ /de ltar yongs su rdzogs nas ni/ /'dab ma snying khar gzhug par bya/ /gsang sngags 'di dang lcug ma yis/ /lan bdun bar du spyan drang ngo / /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li ni g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ g+ha Da g+ha Da hri hri

haHhaH/ he heHha~M/ lan bdun bsngags pa tsam gyis ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa rnam pa gnyis/ /bar snang du ni lding 'gyur te/ /gcig ni dum bu dum bu ru/ /sa la ltung ba ru ni 'gyur/ /dus zin 'dir langs the tshom med/ /gzhan yang stor ba rnyed dka' gang / /bad

stegs la sogs lnga po/ /glegs bam la ni bri ma byas/ /bla ma'i drin las shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las rig pa 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba'i man ngag nges pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //

de nas phyag na rdo rjes rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gtsor gyur pa/ /shes rab chen po'i lha mo legs/ /khyod kyis gsungs pa'i sbyor ba gang / /'jig rten na yang rnyed par dga'/ /bdag

gis rgyud kun mthong mod kyi/ /sbyor ba 'di dag rnyed par dka'/ /rgyud 'dir khyod kyis gang gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis ma bshad do/ /e ma'o sems can don la brtson/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas kun skyed ma/ /e ma'o phyag rgya che la brtson/ /sngags rnams

kun gyi rab sbyor ma/ /shin tu rnyed dka' gang yin des/ /rnal 'byor pa gang ngo mtshar ba/ /sna tshogs byed 'gyur lha mo gsungs/ /dang po'i le'u gang gang gsungs/ /sbyor de lha mos bdag la shod/ /'di lta bu yi tshig gsan nas/ /rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs

sde/ /bzhad cing shin tu bzhad pa yis/ /lha rnams cad sgrag pa dang / /bdud sde thams cad 'bros pa dang / /bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /e ma'o bzhad pa'i nges pa yis/ /rgyal ba'i mchog kun ngo mtshar ro/ /gsungs pa/ rgyal mtshan

'phyang ba blangs byas la/ /de yi sha yang blang bya zhing / /de yi rked cha'i rus pa ni/ /blangs nas tha ba khung du ni bya/ /de yi thod pa'i rjes bzung ste/ /rgyus bsdong bur byas te gzhag /de yi mar khus dgang bya zhing / /thab khung gru gsum steng du gzhag /gzhan yang dud pa

'bebs pa dang / /ji srid dud pa chags kyi bar/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /gsang sngags 'di ni bzlas par bya/ /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li ni b+ha ra b+ha ra/ d+ha d+ha ra/ d+ha d+ha ra/ d+ha rA pa ya d+ha rA pa ya/ sho Sha ya/ sho Sha ya/ ta pa ya ta pa ya/ trA~M trA~M o~M ma~Ms ra d+hA ku ru

ku ru b+ho b+ha ga pa te bud+d+ha ka pA la s+ya dz+nyA ma laM g+ha ya shI g+h+raM ka dza la pa taM/ pa ta ya pa ta ya/ trA~M trA~M a hU~M stam b+ha ya b+ho b+ha ga ba ti hU~M a~M phaT/ 'di ltar sngags kyi rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten gsum yang skems par byed/ /'byung po ro langs mkha' 'gro ma/ /srin po sha

za la sogs dang / /gzhan yang rung ste bgegs de rnams/ /thos pa tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur/ /ji srid dud pa ma babs pa/ /de srid sngags ni bzla bar bya/ /dud pa bsam thag tu ni/ /lag pa gnyi gas gzung bar bya/ /de nas blo chen rnal 'byor pas/ /rol

rtsed phreng ba btung bar bya/ /bu mo lo ni bcu drug ma/ /lang tsho'i gzugs la brtse ba can/ /'di ni rnal 'byor pa yis spyad/ /gcig tu sems can don 'bad pa/ /gcer bu skra grol gyur pa yi/ /mkhas pas hi hi'i sngags bton te/ /rol rtsed phreng ma btung bar

bya/ /de yi rjes la rtse 'jo brtsam/ /shin tu bzhad gyur phed mdzad pa'i/ /brtse ba chen po'i lag g.yon du/ /dud chen mchog ni gzhag par bya/ /sbyor ba la ni mkhas pa yis/ /phyis ni pags kyis bya ba bya/ /pad+ma las byung rdzas gang zhig /de nyid kyis ni dud

pa mnye/ /ming med mthe bos me tog sbyin/ /ril bu brgya dang rtsa brgyad bya/ /ril bu re re re re la/ /gsang sngags brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzla/ /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li ni trA~M hrIHhU~M phaT/ 'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' zhing / /rgyud rnams kun tu rnyed dka' ba/ /rnal 'byor

mas kyang rnyed dka' ba'i/ /sngags 'di yis ni dud pa bsgrub/ /srin lag gi ni sor mo yis/ /mig la dud pa byugs tsam gyis/ /stong gsum rdul phran lta bu yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgyad

cu yi/ /steng dang 'og ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis/ /skad cig de la rnal mar 'gyur/ /mdzub mos byugs ba tsam gyis ni/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong 'gyur te/ /'byung po sha za dang / /gzhan yang grub pa rnams dang ni/ /

dpag tshad bya ba stong phrag gi/ /steng dang 'og ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis/ /rnal mar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /gung mos byugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /shin tu ngo mtshar byed 'gyur te/ /pheg brdabs bdun gyi sgra tshad du/ /nag po 'bar

byed rtse mo yis/ /sprin rnams thams cad 'thor bar 'gyur/ /'di lta'i dud pa rnyed par dka'/ /lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis/ /skad cig de la mi ru 'gyur/ /mthe bong gis ni dud pa yi/ /bdag nyid chen po byugs tsam gyis/ /gzugs brnyan mtshan

ma ri dang shing / /gzhan dag gang yang rung pa rnams/ /khro bo'i lta bas bltas tsam gyis/ /dum bu stong du 'gyur ba yin/ /g.yon pas mnyes pa tsam gyis ni/ /rnal mar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /mthe'u chung gis ni mig byu gsan/ /skad cig de la mi snang 'gyur/

sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur/ /skad cig sum cu gsum du 'khor/ /mdzod dang bud med rdzas nyid dang / /dngos po gang dang gang 'dod pa/ /dud pa'i bdag nyid chen po yis/ /skad cig de la 'phrog par 'gyur/ /'di lta bu yi dud mchog gi/ /sbyor ba sna

tshogs legs par bshad/ /de ni mig la byugs tsam gyis/ /rang gi gzugs ni bsgyur bar byed/ /dud pa 'di ni byugs tsam gyis/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /bya rog 'ug pa bya rgod dang / /sprul dang khyi dang ce spyang dang / /stag dang gung dang byi la dang / /

sprang bu glang po bong bu ru/ /de ltar dud pa chen po yis/ /sna tshogs pa yi las byed pa'o/ /kun la las kun yod mod kyi/ /sbyor ba 'ba' zhig rnyed par dka'/ /sbyor ba glegs bam la ma bris/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad

de/ /sbyor ba shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /sngags dang rus pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rtag tu sna tshogs las byed do/ /glang po'i rus pas bsad pa'i sbyor ba bya'o/ /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI hrIH hU~M/ rta yi rus pas bskrad pa rnyed par dka' ba bya'o/ /o~M bud+d+hA ka pA li nI kha~M hrIH hU~M

phaT/ ba lang gi rus pas dgra'i snying gar phur bu gdab par bya'o/ /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI trA~M hrIH /khyi'i rus pas rengs pa chen po bya bar gsungs so/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI AH hU~M phaT/ rus pa chen pos ni dgug par bya'o/ /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI hrIH bau ShaT/ bong

bu'i rus pas rmongs par bya'o/ /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI bru~M hU~M/ 'ug pa'i rus pas dbang du bya'o/ /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI trA~M hrIH hU~M/ bya rgod kyi rus pas dbye bar bya'o/ /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nA hAH phaT hU~M/ bong bu'i rus pas rengs par bya'o/ /o~M bud+hA ka pA li nI

badzri Ni tra~M/ ce spyang gi rus pas g.yul las rgyal bar byed do/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI b+ha ga ba ti d+ha ra d+ha ra ha he ho ha ha/ ma he'i rus pas dga' zhing rtse bas lo bcu gnyis su nyin dang mtshan du de'i byang chub sems mi ltung ngo / /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI ra ma ra ma kri Ta kri Ta ha ha/

sbrul gyi rus pas shing rtsad nas 'don no/ /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI ta Ta ta Ta/ tra ta ya tra ta ya/ ma ta s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ud+pa Ta ya hU~M phaT/ stag gi rus pas ri 'degs par byed do/ /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ma Ta ma Ta tra Ta ya tra Ta ya/ g+ha TA pa ya g+ha

TA ba ya/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta mo Ta mo Ta ya saM kra ma ya hrIH hU~M tra~M phaT/ lcags kyus ni nags stug po stong par byed do/ /o~M bud+d+ha ka bA li nI badzre nA sha ya ma ra ya g+hu Ta g+hu Ti ni sar+b+ba bi na ya ti na hri ye yaM ta Da ya b+hi trA pa ya tsa maM tsa maM/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ b+ho b+ha ga ba ti a~M a~M ta Ta

hU~M phaT/ sems gcig dri med me long bzhin/ /gang bsams de yang gzugs brnyan dang / /rmi lam lta bur shes mod kyi/ /'on kyang rnam par rtog pas bzung / /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa'i

gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las sngags sna tshogs kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /rnam dag le'u rab rnyed dka'/ /ne ne mo dang tsha mo dang / /ma dang bu mo chung ma nyid/ /gal te phyag rgya che 'dod

na/ /shes rab can gyis 'di dag spyad/ /g.yung mo dang ni gar mkhan ma/ /khrus mkhan ma dang gtum mo yi/ /bu mo ko ba byed par gsungs/ /blo dang ldan pas 'di dag spyad/ /de lnga rnal 'byor ma yi mchog /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /

ma dag pa yi sems sbyang phyir/ /mig ni sring mor gyur pa ste/ /rna ba tsha mo nyid yin no/ /sna ni ma ru 'gyur ba ste/ /lce ni bu mo nyid yin no/ /yid ni chung mar 'gyur ba ste/ /lnga po de rnams mchog lha mo/ /phyag rgya chen po rab ster ma'o/ /gti mug gar

mkhan ma ru 'gyur/ /zhe sdang g.yung mo nyid yin no/ /'dod chags khrus mkhan ma yin te/ /nga rgyal gtum mo nyid yin no/ /phrag dog ko ba byed ma'o/ /lnga po de rnams bud med mchog /gzugs las gti mug skye ba ste/ /sgra las zhe sdang skye ba

yin/ /dri la longs spyad pas 'dod chags/ /ro las nga rgyal nyid yin te/ /reg bya las ni phrag dog skye/ /sems kyi dag pa nyid yin no/ /da phyir rnal 'byor blo chen gyis/ /shin tu sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni/ /skyes 'dir dngos grub ma thob kyang / /

skye gzhan srid par dngos grub 'thob/ /ji ltar dngos po med par bsgom/ /ji ltar dngos po bsgom par bya/ /dngos po bsgom bya ji ltar 'gyur/ /sring mo'i gzugs ni ji ltar yin/ /dkar mo ljang khu sngon mo'i mdog /'di lta'i gzugs dang ldan

par ni/ /dag pa'i sems kyis blta mi bya/ /tsha mos ji ltar sgra thos pa'i/ /sgra grag pa ni rnam gsum nyid/ /'di lta'i sbyor dang ldan par ni/ /dag pa'i sems kyis mnyan mi bya/ /rab sbas skyed ma gang yin des/ /dri ni rnam pa gsum bltas pa/ /lta

min yid dang ldan pa la/ /ji ltar 'dod chags skye bar 'gyur/ /lce dang lhan cig longs spyod rdzas/ /ro drug myangs pa ci 'dra ba/ /myangs pas longs spyod ldan pa yi/ /myangs pa'i gzugs ni ji lta bu/ /yid kyis longs spyod dga' bde nyid/ /yid kyis gnyi

ga spyad pas bde/ /der ni rtag pa yod ma yin/ /dngos po las ni dngos med yod/ /dngos med la yang dngos po nyid/ /dngos dang dngos med gnyi ga stong / /'di dag sems kyi dag pa nyid/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /phyi yi lus ni sbyang phyir ro/ /

lta dang ldan pa snying rje ste/ /'khyud pa byams par 'gyur ba'o/ /drud pa'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid ni/ /dga' ba yan lag ma yi mchog /gnyi ga 'dus las gang 'jog pa/ /de ni bdag gis btang snyoms gsungs/ /de ltar dngos po'i sbyor ldan pa/ /

ji ltar 'dod chags kyis 'ching 'gyur/ /mthong ba las ni 'dod chags skye/ /'khyud las 'bras bu cung zad tsam/ /drud pa las ni dga' ba skye/ /kun gyi mtha' mar dga' bral lo/ /de ltar dga' dang dga' bral 'bras/ /khams gsum pa

las skye bar 'gyur/ /rab dga' sems kyi sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po gsum gyis 'ching mi 'gyur/ /bza' dang btung ba gang ci'ang rung / /bde ba 'bab pa'i kha zas rnams/ /de kun bshang dang gci sogs su/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu brtag /gang

ci rung ba'i dga' rtse 'jo/ /'khyud pa dang ni 'o byed dang / /nyed dang 'tshir ba nyid kyis ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'ang mthong bar 'gyur/ /'di lta'i bsgom dang ldan pas ni/ /'di ru 'grub par the tshom med/ /rnal 'byor ma lngas sangs rgyas kyi/ /dpal dang phyag rgya

cher ster byed/ /rnal 'byor ba yis de mchod na/ /'dod pa rnams kyis gos mi 'gyur/ /phrag dog la sogs kyis sbags kyang / /de la nyes pas gnod pa med/ /rnal 'byor pa yi mchog de nyid/ /sring ba'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/ /

ji srid khams ni phyi mi gsor/ /sangs rgyas sku srid sdig dang bral/ /byang chub sems ni 'dzag med pa/ /gang tshe phun sum tshogs pa'i shing / /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las sems rnam

par dag pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /sna tshogs sde mas bsngags pa'i le'u/ /de ltar phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / ri rab kyi rdul phra rab snyed dang mtshungs pa'i rnal 'byor

ba rnams spyan drangs shing mgu ba'i sems kyis sna tshogs sde ma la btud de bstod pa/ /e ma'o bcom ldan 'das lha mo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed ma/ /dpal dang grags pa che zhing 'jigs/ /sems can kun la phan mdzad ma/ /lha mo

snying rje che ldan ma/ /phyag rgya chen po blo chen ma/ /don chen 'bras bu ston mdzad ma/ /sangs rgyas thod pa yi ni rgyud/ /rdo rje 'chang gis sbas pa dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gsungs shing / /byang chub sems dpa'i yul min pa/ /gsung gcig gis

ni gsal mdzad de/ /de ni lha mo khyod kyis gsungs/ /e ma'o snod chen lha mo khyod/ /rnal 'byor ma kun bsdus byas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs kun yul min pa/ /rnyed dka'i dngos grub gang yin pa/ /de ni lha mos gsal bar mdzod/ /gsungs pa/ rnal

'byor ma ni thams cad nyon/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / /'dod chags bral dang bdag chen nyon/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa nyon/ /klu dang lhar bcas mi rnams nyon/ /rgyud rgyal 'di ni bklags tsam gyis/ /bsod nams gang yin

de kun gyi/ /bsod nams rjes rang yongs su bsngo/ /phyag rgya chen po'i don du ni/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rnam pa dbul/ /sngags don zab mo rnams dang ni/ /sbyor ba shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /gang zhig gsal byas bdag bzod mdzod/ /shin tu sbas

pa'i yul de yang / /sems can don du gsal byas pas/ /rgyal ba'i mchog rnams bdag bzod mdzod/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa stobs po che/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /sangs rgyas thod sbyor bzang po bzla/ /

o~M hrIHbud+d+ha hU~M ka pA li nI AH/ 'jug pa la o~M/ 'byung ba la hrIH gnas pa la bud+d+ha/ bde ba la hU~M/ nub pa la ka pA li nI/ ldang ba la AH'o/ /de ltar bzlas pa rab rnyed dka'/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor chud bzla/ /de ltar yid kyi bzlas ldan pas/ /

dngos grub 'thob par the tshom med/ /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI AHhrIHheHhU~M phaT/ snying po'i sngags so/ /o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI badzri Ni ho hU~M/ a dur la kA+e hU~M phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /dbang dus cho ga ji bzhin du/ /

slob ma dad brtan gang zhig gis/ /shes rab ma la gsol ba gdab/ /dri zhim pa yi dngos po yis/ /maN+Dal rnam pa lnga byas te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis brgyan byas pa/ /lha mo che la gsol ba gdab/ /zhal du bza' ba'i rdzas mchog bstab/ /rdzas de rnams

ni gsol ba dang / /yid ni tshim zhing thugs dgyes so/ /lha mo dgyes par mthong nas ni/ /tshig 'di dag gis smra bar byed/ /rnam par rtog pa mang po yis/ /g.yogs pa'i bag chags rab ldan pa/ /'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag /mdzes ma khyod

kyis skyob par mdzod/ /grags chen snying rje ldan pa yi/ /lha mo de ni zhi bar mdzod/ /der ni rgyan rnams thams cad dang / /lhab lhub rgyan rnams dbul bar bya/ /dad pa brtan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya/ /sna tshogs zas

dang sna tshogs btud/ /de yi mdun du dbul bar bya/ /gang gis shes rab ma mnyes pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni mchod/ /'di nyid la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /gzhan yang dngos grub gtso bo dang / /snying rje ldan pa gzhan gang zhig /

mkha' 'gro ma kun 'di la bzhugs/ /gang du dbang po 'gags gyur pa/ /bdag rtog rang bzhin nyams pa ste/ /kye de lhan cig skyes dgar 'gyur/ /bla ma'i zhal sngar gsal bar zhus/ /gang zhig 'char dus tshe na dbang po dang / /yul mnyam nub gyur de la phyag

'tshal lo/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi snying sbas su sad pa/ /phyis ni mngon dga' rgyal ba'i mdzes sku gcig /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las sngags kyi bzlas pa dang / shes rab ma la gsol ba

gdab pa dang / /rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //'di gsungs nas sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma thams cad dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang rang gi gnas na 'dug ste/ ci'ang mi gsung

bar bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma chen mos gsungs pa mchog tu gsang ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA mA yA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal sgyu 'phrul chen po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo bsgyur/ /ye

shes lnga dang sku gsum nyid/ /'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji skad rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /kun tu rtog pa'i 'ching gcod cing / /'jig rten bya bar rab 'jug pa/ /de snyed rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas de las rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba'i dbang phyug

ma rnams kyi mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud bshad par bya ste/ gang zhig gis ni kun khyab pa/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu tshangs sgo nga / /lha mo thams cad skyed byed cing / /tshangs la sogs pa'i bdag nyid che/ /de rnams kyi ni gsang chen 'di/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo dbang

phyug che/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo drag chen mo/ /'byung ba yang dag sdud mdzad ma/ /gang gis 'di kun la khyab pa/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum/ /des ni de nas 'di bsdus nas/ /'jig rten gsum po yang spro'o/ /gsang ba pa rnams 'di yi ni/ /sgyu ma'i

bdag nyid ces rnam grags/ /'jig rten gsum sgrub rig ma ste/ /'dod pa thams cad rab ster ba/ /gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /sgrub pa'i dbang phyug rig pa nyid/ /lha dang nor bdag dri za dang / /gnod sbyin lha min mi dang bcas/ /rig pa 'dzin dang gang

yang rung / /mi'am ci dang lto 'phye che/ /srin po dang ni sha za rnams/ /sgrub po rnams la 'grub par 'gyur/ /dbang du 'du 'gyur 'byung po rnams/ /chu las skyes dang thang las skyes/ /chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /gdod nas dag cing rnyog pa med/ /

thabs brjod pa yis de las ni/ /rang byung ye shes lnga ldan 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams sbyor ba'i ma/ /khams gsum po ni ma lus kun/ /ma lus lus pa med grub cing / /sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun las phrogs nas su/ /lha mchog

lha skyes bu mo skyod/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug byed rig pa/ /de bzhin du ni mig 'phrul byed/ /rmongs pa dang ni rengs pa dang / /bskrad dang gsad pa la sogs pa/ /dbang dang dgug pa la sogs dang / /nam mkhar 'gro ba nyid kyang ngo / /gzhan gyi grong sogs

bya ba dang / /mi snang ba dang gang yang rung / /zhe 'gras pa dang rmugs pa dang / /de bzhin sa 'og 'gro ba'o/ /rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur nyid 'gyur/ /'chi ba med cing rgas pa med/ /rnal 'byor sgyu ma'i rig pa 'di/ /'di yis na ba med par 'gyur/ /sngags

kyi yi ge'i gzugs kyis su/ /rnal 'byor bas ni rnam rol byed/ /bklags pa dang ni bsams pa yis/ /bsgom pa dang ni ting 'dzin rnams/ /bklags pas byed pa'i rig pa ste/ /rig pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs

med cing dka' thub med/ /dka' spyod smyung ba sdom med par/ /rtag tu shes rab thabs sogs kyis/ /rtag tu dga' dang bde bas 'grub/ /lte ba'i dbus nas dpa' bo ste/ /ge sar gsang ba'i spyod yul la/ /sems dang sems med sems kyi gzugs/ /

ye shes shes bya'i rang bzhin bdag /de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste/ /zab mo sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/ /A li kA li mnyam byas te/ /ri mo de la sbyar bar bya/ /ri mo steng du 'bar ba mthar/ /'og tu 'bab par byed pa'o/ /khu ba'i tshul gyis 'bab pa ste/ /

bdud rtsi'i thigs pa'i gzugs las so/ /gang gang dbang po'i lam nas ni/ /de de'i rang bzhin skye bar 'gyur/ /mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'bab/ /dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub dang / /ril bu chen po'i bsgrub pa yang / /

sgyu 'phrul chen po'i rab sbyor ba'i/ /sdom pa'i sbyor ba byed par 'gyur/ /mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang bcas/ /sgrub pa'i dbang po shes bya ba/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag pa'o/ /gang zhig shes pa'i dngos grub kyis/ /lha yi gnas

su myur bar 'gyur/ /de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste/ /lha mo bden par nga smra'o/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo khyod la ngas/ /'jig rten gsum 'grub de bshad bya/ /rnal 'byor chen mo rnams kyi ni/ /bzang po'i yi ge'i phrang ba rnams/ /gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis

ni/ /rgyu dang ni rgyu 'grub 'gyur ba'o/ /'dod pas kun la nyer spyod pa/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin bsten byas na/ /rnal 'byor pa chen rtag rol te/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor rnams 'grub/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su ni/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid ston par byed/ /de

bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal/ /dngos grub chen po ster bar 'gyur/ /bcud len rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /rtag tu sems can don byed pa'o/ /khu ba dgug dang chang dang ni/ /gong bu chen po dgug pa nyid/ /sha chen po ni bkug nas su/ /rnal 'byor ma

dang lhan cig spyod/ /tshe ring brtson 'grus chen po dang / /gzi brjid che zhing stobs chen 'gyur/ /lha yi mig dang rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /nyin re zla ba 'thung ba'o/ /de yi tshe ni 'phel 'gyur te/ /bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas/ /blta bas mi ngoms lus dang ni/ /cho

'phrul dag ni ston par byed/ /yid la bsams ma thag tu ni/ /rang gi gzugs ni yongs brjes shing / /bklags pas 'grub pa'i don yod pa/ /rig ma'i dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul che/ /rig pa 'jig rten gsum po na/ /nga yi rig dang mnyam pa med/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi

lung 'di ni/ /mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma'i rig ma chen mo las dngos grub kyi mtshan ma bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o// //de nas de las rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen mo rnams kyi sbyor ba'i dngos grub kyi 'bras bu rab tu ster ba'i

gsang ba'i yi ge bzang po bshad par bya ste/ gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis ni/ /rnal 'byor ma mchog ster 'gyur ba/ /dang po'i yi ge'i sbyor ba yis/ /rtag tu dgugs ni gtang bar bya/ /brgyad pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/ /u dang thig ler bcas pa yis/ /

rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs rngub byed/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs pa'o/ /de la brtul zhugs ma bshad de/ /phreng ba sngags dang gzung ba dang / /sbyin sreg gi ni las rnams kyang / /gcig nas gcig tu ldog par 'gyur/ /sngags dang dbyibs dang chos

bdag nyid/ /sbyor ba rnam gsum zhes bya ste/ /ye shes rnam pa gsum gyis ni/ /srid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/ /de ltar rgyun du rnal 'byor pa/ /rtag tu goms pa nyid kyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'ang / /zla ba gcig gis de 'grub

'gyur/ /dbang po'i mdog dang yang dag ldan/ /dang po'i yi ge bsgom bya ste/ /rang gi rig pa rab sbyar na/ /des 'di mod la 'gugs par 'gyur/ /yi ge gnyis pa dang ldan pa/ /bsam zhing rnam par bsgom byas na/ /sa gsum po ni

ma lus pa/ /de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang po dang / /de bzhin dbang po 'dod dbang phyug /ye shes yi ges bskul byas na/ /de dag chung mar bcas te 'gugs/ /yi ge a dang yang dag ldan/ /sku gsung thugs la legs

gnas pa/ /sbyor ba rnam gsum bsgom byas na/ /gong bu 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no/ /yi ge khe dang yang dag ldan/ /sku mdog dmar po zhal bzhi pa/ /lag na thod pa chags pa'i bdag /khu ba 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no/ /yi ge rtsi dang ldan pa yis/ /

kha dog ser po kun tu 'od/ /rta yi zhal gyi tshul byas na/ /chang 'gugs pa yi dam pa yin/ /yi ger dang yang dag ldan/ /kha dog dmar po 'od chen po/ /phyag bzhi pa dang zhal bzhi pa/ /ce spyang tshul du legs gnas pa/ /khro ba'i sems kyis bsgom byas na/ /

khrag 'gugs pa yi dam pa'o/ /yi ge drug dang yang dag ldan/ /gnas drug tu ni nges sbyar bya/ /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub/ /mig gnyis dang ni rna ba dang / /de bzhin sna dang yid nyid dag /seng ge rnal 'byor phyag

rgya yi/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bcing bar bya/ /srog dang rtsol ba bsdams nas su/ /bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar/ /'og min srid pa'i mthar thug par/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten bdun/ /thams cad kyis ni de bsgoms kyang / /de ni rtog pa ma yin no/ /gal

te thams cad rab rtogs na/ /'gro ba'i rol pa rnam par 'jig /de phyir ye shes 'di gsang zhing / /mi gsal yi ge med pa'o/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen/ /rnal 'byor gnyid dang yang dag ldan/ /gong bur song ba'i yid de yis/ /gzugs

gcig tu ni sgom par byed/ /sgo dgu las ni gang byung ba/ /rdzas kyi bdag nyid rnam bsgoms la/ /rang bzhin med pa'i blo ldan pa'i/ /rnam par mi rtog pa yis bza'/ /mthe bong dang ni srin lag gis/ /kha ru yid bzhin nor bu ni/ /bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin las byung ba'i/ /

rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma'i rig pa chen mo las sbyor ba gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig sgrub pa'i dam pa ste/ /rdzas gzhan tshogs ni bza' bya ba/ /thams cad

mkhyen pa'i 'bras ster ba'o/ /gang zhig zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /'byung po'i mi rnams 'grub 'gyur ba/ /brtan pa dang ni myur 'gro nyid/ /de bzhin du ni ba lang khyi/ /chen por yang dag ldan pa ni/ /de bzhin ye shes bdud rtsi lnga/ /tshes grangs bcu bzhi brgyad

la ni/ /lhan cig bsgos te sbyar byas nas/ /nyi ma bdun du ce spyang gi/ /dbus su gzhag la de nas bton/ /lnga po dag las yungs kar gyi/ /'bras bu'i tshad tsam ril bu bya/ /de ni rgyud 'dir gsungs mod kyi/ /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi'i bar dag tu/ /

nyi ma bdun du lhan cig min bsgom ste/ /sbyar nas ce spyang dbus su lags bzhag la/ /de las bton te lnga po dag las ni/ /dngos grub 'bras bu'i tshad tsam ril bu bya/ /'bras bu chen po rab tu rtogs pas na/ /de ni rgyud 'dir gsungs kyi kun tu sbas/ /

'bras bu chen po sangs rgyas kyis/ /thams cad du ni sbas pa'o/ /de nas sgrub thabs 'byung ba'o/ /yid kyi pad+ma bsam bya ba/ /kha dog dmar po kun 'od la/ /lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa'o/ /shar du ut+pal

sngo 'od mdog /lho ru ser po lta bu'o/ /nub tu dkar dang dmar ba'i 'od/ /byang du ma rgad 'od yin no/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa dang / /zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum ma mdzes/ /shar phyogs kyi lha mo ni spyan gsum pa phyag g.yon na kha T+wA~M ga dang

dril bu/ g.yas na rdo rje dang / thod pa bsnams pa bsam mo/ /lho phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na mdung rtse gsum pa dang / rin po che dang / ba dan dang / ce spyang bsnams pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na gzhu dang / mda' dang / sna tshogs

pad+ma dang / thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /byang phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na ral gri dang / zhags pa dang / rnge'u chung dang / thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /de yi dbus su bsam par bya/ /thod pa nyid dang kha T+wA~M ga/ /de bzhin gzhu dang mda' nyid

do/ /dang po'i sngags dang yang dag ldan/ /bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgrubs na/ /rdzas kyi dngos grub rab tu ster/ /rnal 'byor ma yi grub sbyor bas/ /'phral du yid ches yang dag 'jug /thams cad kyis ni mi mthong zhing / /

stong phrag gcig tu snang bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun las phrogs pa dang / /lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod/ /gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /nyid kyi rdo rje'i gnas bzhugs pa/ /lag tu skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang gA'i

bye snyed zhing dag kyang / /sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / /dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid gnas/ /sems kyi gar las byung ba mkhyen/ /yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba yis/ /sngags ni de ru rnam bsgom bya/ /rdo rje chu dang yang dag ldan/ /ril bu re re bza' bar bya/ /

yi ge brgyad kyi mtha' ldan pa/ /U dang thig ler bcas pa ni/ /mtha' ru yang dag sbyar byas la/ /sngags ni kun du brjod bya ste/ /gu h+ya bak+Sha a b+ha k+She hU~M zhes bya'o/ /rnal 'byor ma kun sbyor ba yis/ /dang po'i yi ge yang dag ldan/ /gal te rdo rje can gyis grub 'dod

na/ /lan bdun mngon sngags rnal 'byor pa yis bza'/ /yi ge gsum mtha' zhes bya ste/ /brgyad kyi mtha' mar legs gnas pa/ /A dang thig ler yang dag ldan/ /yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas/ /yi ge dang po sbyor ba yis/ /hrI zhes bya ba yang dag sbyar/ /

yi ge rnams kyi mthar sbyor la/ /sa bon lngas ni rab dgang bya/ /yi ge yis ni rnam bsgoms te/ /pad+ma rab tu rgyas par bya/ /ci ste rdo rje can 'grub 'dod/ /de lta'i sbyor ba kun shes bya/ /de nas 'dir rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis dgongs pa dpal rdo rje'i

gras srid pa shin tu sgrub pa blangs pa/ kye grogs po rdo rjes pad+ma kha 'byed sad mdzad ma/ /a la la ho/ bde ba chen po gar gyis rab tu mnyes mdzod cig /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i kha ni rab phye ba/ /bde ba chen po gar gyis rab tu mnyes par mdzod/ /

rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la/ /de nas 'dir glu blangs tsam gyis/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams gar/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskul/ /de ltar rtag tu gus ldan pas/ /sbyor ba'i dngos grub 'gyur ba yin/ /dus bzhir rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /'grub par

'gyur ba bsgom pa'i mchog /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing / /spos dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan/ /ji ltar sku gsum mchog ster ba'i/ /dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur/ /dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/ /'di ni rab tu snang bar byed/ /

dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas/ /sgo dgu las ni byung ba'i rdzas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba'i/ /de nyid bla na med pa 'grub/ /'dir tshigs bcad du 'gyur ba ni/ /gzugs rnams de bzhin phyag rgya mtshan ma dang / /rdzas rnams dang ni bsam gtan

rnam sgom pa'i/ /cho ga'i thabs ni sna tshogs bstan pa dang / /lha mo yid 'dod rnams ni gsungs pa'o/ /gang gi khyim du rgyud 'di gnas pa dang / rgyun du 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rnam par bsgom pa de la nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rgas

pa dang / bgegs mi 'byung la/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ rgyun du thams cad du rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyis bgags bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo rnams kyi dgongs pa mchog tu gsang ba gsang ba chen po nye bar spyod pa dang bcas

pa'i sgrub thabs te le'u gsum pa'o/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na bar dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra A ra li ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje A ra li zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsol ba btab par rig cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang mkhyen nas bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs

te/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /chu yis gdong ni bkrus nas ni/ /sman ni bza' bar byas nas su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /he ru ka ni rab bsgrub bya/ /rang gi snying gar re pha ni/ /bsreg pa'i bskal pa ltar 'bar bsgom/ /de

byung rdo rje nyi ma ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas yang dag khyab/ /de yi steng du hU~M nyid de/ /bskal pa'i me ni lta bu nyid/ /de ni rdo rjer yang bsams nas/ /rdo rje las byung he ru ka/ /bgegs ni chen po mnan nas ni/ /sku la thal bas byugs pa dang / /phyag rgya lnga dang yang

dag ldan/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /in+d+ra nIM la'i 'od lta bu/ /dbu skra ser po stobs po che/ /gar dgu'i ro dang ldan par ni/ /rol pa'i gar gyis gar mdzad cing / /ri rab ri rgyal mthon po yang / /sa yi 'og tu yang dag mnan/ /phyag tu rdo rje
