rnam bsgoms nas/ /g.yon pas skyes pa'i thod pa ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /sha lnga yang dag ldan par bsgom/ /kun+da dang ni zla ba dang / /chu skyes do shal lta bur ni/ /kha T+wA~M ga yis phrag pa brgyan/ /rdo rje A ra li las lha'i le'u ste dang po'o// //

de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rdo rje btsun mo thams cad dang / dzam b+ha la la sogs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin

thams cad dang / dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'byung po thams cad dang / dbang po la sogs pa rdo rje nam mkha' la gnas pa thams cad dang / glang po che'i rna ba la sogs pa zhing skyong ba thams cad dang / kun dar la sogs pa'i thams cad dang / de dag la

sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi chos nyan pa'i sbyor ba des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje A ra li chen po la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das gtor ma'i sngags ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bde gshegs kun gyi ston pa

yis/ /gtor ma'i las ni rab tu phye/ /phyag rgya yang ni khyad par du/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje thal mo gyen phye nas/ /o~M dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di nyid sngags ni chen po nyid/ /de bzhin du ni gtor ma'i sngags/ /las ni thams cad pa yi

sngags/ /yin pa nyid du the tshom med/ /rdo rje A ra li las gtor ma'i bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ming yang dag par rab tu phye ba/ gdong ring na ni mtho ba dang / /de bzhin dpag bsam shing nyid dang / /tshangs par spyod pa mang

ba nyid/ /dam tshig 'dir ni dngos grub byin/ /glang po rta bong glang rnga mo/ /khyi las byung ba'i mar me dang / /mar me chen po bsregs nas ni/ /tshangs spyod 'dzin pa mchod par bya/ /de nas sdom pa bka' stsal pa/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya/ /gyi

tshig kyang smra bar bya/ /khyod kyis ma byin par yang long / /gzhan gyi bud med bsten par gyis/ /ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang / /bu mo sring mo'i bu mo ni/ /thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod/ /de nas dbang bskur bka' stsal

pa/ /phyag rgya ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /dbang bskur de yi phyi nas ni/ /de nyid 'di ni rab tu dbye/ /de nyid bde ba chen po ste/ /thams cad lus la rnam par gnas/ /'di nyid ye shes chen po ste/ /

mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can/ /de nas sbyin sreg bka' stsal pa/ /khru gang tsam pa'i tshad dang ni/ /khru phyed sa la brko bar bya/ /rdul tshon dkar po ldan par ni/ /rnam par mkhas pas thab khung bya/ /gsungs pa'i sngags kyis nges par ni/ /der ni sha

sogs sbyin sreg bya/ /me ni lha yi spyan nyid de/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar

bya/ /dur khrod sol ba so phag dang / /ldong ros phye ma nyid dang yang / /ljang khu yi yang phye ma nyid/ /dkyil 'khor la ni mkhas pas bsngags/ /dbus su gsum la rdo rje bri/ /shar gyi sgo ru mgo chen po/ /lho ru rdo rje dril bu nyid/ /de bzhin nub tu dgra sta ste/ /

byang du gri gug dge ba nyid/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor du ni bri/ /chos don 'dod dang thar pa la/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni rab tu dbye/ /dkyil 'khor bzhengs par byas nas ni/ /der ni slob ma gzhug par bya/ /ras kyis gdong ni bcings nas ni/ /bkrol nas dkyil

'khor bstan par bya/ /rdo rje A ra li las las thams cad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //mngon par shes pa bka' stsal pa/ /lha yi mig dang rna ba dang / /de bzhin gzhan sems shes pa nyid/ /sngon gyi gnas rjes dran pa dang / /de bzhin rdzu 'phrul mngon

shes nyid/ /he ru ka yi dbyibs bsgoms na/ /yo gi mngon shes lnga ru 'gyur/ /shin tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /he ru kar ni ngang gis 'gyur/ /bsam gtan las ni nus skyes nas/ /phyis ni spyod pa yang dag brtsam/ /yid ni brtan nam g.yo'am

ci/ /rang gi sems ni bskul ba'i phyir/ /glu ni sna tshogs len pa dang / /de bzhin gar ni sna tshogs nyid/ /sna tshogs rim gro byed pa dang / /lus la rgyan ni sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin sna tshogs dga' ba yi/ /gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni/ /ro dang reg bya

yang dag brtsam/ /de nas las rgyas bka' stsal pa/ /re'u mig brgyad ni bris nas ni/ /rgyud kyi sngags ni rgyas par bya/ /las kyi dbye ba'i rab dbye bas/ /de bzhin zhi rgyas la sogs kyis/ /o~M ni dbang ldan la ni mer/ /de bzhin bden bral nyid du la/ /

rlung gi mtshams su hU~M nyid de/ /shar du dz+wa ni rnam par gnas/ /lho ru dz+wa yi rnam pa nyid/ /nub tu b+h+yo yi rnam pa ste/ /byang du phaT kyi rnam pa yis/ /dbus su swA hA rnam par gnas/ /ngos gsum du ni bsgrub bya'i ming / /rdo rje A ra li las spyod pa'i le'u ste bzhi

pa'o// //de nas 'khor lo bri ba bka' stsal pa/ che ge mo 'di sod cig /che ge mo 'di dbang du mdzod cig /che ge mo rengs par mdzod cig /che ge mo rmongs par mdzod cig /che ge mo ma lus par gyis shig /che ge mo lkugs par mdzod cig /che ge

mo khug cig /che ge mo skrod cig /che ge mo la sdang bar mdzod cig /che ge mo chings shig /che ge mo ma ning du mdzod cig /che ge mo sgur por mdzod cig /ces sngags kyi rkang pa 'di rnams kyi ngos gnyis su bris te/ gro ga'i 'dab mar gur gum gyis 'dri bar

bya zhing / 'di dpung ba'i rtsa bar gdags par bya'o/ /dgug pa la ni zla mtshan zags pa'i ras la rgya skyegs kyi khu bas 'dri bar bya'o/ /bsad pa la sogs pa'i las la dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / tsi tra ka'i khu ba dang / yungs mar dang / dug dang / ske tshe

dang / lan tshwa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / ka na ka'i khu ba dang / rus pa'i smyu gus so/ /dgug pa la ni skyu ru ra'i tsher mas so/ /rmongs pa la ni d+ha ru ka'i shing gis so/ /rengs pa la ni pa Ta'i smyu gus so/ /ma lus pa la ni bo de tse'i shing gi smyu gus

'dri bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i mchod pa bka' stsal pa/ bas mtha' dang ni dben pa dang / /bdag gi khyim gyi nang du yang / /lo ni bcu gsum de bzhin du/ /lo ni bcu drug bu mo dang / /nyi shu rtsa lnga ma mchod bya/ /ba dang de bzhin

ma te dang / /ste'u mo dang khyi mo dang / /bong mo de bzhin rnga mo dang / /sha ba dang ni ra ma nyid/ /phag dang ba man las byung ba/ /gzhan yang he ru ka mchod na/ /'grub pa nyid du the tshom med/ /nya dang zla ba 'pho ba yi/ /tshes ni mu stegs can gyis brtags/ /

dri ma gzhig par bya ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor pas ni myang bar bya/ /srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya/ /gyi tshig ni smra mi bya/ /ma byin par ni blang mi bya/ /pha rol bud med bsten mi bya/ /nyin par nyal zhing mtshan mo langs/ /shin tu mnyam par

bzhag pas 'dug /sha chen dang ni rus pa dang / /khrag ni chen po btung ba dang / /khu chen yang dag bza' ba dang / /de bzhin rnam snang chen po nyid/ /bram ze mo dang g.yung mo nyid/ /gar ma de bzhin btso blag ma/ /thod can ma dang ko lpags mkhan/ /

gdol pa de bzhin phyag dar ma/ /rtswa 'tshong ma dang shan ma nyid/ /de bzhin kla klo la sogs dang / /smig mkhan dang ni chang 'tshong ma/ /gzhan yang zla mtshan 'dzag pa nyid/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /sring mo las byung bu mo nyid/ /gzhan gyi bu mo

spang mi bya/ /rje'u rigs mngon dga' mi bya ste/ /bgrod bya'i bu mo rtag spangs nas/ /bgrod min mkhas pas bsten par bya/ /rdo rje A ra li las 'khrul 'khor dang / las kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas dam tshig gi bag

dbab pa bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos skal ba ngan pa la/ /bag ni dbab par mi bya zhing / /de bzhin gcer bu thod dum dang / /ral pa can ni thams cad la/ /dam tshig bag ni dbab mi bya/ /snying rje yis ni bdag nyid can/ /gal te yin na bza'

bar bya/ /grub kyang lta ba dman pa ni/ /sems can don byed skyes pa nyid/ /skal ba ngan pa zhes byar brjod/ /bram ze dam tshig rnam par sdang / /de nas slob ma'i dam tshig bka' stsal pa/ dul byed blo dang ldan pa dang / /bzod ldan dal ba

mi bslu ba/ /bla mar gus shing snying rje ldan/ /rgyud ni 'dir ni rab tu bsngags/ /de nas slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bka' stsal pa/ sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/ /snying rje ldan zhing bstan bcos mkhas/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes/ /dkyil

'khor bri ba'i las la mkhas/ /de nas thun tshod bzhi byin gyis brlab pa bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar bsgom pa'i sbyor ba des/ /dang po thun tshod byin gyis brlab/ /des ni ci srid nyi phyed na/ /nyi ma phyed na thun gsum pa/ /dus dang bral nas nam phyed

na/ /thun tshod byin brlabs rab tu grags/ /thun tshod byin brlabs rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag gi rnal 'byor ldan pas 'grub/ /de nas bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /phrag dog dang ni ser sna nyid/ /

bcom ldan he ru ka la med/ /yod na rnam par dag pa nyid/ /de nas dam tshig bsgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ bgegs dang btsugs pa'i shing la'am/ /ljon shing btags shing 'phyang ba dang / /g.yul du mtshon gyis bsnun pa nyid/ /bdag nyid rnal

'byor ldan pas bsgrub/ /de nas nang du mdzad pa bka' stsal pa/ btung ba rin po che yi chu/ /gang zhig bza' de don yod nyid/ /khrus ni dpag med rdo rje yis/ /dril sogs rim pa rnam snang mdzad/ /dam tshig chos kyi de bzhin spyad/ /btso ni

gang zag mnyam pas ni/ /dam tshig ro ni 'di yis ni/ /gang zhig glu yi rang bzhin nyid/ /mkha' 'gro thams cad btsun mo ste/ /bu ni 'jam dpal la sogs pa/ /khro bo yi ni bsnyen bkur ba/ /bdag nyid he ru ka ru 'gyur/ /brjod pa bzlas pa

yang dag bshad/ /yan lag nyed sogs phyag rgya ste/ /lha yi rnal 'byor dmigs nas ni/ /gang zhig thams cad du ni gnas/ /mang du brjod pa ci zhig bya/ /gang zhig 'jig rten bya gnas pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas thob phyir/ /

rnam par bzlog pas bya ba nyid/ /shor sogs bya ba ni/ /'jig rten du ni mi shes pas/ /mchog tu rab tu bsngags 'gyur ba/ /rnam dag dag pa dam pa ni/ /de nyid thob pas rab tu spyod/ /de nas sdom pa bka' stsal pa/ /rdo rje dril bu

gzung bya zhing / /bdud rtsi mkhas pas bza' bar bya/ /rang gi phyag rgya rtag bsten cing / /spyod pa 'da' ba nyid mi bya/ /de nas lha'i mchod pa bka' stsal pa/ chu klung tshal gyi gnas su ni/ /bdag nyid lha ni mchod par bya/ /bdag gi sngags ni

brjod par bya/ /me tog la sogs byin gyis brlab/ /rdo rje A ra li las las sna tshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms kyi lhung bzed bka' stsal pa/ mkhas pas phru ba chag par ni/ /rigs bzhi

ru ni slong mos rgyu/ /chu bo'i 'gram du bza' bya zhing / /gtsang sbra nyid ni rab tu dbye/ /byi la'i rkang pa tsam gyi ni/ /kham ni blo dang ldan pas blang / /phye btab bza' bar mi bya zhing / /mi ster ba la rtag tu blangs/ /g.yas su rab mos skye bo ni/ /

g.yon nas bskor ba ru ni bya/ /nges pa med par khyim du gnas/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /rdo rje shing gi stongs byas dang / /de bzhin dril bu shing gi bdag /he ru ka ni rab grub phyir/ /bzung nas rtag tu rgyu bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje

gnod sbyin mo'i bsgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ ser skya'i phru ma blangs nas ni/ /sngags ni 'di ni bzla bar bya/ /bsrung bar byas shing bskams byas nas/ /de la gu gul bsre bar bya/ /mkhas pas gnod sbyin mo sngon du/ /des ni bdug pa

sbyin par bya/ /shin tu mdzes shing gos mdzes pa/ /bris skur gnas pa legs grub phyir/ /'di nyid kyi ni cho ga yis/ /gnod sbyin mo ni dgug par bya/ /bris sku nyid ni gnod sbyin mo/ /snga bar byin nas 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de yi rgyan rnams

thams cad ni/ /gang zhig cung zad rgyan rnams kun/ /snga ba ru ni blang bar bya/ /gal te 'dod na mtshan mo la/ /me tog gis ni mchod par bya/ /de nas rdo rje ro langs kyi bsgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ ma chad rma med gang ba ni/ /legs par brtul zhugs

can gyis bkru/ /mar khu chen pos byug pa dang / /bdug pa chen pos bdug par bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar phyogs su/ /mar khu chen po'i mar me dbul/ /nga yis khyod la ci gsungs pa'i/ /de la dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya/ /yungs kar ro

la brdeg bya zhing / /sgra ni ri bor yang dag brjod/ /de la mkhas pas 'jigs mi bya/ /o~M dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hU~M brjod par bya'o/ /des ni ci zhig sbyin zhes smra/ /sgrub pos de la blang bar bya/ /rkang byug dang ni mig sman nyid/ /ral gri dang ni sa 'og dang / /

ril bu mkha' la spyod pa nyid/ /thams cad sbyin par the tshom med/ /de nas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ gong gi bsam gtan byas nas ni/ /de la sngags ni bzla bar bya/ /rang gis he ru ka yi ni/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni bdag nyid du/ /

tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur/ /gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs dang / /zhi zhing dge ba'i gnas su ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bza' bar bya/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du/ /dpal ldan he ru ka yi ni/ /A ra li zhes bya ba'i

mtshan/ /za ba na ni gtam smra bya/ /ri yi rgyal po'i mgor gnas pa/ /tshogs kyis dag pa'i sems kyis bskor/ /de yang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'grub 'gyur gang phyir 'di nyid du/ /mchod pas grub par shes mi 'gyur/ /de yi
btsun mo bsrung ba ni/ /gshin rje mthar byed du ni 'gyur/ /shes rab mthar byed dpung gi mgon/ /pad+ma mthar byed sku bsrung bdag /de yi bgegs kyi mthar byed ni/ /dmag dpon du ni brjod pa yin/ /'dod

pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ /de yi gshed ma'i bdag po nyid/ /dpal ldan dbyig pa sngon po ni/ /sgo srung ba yi bdag po nyid/ /thams cad la ni dbang byed pa/ /zhar ba mi g.yo mgon po nyid/ /yi ge pa yi bdag po ni/ /de bzhin du

ni stobs po che/ /rdo rje A ra li las dngos grub bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa thams cad gtam 'di thos nas srid pa'i sbyor ba kun tu bcad cing rnam par dag par gyur pa dang / /

sdig pa zad cing nyon mongs pa bsregs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rdo rje A ra li brtson che/ /sna tshogs e ma rmad byung ba/ /gang zhig bdag cag nyon mongs khebs/ /gang zhig bdag

cag grub 'gyur ba/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams rkang gnyis kyi mchog dam pa zob nas sangs rgyas kyi rol ba ston par byed do/ /la lar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdzad/ /kha cig tu ni dka' thub spyod/ /lha las babs pa'i sprul

pa dang / /de bzhin khab nas 'byung ba dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /kha cig tu ni rab byung byed/ /'dul bar ston par byed pa dang / /mngon pa'i sems ni lhag pa'i sems/ /la lar sngags kyi bdag nyid 'chang / /kha cig

pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /kha cig bye brag smra ba'i lam/ /kha cig tu ni mdo sde pa/ /kha cig tu ni rnam shes nyid/ /kha cig tu ni dbu ma nyid/ /la lar dmyal ba chen por 'gro/ /la lar sems can rjes su skyong / /sems can

'dul ba la bltas nas/ /snying rje'i bsam pas rol par bya/ /rdo rje A ra li las phan yon gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gang yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis las rnam par 'byed

pa bstan par bya'o/ /gang zhig rgyud gang du dam tshig byed pa des ni 'jig rten gsum po kun gyis bstod par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig rgyud de yis gang gi tshe byed pa de ni srid par mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig glu yis mchod byed na/ /des ni rtag tu

sgra snyan 'gyur/ /gang phyir gang zhig mar me 'bul/ /de ni mig dang ldan par 'gyur/ /gang zhig gar gyis mchod byed pa/ /de ni rig 'dzin chen por 'gyur/ /gang zhig phyag 'tshal byed pa ni/ /de la skye bo phyag 'tshal 'gyur/ /gang

zhig dri zhim 'bul ba ni/ /lus ni dri zhim ldan par 'gyur/ /gang zhig phreng ba bzang 'bul ba/ /de ni gser gyi phreng ldan 'gyur/ /gang zhig gos ni 'bul ba ni/ /des ni lha yi gos rnyed 'gyur/ /gang zhig mtshan tsam 'don pa dang / /

dad pa tsam yang rab byed pa/ /lhag par mos pa rab tu byed/ /gang zhig skye bo mchod byed pa/ /de rnams thams cad rnam dag pa'i/ /srid pa'i longs spyod rab tu bzang / /rdo rje A ra li las yon tan rjes su bsngags pa'i le'u ste dgu

pa'o// //de nas yang gang zhig de ltar rnam par dag pa'i sbyin pa byin pas de rkang gnyis kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dga' bas the tshom skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te nye bar 'dug ste

zhus pa/ ji lta bu yi rnal 'byor bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sbyin pa mtha' gsum yongs dag pa/ /he ru ka ni bsgom par bya/ /sbyin pa yang ni he ru ka /gang la sbyin pa'ang de lta bu/ /sbyin pa 'di ni rab tu bsngags/ /

sbyin pa 'di ni dpe tsam ste/ /tshul khrims la sogs 'di ltar spyad/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje A ra li las de skad ces gsungs so/ /rdo rje A ra li las rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa rdzogs

so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA ya s+tha pa ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ ri gi A ra li tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/

ri gi A ra li'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gi rnam pa'i e ba~M sdom pa la bzhugs so/ /gnyis med gnyis kyi rnal

'byor gyi/ /A ra li dang ri gir brtags/ /ri gi rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso/ /de la A ra lis zhus pa/ /gnas kyi rnam pa du zhig lags/ /nye gnas rnam pa du ru 'gyur/ /de la zhing gi rnam pa du/ /nye zhing rnam pa du ru gsungs/ /

ts+tshan+do rnam pa du ru brjod/ /nye ba'i ts+tshan+do rnam pa du/ /de la 'du ba gang zhig lags/ /de bzhin nye ba'i 'du ba ci/ /de la dur khrod rnam pa du/ /nye ba'i dur khrod ji ltar lags/ /de la lha mo ri gi che/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor cher

gnas pas/ /A ra li dang bder go bar/ /sa bcu rnams ni rab tu phye/ /gnas ni shar gyi lus 'phags so/ /de bzhin du ni ba lang spyod/ /gnas ni byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /gnas ni de bzhin 'dzam bu gling / /gling bzhir

lha mo bzhi dang ni/ /ri rab spyi bor ri gi bzhugs/ /A ra li dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /gnyis kyis mnyam sbyor gnyis med las/ /si sa'i 'dod pa'i lcug ma dang / /bde chen de bzhin sdom pa ma/ /ljang khu ser mo btsod mdog

dang / /dmar mo ru ni yongs su grags/ /zhal gcig ma ni phyag gnyis dang / /g.yas na chu gri 'dzin ma ste/ /g.yon na rnal 'byor lhung bzed nyid/ /gcer bu mgo skyes grol ba'o/ /A ra li yi sku mdog gnag /spyan gsum phyag

drug A ra li/ /ri gi sngon mo spyan gsum ma/ /phyag gnyis zhags pa lcags kyu 'phyar/ /rdo rje ra li'i phyag gnyis kyis/ /ri gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'khyud/ /g.yas kyi phyag gnyis dag tu ni/ /rdo rje dang ni cang te'u brtags/ /gzhan dag tu ni dgra sta dang / /

thod par mgo bo 'dzin pa nyid/ /gnas ni sems dang nye ba'i gnas/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /'dir yang lha mo rnam pa bzhi/ /kha dog dbye ba gong ma bzhin/ /mi bzad rnon po sgyu ma che/ /mthon po gsung gi 'khor lo la'o/ /shar sgo de bzhin du ni zhing / /

nye ba'i zhing ni lho ru 'gyur/ /ts+tshan+do ha ni nub kyi sgo/ /nye ba'i ts+tshan+do ha ni byang / /wa dang ma he nyid dang ni/ /rta mgrin glang po'i rgyal mtshan nyid/ /'di rnams sgo dang sgo ru ni/ /kha dog dbye ba gong ma bzhin/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i mtshams rnams ni/ /'du ba nye ba'i 'du ba

nyid/ /sku yi 'khor lo'i mtshams su ni/ /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod nyid/ /sku gsung 'khor lo'i mtshams su ni/ /dmyal ba dag ni rtag tu bri/ /sku la grang ba'i dngos po bzhi/ /gsung la de bzhin tsha ba bzhi/ /ri gi A ra li'i sbyor ba ste le'u dang po'o// //lha mo ri gi snying

rje che/ /A ra li ni nyid kyis zhus/ /ji ltar 'khor lo'i mtshams brgyad du/ /dmyal ba brgyad ni rnam par bsgom/ /ri gis bka' stsal pa/ ji snyed pa yi sems can gyi bsdu bas bsdus pa sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal las skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes

pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs med pa can nam/ 'du shes can dang / 'du shes med pa can de thams cad A ra li dmyal bar 'tshed par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams gdon pa'i blos e ba~M rnam par bzhugs par bya'o/ /

stong pa nyid ni bsgoms nas ni/ /hU~M ni snying gar bsgom par bya/ /hU~M las sna tshogs rigs bdag yin/ /rdo rje las ni A ra li/ /'byung ba nyid du 'gyur ba nyid/ /mang du brjod pas ci zhig bya/ /e ba~M rnam pa ches gsang bar/ /sangs

rgyas rin chen ga ba tser ni/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'gyur/ /oM A ra li ri gi phe~M phe~M phe~M b+h+yo swA hA/ char dbab pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /sa yi bdag po blangs nas ni/ /nor rgyas bu ni mkhas pas bya/ /thod pa sbyar mar bzhag nas ni/ /ba yi 'o mas dgang

bar bar bya'o/ de yi sbyor bas bkang nas ni/ /nges par srad du nag pos dkri/ /chu yi 'gram du rang song ste/ /ri gi A ra li sbyor bas/ /sngags pas sngags ni khri bzlas na/ /klu ni 'khrugs pas char ba 'bebs/ /rmi lam gyi las bshad par bya ste/ /rnal 'byor bdag gi

mal 'og tu/ /da du ra yi khu ba dang / /dur khrod sol ba bsres pa dang / /'ug pa'i sgro rtsa'i smyu gu yis/ /ro dkris dmar po'i gos la ni/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni rang gis bri/ /de la rnal 'byor ma 'dug nas/ /A ra li ni khri ru bzlas/ /o~M A ra li ri gi phe~M/ a mu ki ke/

ma me da~M swa b+na~M dar+sha ya b+h+yo/ swA hA/ /brag dgug pa bshad par bya ste/ rna tshol brtag par byas nas ni/ /gong bu mdun du dgod par bya/ /ri gi A ra li'i sbyor bas/ /dbugs kyi gong bu dgag par bya/ /khab kyi phyag rgya mchu byas nas/ /dang po lce yi byed pa pos/ /ji ltar

tsha ba'i gong bu bzhin/ /shes rab can gyis sbrang chen dgug /khab kyi phyag rgya gnyis pa ni/ /mgrin skras dal gyis yongs su gzir/ /'jug pa'i las yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya ste/ ji ltar sbyor ba'i gzugs bltas nas/ /bdag nyid ri gi yi gzugs su/ /

ri gi A ra li'i sbyor bas/ /mgo ni 'og tu rnam par bsgom/ /o~M badzra A ra li phaT ya to ta ya pha~M pha~M swA hA/ rengs par byed pa bshad par bya ste/ dgra bo nyid kyi lce la ni/ /bu ram gong bu bsgom par bya/ /o~M ri gi g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ta sha hU~M phaT/ 'khru ba rab tu bshad par

bya ste/ dgra bo'i dri mas gzugs brnyan bya/ /de yi skra yis dkri bar bya/ /tsha ba gsum gyis kha bkang nas/ /gzugs brnyan kha ru gzhag par bya/ /o~M A ra li ma me a mu ka~M ka~M ka~M sa ra ya phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ dbang du bya ba la/ bdag gi g.yon pa'i mig tu ni/ /

e ba~M rnam par bsgom par bya/ /de yi g.yas pa'i mig tu ni/ /rdo rje 'phro ba'i rnam pa bsgom/ /de dag 'dus pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /ri gi A ra lis sbyor bas/ /mdzes ma dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bsrung bar bya ba dang / /gnas ni sbyang ba nyid dang yang / /ye shes

'khor lo gzhug pa dang / /thugs sogs byin gyis brlab pa dang / /yan lag dgod par bya ba dang / /de bzhin lha yi dbang bskur dang / /lha mo rnams kyi sngags 'byung ba/ /A ra lis ni rtag tu bya/ /o~M dang AHhU~M byin gyis brlab/ /de nyid gsum ni rigs gsum

'byung / /byin brlabs las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /las rnams thams cad rab sbyin dge/ /snying dbus rang gi sa bon gyi/ /lcags kyus A ra li phyung nas/ /ye shes 'khor lo dgug par bya/ /bkug nas dam por bcing bar bya/ /dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su toSh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu

rak+to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha e h+ye hi b+ha ga ban ti ri swA hA/ spyi bo snying dang de bzhin mgrin/ /lte ba gsang ba'i gnas su ni/ /zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /dam po la sogs bcing bar bya/ /ha ha hi hi de bzhin du/ /hu hu ho ho de bzhin te/ /lus kyi gnas ni

brgyad rnams su/ /yan lag dgod par bya ba nyid/ /spyi bo mchan khung lte ba dang / /kha dang de bzhin mig gnyis dang / /rkang mthil gsang ba nyid du ni/ /yan lag dgod par rab tu grags/ /sngags ni rim pa yis ni mtshon/ /lag pa ba spu'i khung kun nas/ /ri gi'i 'od

zer spro bar bya/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgya rab sbyor ba'i/ /yang ni phyis ni bsdu bar bya/ /ri gi hU~M sa~M ka~M ma~M sa~M nyid/ /thugs kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags/ /g+ha~M tA~M ma~M yu~M zhes bya ba/ /gsung gi 'khor lor grags pa'o/ /dza~M ma~M hA~M ka~M a~M nyid ni/ /sku yi 'khor lor rab tu grags/ /

ri gi sngags kyi gdon pa ni/ /rim pa yis ni mtshon par bya/ /rang gi snying las 'od zer byung / /lcags kyu'i phyag rgyar rab sbyor bas/ /phyogs bcur rnam par bzhugs pa yi/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des bkug nas/ /cho gas 'dod pas mchod nas ni/ /dbang ni blo dang

ldan pas blang / /o~M sarba ta thA ga ta DA kin+yA nu ga ta ma hA a b+hi She kA nu d+ha nu zhes/ bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyi/ /des ni lha rnams dbang bskur bya/ /lha yi dbang las bde ba nyid/ /o~M sarba ta thA ga ta DA kin+yA b+hi Shi ka badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko\u0f85haM/ gru gsum me yi sa

bon gyis/ /snang byed rnam par bsgom par bya/ /snying gar hU~M las rigs bdag nyid/ /de nyid kyi ni de ru 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje las byung kun/ /rdo rje gur dang ra ba nyid/ /ri gi A ra li gnas su/ /bdag nyid rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /dmyal ba brgyad ni thod pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'phar ma

gsum gnas pa'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/ /'khor lo g.yas su bskor ba yin/ /zhabs g.yon brkyang ba'i A ra li/ /sems kyis 'jigs byed mnan nas ni/ /ri gi shing la mngon zhon pa/ /zhabs la zhabs kyis bskor ba bya/ /rnal 'byor ma kun thod par gnas/ /gar gyi

rkang pas phyogs su gnas/ /tsha dang grang ba'i rab dbye bas/ /mtshams su thod pa brgyad po yin/ /las thams cad rab tu bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //ri gi A ra lis zhus ba/ /brda yi rnam pa du zhig lags/ /de la lha mo ri gi chos/ /brda ni yang

dga' rab tu phye/ /brda ni chen po ts+tsho ma bcu/ /bdag nyid sngon du byed pa nyid/ /gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /sgrub po dngos grub thob 'dod na/ /gnas ni dpral ba'i rgyab tu 'dod/ /ngos ni nye ba'i gnas nyid do/ /pus mo ts+tshan+dor 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dpral bar nye ba'i ts+tshan+do nyid/ /lag

pa g.yas pa 'du ba nyid/ /g.yon pa nye ba'i 'du ba nyid/ /rna ba g.yas pa dur khrod gnas/ /g.yon pa nye ba'i dur khrod do/ /snying ni zhing du yang dag 'gyur/ /lhag ma nye ba'i zhing nyid dang / /tshong rdal nyams dga' tshong 'dus dang / /ma mo'i khyim du rtag tu blta/ /brda yi rnam par shes par

bya/ /rang gi mtshan ma rang gis ston/ /ril bu mig sman la sogs pa/ /mchog ni rab tu smin par 'gyur/ /A ra li yis lha mor zhus/ /ye shes dam pa ji ltar lags/ /gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /sgrub po dngos grub thob 'gyur ba/ /'bras phyir byang chub thob 'gyur ba'i/ /ting

'dzin lha mo ri gi ste/ /mchog tu bde ba chen po nyid/ /srub dang srub byed las byung ba/ /kun mkhyen ye shes yang dag 'byung / /sems pa thams cad yongs su spangs/ /dbang po thams cad bzlog par bya/ /dgon pa dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /gnyis gnyis thams cad rnam par

spangs/ /mig dag steng du bzlog nas ni/ /smin ma'i dbus su sems byas na/ /mi zad mun pa'i gzugs su ni/ /sgrub pos dang po mthong bar 'gyur/ /phyis ni rna ba g.yon par bcug /dal gyis dal gyis 'gul bar 'gyur/ /yan lag can gyi bde ba gang / /de bzhin phyag rgya

chen po bde/ /phyi yi phyag rgya ngang gis 'jig /de yis ye shes kyang ni 'jig /bde ba chen po rtags pa'i phyir/ /de yi ye shes phyag rgya ba/ /'di nyid ye shes chen po nyid/ /rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin can/ /gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta bar/ /gzhan du brjod par mi nus so/ /lhan cig

skyes pa'i rnal 'byor 'di/ /sems can gsol 'debs sems kyis ni/ /sems can kun la snying rje yis/ /'di ni rnal 'byor gtso bo nyid/ /'di la goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /snying rje mthu chen rnal 'byor bas/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la

the tshom med/ /dang por mun pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /gnyis pa dkar dang du ba 'thul/ /gsum pa me khyer rnam pa ltar/ /bzhi pa ya pa'i me tog bzhin/ /lnga pa sprin med ye shes ni/ /rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs/ /sprin med nam mkha' lta bu ni/ /de yod thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu/ /

rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rtse gcig sems kyis ri gir 'gyur/ /ye shes bdud rtsi rtag 'thungs pas/ /bkres pas zil gyis mi non cing / /skom pa yis kyang zil mi non/ /rga dang na bas gzir mi 'gyur/ /'di yi thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /ri gi thams cad rig par 'gyur/ /

de nas rnal 'byor pa chen po/ /A ra li ni nyid kyis ni/ /dam du 'khyud par 'o mdzad pas/ /ri gi la ni gus pas zhus/ /e pa~M ma yA ci zhig bshad/ /e yi rnam pas sa ru bshad/ /ba~M gi rnam pa de bzhin chu/ /ma ni me zhes bya bar brjod/ /yA yi rnam pa rlung du gsungs/ /

ri gi sdom pa ci zhig bshad/ /ri gis bka' stsal pa/ ri gi mkha' 'gro mar ni gsung / /sdom pa dam par gyur pa 'di/ /ri gi e ba~M sdom pa ni/ /e ba~M rnam pa rna bar gnas/ /ri gi sna yi rtse mor ni/ /rtag tu ri gi bzhugs pa yi/ /ye shes dam pa 'di nyid ni/ /

kun mkhyen ye shes de yi bdag /'byung ba chen po bzhi gtan la dbab pa dang brda'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor chen po yis/ /A ra li ni nyid kyis ni/ /rang bzhin mdzes pa nyid la zhus/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i/ /khrag ni ji

ltar dgug par bgyi/ /ri gis bka' stsal pa/ nus la sogs pas mdun du ni/ /ya pa'i me tog bzhag nas ni/ /rang gi khrag ni dgug par bya/ /ri gi nyon cig goms pa yi/ /nas ni nyi shu kha smad 'byung / /phyi nas khrag ni 'gugs par byed/ /lha ni dral ba

bshad par bya/ /spyi bor 'bar ba bsam par bya/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab nas ni/ /der ni sngags ni bzlas par bya/ /o~M he ru ka pa ta~M phi pa tA ya/ /ri gi A ra li'i sbyor bas/ /lha la phyag byas 'gag par 'gyur/ /A li kA li yan lag mnyam/ /'di dag gnyis

dbus rang sa bon/ /rang gi sa bon nyid kyis ni/ /rang gi phyag rgya rnams yin te/ /phyag rgya las ni lha rnams 'byung / /o~M shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ lcags kyu phyag rgya lag gnyis kyis/ /mthe chung phan tshun lcags kyu'i tshul/ /dbu ma yi ni sor mo gnyis/ /mthe bong rgan pos

gzir bar bya/ /sdigs mdzub gnyis kyi zhags pa nyid/ /rdo rje ral gri zhags chen po/ /chos kyi ye shes gang zhig gzhan/ /ri gi nyid du rab tu grags/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yis ni/ /si si la sogs rab tu grags/ /mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi yin te/ /mi

bzar la sogs rab tu grags/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yis ni/ /wa la sogs pa rab tu grags/ /phyag drug 'gro ba drug tu gsungs/ /spyan gsum srid pa gsum du brjod/ /'jigs byed bdag gi sems nyid de/ /zhabs kyi rtsa bar bsgyel ba nyid/ /dga' ba la

sogs sa bcu ni/ /gnas sogs yang dag rab tu grags/ /pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya drug /thod pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /e ba~M ma yA'i dbus gnas pa'o/ /bdag nyid kyis ni de ltar bsam/ /'chol ba kun gyi mtshan nyid kyis/ /thams cad rgyud

du yang dag gnas/ /gri gug ma rig gcod pa nyid/ /thod pa nyid ni snying rje che/ /ri gi A ra li yi sgra/ /cang te'u hU~M he'i sngags bzlas pas/ /dgra ste chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod/ /rdo rje rdo rjer rab tu grags/ /mgo bor nyon mongs pa yi bdud/ /thod pa

nam mkha' dag pa nyid/ /lcags kyu ri gi ze 'bru ste/ /de bzhin zhags pa dag pa nyid/ /ngang gi dag pa bsdus nas ni/ /lus ni mchod rten dag pa ste/ /skyil krung gdan du shes par bya/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi snying por gsungs/ /gnyer ma gsum

brtag lte ba nyid/ /lto ba yang ni gzugs su 'gyur/ /mgrin pa yang ni mgrin par brjod/ /kha khyer mgo bor shes par bya/ /spyi bo gdugs kyi phreng bar brjod/ /mig gnyis zla ba nyi ma nyid/ /'phan ni mgo las skyes pa yin/ /rus pa bde bar gshegs

pa'i gdung / /de phyir rang byin rlob par 'gyur/ /de phyir sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lus/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu mchod/ /rang gi ngo bo sangs rgyas su bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //rgyal po chen po zas gtsang 'di/ /A ra lis ni yang dag

phye/ /de la ri gi sgyu ma che/ /'gro ba thams cad shes rab dag /don grub rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /lha mo sa 'tsho phyag rgya'o/ /sgra gcan bzang po'i bde ba che/ /sgyu ma'i gzugs kyi spros pa las/ /sgyu ma chen pos 'tsho nyid/ /rdo rje sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul bas/ /

don grub lhan cig skyes dga' nyid/ /sras ni bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /yab ni rdo rje 'chang bar grags/ /yum ni sgyu ma chen mo yin/ /de nyid phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /mthe bong rgan po rdo rje yin/ /lte ba chos kyi 'byung gnas gsungs/ /sgyu ma chen po'i rnam 'phrul bas/ /don grub nyid ni

gzi brjid can/ /ngo bos 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid/ /lha mo ri gi nga tshig nyon/ /las la spyod pa rab brtags pas/ /lus can rnams ni rtag tu gdungs/ /dga' ba yang ni shi shir gsungs/ /mchog tu dga' ba 'dod pa ma/ /dga' bral dga' ba bde chen ma/ /lhan cig skyes dga' sdom pa

ma/ /mi bzang ma ni 'o ru gsungs/ /rnon mo yang ni 'khyud mo nyid/ /sgyu ma skyed la sgyu ma che/ /mthe bo mchu ni 'jib pa nyid/ /dga' ba'i rtsod pa wa nyid de/ /sbrang rtsi btung bas ma he nyid/ /rtog pa yis ni rta mgrin te/ /'o byed glang po'i rgyal mtshan no/ /rdo rje ra li 'dod

chen can/ /'dod pa ma ni ri gir brjod/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam par khyab/ /si si rnam pas dmyal ba bzhi/ /de bzhin ha yi rnam pa bzhi/ /'khor bar ji ltar spyad pa ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa mi 'gal lo/ /rdo rje A ra

li nyid ni/ /khu bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /ri gi bde ba chen por gsungs/ /ri gi A ra li sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sgyu ma zhes byar brjod/ /bud med sgyu ma'i spros pa yis/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam par rmongs/ /bud med sgyu ma sangs rgyas nyid/ /sgyu ma thams cad spel bar byed/ /snying po'i

sngags ni/ o~M A ra lI b+h+yo b+h+yo ha ha ha ha/ si si si si mi gsal bar bzlas so/ /gnyis kyi nye ba'i snying po ni/ /ha ha ha/ las rgyas pa la sngags gang ni/ /de yi sngags su rab tu bsngags/ /snying po yi ni sngags yin no/ /nye ba'i sngags kyis bskul ba yin/ /bsgom pa bde chen myang ba ste/ /de

bzhin dam tshig mchod pa nyid/ /thams cad kyi ni dam tshig la/ /mi las skyes pa rab tu bsngags/ /klu gzir gnyis 'thung dam tshig ste/ /rmi lam rta ni rab tu bsngags/ /bsad la ma he dam tshig go/ /dbang la khyi ni rab tu bsngags/ /khrag dgug pa la dam tshig

ste/ /'jug pa de bzhin rnga mo nyid/ /rengs pa la ni ne'u'i sha/ /kha na ma tho med rnyed pa/ /gal te bsad par byas na ni/ /de tshe rnal 'byor pas mi 'grub/ /sems can bskyab sems rnal 'byor pa/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /dkyil 'khor khru ni bzhi pa bya/ /

sgo la sor ni bzhi pa ste/ /sgo khyud sor ni gnyis su gsungs/ /lo gsal yang ni sor gnyis yang / /sgo khyud kyi ni kha khyer la/ /sor ni bcu gnyis dag tu gsungs/ /lha yi snam bu sor gnyis te/ /rta babs sor ni bcu drug nyid/ /sgo las sor mo gnyis

kyis ni/ /rdo rje phreng ba de bzhin bya/ /dkyil 'khor snying po zlum po ste/ /phyogs bzhi kha dog bzhi dang ldan/ /kha dog lnga yi rdul tshon nyid/ /srad bu lnga zhes bya bar brjod/ /gser dang yang na dngul nyid dang / /mu tig dang ni byi ru drang / /mu men yang dag bsres nas ni/ /

rin chen lnga ni shin tu gzhug /lha yi grangs kyi bum pa nyid/ /rnam rgyal bum pa ches che ba/ /bum pa dkri ba nyid du ni/ /sgrub pa po ni dam pas bya/ /dang por sa ni yongs dag bya/ /gnyis par thig sogs gdab pa dang / /lnga pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / /de bzhin lnga par sbyin sreg nyid/ /'jig

rten skyong ba dbang po dang / /lha mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni bzhengs par bgyi/ /'od srung ma yis bgegs med mdzod/ /ji ltar bdag nyid nags de bzhin/ /rtag pa nyid du gtor ma sbyin/ /mtshan mo thun gcig gnas pa ni/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya/ /gtor

ma'i sngags ni/ o~M sharga ti ka sa ne nA kA ro mu khaM sarbA d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nut+pan+na twA ta/ sa ni yongs su gzung dus su/ /bgegs ni skrod par byed pa'i sngags/ /o~M a na sa ta na na Ta stiSh+Tha ya ma bA ru na ku be ra ka swA tsA s+tha Ne Shu tiSh+Ta d+ha~M rak+ShaM ku ru ta me pi ra tra~M/ cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang nges pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //

ri gi A ra li'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA ya s+tha pa ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsa tur+pI Tha ma hA yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dra ba sdom/ /

ye shes stong pa can dbang phyug /gnas gtsang ma na bzhugs nas su/ /thams cad mkhyen pas 'di skad gsungs/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan can dang / mi sdug pa dang / 'phyang ba dang / mgrin pa gsum pa can dang / ri rab dang ri rab gtsug tong dang / pad+ma can dang / pad+ma yangs

pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nang nas phyag na rdo rje la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu 'dir phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/

lag pa thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gsang ba sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid rnams/ /ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal/ /sa dang nam mkha' ji ltar lags/ /chu dang me ni ji lta bu/ /'byung dang 'jug pa'i dbugs dag gis/ /bsam gtan ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ /

yul 'khor skyong ba dang po'i lha/ /dkyil 'khor dag na ji ltar lags/ /ye shes rnam shes lus kyi ni/ /las la sogs pa ji ltar sbyor/ /'khor ba las sgrol mtshan nyid kyi/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /dbugs kyi yas la sogs thams cad/ /ye shes can gyi las

su sbyar/ /nyi khri dang ni chig stong dang / /drug brgya ru ni brtsi bar bya/ /chu tshod drug cu'i dbugs rnams kyis/ /nyin mtshan du ni grags pa yin/ /'byung dang 'jug pa'i dbugs rnams ni/ /'byung ba'i grangs kyis brtsi bar bya/ /blo dang ldan pas dbugs gnyis ni/ /'jug

pa 'byung la thim par bya/ /de bzhin sa ni bcu gnyis la/ /phyi rol mtshan ma bzhag bya ste/ /tshes grangs mtshan ma ji bzhin du/ /re mig bcu gnyis rnams su gzhag /ga rim bcu gnyis rab brtson pas/ /shar nas dpyid zla 'bring sogs gzhag /ro hi ta dang

mo hi ta/ /de bzhin b+ha drA br-iSha b+ha/ /kurma ma ka ra raN+Da dang / /mi ki ra de bzhin bi tri ka/ /byA ku swap+na ka ma nA/ /kA ma sa dang bcu dang gnyis/ /'di dag shar sogs re mig la/ /bzhin du dgod par bya/ /ro hi ta la btsas pa'i bu/ /skal ba bzang la de bzhin

phyug /gdug pa'i sems la nad bu can/ /rtag tu mtha' 'khob gtso bo ste/ /'khrig pa la ni rtag tu dga'/ /thams cad du ni snyan par smra/ /ro hi ta la lha mchod cing / /de bzhin tshe lo bdun cu thub/ /ro hi ta la nor btang na/ /mdza' bo thams cad ldog par 'gyur/ /

ro hi ta la lus rmas na/ /dpal dang kun tu phrad par 'gyur/ /ro hi ta la gnas brten na/ /grogs dang nor gyis rgyas par 'gyur/ /ro hi ta la mgron zhugs na/ /bsam pa thams cad mngon par 'grub/ /bag ma blang dang me yi las/ /zhi ba'i las ni sbyar bar bya/ /mo

hi ta yi don sbyor ba/ /bgrang ba nyid kyis shes par bya/ /mo hi ta la btsas pa'i bu/ /tshe ni drug cu rtsa lngar grags/ /mang du za zhing sems chung la/ /'khrig pa la ni rtag tu dga'/ /rtag tu gdug cing ca cor ldan/ /mi snyan pa dag smra la dga'/ /khro la nga rgyal snying

stobs med/ /sdig pa byed cing ngang tshul ngan/ /'khyal ba dang ni tshig rtsub smra/ /mtshon gyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /yang na tshe lo brgyad cu ni/ /rtsa bzhi dag tu rab tu grags/ /rung ba'i sa ni spong byed cing / /mi rung ba la brtson par 'gyur/ /lus kyi yan

lag rmas na ni/ /'chi bdag dang ni phrad par 'gyur/ /gal te cung zad nor gtong na/ /btang ba slar ni mi ldog go/ /b+ta drA la ni skyes pa'i bu/ /kha zas bzang po zab dang / /bzang po'i las ni byed 'gyur zhing / /lo brgya ru ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /dbul la chos ni spyod

pa dang / /bden par smra zhing snyan par brjod/ /chung ma gcig gis tshim pa'i lus/ /bzang por smra ba'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /bzo rnams kun dang dus tshod rig /rtag tu rang gi gnyen dang mdza'/ /chad pa gcod pa'i rigs can te/ /de bzhin lus ni chu ru 'chi/ /br-i

Sha b+ha la skyes ba'i bu/ /brtson 'grus ldan zhing dgra la dpa'/ /sgeg dang nor gyis phyug pa ste/ /chung ma mang du len par 'gyur/ /rtag tu gnyen ni mang ba ste/ /pha yi srog ni 'joms par byed/ /so nam tshong gis 'tsho byed cing / /tshe ni drug cur 'tsho bar

'gyur/ /snyom las mu cor smra ba dang / /gdug cing las dang dang tshul ngan/ /mtshon gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/ /yang na srog chags gdug pas so/ /kurma la ni btsas pa'i bu/ /rtag tu sems khral can du gnas/ /chung gis khro zhing chung gis mgu/ /mang du

smra zhing gnyen la byams/ /drag tu smra zhing lhag par khro/ /phyug cing thams cad gtong la dga'/ /bu dang chung ma 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu rang gi yul na gtso/ /zhing gis las la sogs pas 'tsho/ /mdze yi nad kyis 'dzin par 'gyur/ /tshe lo brgyad cu lon pa na/ de bzhin

rang gi yul du 'chi/ /ma ka ra la bcas pa'i bu/ /tshe ni dgu bcu rtsa drug ste/ /tshul khrims phun tshogs bsod nams ldan/ /'dul ba dang ni spyod pa srung / /nor ldan gzugs bzang phun sum tshogs/ /skal ba bzang zhing grags pas mdzes/ /bzo dang sgyu rtsal

kun la mkhas/ /chung ma gcig ni shin tu gsal/ /rtag tu sems ni lhod pa ste/ /dul ba dang ni bsrung ba ste/ /gnyen gyi nang na gcig pu gtso/ /kun la snyan sogs smra ba dang / /de bzhin g.yul ngor 'chi bar 'gyur/ /tshe lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang / /yang na drug cu'am

sum cu'o/ /raN+Da la ni btsas pa'i bu/ /rtag tu sdig pa'i blo can te/ /sems can rnams la 'khyal bar smra/ /rtag tu dbul zhing kha gsag smra/ /dus kun du ni nad bu can/ /rgyal pos chad pa gcod pa'i bdag /'khrig pa la ni rtag tu dga'/ /gzhan dag la ni yid

mi rton/ /zol dang bzo sogs kun rig pa/ /bud med rnams la skal ba bzang / /tshe lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga'am/ /yang na drug cu'am sum cur nges/ /mi ki ra la btsas pa'i bu/ /chos shes rang gi rigs kyang mtho/ /lugs kyi bstan bcos phun sum tshogs/ /bzo

dang rig pa sna tshogs ldan/ /tshig rtsub smra la drag pa ste/ /shin tu khro zhing 'jigs su rung / /nor nyung gzugs ni bzang ba ste/ /bya ba thams cad myur bar 'grub/ /de yi lus ni rang nyid kyis/ /chu ru mchongs te 'chi bar 'gyur/ /tshe lo brgyad cu rtsa brgyad na/ /yang

na rgyal po'i khrims kyis gsod/ /bi tri ka la btsas pa'i bu/ /skyes ma thag tu ma ni 'chi/ /pha yang lo ni brgyad na 'chi/ /de bzhin rang gi khyim na gtso/ /khrol rdzas ni nyung bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa la sogs blun dang ldan/ /las dang sems khral chung ba ste/ /dpung rnams

kyi ni gtso bo nyid/ /tshe lo brgya dang rtsa brgyad na/ /rang gi khyim du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gnyen rnams kun dang mdza' ba ste/ /sdug phongs rnams la brtse bar ldan/ /byA ku la ni btsas pa'i bu/ /blo chung ngan par smra ba dang / /shes rab zhan cing nad bu can/ /rtag tu grogs

po ngan dang 'grogs/ /rang gi gnyen byams skal ba bzang / /sdug phongs rnams la rjes su brtse/ /nor dang ba lang shin tu phyug /khyim dang chung ma gsum la sogs/ /skad cig khro zhing nga rgyal ldan/ /dgra yis gzir bas 'jigs par 'gyur/ /pha dang ma ni

tshe yang ring / /de bzhin lo bdun cu thub/ /tshong gi las kyis 'tsho bar byed/ /lan cig tshong gi rgyu yis 'chi/ /sbyor ba brtsams pa'i mtshan ma la/ /ye shes can gyis bgrang bar bya/ /swap+na la ni btsas pa'i bu/ /dpa' rtul pha rol gnon pa yis/ /dgra rnams

thams cad sreg par byed/ /mgon med rnams kyi rtsa lag ste/ /dus rnams kun tu dbul pa dang / /sdig pa'i las la nan tan byed/ /bdag nyid seng ger sems pa dang / /tshig rtsub smra la thams cad rig /dus kun du ni nad med cing / /rtag tu longs spyod rnyed

par 'gyur/ /gzhan la brten pas 'tsho ba dang / /bud med kun la gnod cing spyod/ /tshe lo lnga bcu tham pa ru/ /de ni nges par 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /dgra yi mtshon gyis brgyab nas su/ /'chi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /kA ma sa la btsas pa'i bu/ /tshe ni drug cu rtsa

brgyad 'tsho/ /nor dang 'bru dang grong dang ni/ /phyugs dang rta sogs bzhon par ldan/ /bden par smra zhing chos kyang shes/ /sems can kun la phan par byed/ /rig pa dang ni snyan par smra/ /bstan bcos thams cad shin tu rgyas/ /sems can kun

la skal ba bzang / /rang gi yul du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i mtshan ma bstan pa rnams/ /ngas bstan pa la the tshom med/ /ro hi ta ni lha la mchod/ /mo hi ta ni nor la brkam/ /b+ha drA kha zas bzang po ze/ /br-i Sha b+ha la mang du khro/ /kurma la ni gzhan du sems/ /ma

ka ra la 'brel bar smra/ /raN+Da la ni sdig sems can/ /mi ki ra ni 'khrig la brten/ /bi tri ka ni gnyid log cing / /byA ku li ni bla rdol lo/ /swap+na la ni rang nyid sems/ /kA ma glu dang klog 'don byed/ /ro hi ta la zhi ba'i las/ /de bzhin br-i Sha rgyas pa ste/ /ma kar

ni dbang dang 'byor/ /b+ha drA la ni mngon spyod bya/ /mo hi ta yis bskrad pa ste/ /kurma la ni bcing ba'i las/ /raN+Das dbye bar shes par bya/ /byA ku la ni smran sbyar bya/ /ra yi khyu mchog grub pa ste/ /bdud rtsi sbyor bas skye mi 'gyur/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhag

nas/ /snga dro mkhas pas brtsi bar bya/ /ro hi ta la nor byin na/ /rdzu 'phrul dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /mo hi ta la nor bsdus na/ /gzhan gyis dgag par mi nus so/ /b+ha drA la ni khyim brtsams na/ /dpal dang yang dag 'phrad par 'gyur/ /br-i Sha lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /

sngags ni kun tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /kurma'i sbyor bas pag ma blang / /thams cad du ni 'bral mi 'gyur/ /ma ka ra la zhing btab na/ /gdon mi za bar 'bru rnams 'phel/ /raN+Da bud med bgrod byas na/ /shi bar gyur kyang mi gtong ngo / /mi ki ra la tshong byas na/ /

gtam pa de ltar len par snang / /rtag tu brtan par gzhag bya ba'i/ /las tshogs bi tri ka las bzung / /bya ku li las mgron zhugs na/ /'tshe ba med par gnas su phyin/ /swap+nas thams cad kun tu ni/ /nges par rtag tu mngon par 'ong / /kA ma la ni nor

btang na/ /btang ba slar la ldog mi 'gyur/ /ro hi ta la nor rgyas bu/ /mo hi ta ni 'jog po yin/ /stobs kyis rgyu ba b+ha drA'i gnas/ /de bzhin pad+ma br-i Sha b+ha/ /kurma pad+ma chen po ste/ /ma ka ra ni dung skyong ngo / /raN+Da dung skyong chen po ste/ /mi ki ra ni rigs ldan no/ /pi tri

mgo brgya ba yin te/ /byA ku la ni 'khyil ltung yin/ /swap+na 'jigs pa zhes bya ste/ /kA ma dus kyis 'chi bar 'dod/ /'di dag dus sbyor rim pa bzhin/ /bye brag tu ni shes par bya/ /ra yi khyu mchog grub pa ste/ /bdud rtsi'i sbyor bas skye mi 'gyur/ /gang gi mche bas

mngon zin na/ /'chi bdag dang ni phrad 'gyur ba'o/ /dug bsdu ba yi sbyor ba dag /gzhan la dug ni sbyar bar bya/ /dus kyi mtshan ma ji bzhin du/ /rim pa bzhin du bya/ /dpyid zla 'bring sogs rim bzhin du/ /nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ /ji lta'i dus bzhin

mtshan ma ni/ /rim gyis rim gyis sbyar bar bya/ /nyin mo'i chu tshod so sor ni/ /mkhas pas bcu gnyis bzhi bsgyur bya/ /mtshan mo drug dang bcu gsum bsgyur/ /chu tshod mkhas pas brtsam par bya/ /re mig dag ni gnyis pa la/ /dus la mkhas pas dus tshod bya/ /

nyin mo drug dang bcu gnyis bsgyur/ /chu tshod kyi ni mtshan mar bya/ /bzhi dang bcu gsum bsgyur ba ni/ /mtshan mo chu tshod du ni brtag /bdag dang bcu gnyis bsgyur bdag /nyin mo ru ni brtag par bya/ /gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag /

chu tshod sum cu tham pa ni/ /dbus kyi bi shug nyis par sbyar/ /gnyis mtha' bcu ni gsum po dag /nyin mo chu tshod shes pa ste/ /brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis po dag /de yi mtshan mo'i mtshan mar bya/ /bzhi dang bcu gsum mtshan ma ni/ /nyin mo yi ni chu tshod de/ /

drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod mtshan ma bya/ /drug dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/ /nyin mo yi ni shes bya ste/ /bzhi dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni grags/ /byang du bgrod pa bshad nas ni/ /de bzhin gzhan gyi dus shes bya/ /

bzhi dang gsum bsgyur chu tshod ni/ /nyin mo yi ni bshad pa yin/ /drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /mtshan mo yi ni mtshon par bya/ /gnyis dang pa cu ni gsum bsgyur ba/ /de bzhin nyin mo'i chu tshod yin/ /brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /chu tshod

mtshan gyi rab tu grags/ /bcu ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba dag /bi shu nyin mo'i chu tshod de/ /de bzhin mtshan gyi na chu tshod kyang / /bcu ni gsum du bsgyur bar bya/ /de bzhin pi shu bar ma gnyis/ /brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /nyin mo yi ni bsam par bya/ /

gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag /drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /nyin mo'i chu tshod rim pa yin/ /bzhi dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/ /de bzhin mtshan mo'i chu tshod de/ /sum brgya lnga bcu rtsa gnyis kyi/ /chu tshod kyis ni dus

rnams 'da'/ /chu tshod drug cu'i grangs kyis ni/ /nyin mtshan phrugs gcig du ni sbyar/ /zla ba'i ji bzhin du/ /rim pa de bzhin mtshan ma bya/ /chu tshod dbugs sogs rdzog pa dang / /bi shu ma gtogs rim 'phel bri/ /las dang las min bye brag

bzhin/ /dbugs kyi rim gyis gzung bar bya/ /kha dngar sogs dus tshigs dang / /bgrod pa gnyis kyis mtshon par bya/ /gnyis po dag ni bcus bsgyur ba/ /de bzhin lo yi chu tshod de/ /de yi mtshan ma ldan pa yis/ /nyin mtshan gyi ni dbugs su brtsi/ /ngag gi

dbang phyug kun bzung nas/ /dbyangs kyi mtshan mar mngon par bzhag /ma ning gnyis ni spangs nas su/ /sa yi dbang phyug kun tu gzhag /a yi rim pa la bab na/ /dpal dang mngon par mnyam 'grogs shing / /nor rnyed pa ni snang ba ste/ /skal ba bzang por

gdon mi za/ /A yi re mig la bab na/ /rims dang nad kyis gzir ba dang / /'jigs shing skrag par snang 'gyur ba/ /A zhes bya bar nges pa ston/ /yi ge i la bab gyur na/ /rgyal pa'i dpal ni ster 'gyur te/ /kun nas nor na rnyed pa dang / /gang zhig bsam pa

des 'grub 'gyur/ /yi ge I la par gyur na/ /zla ba drug na 'chi ba dang / /de bzhin dgras ni gzir ba dang / /me yis 'jigs pa shes par bya/ /yi ge u la bab gyur na/ /dpal dang grogs mo rnyed pa dang / /nor dang 'bru ni 'phel par 'gyur/ /dpa' rnams

kyang ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /U la gal te bab gyur na/ /de ni dgra yis 'tshe bar 'gyur/ /bran bza' dang ni gnyen mtshan rnams/ /'jigs shing skrag par snang bar 'gyur/ /yi ge e la bab gyur na/ /'phral du skye bo skal can 'gyur/ /skyes pa pud med dag gi

ni/ /mchod pa'i gnas ni thob par 'gyur/ /ai yi mtshan ma la lhung na/ /dgra dang rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / /lus can rkun pos gzir 'gyur zhing / /nad dang rims kyis thebs par 'gyur/ /o yi mtshan ma la bab na/ /gnas kyi dbang po 'gyur ba dang /

nor dang 'bru ni rnyed 'gyur zhing / /yid 'ong rig pa de bzhin no/ /au yi mtshan ma la bab na/ /'thab mo dang ni dgras 'tshe zhing / /gnas las nyams dang brdeg 'tshog dang / /byas pa chud ni zor par 'gyur/ /yi ge a~M la bab gyur na/ /bran bzang dag ni rnyed 'gyur

zhing / /bu dang rig pa rnyed 'gyur te/ /de bzhin grogs po rnyed par 'gyur/ /ji ltar sngon gyi a zhes pa/ /de bzhin tha ma'ang gzung bar bya/ /drug 'gyur du ni bzhag nas su/ /lnga pa de ni sum 'gyur bya/ /sum brgya drug cu bsres nas ni/ /sa bzhin du ni bcad nas

su/ /yi ge lhag ma bzung byas te/ /dge dang mi dge mtshan par bya/ /yang na ri mo kyag kyog bri/ /dbyangs kyi dang po la sogs pa grang / /yang na me tog gtor nas ni/ /de bzhin sa ni mtshon par bya/ /snga dro ro hi ta dus su/ /bden pa thams cad blta bar bya/ /

rnal 'byor bstan bcos rab tu bsngags/ /bdag gi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba ste dang po'o// //ye shes de ni byi brag dag /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /lus kyi mtshan ma ji lta bu/ /de nyid gang la brten par bgyi/ /

lus kyi mtshan ma ston pa rnams/ /nyon cig rdo rje rgyal po che/ /lus kyi mtshan ma mngon bstan gyis/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab par gnas/ /dbugs ni rnam par rgod tsam gyis/ /lus can zla ba drug gis 'chi/ /

'jigs pa cung zad mthong min par/ /'gram pa'i mtshams ni bye 'gyur na/ /de tshe dus la bab par 'gyur/ /dbugs ni chad cing chad gyur pa/ /snga dro ro hi ta dus su/ /mtshan ma dag ni brtag par bya/ /sna yi bar na chad gyur na/ /nyi ma bdun na gdon mi za/ /mig gi

chu ni chad gyur na/ /de bzhin nyi ma lnga yis 'chi/ /'gram pa'i logs kyi mtshan ma yis/ /zhag gcig las ni mi 'tsho'o/ /rna ba'i chol zangs ltebs pa yis/ /chu tshod ldan gdon mi za/ /'dir ni lce yi thig nag gis/ /lus can zhag gnyis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /

steng 'og so ni 'thams pa na/ /zhag gsum 'chi bdag phrad par 'gyur/ /mgrin pa'i logs kyi phyi rol rtsas/ /zla ba phyed na gdon mi za/ /brang gi dra ba zhom gyur na/ /zla byed sman pas gsor mi rung / /sen mo khrag ni med pa yis/ /lus can nyi ma brgyad na 'chi/ /

'chi ba'i mtshan ma brgyad bcas pa/ /'chi ba'i dus bab mtshon par bya/ /sna yi par sha chad pa la/ /ye shes sa bon gyis gzir bya/ /mig gi chu ni chad pa la/ /rdo rje ma yi sa bon gzung / /mkhur tshos logs kyi mtshan ma la/ /drag mo'i sa bon gzir bar bya/ /rna ba'i

chol zangs zhum pa la/ /ro langs ma yi sa bon dgod/ /lce yi thig nag 'di la ni/ /gtum mo'i sa bon bsam par bya/ /so dang so ni 'thams pa la/ /seng ge ma yi sa bon brdeg /mgrin pa'i logs kyi phyi rol rtsa/ /stag mo'i sa bon brdeg par bya/ /brang gi dra

ba zhom pa la/ /ce spyang sa bon gzung par bya/ /lag pa'i sen khrag med pa la/ /'ug pa ma yi sa bon gzung / /'chi ltas yan lag mtshan ma ni/ /sa bon de dag dgod pas bsrung / /phyi nas ye shes 'khor lo ni/ /bri ba'i cho gas rnam shes bsrung / /ma bsregs

kham phor gnyis bzung la/ /gur gum ro tsa na yis ni/ /'og gi cha ni re mig dgu/ /de bzhin steng la bcu gnyis bya/ /dbus su ming ni bris nas su/ /sa bon gyis ni mngon par bskor/ /phyag 'tshal dbyangs kyi dang po ste/ /bsrung ba'i tshig ni sngon du bya/ /

sangs rgyas lnga sogs ldan pa yi/ /sa bon mtha' ru gnas pa ste/ /sreg byed yi ge de yi mtha'/ /steng sogs myu khyud dbyangs yig dgod/ /kha ba gnyis 'gyur sa bon dang / /lha mo rdo rje ma zhes bya/ /sangs rgyas lnga yid sa bon ldan/ /thams cad phyag

'tshal sreg byed mtha'/ /dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon/ /gya gyu phyag na rdo rje yin/ /de bzhin lus ni 'jam pa'i mchog /mgo dang dpung ba byams pa ste/ /steng du 'bar ba ma yig ste/ /'khor ba thams cad sgrol byed pa'o/ /de la shar gyi phyogs

gnas pa/ /lha mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /byang du drag mo zhes bya ba'i/ /sa bon nyid ni sbyar bar bya/ /nub kyi phyogs su gnas pa ni/ /ro langs ma yi sa bon sbyar/ /lho yi phyogs su gang gnas pa/ /gtum mo'i sa bon rdzogs par bstan/ /sa bon mngon du

bstan pa bzhin/ /dbang ldan du ni seng ge ma/ /me mtshams stag so dgod bya ste/ /bden bral du ni ce spyang ma/ /rlung du hU~M byed 'ug pa mo/ /mtshams na gnas pa'i sa bon ni/ /bzhi po'i drug po'i dngos su ni/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams ji bzhin du/ de

bzhin sa bon dgod par bya/ /steng gi gnas ni bcu gnyis la/ /dbyangs kyi sa bon gzhag par bya/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mtha' dang bcas/ /phyogs su ma ning gzhag par bya/ /'bar ma 'jib ma zhes bya dang / /de bzhin 'phrog byed mkha' 'gro ma/ /phyag

'tshal sreg pa mthar gnas pa/ /ji lta'i gnas bzhin gzhag par bya/ /shar phyogs mkha' 'gro ma yi gnas/ /byang du gnas pa 'bar ma ste/ /nub tu 'jib mar yang dag gsungs/ /lho ru 'phrog byed dgod par bya/ /dbus su ming ni bri bya ste/ /'og tu ji

bzhin steng de bzhin/ /gnyi ga kha ni sbyar nas su/ /skud pa dmar pos dkri bar bya/ /kun nas mnyam pa'i gnas su ni/ /tsan+dan dmar pos byugs nas su/ /sna tshogs me tog 'dug pa dang / /drir bcas nyer spyod gtor ma byin/ /dbus su

'khrul 'khor bzhag nas ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma lngas bskor bar bya/ /bdag nyid rdo rje can sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces brjod/ /rdo rje lag ni lag rtse ru/ /rdo rje bsams nas reg byas la/ /dbus su bstan pa'i sa bon ni/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas

par bya/ /tshe rabs snga ma'i sdig la sogs/ /lha la sogs la bsgo bar bya/ /yan lag thams cad gzir ba dang / /'chi ba'i dus bab 'byung mi 'gyur/ /'tshe med nad ni thams cad dang / /nad pa glor gzhag sbyar na ni/ /dus rnams kun tu nad mi 'byung / /

lus can tshe ni zad ba yang / /zla ba drug tu gnas par 'gyur/ /gnas gzhan du ni bzhag nas su/ /rtag tu mchod la brtson par bya/ /rdo rje'i rgya ldan sbyor ba yis/ /rnam shes gang du'ang 'gro mi 'gyur/ /gzhan yang bdag gi dbugs dag ni/ /der ni rab

tu brtag par bya/ /dbugs kyi gnas ni mtshungs pa na/ /thams cad grub par gsungs pa yin/ /g.yas la g.yas su gnas pa dang / /blo ldan g.yon la g.yon du gnas/ /der gnas na ni smra byed pa/ /thams cad 'grub pa nyid du 'gyur/ /dbugs dang

'dri ba mi mthun pa/ /dngos grub ring pa mtshon par bya/ /skad cig srog gi rab sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba gnyis ni shes bya ste/ /skad cig la ni bya ba kun/ /rgyas par 'gyur bar rab tu grags/ /srog la bya ba gang byas pa/ /grub pa ring par the tshom med/ /mche ba la

sogs bsams nas dug /der ni gso ba dag tu bya/ /sbyor sogs sngar kyi mtshan nyid can/ /thams cad rig pas klu la bsgo/ /sbyor ba bzhi la sos btab pa/ /'chi par 'gyur ba the tshom med/ /dug bsdu pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /gzhan ma thams cad gso

bar bya/ /sos btab lus la kun rig pas/ /sa bon gyis ni dgod par dgod/ /yi ge brgyad kyi sngags dag ni/ /yan lag brgyad po rnams su dgod/ /kha dog dkar po bsams pa yi/ /sa bon rnams kyis yid dug dbrog /dkyil 'khor dbus su

gnas pa yis/ /ye shes kyis ni rnam shes pa cing / /yan lag bsgyur ba'i sbyor byas nas/ /de 'og phyi rol brtsam par bya/ /chu dang 'o ma bsres pa yis/ /sa snod yongs su dgang bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'i/ /dbus su pad+ma bsam

par bya/ /gdugs dkar po yis brgyan pa yi/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma de bsgom/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /sprul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/ /kha T+wA~M ga dang thod pa dang / /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' bklubs/ /klu brgyad kyi ni mgo bo

bsnams/ /pad+ma yi ni gdan la mnan/ /shar du nor rgyas bu bsam bya/ /de bzhin byang du 'jog po'o/ /nub tu stobs kyis rgyu ba ste/ /lho ru pad+ma blta bar bya/ /dbang ldan du ni pad+ma che/ /me mtshams su ni dung skyong ngo / /bden bral rigs ldan zhes bya ba/ /rlung

mtshams 'khyil ba ltung pa'o/ /klu brgyad po ni bsams nas su/ /mgo bo rnams ni mnan par bsgom/ /rdzas rnams kun gyis mchod nas su/ /me tog spos sogs gtor ma sbyin/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ru bsam/ /rma bya

sgro yi chun po yis/ /chu yi sbyor bas drang bar bya/ /kun nas rkang bar drangs nas su/ /rkang ba nas ni chur thim bya/ /oM hrI TaT+Ta t+Tar hU~M phaT swA hA/ rdo rje sems dpar mngon sbyor ngas/ /'bum phrag la sogs bsnyen pa bya/ /oM bA su ki ri hrI TaT+TaN+Tar hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM tak+Sha ka hrI

TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/ oM ka rko Ta ka hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/ oM pad+ma hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/ oM ma hA pad+ma hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/ oM sha kha pA la hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/ oM b+h+yo ku li kA ya laM hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/ oM hu lun ke hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/ oM hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT a mu ka s+ya ni ra bi shaM ku

ru hU~M phaT swA hA/ zhes brjod cing / 'o ma'i dbus su drangs pa yis/ /'phral du 'o ma nag por 'gyur/ /yungs kar me tog dkar po dang / /tsan+dan dag gis bsres pa yis/ /'chi bas zin pa'i snying ga ru/ /gsang sngags zlos shing brdeg

par bya/ /snying ni 'phar ma thag tu yang / /ye shes pa sbams te bsrung bar bya/ /rnam shes bsdams pa tsam gyis kyang / /de bzhin dbugs ni g.yo bar 'gyur/ /dbugs ni rnam par g.yos pa yis/ /bdag gi dbugs kyis gzir bar bya/ /dbugs kyis gzir ma

thag tu yang / /rkang lag la sogs 'dar bar 'gyur/ /yan lag thams cad 'dar ba na/ /bdag nyid dbyangs ni blang bar bya/ /hU~M gi klu ni blangs nas su/ /se gol gsum gyis bslang bar bya/ /'chi bas zin pa bslang nas ni/ /de yi yan lag bsrung bar bya/ /bsdus nas klu yi gnas su ni/ /

'o ma de ni dpo bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpar mngon sprul pa/ /'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas pa yis/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /de nas sgrub pos dug bsdus na/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /kha dang thig le

gnyis dag dang / /steng dang mgrin pa sna rtse dang / /snying ga lte ba gsang ba dang / /rkang pa'i mthe bo dag tu ni/ /zin pa gso bar mi bya ste/ /'chi ba nyid kyi rgyu ru gsungs/ /nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje che/ /char ba dbab pa'i tshog mchog /chu 'gram dang ni nye ba yi/ /sa

phyogs nyams ni dga' ba ru/ /bla re dag ni bres nas su/ /dar dpyangs sna tshogs dbyangs pa ru/ /kha dog sna lngar btsos pa yi/ /tshon gyi las ni brtsam par bya/ /gru bzhi ba la sgo bzhi pa/ /klu brgyad kyis ni rnam par bklubs/ /mgo bo gnyis ni sgor bcas te/ /

mjug ma gnyis kyis grwa ru mdud/ /shar du rgyal ba bzang po ste/ /dpal dang dga' bo byang du'o/ /nub tu tshar 'bebs sdug pa ste/ /brtan dang drag po lho ru'o/ /klu brgyad kyi ni ra ba ste/ /phyogs la sogs par rigs brgyad dgod/ /nor rgyas bu ni shar du ste/ /

'jog po byang du dgod par bya/ /nub kyi phyogs su stobs kyis rgyu/ /lho yi phyogs su pad+ma ste/ /dbang ldan du ni pad+ma che/ /me mtshams dung skyong dgod par bya/ /bden bral du ni rigs ldan te/ /rlung mtshams 'khyil ba ltung ba'o/ /sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po brgyad/ /

phyogs brgyad nas ni dgug par bya/ /sgra sgrogs rmugs pa de bzhin du/ /drag po 'khyil pa stug po dang / /gtum po char 'bebs rab gang ba/ /brgyad po rgyal po zhes bya'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dgod pa/ /ji bzhin phyogs kyi mdog tu bsam/ /dbus

su rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /pad+ma'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /kha T+wA~M ga dang rnal 'byor snod/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/ /sku mdog dkar po shin tu 'bar/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' bsnams/ /pad+ma sprul gyis bskor nas su/ /sprul ni

gdan du sbyar bar bya/ /mchod pa rgya chen bshams nas ni/ /'o ma la sogs snod brgyad bzhag /me tog bdug sogs dri dang ni/ /mar me sna tshogs rig pas mchod/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag bsgom pa'i/ /ye shes can gyi rnal 'byor

pa'i/ /oM b+hur+b+hu ba swA hA/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so/ /oM bA su ki hU~M swA hA/ oM ta k+Sha ka hU~M swA hA/ oM karko Ta hU~M swA hA/ oM pad+ma hU~M swA hA/ oM ma hA pad+ma hU~M swA hA/ oM sha~M kha pA la hU~M swA hA/ oM ku li sha bA la hU~M swA hA/ oM hu lun+d+ha hU~M swA hA/ klu'i

rgyal po brgyad kyi sngags so/ /oM g+hi lhi g+hi lhi/ bar+Sha bar+Sha pa ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ho ho ho/ Tha Tha Tha swA hA/ sprin gyi rgyal po brgyad kyi sngags so/ /lag pa kun tu bskor nas su/ /phyogs brgyad du ni bstan par bya/ /sprin gyi rgyal po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon

pa khu tshur bcangs nas su/ /mthe'u chung dang mthe bong brgyad/ /g.yas pa sprul mgo gdengs nas su/ /mthe bong steng du gung mor sbyar/ /klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /o~M badzra Ta ki nI/ bar+Sha bar+Sha ba ya hU~M phu swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /sngon du bsnyen

pa 'bum phrag ni/ /gsum du byas nas bzlas pa bya/ /rnal 'byor can gyi las 'di rnams/ /char 'bebs pa yi cho ga mchog /gzhan yang dge dang sdig pa yi/ /pho nya'i mtshan ma bshad par bya/ /mig yon mgo dkar sgur po dang / /'jigs

pa'i gos dang dbyug pa thogs/ /bud med rnams dang 'grogs te 'ong / /ngu zhing skra ni lhug pa sogs/ /gcer bu ngan gyis smra ba dang / /sbyor bzhis 'chi ba ston pa yin/ /pho nya ji bzhin bdag nyid la/ /brtags nas rnam pa gnyis su bya/ /de tshe sngags pa

'grogs 'dod na/ /grub pa nyams par the tshom med/ /bdag gi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// //rnal 'byor brtson pa'i khyad par dag /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /gang gis sngags rnams 'tshal

bar bgyi/ /ye shes gzung ba ji ltar lags/ /nyon cig rdo rje de kho na/ /de bzhin lha yi bdag nyid do/ /dang por stong nyid bsgoms pa yis/ /lus can dri ma bkru bar bya/ /dang po gzugs ni stong sogs bya/ /ji srid brgyad nyid yin te/ /gzugs

khams zhes bya stong pa ste/ /de nyid du ni sgra yang bya/ /dri khams zhes bya stong pa ste/ /de nyid du ni ro yang bya/ /reg bya'i khams ni stong pa ste/ /de nyid du ni gzugs kyang bya/ /mig gi bdag nyid stong ba la/ /dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod/ /nyan pa'i

bdag nyid stong pa la/ /dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod/ /mnam pa'i bdag nyid stong pa la/ /dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod/ /lce yi bdag nyid stong pa la/ /dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod/ /lus kyi bdag nyid stong pa la/ /dbus na rnam shes ji ltar

yod/ /yid kyi rang bzhin stong pa la/ /dbus na ji ltar brtag par bya/ /yid ni nam mkha' thim nas su/ /thams cad stong par bsam par bya/ /gling dang ri rab la sogs pa/ /steng dang 'og dang bar gyi ni/ /khams gsum stong par bsgoms pa yis/ /

thams cad zad pa nyid du bya/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kun gyi/ /gzugs la sogs bzang par bsgom/ /bdag gi dngos po zang bya ste/ /dngos po 'dres par dmigs par bya/ /sbyor ba mnyam par kun bsams te/ /rnal 'byor ba ni mkhas pa

yis/ /mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su/ /de yi dbus su bltas nas kyang / /de la mtshan ma brtag par bya/ /mar me'i 'od kyis zhi ba ste/ /ser po dngul gyis rgyas par 'gyur/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba ni/ /chags pa la sogs 'grub par

'gyur/ /mthar ni du pa gnag mthong na/ /mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags/ /rlung gi mdog ltar 'khrugs pa yis/ /de yi mod la bskrad par 'gyur/ /zla ba dkar po'i 'od zer lhar/ /thams cad du ni dkar mthong nas/ /rnal 'byor grub par shes par bya/ /

blo ldan 'gro ba'i yang dag gnas/ /de 'og rnal 'byor las byung ba'i/ /myu gu la sogs mngon par bsam/ /gang zhig stong shes bsgom pa yi/ /myur du sems dpa' grol bar 'gyur/ /ye shes kyis ni shes bya ba lta/ /shes byas 'gro ba brtag par bya/ /

pa dang ma ni bsad bya ste/ /bram ze gtsang ma gnyis bzung nas/ /rgyal po yul 'khor bcas bcom na/ /mi de dag par 'gyur zhes bya/ /bdag gi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// //nyon cig rdo rje ji bzhin lam/ /gnyis

spabs gnyis su med pa ste/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor rab 'jigs pas/ /chu yi dgra ni dam pas gang / /dbus su bying ba'i lus can rnams/ /sgrol ba'i mtshan nyid ces byar brjod/ /mtshon byas mtshan nyid mtshon pa po/ /rnam shes kyis ni ye shes te/ /

ye shes kyis ni shes bya blta/ /shes byas 'gro ba brtag par bya/ /'gro ba brtags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin mngon par 'gro/ /zhags pas glang chen myos bcings ltar/ /'khor ba'i zhags pas gnod rmongs pas/ /rnal 'byor pa ni

stong phrag gcig /tshe rabs snga ma'i 'gro bar 'gro/ /sngon du mtshan nyid bstan pa bzhin/ /mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su/ /stong pa'i zhing la sogs lus la/ /blo dang ldan pas sa bon gdab/ /dper na gdol ba'i khad pa mer

bsregs pa/ /lha yi byin gyis bslabs par rab tu brjod/ /rigs can dge dang mkhas pa kun du gnas/ /de bzhin ting nge 'dzin gyis kun bshig nas/ /sa bon dgod pas rab tu dgod par bya/ /steng du me yi sa bon brtag /sa yi sa bon rnam pa gnyis/ /

mig gnyis su ni sbyar bar bya/ /stong sogs rlung gi sa bon ni/ /sna dang rna ba dag la bsam/ /bdud rtsi'i chu yi sa bon ni/ /lce yi dbang so dbang phyug gtso/ /gang gis brtsegs pa rim bzhin gzung / /gnas bzhi ru ni sbyar bar bya/ /mgrin par gti mug sa

bon te/ /de bzhin dpung par nyon mongs so/ /snying ga'i phyogs su g.yo ba ste/ /lte ba'i rtsa bar phyug yin no/ /yan lag brgyad du sa bon ni/ /brgyad po bkod pas bsrung bar bya/ /ye shes mkha' 'gror bdag byas te/ /lus ni sa bon ldan par bya/ /

nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ /pad+ma yi ni stan la bzhugs/ /gdugs ni dkar pos steng du g.yogs/ /btso ma'i gser ltar 'bar pa'i 'od/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag bzhugs/ /steng du rdo rje dbu rgyan

can/ /dar gyi thod ni mdzes par bcings/ /spyan gsum khro zhing bzhad pa ste/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /ral gri dgra sta rdo rje dang / /g.yon pa'i sdigs mdzub nyid dang ni/ /shak+ti kha T+wA~M bsgreng ba ni/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mngon par bsnams/ /

sangs rgyas sprin ni 'phros pa yis/ /sems can rnams kyi don mdzad brtson/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru/ /dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/ /yid kyi ye shes rnam shes dag /shel dang 'dra bar bsam par bya/ /A li kA li rab sbyor bas/ /de yi

sa bon bzung byas te/ /smin par thigs pa'i gnas dag tu/ /ye shes can gyi sa bon bsgom/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa yi/ /yi ge'i sa bon bzlas par bya/ /rlung dang me yi mdun don la/ /rdo rje me yi sa bon bskul/ /sgra dang thig les yang dag mnan/ /

char pa'i rgyun zhes bya ba brjod/ /thog mar bla ma'i yi ge gzhag /sreg byed yi ge mthar bzlas bya/ /ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yi/ /blo gros can gyis sum 'bum bzla/ /bzlas dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ba/ /de yis bsam pa thams cad 'grub/ /las brgyad

la sogs dngos grub rnams/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /de 'og las rnams pa rtsam byas na/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /rmongs par bya ba'i bye brag ni/ /nyon cig rdo rje de kho na/ /bcings pa rnams kyi bye brag dang / /sngon du rdo rje'i tshig brjod

la/ /sde mtshan dang po'i dang po bzung / /de bzhin sde tshan bzhi pa yi/ /yi ge dang po bzung nas ni/ /nyis 'gyur re pha steng du gzhag /de bzhin i dang re phar sbyar/ /gang zhig sde tshan gnyis pa yi/ /yi ge gnyis pa thig le can/ /lcags kyu yis ni gzir

bar bya/ /bzhi pa yi ni gsum par bcas/ /lan gnyis su ni bzlas par bya/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa dang / /sngon du phyag 'tshal yi ge ste/ /yi ge drug po mtha' ru sbyar/ /sa bon 'di bzlas rnal 'byor pas/ /dngos po thams cad bcing bar 'gyur/ /

lag gnyis sor mo pa snol nas ni/ /de nyid bza' blta bur sbyar/ /khro bo dang ni dbu ma brkyang / /gnyis ka phan tshun drud par bya/ /'di ni chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ /'od zer 'ar ba'i phreng ba 'khrug /dgra yi mgrin pa la sogs pa/ /dngos po thams cad yid

kyis rol/ /de nas chu la sogs ba kun/ /rab tu bcing ba bshad par bya/ /gang yang snga tshan tha ma ni/ /yi ge gsum pa gzung bar bya/ /de bzhin snga tshan gsum pa yi/ /yi ge gsum pa nyid dang ni/ /de yi sa bon gsum pa la/ /steg du a zhes bya

bar sbyar/ /sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po la/ /lcags kyu yis ni gzir bar bya/ /gsum pa chu yi sa bon dang / /tsheg drag yi ge dbus byas te/ /mtha' ma rdo rje can dang sbyar/ /re ba glon lcags kyu can/ /mtha' ni drag po'i yi ge dang / /dang por

phyag 'tshal gzhag par bya/ /bcing ba yi ni sngags su grags/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/ /srin lag gnyis ni phan tshun dkri/ /khro bo gnyis kyis mnan par bya/ /mthe bo gnyis ni dbus su sbyar/ /de nyid du ni mthe chung sbyar/ /rgod ma kha yi phyag

rgya 'di/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/ /phyogs bcu'i gnas su 'bar ba yis/ /sprin gyi lha tshogs sreg par byed/ /char pa bcing la sogs dus su/ /phyag rgya 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /sgrub pos 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs

bya/ /bdag gu gdan zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhi ba'o// //lha yi gzugs ni ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan 'das las nyan par 'tshal/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg la sogs dang / /gtor ma ldan pa ji ltar lags/ /gzugs sogs bsam pa rtse gcig pa/ /

nyon cig rdo rje da kho na/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sbyin sreg gi/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan bsgom pa rnams/ /sngon du me yi las sogs la/ /blo ldan bzlas pa shes par bya/ /sa ni sbyangs ma thag tu yang / /stegs bu'i mtshan nyid 'bad de bya/ /sor brgyad lhag ni yan

chad du/ /khru gang tsam nas brtsams nas su/ /ji snyed khru stong bar du gzung / /brgyad pa dgra ni 'joms pa ste/ /de bzhin bcu pas rgyas par 'gyur/ /bcu gnyis pas ni dbang du sdud/ /bcu bzhis de bzhin zhi ba nyid/ /mtheb sor bcu drug tshad kyis ni/ /rigs

rnams mngon par 'phel bar byed/ /mtheb sor brgyad gnas kyis ni/ /ba lang rigs sogs mngon par 'phel/ /thab khung sor ni nyi shu pas/ /grong khyer dang ni yul 'khor zhi/ /rgyar ni cha gsum ba gos pa las/ /cha gnyis su ni brko bar bya/ /brkos

pa yi ni brgyad cha yis/ /khung bu yi ni kha khyer bya/ /kha khyer gyi ni phyed pa yis/ /phyi rol gyi ni mu khyud bya/ /mu khyud cha brgyad ldan pa la/ /pad+ma'i 'dab de cha brgyad bya/ /pad+ma yi ni phyi rol du/ /sor gcig pa yir ba bya/ /thab khung nang du rdo rje rnams/ /pad+ma'i nang

du gzhag par bya/ /mngon spyod la ni gru gsum ste/ /zhi ba la ni gru bzhi'o/ /kun nas zlum po dbang du sdud/ /rgyas pa la yang de bzhin no/ /bskrad la zla ba phyed pa ste/ /dgug dang bcing la zur brgyad pa'o/ /rim gyis rim gyis sbyar par bya/ /zhi dang rgyas dang

dbang sogs rnams/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi mtshan ma rnams/ /ji bzhin phyogs su dgod par bya/ /kha khyer ni gnas bzhi ru/ /sangs rgyas mtshan mas brgyan par bya/ /zla phyed rdo rjes shin tu mdzes/ /grwa dang grwa ru rnam par gzhag /ji bzhin stan gyi gnas

su yang / /mtheb sor bcu gnyis dag dang ni/ /dpangs su khru phyed ldan pa yi/ /ti se'i gangs ni mdzes par gzhag /'dab ma brgyad kyi gnas rnams su/ /lha mo rnams ni ri ma bzhin dgod/ /rnal 'byor pa yis de yi tshad/ /khyad par du ni sbyar bar bya/ /

o~M hi li hi li ki li be tA li hU~M phaT/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgom pa yis/ /rang gi lus ni bsrung bar bya/ /bdag gi yan lag brgyad po ru/ /thams cad bkod pas bsrung bya ste/ /lce la chu ni nyid dang ni/ /nam mkha' rna ba sna

dag la/ /sa ni mig tu sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin mi ni tshangs pa la/ /mgrin par rmongs pa'i ded dpon te/ /g.yo ba snying la gnas pa'o/ /nyon mongs thong ka kun tu'o/ /lte ba'i rtsa bar phyugs yin no/ /yan lag brgyad kyis bsrung ba 'di/ /lha rnams su ni

shes byas la/ /ba dan gsum gyi phyag rgya yis/ /yan lag brgyad du gtugs te bsrung / /ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bdag nyid du/ /bdag nyid lus ni sprul byas te/ /kun+da zla ba ltar dkar zhing / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/ /sems dpa'i skyil

krud phyag gnyis pa/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i bza' ma na bas/ /phyag na kha T+wA~M rdo rje ste/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba kun tu gsal/ /rang gi lus ni mnyam bzhag pas/ /dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/ /de nas sa ni spyang bya ste/ /oM ha na ha na

krod+ha hU~M phaT/ lag pa g.yas brkyang byas te/ /rdo rjer bsgoms nas sa la bsnun/ /sa sbyangs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag gnyis khu tshur kha sbyar te/ /gud mo gnyis brkyang kun tu bstan/ /phyag rgya 'di ni dag khyed pa'o/ /o~M shrI swA hA/ mar sbyang

ba'i sngags so/ /o~M a swA hA/ rdzas bkru ba'i sngags so/ /o~M dzriM swA hA/ 'bru sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /o~M ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zas mchog la sogs pa'i rdzas sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /o~M a swA hA/ ya ma shing sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /me dbus pad+ma bsams

nas su/ /me yi lha ni dgug par bya/ /g.yon pa khu tshur bcings nas su/ /khro bo dang ni dbu ma brkyang / /dbu ma'i chigs na gsum pa la/ /khro bo bsams te btsugs bas dgug /o~M A ga ts+tsha A gats+tsa ag+ne dzaHswA hA/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ru/ /

thab khung dbus su bsgom par bya/ /bgrad phreng spyi blugs bu ram mdog /ral pa'i thor tshugs ser skyar ldan/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' bklubs/ /'od zer me ltar kun tu 'bar/ /me yi dbus su bsgom par bya/ /der ni ji ltar 'byor ba dang / /dngos

po lnga yis mchod nas su/ /me dbus me lha'i lca la ni/ /kun nas sreg blugs gsum gsum bya/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/ /pad+ma'i tshul du cung zad dbye/ /dbu ma kun tu brkyang bar bya/ /o~M dzu hu dzu hu ag+ne swA hA/ me'i snying po'i sngags dang phyag

rgya'o/ /de nas 'bad pas se go la gsum/ /gtogs pas 'bar bar thim par bsgom/ /me yi gnas su kun rig pas/ /de nas sbyang ba brtsam par bya/ /o~M hU~M Ta Ti hU~M phaT/ rdo rjer bcas pa'i lag pa yis/ /me tog yungs kar chu yis ni/ /phyogs

kun tu ni gtor nas su/ /me yi nang du blugs par bya/ /sbyang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /o~M badzra prA kA ra hU~M phaT/ lag g.yon thal mo phar bstan te/ /g.yas ba chur bstan rgyab sbyar nas/ /dbang ldan phyogs sogs bskor bar bya/ /ra ba'i sngags dang

phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su/ /phan tshun rtse mo reg par bya/ /o~M dzru~M swA hA/ rdo rje dra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs nas su/ /mthe bong 'og tu brkyang par bya/ /o~M pru~M swA hA/ phur bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /nyi

ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'i/ /me dbus pad+ma bsams nas su/ /gdugs dkar po yis g.yogs pa yi/ /rdo rje dbus su bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ste/ /kha dog dmar sogs bsam par bya/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las/ /nyi ma'i

dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su bskyed nas su/ /rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi/ /sbyor ba'i gdan la byung ba yis/ /las kyi mdog tu bsgom par bya/ /phyag gnyis kha T+wA~M rdo rje bsnams/ /thams cad rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/ /rdo rje'i

gzugs ni bskyed nas su/ /rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi/ /bdag gi lus ni gang yin la/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bstim par bya/ /me yi dbus su kun rig pas/ /sna tshogs dngos po mchod par bya/ /o~M ThaHThaHThaHswA hA/ dgang blugs kyi sngags so/ /

g.yas su dbyug pa bsam par bya/ /de bzhin g.yon du snod ni sbyang / /o~M hU~M swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa brkyang pa dang / /o~M pra tIts+tsha su gan+d+ha hU~M swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni dri'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /brkyang ba de nyid kyi mthe bong

dang khro bo sbyar ba dang / o~M puSh+pa mA le hU~M swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni me tog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur de nyid las mthe bong brkyang ba dang / o~M tik+Sh+Na dI pe hU~M swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni mar me'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /me tog gi phyag rgya de nyid las dbu ma

bsgreng ba dang / oM d+hU be shwa ri hU~M swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni bdug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis ka brkyang ste mthe bong dang / gung mo bskyod pa dang / o~M ku ru ku ru ma hA pa liM hU~M swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag

rgya'o/ /me yi kha yi nang du ni/ /lan re bzlas shing lan re bzhin/ /dbus su gong bu bsreg par bya/ /bdun las lhag ma kun bzung nas/ /dbus su gong bur na par ni/ /gong ma'i tshul gyis gnas pa ni/ /'bad de rdzogs pa'i mtha' ru ni/ lhag

ma dag ni bsreg par bya/ /bsreg pa zin nas lha rnams ni/ bdag gi lus la thim par bsgom/ /dgang blugs kun la rdzogs pa ru/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas rdzogs par bya/ /snod ni mar gyis bkang nas su/ /me yi dbus su blugs nas kyang / /drangs

nas dbugs ni stongs 'gyur te/ /rang gi lus la thim par bya/ /de nas rang gi lus nyid du/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /dbus su me yi lha nyid ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsams nas kyang / /lhag ma lan gsum bsregs nas su/ /mchod de

gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /bkra shis dbyangs ni blangs nas su/ /der ni phyag rgya sbyar bar bya/ /sbyin sreg las kyis phye ba gzhan/ /mdor bsdus rgyas pa min par bshad/ /sA lu 'bras dang so ba dang / /ti la dkar po dang yungs kar dang / /nas dang dUr ba'i

sa bon bcas/ /mar dang 'o mar bsres nas su/ /sbrang rtsi bsres ba'i 'o thug ni/ /khyad par du ni bsreg par bya/ /'o ma can gyi shing lnga las/ /sor mo bcu bzhir ldan pa'i tshad/ /zhi ba'i dus la bab pa na/ /bsreg pa'i cho ga'i mchog yin no/ /til

nag po dang ma sha dang / /sA lu dmar po'i zan dang ni/ /dri dang gur gum 'o ma ni/ /mar dang sbrang rtsir bsres ba dang / /mar dang ldan pa'i 'o thug dag /khyad par du ni bsreg par bya/ /'o ma can gyi shing lnga las/ /yam shing sor bcu'i tshad dang bcas/ /

gal te rgyas pa'i las 'dod na/ /sgrub pos khyad par bsreg par bya/ /til ni dmar dang gnag pa dang / /nA ga ge sar pri yang ku/ /de bzhin ske tshe'u su dang / /sbrang rtsi dang ni mar sar sbyar/ /thang shing dang ni n+ya gro dang / /klu shing dang ni ba sha ka/ /yam

shing sor mo bcu gnyis pa/ /chags pa'i las la mchog yin no/ /til nag po dang ma sha dang / /pa la ta ka nag chen 'bras/ /tsha ba'i mar nag khrag dang ni/ /bsres pa yis ni byugs pa dang / /lung tang shing dang skur po'i shing / /ba lo ta ka ku li'i shing / /

yam shing sor brgyad pa yi tshad/ /mngon spyod las la rab tu grags/ /yungs kar mon sran gre'u dang se'u/ /lam gyi rdul dang bsres pa dag /khrag dang kha ba'i mar nag gis/ /de ni bsgo bar rab tu grags/ /gser shing dang ni ba sha ka'i/ /yam shing

der ni bzung nas ni/ /de nyid las la bsreg bya ba/ /bskrad pa dag la rab tu grags/ /nya dang sha la sogs pa'i rdzas/ /bag phye 'bru rnams thams cad dag /khrag dang sbrang rtsis bsgos pa dang / /bya rog gi ni sgro dag dang / /bya rog tshang gi shing pu dang / /so shing

'chos nas bor ba ste/ /'di dag bcing ba'i las rnams la/ /brtson dang ldan pas sbyor ba bya/ /de nas gzhan yang khyad par du/ /sbyin sreg mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi yis/ /bsgos pa yi shri ba la ni/ /byang chub shing gi yam

shing la/ /lnga brgya ru ni bsreg par bya/ /de yi dbus su mnyam bzhag nas/ /smon lam btab ste khrus byas na/ /rgyal srid nyams pa'ang myur du ni/ /sa gsum rgyal po dbang du 'gyur/ /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas/ /lo ta'i yam shing me la ni/ /

brgya phrag brgya ru mngon bsregs na/ /shin tu myur bar dpal ldan 'gyur/ /bya ba gang dang gang bsams pa/ /de de thams cad 'dir 'grub 'gyur/ /de nas yongs gzung slob ma yi/ /mtshan nyid dag ni bshad par bya/ /yan lag thams cad yongs

su rdzogs/ /dul zhing spyod pa zhi ba dang / /chos gsum la ni mngon par dad/ /theg pa che la rtag tu dga'/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/ /bzo dang sgyur rtsal thams cad mkhas/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba mngon par dga'/ /thos dang

klog sogs gus dang bcas/ /dus rnams kun tu bla mar gus/ /sbyin sogs dge ba'i las la brtson/ /'dod la dga' ba ma yin zhing / /longs spyod la ni brten pa min/ /khro dang nga rgyal med pa dang / /dang tshul ngan ma ni tshig rtsub min/ /sems can kun

la smod pa dang / /lha dang bla ma de bzhin te/ /gdug sems can dang ngang tshul can/ /rtag tu sdig pa'i blo dang ldan/ /'khyal pa dang ni tshig rtsub smra/ /'di lta bu dag spang bar bya/ /gzhan gyi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba dang po'o// //

nu yi sbyin sreg ji lta bu/ /lha las gzigs mo nyan par 'tshal/ /chu yi sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i/ /mtshan nyid dag ni ji ltar lags/ /chu sogs yang dag mtshan nyid rnams/ /nyon cig rdo rje de kho na/ /bla re dag ni bres nas su/ /sna tshogs gos

rnams rab tu dbyangs/ /shin tu yangs shing gru bzhi par/ /kun tu dri yis byug par bya/ /dbus su chu yi snod sogs la/ /dri ni dkar pos byugs nas su/ /chu dang 'o mar bsres pa yis/ /snod ni mdzes par dag par bya/ /bum pa dag ni brgyad po yang / /phyogs

brgyad dag tu gzhag par bya/ /dri yi cu yis rab tu dgang / /kha ni shing lo sar pas brgyan/ /bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ru/ /skad cig gis ni bskyed nas su/ /me tog bdug spos dri sogs pa'i/ /dngos pos bdag nyid mchod byas pa'i/ /de 'og

phyi rol gzhag pa yis/ /chu yi las rnams sbyar bar bya/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/ /pad+ma'i tshul du cung zad dbye/ /oM ka ma le b+hi swA hA/ pad+ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'i/ /pad+ma chu yi nang bkod la/ /gdugs

dkar po yis g.yogs pa yi/ /sa bon dbus su bsgom par bya/ /rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi/ /sa bon las ni gzugs su bskyed/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung phyag gnyis ldan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje dbyug

pa bsnams/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/ /bzhad cing la sgeg dang bcas/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /dam tshig phyag rgya sogs bstan zhing / /dam tshig sngags dang sbyar bar bya/ /lag gnyis phan tshun khu tshur bcings/ /mdzub

mo gnyis ni brkyang nas su/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyis mdud par bya/ /dam tshig phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /oM sa ma ye tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /shar gyi bum pa rdo rje ma/ /byang du drag mo zhes bya ba/ /nub tu ro langs ma

yin te/ /lho phyogs su ni gtum mo gnas/ /seng ge zhes bya dbang ldan du/ /de bzhin me mtshams stag mo'o/ /bden bral na ni ce spyang mo/ /hU~M byed 'ug pa rlung gi phyogs/ /so so so sor mtshan ma dang / /dam tshig phyag rgyar bstan par bya/ /rang gi
