gzugs kyi sku mdog ldan/ /sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pa'o/ /me tog bdug spos dri la sogs/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /g.yon pa snying gar bzhag nas su/ /g.yas pas steng nas dbub par bya/ /rtsa

ba'i phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /oM dzruM hU~M swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /kun+da la sogs me tog dkar/ /rtse mor dUr ba btsugs nas su/ /lha mo'i dbu steng rdo rje yi/ /cod pan la ni gtor bar bya/ /gsang sngags lan re bzlas nas su/ /lan

re'i sbyor bas dbul bar bya/ /lan grangs khri yi las kyis ni/ /thams cad rig cing tshe 'phel 'gyur/ /ka ra bI ra'i me tog dmar/ /dUr ba dang ni ldan pa yi/ /las ni khri phrag byas pa yis/ /khyim rnams zhi bar rab tu grags/ /nA ga puSh+pa'i ya ma shing gi/ /

'o mar sbags te dbul bar bya/ /las 'di khri phrag byas pa yis/ /grong ni zhi bar byed par 'gyur/ /pad+ma yi ni yam shing rnams/ /khri phrag du ni bzlas nas su/ /las rnams kun la sbyar byas na/ /yul phyogs zhi bar byed par 'gyur/ /bri

yang+ku dang bil ba dang / /de bzhin ut+pal ku mu ta/ /rgyal po'i las la sogs sbyar nas/ /pha rol yul 'khor 'joms par 'gyur/ /sngags pas rtag tu skyong chu gtor/ /bye brag tu ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par

phye ba gnyis pa'o// //'khor ba'i pha rol sgrol mtshan nyid/ /nyon cig rdo rje rgyal chen po/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/ /dag dang ma dag rab tu spangs/ /dngos po gnyis ni rab spangs pas/ /gnyis med chos zhes bya ba ste/ /

gzugs stong thog mar mthar thug dang / /dbu ma mnyam par gnas pa'o/ /dag dang ma dag dbu ma ni/ /'ba' zhig gis ni mnyam par blta/ /bsten dang bsten med dbu ma yi/ /mnyam nyid ye shes las byung ba/ /lus ni mnyam par gnas pa ste/ /

ngag kyang mnyam par gnas nas su/ /mnyam nyid ye shes las byung bas/ /mnyam pa'i lta bas blta bar bya/ /mnyam pa'i lta ba ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /gnyis med chos zhes bgyi ba yi/ /bdag nyid ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ /

gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid ni/ /ji bzhin de nyid rdo rjes nyon/ /dngos po gnyis ni rab spangs la/ /ye shes can gyis gnyis med chos/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi 'og ma ru/ /dag pa rnam gsum brjod par bya/ /o~M swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/

oM badzra shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M yo ga shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ bla med nyid du bya ba'i phyir/ /thal mo sbyar nas de dag brjod/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs kyi/ /gnas dag tu ni brten nas su/ /bla re dag ni bre bar bya/ /sna tshogs gos

ni dbyangs nas su/ /bdag rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bya/ /g.yer ka drangs mdzes byas la/ /gnas bcu dag ni kun tu yang / /de bzhin dri yi dkyil 'khor bya/ /skad cig rnal 'byor tshul gyis ni/ /rang gi lus ni bsam par bya/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro

bzung nas ni/ /bdag nyid mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /lag pa gan rkyal bzhag nas su/ /der ni rdo rje brtag par bya/ /gnas lnga dag tu bstim par bya/ /sa 'og tu ni spyang bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal 'joms pa'i mtha' ldan pa'i/ /hU~M zhes bya ba sbyar bar

bya/ /lhun po'i steng du bsam bya ba/ /kha dog bzhi sogs ldan pa yi/ /gser las byung ba'i grong khyer ni/ /rin chen bdun la sogs pas sngas/ /g.yer ka'i dra ba'i phreng ba can/ /mnyam zhing ji ltar 'dod pas dbyangs/ /phyag rgya kun gyi thog

mar ni/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcing la/ /g.yon pa snying gar bzhag nas su/ /g.yas pa mchan khung gzhug par bya/ /dam tshig phyag rgya shes par bya/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' ldan pa'i/ /ji ltar rdo rje

dngos sa bon/ /sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni/ /de bzhin dam tshig bstan par bya/ /seng ge'i gdan ni rnam pa lnga/ /gnas ldan dag tu sbyar bar bya/ /nyi ma'i gdan ni bsams nas su/ /gdugs dkar po yis brgyan par bya/ /rang gi dbugs

las byung ba yi/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro dbus su bsam/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/ /sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung can/ /skra grol bas ni g.yogs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis mdzes par bya/ /kha dog sngon mo drag chen mo/ /sprul

gyi rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/ /bzhad dang khro dang sgeg pa yi/ /zhal gsum po ni spyan gsum po/ /ha har bzhad cing gtsigs pa ste/ /na bza' dmar pos shin tu mdzes/ /kha T+wA~M gyen du bsgreng ba dang / /gnyis pa na ni dgra sta nyid/ /gsum

pa na ni rdo rje thogs/ /g.yon pas dril bu sgra sgrogs shing / /gnyis pa na ni snod nyid de/ /gsum pas de bzhin ral gri 'phyar/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru/ /dbus su mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /ye shes kyi ni shar phyogs

su/ /bdag gi chu las byung ba ste/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/ /skra grol ba ni rnam par bklubs/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /phyag na kha T+wA~M rnal 'byor snod/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i

na bzas bklubs/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya/ /ye shes kyi ni byang gi char/ /bdag gi me las byung ba yi/ /kha dog ser po shin tu mdzes/ /sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung can/ /skra grol bas ni shin tu brgyan/ /

sprul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/ /sku la na bza' mdzes pa man pas/ /phyag gnyis kha T+wA~M rnal 'byor snod/ /mkha' 'gro drag mo zhes bya bsgom/ /ye shes kyi ni nub phyogs char/ /bdag gi rlung las byung ba yi/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil

krung can/ /kha dog dmar po kun tu 'ong / /kha T+wA~M rnal 'byor snod bsnams shing / /skra grol bas ni mdzes pa ste/ /lus kun sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /mkha' 'gro ro langs

ma bsgom bya/ /ye shes kyi ni lho yi char/ /sa yi ye shes las byung ba/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can/ /kha dog sngon po shin tu mdzes/ /kha T+wA~M rnal 'byor snod bsnams shing / /rgyan rnams kun gyis bklubs pa ste/ /skra grol bas

ni shin tu mdzes/ /ha har rgod pas 'jigs par mdzad/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /mkha' 'gro gtum mo zhes byar bsgom/ /bdag dngos lnga las byung ba yi/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni lnga zhes bya/ /lnga po lnga ru bsgom par bya/ /gzugs

sogs shin tu mdzes pa yin/ /dbang ldan gyi ni phyogs kyi char/ /seng ge'i gdod ni bsam par bya/ /kha dog dkar zhing ser ba ste/ /glang po yi ni stan la bzhugs/ /rdo rje lcags kyu sdigs mdzub can/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /'od

zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yis/ /'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya/ /me mtshams stag mo zhes bya ba/ /rin chen bdun gyi stan la bzhugs/ /phyag gnyis kha dog dkar zhing sngo/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /lag na lcags kyus brgyan pa

ste/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /'bar ba' lus can bsgom par bya/ /bden bral lha mo ce spyang mo/ /ha ha bzhad pas 'jigs par mdzad/ /ma hA yi ni gdan la bzhugs/ /mdog ni dmar zhing

sngo ba ste/ /sku la na bza' mdzes pa gsol/ /phyag gnyis lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /sdigs mdzub kyis ni shin tu mdzes/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya/ /rlung

mtshams lha mo 'ug pa mo/ /kha dog ser zhing dmar ba ste/ /klu yi stan la yang dag bzhugs/ /rgyan du'ang de nyid sbyar bar bya/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can/ /sdigs mdzub lcags kyu zhags pa bsnams/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba

yi/ /'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya/ /dbus kyi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad kyi/ /phyi rol dag ni rnam bzhi la/ /shar du mkha' 'gro rgyal dbang mo/ /phyag gnyis kha dog dkar po ste/ /kyi ni stan la bzhugs/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis bklubs

pa ste/ /shin tu drag cing skra grol pas/ /'od zer sna tshogs yang dag 'bar/ /lag gnyis kha ru bcug nas ni/ /ha har bzhad pas shin tu 'bar/ /byang na 'bar ma rgyal dbang mo/ /kha dog ser mo shin tu 'bar/ /spyi bo'i steng du lag pa gnyis/ /

thal sbyar mar me lta bu 'bar/ /drag mo'i gzugs can tshig pa ste/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bzas brgyan/ /kyi ni stan la bzhugs/ /'od zer me ltar 'bar pa bsgom/ /nub kyi lha mo 'jib byed ma/ /kha dog dmar mo 'jigs

byed can/ /kyi ni stan la bzhugs/ /rab tu mdzes pa'i go bgos shing / /stan la kun tu gnon/ /lag tu skud pa dmar khyer zhing / /thal mo sbyar te khrag 'thung ma/ /drag mo me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/ /lha mo 'jib byed rab tu grags/ /

ngag 'phrog ma ni lho phyogs su/ /kha dog nag mo mnyam pa'i 'od/ /stan la gnas pa yi/ /skra ni gyen du 'bar brgyan pa'i/ /rab tu mdzes pa'i dmar po'i gos/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /sdigs mdzub gtun shing lag na thogs/ /

rnam par rmongs ba'i sems can sgrol/ /drag mo me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/ /thams cad kun nas mkhas pas bsgom/ /de dag gi ni gzugs mdun du/ /dam tshig dag ni bstan par bya/ /rlung dang me yi bdun don la/ /rdo rje ma yi sa bon dbye/ /sgra dang

thig le yang dag mnan/ /char ba'i rgyun zhes bya bar brjod/ /phyag 'tshal dang po sreg byed mtha'/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sa bon yin/ /dbyangs thog dang po'i sa bon ni/ /phyag 'tshal dang po sreg byed mtha'/ /shar phyogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /

sa bon du ni rab tu grags/ /dbyangs yig yi ge gnyis pa ni/ /phyag 'tshal sreg byed sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni byang gi phyogs gnas pa/ /mkha' 'gro drag mo'i sa bon yin/ /sa bon dag ni 'di nyid la/ /dbyug pa glo ru gzhag par bya/ /phyag 'tshal dang po

sreg byed mtha'/ /nub phyogs ro langs ma yi yin/ /sa bon dag ni 'di nyid la/ /steng du thig le sbyin par bya/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa mthar sbyar pa/ /lho phyogs gtum pa mo yi yin/ /ma ning sa bon dang po ni/ /phyag 'tshal sreg byed mtha' dang

sbyar/ /dbang ldan lha mo seng ge ma'i/ /sa bon du ni rab tu grags/ /ma ning sa bon gnyis pa ni/ /phyag 'tshal sreg byed mtha' dang sbyar/ /me mtshams lha mo stag mo yi/ /de kho na nyid sa bon bshad/ /de bzhin ma ning sa bon gsum/ /phyag 'tshal

sreg byed mtha' dang spel/ /bden bral lha mo ce spyad ma/ /khyad par gyi ni sa bon yin/ /ma ning yi ge bzhi pa la/ /phyag 'tshal sreg byed mtha' dang sbyar/ /rlung mtshams hU~M byed 'ug pa mo'i/ /sa bon du ni rab tu sbyar/ sde chen dag ni lnga ba yi/ /yi ge

dag ni gnyis pa bzung / /sa bon rtsa bar sgra dang sbyar/ /phyag 'tshal thog mar sreg byed mtha'/ /shar gyi mkha' 'gro rgyal dbang mo'i/ /sa bon du ni shes par bya/ /sde tshan dag ni lnga pa yi/ /de bzhin yi ge gnyis pa gzung / e dang thig ler sbyar

bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal thog ma sreg byed mtha'/ /byang phyogs lha mo 'bar byed ma'i/ /sa bon yi ge sbyar bar bya/ /sde tshan dag ni lnga pa yi/ /yi ge gnyis pa bzung bar bya/ /o dang re pha thig ler bya/ /phyag 'tshal thog mar sreg byed mthar/ /nub

phyogs lha mo 'jib byed ma'i/ /khyad par gyi ni sa bon yin/ /sde tshan dag ni lnga pa yi/ /yi ge gnyis pa bzung nas su/ /re ba'i yi ge lcags kyu sbyar/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' sbyar ba/ /lhor gnas lha mo 'phrog byed ma'i/ /sa bon du ni rab

tu grags/ /khu tshur gnyis ni bcings nas su/ /dbu ma gnyis ni brkyang nas kyang / /rtse mo phan sprad nas ni/ /ye shes lha mor bstan par bya/ /lag gnyis phan tshun sbyar nas su/ /dbu ma dag ni mthe bong sprad/ /cung zad cig ni bskyed

par bya/ /shar phyogs rdo rje ma la bstan/ /khu tshur mnyam par bcings nas su/ /mthe bong gnyis ni brkyang byas la/ /byang gi phyogs nas brtsams nas su/ /rgya 'di drag mo la yang bstan/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bcings nas su/ /mthe chung gnyis ni

brkyang bar byas/ /nub tu gnas pa'i ro langs ma'i/ /phyag rgya de nyid bcings nas su/ /gung mo gnyis ni brkyang bar bya/ /lho phyogs su ni bshad pa ste/ /de ni phyag rgya bzhi pa'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /khro bo

gnyis ni brkyang nas su/ /rtse mo sprad de gnas pa ni/ /mtshams bzhi yi ni phyag rgya yin/ /lag gnyis thal mo khar bcug nas/ /phu zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya/ /shar phyogs mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo kha sbyar nas/ /spyi bo

ru ni gzhag par bya/ /byang du gnas pa'i 'bar ma la/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bstan par bya/ /phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas su/ /kha ru gzhag ste hU~M zhes bya/ /nub phyogs lha mo 'jib byed ma'i/ /phyag rgya ru ni sbyar bar bya/ /lag gnyis kun tu bskor byas nas/ /

sor mo rnams kyi rtse mor sbyar/ /gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag nas kyang / /lho phyogs 'phrog byed ma la bstan/ /phyag 'tshal dang ni sreg pa yi/ /dbus su hU~M zhes bya ba sbyar/ /lag pa kun tu brkyang la sogs/ /dri sngags phyag rgyar rig par bya/ /bdud

rtsi ro dang thig ler bcas/ /phyag 'tshal dang ni sreg pa mtha'/ /dri yi phyag rgya brkyang nas su/ /khro bo dang ni mthe bong sbyar/ /sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni/ /thams cad rig pas thams cad dbul/ /sde tshan dang bo'i dang po ni/ /phyag 'tshal thog ma sreg

byed mtha'/ /phyag rgya de nyid sbyar nas su/ /dbu ma'i sor mo bsgreng bar bya/ /bdug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya/ /dgu mtha' yi ni sa bon gzung / /phyag 'tshal dang ni sreg byed mtha'/ /khu tshur bcings nas

mthe bong bsgreng / /mar me'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya/ /sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa gzung / /sgra dang thig ler sbyar ba dang / /phyag 'tshal dang ni sreg byed mtha'/ /gtor ma'i phyag rgya dang ni sbyar/ /lag pa gnyis

ni sbyar nas su/ /mthe bong gung mo sbyar bya ba/ /thams cad du ni skad cig bskyod/ /gtor ma'i sngags ni snga mar sbyar/ /gnyis med gtor ma snga ma bzhin/ /de nyid 'di yi mchod par bya/ /sngon du rdzas ni rnam pa lnga/ /sna tshogs pa yi lcags kyu dang / /

dri dang med tog pa dug pa sogs/ /sngags dang phyag rgya phul nas kyang / /phyi nas mchod pa nyi shu yis/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /hU~M zhes pa yi glu blangs nas/ /rnal 'byor ma lus mnyes par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /rked pa'i

mtshams su bzhag nas ni/ /yan lag gsum du hU~M gis bskyod/ /pi wang tshul du bsgreng pa dang / /gling bu'i tshul du 'bud pa dang / /zangs dung tshul du 'bud pa dang / /cang te'i tshul gyis brdung ba dang / /dkrol ba'i tshul gyis dkrol ba dang / /pa Ta

ha ltar brdung ba dang / /gar gyi tshul gyis bskyod pa dang / /bsil g.yab tshul gyis g.yob pa dang / /rgyal mtshan tshul gyis bsgreng ba dang / /bla re'i tshul du bres pa dang / /ba dan tshul du 'phyar ba dang / /gdugs kyi tshul du dbub pa dang / /rdza rnga'i tshul

du brdung ba dang / /rnga zlum tshul du brdung ba dang / /'dzum pa'i tshul du bzhad pa dang / /khro ba'i tshul du khro ba dang / /sgeg pa'i tshul du sgeg pa dang / /'gying ba'i tshul gyis rol pa dang / /mda' 'dren nu mar 'khyud pa dang / /rdo rje gsor zhing phyag

'tshal ba'i/ /phyag 'tshal tshul du 'dud pa ste/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad de nyid kyi/ /dngos po kun gyis mchod par bya/ /de nyid dbyangs su blangs nas su/ /hU~M zhes bya ba bdag gis sprul/ /hU~M gis glu ni blang par bya/ /rdo rje dga' ba'i mthu dang spyan gyis

gzigs/ /yi ge'i dngos por rang bzhin stong par rol/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol dbu ma mkhyen/ /mi 'gyur dgra bcom lhag ma sems pa'o/ /gnyis sprod gnyis 'khyud chu yi bya ba can/ /gnyis med chos skyes thar pa'ang brnyes pa'o/ /bde bas

'khor mnan thar pa'ang btang ba'o/ /thams cad dngos kyis rnal 'byor ma rnams rol/ /rnal 'byor ma lnga sangs rgyas de nyid mkhyen/ /gzugs mang sgyu mas sems can smin mdzad pa/ /rdo rje kun rtogs chos kyi rmongs pa gcod/ /rnal

'byor ma rmongs snying chos tshogs la 'dud/ /rnal 'byor ma yi chos grol nges pa'i gtso la 'dud/ /sems can grol mdzad rnal 'byor bdag la bstod phyag 'tshal/ /thams bdag skyes gcig dngos de la bstod phyag 'tshal/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho

rmongs gcod pa bstod phyag 'tshal/ /de nyid gcig la rtag tu bdag 'dud bstod phyag 'tshal/ /zhes bya bas khyad par du bstod cing / glu dang bstod pas nye bar mchod par bya'o/ /bar bar du hU~M gi sgra dang dril bu bsgrags la smon lam rnam pa gsum

gdab par bya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas/ /snying ga'i phyogs su btsir bar bya/ /oM swa b+hA ba sud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM badzra shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM yo ga shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ g.yas pa pad+ma bsams nas

su/ /g.yon pa rdo rje bsgrengs nas kyang / /pad+ma'i bskor bas bskor nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po bsten par bya/ /oM ha ho hrIHswA hA/ phyag rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor can gyis mtshungs ba ru/ /lha rnams thams cad

bsam par bya/ /'jig rten la sogs ye shes can/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /so sor dri yis mchod pa dang / /so sor me tog gtor ba dang / /so sor bdug pas bdug pa sogs/ /so sor sbyor bar dbul bar bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni

bsres nas su/ /nya phyis la sogs dbul bar bya/ /ha zhes bya pas kha dog dbrog /ho zhes bya bas dri gzhom ste/ /hrIHzhes bya bas nus pa gzhom/ /de ltar mngon par brjod/ /rnam gsum lan gsum brjod nas su/ /lha gsum du ni

bsam par bya/ /pad+ma'i dbang phyug gzugs mdzes gser gyi mdog /dri chu'i ngo bo shin tu rnam snang mdzad/ /myang ba rdo rje'i dbang phyug phyag rdo rje/ /lha gsum dbang phyug tu ni bsgom par bya/ /g.yon pa zla ba'i lag pa yi/ /zla ba'i dbus su bdud rtsi

yi/ /yi ge kun rig gug bskyed bcas/ /mthe bong sor mo sa nyid de/ /srin lag dag ni ri rab bo/ /bsrubs pa'i stobs kyis bdud rtsi yi/ /chu ni rnam gsum shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad la/ /mthe bong 'thor 'thung so sor dbul/ /

de 'og rang gi dngos po yis/ /bdag nyid la ni bsam bya ba/ /rgyas pa lnga yi mchod rten ni/ /rnam pa gsum gyis bkru bar bya/ /lce rtse thig le steng du yang / /blo dang ldan pas gnas gsum mchod/ /ltos shig shin tu mdzes pa'i chos/ /'di la

rtog pa yod min thong / /bram ze khyi dang gdol ba gsum/ /rang bzhin gcig pas lhan cig bza'/ /rnal 'byor pho mo'i 'khor lo la/ /tshigs bcad 'di yis sbyin par bya/ /pad+ma'i bskor ba sngon 'gro bas/ /sems ni shel ltar bsams nas su/ /

g.yas pa pad+ma'i gdan la ni/ /rdo rje rtse gsum bsgreng bar bya/ /'dod chags dri ma dang bral ba'i/ /rin thang med las legs 'ongs chos/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/ /de kho na nyid bdag phyag 'tshal/ /tshigs bcad 'di yis blang

byas te/ /sbyor ba'i dngos grub don du ni/ /kun spyod de nyid ji bzhin du/ /rnal 'byor pa yis kun tu sbyar/ /ji ltar bde bas kun zhes brjod/ /dmar po yi ni rdzas rnams kyis/ /maN+Dal gru gsum gsum du bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /

rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /mthe chung gnyis ni bsgrengs nas su/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/ /g.yas pa cung zad bskum nas su/ /sbyar bas phyag rnams spyan drang ngo / /oM ku ru ku ru sa ma ya a d+hi pa ti hU~M dzaHswA hA/ spyan dang ba'i sngags

dang phyag rgya'o/ /me tog dmar po 'dug pa dang / /dri dang mar me la sogs dbul/ /rgyas pa'i gtor ma'i snod la ni/ /nye ba'i longs spyod gtor mar ldan/ /sha rlon dang ni nya la sogs/ /bza' ba'i rdzas rnams thams cad la/ /bdud

rtsi lnga dang bcas par dgod/ /g.yon gyi cha ru snod gzhag la/ /g.yas su khro bo bstan par bya/ /oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang / /ri bo dang ni ri sul dang / /grong dang bzhi mdo zhing dang ni/ /khyad par du ni khang stong dang / /gdol ba snod dang thang dang

ni/ /khyad par du ni tshul gnas/ /nag po drag po drag chen po/ /lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang / /nag po gcigs dang mi sdug dang / /rga las 'das dang log 'dren rnams/ /rgan byed ma dang drag mo dang / /mi sdug ma dang u ma dang / /

rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang / /mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo/ /nag spom ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/ /drag tu sdang dang 'phyang ba mo/ /'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma/ /'jib byed grong gnas rnal

'byor ma/ /drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo/ /mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma/ /thod phreng can dang kha T+wA~M ma/ /sprul chen ral gri dgra sta can/ /rdo rje bzhin gzhu can la/ /lha yi dbang phyug ma rnams ni/ /de bzhin chen mo mkha' 'gro lnga/ /las

kun rjes su sgrub byed ma/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen mo/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te/ /rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo/ /rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' 'di yis/ /thams cad kun nas 'dir spyon cig /

oM kak+ka D+Th+ha na/ bab+ban+d+ha na/ khakh+khad na/ sar+b+ba duSh+TAM ha na ha na g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya a mu kas+ya shAn+tiM ku ru sU~M hU~M phaT dzaHswA hA/ bdud rtsi yis ni kha bgang nas/ /las kyi go 'phang mngon par bam/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma bsgoms ste/ /las rnam

thams cad rjes su 'grub/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /oM tiSh+Tha hU~M b+hak+Sha b+hAk+Sha dzaHphaT swA hA/ ji bzhin las sbyor sngags sbyar nas/ /gtor ma'i las la sogs pa sbyar/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang / /gsad

bskrad dbye dang bcing ba la/ /phyi rol gtor ma de nyid kyis/ /gtor ma'i las la sogs pas sgrub/ /de nas mchod pa'i khyad par las/ /rung dang mi rung rnam par spang / /lcags kyu la sogs rnam pa lnga/ /de nyid lnga ru bya ba ste/ /lcags kyu che la

dgod pa ni/ /ye shes lhar ni 'dod pa ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyur mi bskyod pa/ /gnas kyi lcags kyur rin chen dbang / /rgyal po'i lcags kyur don yod grub/ /g.yo ba'i lcags kyur 'od dpag med/ /lcags kyu lnga la sogs pa la/ /de nyid thams cad

sbyar bar bya/ /gang zhig 'dod pas lha kun dang / /rnal 'byor ma kun tshim par bya/ /'dod la dga' ba ma yin zhing / /longs spyod phyir ni bsten mi bya/ /rang 'dod thams cad de nyid de/ /mchod pa'i las la sogs pa bya/ /de yi dbus su dpa' bo

rnams/ /A li kA li sbyar bar bya/ /A li kA li rab sbyor gyis/ /lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya/ /de yi dbus nas byung ba yi/ /bdud rtsi'i ro kun myang bar bya/ /rdzas rnams kun gyi lhag ma dag /phyi yi dkyil 'khor du ni brtag /hU~M zhes bya ba'i

glu yis ni/ /bkra shis sgra yis dgang bar bya/ /lus can don phyir shes rab gsol btab pa/ /kun 'khyud la sogs gnyis kyis gnyis sprod cing / /sgyu ma lta bur sbyor bas shin tu brgyan/ /srid pa las sgrol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang 'dod bkra

shis sgra dang ni/ /hU~M hU~M brjod cing dril bu gsil/ /rdo rje thal mo bcings nas ni/ /snying ga'i gnas su rab gzhag la/ /ma lus sems can kun gyi phyir/ /smon lam dag ni gdab par bya/ /sems can thams cad nad med cing / /sems can thams

cad bde gyur cig /gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang 'phrad par shog /ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang / /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /da lta nyid du rjes brtse bas/ /rnal 'byor bstan bcos gnas la

dgod/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas/ /g.yon pa'i snying gar gzhag par bya/ /g.yas pas la brkyang nas ni/ /de yi 'og tu gshegs su gsol/ /oM At+ma tiSh+Tha hU~M swA hA/ de nas rang gi dbugs kyis ni/ /bdag gi lus la bstim par bya/ /

skad cig tshul gyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag gi dngos po mchod par bya/ /oM sar+b+ba duSh+TaM graMh+tA gats+tsha hU~M phaT/ se gol gsum ni gtogs pa yis/ /phyi rol lha rnams gshegs su gsol/ /gzhan gyi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gsum

pa'o// //bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang / /gang gis lcags kyu lnga po brlabs/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par rtog /gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i chos/ /gnyis kyi rtog pa ji ltar spang / /A li kA li ji ltar lags/ /rnal 'byor

bstan bcos tshul rnams ni/ /phyi rol phyag rgya'i sems ni ci/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dang po rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu/ /lnga yi bdag nyid rab tu 'jug /reg na dro ba me yin te/ /du ba ltar

snang rlung yin no/ /sla ba'i rang bzhin chu zhes bya/ /gzugs su snang bas yin no/ /ye shes byin brlabs rdo rje'o/ /lha lnga ru ni bsgom par bya/ /ma lus chu yi dbyibs dang ni/ /zad par bya ba me nyid dang / /de bzhin rtag tu rlung dang ni/ /dad pa mtshungs

don sa dbang po/ /ye shes kyi ni yi ge lnga/ /sgra dang thig ler sbyar bar bya/ /de yi dbus su zla ba yi/ /dbus su bdud rtsi'i yi ge'o/ /lnga po lnga ru brjod par bya/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol ba'i/ /rdo rje chu ni sbyangs pa yis/ /des ni gti mug

bsrings pa yin/ /phyi rol bdud rtsi rdzas bzang po/ /me yis btsos nas spyangs pa ltar/ /lha sogs me yis btsos nas ni/ /lhag ma bshang dang gci ba yin/ /me yis btsos nas sbyang me yi/ /dbus su sbyin sreg rtag tu dbul/ /rdo rje chu yi

sa bon ni/ /sa bon babs pas bzlas nas kyang / /de yi dbus su nyi ma la/ /dur khrod yi ge bsams nas sreg /dngos dang dngos med las grol bas/ /de phyir rmongs las ring du 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i dbang phyug gzugs mdzes shin tu sdug /dri

chu'i ngo bo shin tu rnam snang mdzad/ /myang ba rdo rje dbang phyug phyag rdo rje/ /lha gsum rnam gsum du ni shes par bya/ /ha zhes pa yis kha dog dbrog /ho zhes pa yis dri gzhom ste/ /hrIHzhes bya bas nus pa gzhom/ /de ltar mngon par brjod/ /

bdud rtsi cu zhes bya ba ste/ /lta ni rnam pa gsum du grags/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol bas/ /de phyir rmongs pa ring du spong / /A li bung ba zhes brjod de/ /bung ba rdo rje 'jigs byed yin/ /A li nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i/ /chos

kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin te/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang blo can/ /lus ni ma lus bskyed pa'o/ /bcu dang brgyad kyi rtsa rnams nas/ /dbang po kun gyi bdud rtsi rnams/ /de yi dbus nas drangs nas su/ /A li'i dbus su thim par 'gyur/ /'jigs byed rdo rje

sgra yis te/ /sbyor ba'i rdzas rnams skye ba yin/ /rlung dang me yi bdun don la/ /rdo rje ma yi sa bon sbyar/ /sgra dang thig les yang dag mnan/ /char pa'i rgyun zhes bya bar brjod/ /dbyangs yig dang po mchog sa bon/ /de yi dbus su gzung bar bya/ /

dngos dang dngos med las grol ba/ /de phyir rmongs las ring du 'gyur/ /kA li me tog kun tu mnan/ /rdo rje can gyi lus me tog /'khor ba thams cad bskyed pa ste/ /sa dang kun gyi ma zhes bya/ /ye shes chu yi rgya mtsho 'dir/ /de bzhin shes rab chu

srin nya/ /gnyis med 'dam gyi dbus su ni/ /thabs kyi myu gu de bzhin te/ /ban+du ka ltar kha phye ba'i/ /sbrang rtsi bdud rtsi yi ger gnas/ /kA li bdud rtsi de nyid ni/ /me tog chu yis de bzhin bskor/ /yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le

dang / /rtsa bar sgra ni yang dang sbyar/ /yi ge'i sa bon de nyid ni/ /lha rnams kyi ni rigs kyi yum/ /zla ba'i dbus su bsam par bya/ /bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsgoms pa yis/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol ba/ /de phyir rmongs pa kun tu spong / /

A laM bung ba zhes byar brjod/ /kA li de bzhin gshegs ma yin/ /lus gnyis po las skyes pa dag /bdud rtsi yi ni cho ga mchog /sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i/ /yi ge gsum pa gzung bya ba/ /dbyug pa phyi mo rdo rje can/ /lu gu rgyud kyis dkri

par bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi de nyid kyis/ /lus can bdag nyid pa kru bar bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang / /gang gis shes 'gyur 'chi mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i sgo ni mthong 'gyur zhing / /dag pa'i lus ni skyon med par/ /bdud rtsi sbyor ba kun shes

pas/ /rang dgar bdud rtsi myang bar bya/ /bza' ba lnga yi bye brag gi/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjer nyon/ /gang zhig shes nas zos pa yis/ /myur du 'gro ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /blo chen dang ni ngag dang ni/ /rigs la 'gran dang reg 'gro dang / /

lcags kyu chen po rnal 'byor pas/ /shel dang 'dra bas longs spyad bya/ /rnam shes sa bon bzlas nas ni/ /de yi sa bon gzung bar bya/ /shel gyi sems kyis longs spyod na/ /rnal 'byor rmongs pa gcod par 'gyur/ /dag pa'i sems kyis bza'

bar bya/ /bgegs kyi lcags kyu gcig yin te/ /de yi yan gal la sbyar ba/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyis/ /lcags kyu ru ni sbyar bar bya/ /gnas kyi bdag po'i lcags kyu ni/ /gri zhes bya ba'i sa bon nyid/ /rab tu sbyang nas bsams nas su/ /

rnam par rtog pa ring du spang / /rta yi lcags kyu'i dbus gnas pa/ /thams cad rig pas dgod bya ba/ /rnal 'byor pa yis dzriM zhes pa/ /dag pa'i shel ltar bsam par bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu byin brlabs pas/ /rdo rje'i lus su brjod pa ste/ /sri zhes

bya ba bkod de bza'/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams sdig 'byang ngo / /bcu bzhi ba dang lnga dang / /khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la/ /dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /rab tu 'bad de gtor ma sbyin/ /sgrub bos rnal 'byor bstan bcos la/ /rtag tu

mchod pa'i las byas na/ /spyod dang grol ba gang 'dod dang / /las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro na yang / /myur du dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ /mdza' bo sdug cing yid 'ong bar/ /'thong ba tsam gyis 'grub par

'gyur/ /dbul po nor gyis phongs pa yang / /khyim ni 'byor zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i tshe na rnal 'byor pa/ /bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ /dri zhim dang ni sbyar ba yi/ /rdzas bcu po dag ldan pa la/ /yi ge bcu yi sngags dag ni/ /phyag

'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas te/ /mkha' 'gro gtor ma'i byin brlabs la/ /sgrub po sa 'di yi du bas 'dug /'gro ba thams cad rmongs par 'gyur/ /gur gum dang ni sbyar ba yi/ /rdzas bcud phan tshun

ldan pa yi/ /rnal 'byor pa yis thig le bya/ /skyes bu 'gro la skal bzang 'gyur/ /tsan+dan dang ni sbyar ba yi/ /rdzas bcud dag ni ldan pa yi/ /yan lag dag ni byugs nas su/ /rig na shi yang mi gtong ngo / /dbang po lag dang sbyar ba yi/ /

rdzas bcu dag dang ldan pa ru/ /bza' dang btung bar sbyin byas na/ /dbang med dbang du 'du bar 'gyur/ /sngags ni lan 'bum bzlas nas kyang / /mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs nas/ /de dag las su sbyar bar bya/ /ngas bstan pa la

the tshom med/ /gnyis med ded dpon gnas su ni/ /thig le byas na go char 'gyur/ /de nyid theg pa'i snying po 'dir/ /'khor ba las ni rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi 'od dang skal bzang ma/ /sems can rnams la sdug par

lta/ /bde sdug dag ni 'phrog byed ma/ /de bzhin sgeg pa'i nyams kyis mdzes/ /thun mong nga rgyal bdag 'dzin ma/ /mi brtson ma dang brtson sems can/ /skal bzang lha kun rmongs byed ma/ /kun nas 'joms pa nyid dang ni/ /blo ngan srid pa'i

ngo bo 'joms/ /lha mo byams ma nyid dang ni/ /yid 'ong bdud rtsi ldan grags ma/ /yon tan ldan pa'i lha mo nyid/ /lha mo 'di dag las kyis ni/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'dod pa stsol/ /de ltar yon tan ldan lha mo/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /

pho nya'i las kyi bya ba yis/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor don gyi phyir/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i sgrub thabs ni/ /bcom ldan 'das las nyan par 'tshal/ /pho nya'i las su sbyar ba yis/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /las rnams kun gyi snying po bas/ /rab tu

'bad de pho nya bsgrub/ /shing gcig gi ni drung dag tu/ /cho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzlas/ /khru gang bzhi char bcas pa yi/ /thang ga la ni bri bya ste/ /mtheb sor bcu gnyis tshad du ni/ /kha dog ser po shin tu mdzes/ /phyag gnyis mgo bor thal

sbyar ba'i/ /'od zer me 'bar lha mo bri/ /sgrub pa'i mdun du bkram nas su/ /'bad de mchod pa'i cho ga brtsam/ /dri dang me tog dmar po dang / /sha skam gyis ni bdug par bya/ /sha dang nya sha btsong la sogs/ /nye bar spyad pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /rdzas

lnga dag ni dngos po lnga/ /mchod nas de bzhin 'bum du bzlas/ /dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste/ /gnyis pa la ni nya dri bsnam/ /gsum par shing ni 'gul 'gyur te/ /bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas/ /de yi sngags ni brjod nas kyang / /dam tshig phyag

rgya bstan par bya/ /oM dI pe shwa ri hU~M phuH/ lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/ /spyi bor bzhag ste brjod par bya/ /dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi/ /dam tshig chu ni sbyin par bya/ /'bad de dam tshig byin nas ni/ /lag

pa g.yon pas bzung nas su/ /rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med pas/ /byin gyis rlobs la bdag sgrubs shig /de nas rang gi gzugs bzung nas/ /bza' dang btung sogs ston mo dang / /gser la sogs pa ci yang rung / /bka' bzhin myur du ster

bar 'gyur/ /thun phyed du ni lhan cig spyad/ /'khrig la sred pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /gal te grub par ma gyur na/ /de tshe drag mo'i sa bon bzla/ /sa bon gnyis ni gzir tsam gyis/ /'bar phyed ma yi spyi bo 'gems/ /sems can don 'bad sgrub pa

bos/ /'bar ba chung mar bsgrub par bya/ /grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gzhan gyi/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /thang ga khru gnyis dman pa la/ /mchod dang gtor ma byin brlabs te/ /de 'og gzugs ni bri bar bya/ /dkar zhing dmar la shin tu mdzes/ /

phyag gnyis rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /phyag na sdigs mdzub lcags kyu bsnams/ /skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan/ /'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal/ /mig g.yon ha har bzhad pa bri/ /dur khrod kyi

ni sa phyogs su/ /sgrub pa po yis bris sku dgram/ /kun tu khrag gis byugs nas ni/ /me tog dmar la sogs pas mchod/ /me tog dri dang bdug pa dang / /sha dang nya sha btsong la sogs/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi/ /nye bar spyod pa'i

gtor sbyin cing / /rnal 'byor bsgom pas bzlas nas ni/ /'bum gyis dngos grub skye bar 'gyur/ /lag gnyis thal mo bcings nas su/ /kha ru bcug nas bgad par bya/ /oM DA ki nI hU~M phruM phuH/ sgrub pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /dang po

sa ni g.yo 'gyur te/ /gnyis pa mdun du gad rgyangs sgrogs/ /gsum pa mdun du snang gyur nas/ /bzhi pa la ni bka' lung nod/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi/ /dam tshig 'bad de byin nas ni/ /g.yog mo ru ni sgrub pa yis/ /ci

'dod bka' ni bsgo bar bya/ /dgra rnams bsad cing gtse ba dang / /yan lag gzir ba gang 'dod pa'i/ /las la sogs pa thams cad ni/ /g.yog mo'i las kyis bsgrub par bya/ /gal te 'bum gyis gdon za na/ /rdo rje ma yi sa bon gyis/ /sngon du

bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /mkhas pas gzir par byas te bzla/ /ra dag gi ni pags pa la/ /'bad de thang ga brkyang bar bya/ /'jib byed ma de bri ru gzhug /kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes/ /lus la rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /mdzes pa'i gos ni

gyon pa bri/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /g.yas su dgra sta dgod par bya/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste/ /lci ba yis ni byug byas la/ /me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ /me tog bdug pa mar

me sogs/ /'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin/ /khrag dang nya dang sha dang btsong / /bza' bdag dang sna tshogs dang / /bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang ba sbyin/ /'bad de gnas pas 'bum gcig bzla/ /oM tsu ShI ni A kar+Sha ya phuHphaT/ lag gnyis mnyam

par byas nas ni/ /snyim pa'i tshul gyis bar bskyod bya/ /snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas pas/ /'jib byed ma ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /dang po khyi ni dur ba'i sgra/ /gnyis pa la ni gsal bar dgod/ /gsum pa

la ni mtshon thogs nas/ /bsdigs pa'i phyir ni 'ong bar byed/ /bzhi par mdun du gnas nas ni/ /bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol smra/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis/ /dam tshig dag ni byin nas su/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /dbul

bo bdag gis khyod bsgrubs so/ /de nyi ma re re bzhin/ /gser phrang phyed ster bar 'gyur/ /gal te 'bum gyis ma 'grub na/ /ro langs snying pos gzir te bzla/ /sa bon 'di yis gzir tsam gyis/ /'jib byed ma yi mgo 'gems so/ /chu

'gram gyi nis phyogs su/ /ka ma po tsi ni bsgrub par bya/ /ba lang la sogs ko ba ni/ /brkyang ste 'phrog byed 'dri ru gzhug /lus ni sbrul gyis brgyan pa ste/ /kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od/ /skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan/ /gos dmar bgos

shing phyag gnyis mdzes/ /ral gri dang ni zhags pa thogs/ /ha har bzhad cing rnam gtsigs pa/ /khrag gis maN+Dal byugs nas ni/ /dri dang me tog bdug pas bdug /rgyas pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /sha dang nya dang btsong la sogs/ /

nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /sngon bzhin lha yi gtor ma sbyin/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom zhing bzlas/ /'bum gcig gis ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur/ /gnyis pa la ni char chen 'bebs/ /

mdun du rdo rje'i sgra 'byin cing / /gsum par thog ni 'bab 'gyur te/ /bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi/ /dam tshig de nas 'bad de sbyin/ /oM k+ShaM kruM phraM phuHphaT/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas su/ /de yi sngags ni

brjod par bya/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /mdun na thal mo sbyar bas ni/ /ci zhig bgyi zhes brjod par 'gyur/ /ti se gangs kyi rtse ru ni/ /rtse phyir khyod kyis nga khrid la/ /slar yang 'dir ni 'ong ba dang / /rgyal po'i bu mo'am gzhan yang

rung / /ba 'dod pa de khrid de shog /gser dang dngul dang zangs la sogs/ /bza' dang btung dang bgo ba ni/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyer te 'ong / /lha mi'i chung ma gang yang rung / /ti se gangs kyi rtse ru ni/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin khrid par byed/ /

bstan pa'i las kyis ma 'grub na/ /las gzhan gyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su/ /de yi rkang pa g.yon pa yis/ /mnan te lnga brgya bzlas nas ni/ /gdon

mi zab rab grub par 'gyur/ /gal te des kyang ma 'grub na/ /dpa' bo'i dbus su bkug nas ni/ /dum bu dum bur gtub par bya/ /kriM zhes bya dang gsod pa mtha'/ /hU~M gi sa bon bsgoms pa yis/ /thams cad du ni bza' bar bsam/ /des

ni bsgrub bya'i rnal 'byor ma/ /thams cad kyi ni dbang phyug ma'ang / /gal te ma 'grub 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bstan pa'i las kyis ma 'grub na/ /b+ha la ta ka nag po'i shing / /me 'bar ba yi dbus su ni/ /khrag dang bcas pa'i yungs kar ni/ /

nyi ma phyed na hU~M zhes ni/ /brjod cing brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs na/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'chi 'gyur ba'am/ /cho nges 'debs shing 'ongs nas su/ /nges par las rnams sgrub byed par/ /ngas bstan pa la the tshom med/ /khro bo sngon po mdzes pa ste/ /

khyod ni dam tshig yid du 'ong / /nor bu rin chen gces bcings ba'i/ /dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa ste/ /bdag ni 'khor ba las bsgral phyir/ /dpa' bos gnang gis gtang du gsol/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshoms dbus su/ /bzang po sgo 'di phye ste

thong / /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma gsang che/ /gsang dang gsang bas shes bya ba/ /ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /g.yas kyi cha ru rnal

'byor pa/ /g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid de/ /sor mo khar ni 'jug byed pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o/ /thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed pa/ /g+ho g+hu/ 'bar byed ma yi mtshan ma yi/ /gu g+hu/ mthe bo 'tshir bar byed pa yi/ /'jib byed ma

yi mtshan ma'o/ /mug+hu/ lag pa rna bar brde bas pa ni/ /blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no/ /lu g+hu/ sna rtser skyor mo brdabs pa ni/ /thugs bde mi bde 'dri ba yin/ /DaSh+Ta/ sha ba'i mgo ltar stod byed pa/ /rnal 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /

gan+d+ho de/ gang zhig smin ma dbus reg pa/ /nga yi snying sdug grogs po'o/ /ag+ne da ha/ so yis lce ni 'tshir byed pa/ /lus nang gtor ma bza' zhes pa'o/ b+hak+Sha so/ lag pa skra la 'ju byed pa/ /khyod kyi khyim du bas phyin pa'o/ /dwe ra ti/ /

lag pa snying gar reg byed na/ /da ni nga yi yid 'ong ba'o/ /ru tsa Ta ba ta/ sna rtser khu tshur 'chang ba ni/ /med do zhes ni ston pa'o/ /shUn+ya tA/ lag pa brkyang ste ltor brdebs na/ /phun sum ldan par yod zhes pa'o/ /bip+d+ha ka si Da/ lte ba ru

ni nyid byed na/ /kha zas bza' bar 'dod pa'o/ /tsaN+Da li ka /mdzub mo mdun du ston byed na/ /zhe ga nag gtum la drag pa yin/ /nI la da N+Da pa ta/ smin ma la ni reg byed na/ /'dir 'dod pa ni nga la ston/ /a naM gA yud+d+ha/ lce ni 'dril bar

byed pa dag /da ltar 'chi zhes bya ba'o/ /dur+k+ka ti/ kun tu lta bar byed pa ni/ /tshes grangs shes par 'dod pa'o/ /tA ra ga NaH/ tshes gcig nas ni brtsams nas su/ /mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya/ /nyi tshod yi ge la sogs pa/ /sngar bstan bzhin du

mdun du reg /gi ri to/ steng du lta bar byed pa ni/ /nyin phyed dga' bar rol pa'o/ /sa mats+tsha yA/ 'dzum dang bcas pas lta byed cing / /lag pa lag pas bzung nas su/ /rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa/ /nor byin zhes bya ba'o/ /dzIM N+Na ba ta/

lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na/ /sa l+ya bad/ mthe bong gis ni rin lag la/ /reg pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /so ma/ mthe bong khro bo bza' la sogs/ /su r+ya bad/ rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dga' ba la rol pa'i ngag gi phyag rgya

dang brda'i mtshan nyid do/ /gzhan gyi gdan zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// //mtshon cha'i mtshan nyid gzhan dag ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /de nyid bzhi po ji lta bu/ /shes nas ji ltar sbyar

bar bgyi/ /'khor ba las sgrol mtshan nyid ni/ /yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /dang po de nyid rdo rje ni/ /dril bu yang ni gnyis pa'o/ /bgrang ba'i phreng ba gsum pa ste/ /ye shes mtshan nyid bzhi ba'o/ /de nyid bzhi yi dpa' rlabs kyis/ /ji ltar

'dod bzhin pha rol sgrol/ /dbus kyi lha ni rnam snang mdzad/ /thams cad thog mar mi bskyod pa/ /lho yi rtse mor rin chen 'byung / /nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dgod/ /byang gi phyogs su don yod grub/ /rtse mo lnga ni lha rnams so/ /pad+ma byang chub

yan lag brgyad/ /ji bzhin sa ru gzhag par bya/ /phyag na pad+ma byams pa dang / /nam mkha' dang ni kun tu bzang / /gnod sbyin bdag dang gzhan gi dpal/ /sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / /lha ni brgyad po 'di dag nyid/ /shar la sogs par ji bzhin

bsam/ /dbus kyi bcu gsum sgo nga ru/ /ye shes lha ni thim par bya/ /pad+ma brgyad la lha mo brgyad/ /ji bzhin gnas su sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin du/ /zhags pa lcags sgrog sgrol ma ste/ /de ltar lha mo bzhi po dag /de bzhin

phyogs bzhir rol pa yin/ /mtshams kyi cha ni rnam pa bzhir/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsam bya ba/ /skul byed rin chen sgrol ma dang / /rdo rje lcags sgrog ming can de/ /gzhan gyis mi thub zhes bya ste/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma kun la dgod/ /rtse mo lnga

ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /snga ma ji bzhin bsam par bya/ /shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /byang du drag mo zhes bya ste/ /nub tu de bzhin ro langs ma/ /lho yi phyogs su gtum mo gnas/ /dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ /rdo rje de kho na yi lha/ /mkhas pa

yis ni shes par bya/ /cha gsum gsal bar gzung ba la/ /ska rags kyis ni shin tu brgyan/ /ut+pal ku mud ltar mdzes/ /rin chen pad+ma yang dag gnas/ /phyogs la sogs pa brgyad dang ni/ /dbu ma'i sangs rgyas nyid dang dgu/ /rtse mo dgu

yi lha nyid de/ /lha dgu yis ni byin gyis brlabs/ /chu srin las ni byung ba ni/ /rtse mo 'od zer zla bar gnas/ /rtse mo dgu ba zhes bya ba/ /ye shes rdo rje 'gro ba sgrol/ /rdo rje de nyid gang yin pas/ /bdag nyid rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsam/ /rdo rje'i

snying po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje yi ni sems su bya/ /rdo rje dag pas brtan byas nas/ /chos rnams rdo rje las gzhan med/ /thams cad rdo rje de nyid yin/ /rdo rje las kyi snying po'o/ /rdo rje 'pho ba sbyor ba'i bdag /rdo rje 'khor bsgrol par byed/ /rdo rje

'gugs pa sbyor ba'i bdag /rdo rje bcings ba'i sbyor bar ldan/ /bdun pa de bzhin nyon mongs ldan/ /rnam shes bcas pa'i sgron ma ni/ /ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas su/ /phyogs kun tu ni snang bar byed/ /rdo rje'i sgrub pa la sogs kun/ /rdo rje'i bdag

nyid pa lta bar bya/ /chos kyi 'ching ba rdo rje ste/ /thar pa mchog 'bad rdo rje'o/ /rdo rje pad+ma bzung nas ni/ /de nyid thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje pad+mor zhugs pa ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /dril bu yi ni mtshan nyid rnams/ /nyon cig rdo rje

'dzin rgyal po/ /shes rab sgra yi de nyid ni/ /thos pas srid pa las sgrol ba'i/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs par/ /byang chub snying por rnam par gnas/ /thams cad rigs pas phyogs kun tu/ /gnas pa'i 'jig rten khams

mthar thug /phyogs brgyad zhes ni bya ba rnams/ /lha mo brgyad du rab tu grags/ /yi ge brgyad kyi sa bon ni/ /phyogs brgyad du ni dgod par bya/ /shar du lha mo sgrol ma ste/ /byang gi phyogs su gos dkar mo/ /nub kyi phyogs su mA ma kI/ /

lho yi phyogs su sangs rgyas spyan/ /mdog bzang dbyangs snyan mdzes pa dang / /bzhi ba rdo rje phreng ba mo/ /dbus su nam mkha'i rang bzhin la/ /gzugs kun rdzogs shing shin tu mdzes/ /pad+ma rgyas la yang dag 'byung / /

gzugs med gnas kyi phyogs su ni/ /shes rab bdud rtsi bum pa 'dra/ /shes rab bdud rtsi gnas dag la/ /de yi dbus kyi stan dag la/ /shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo/ /gzugs mdzes yon tan rnams kyi gnas/ /steng gi pad+ma rdo rje rnams/ /snga

ma bzhin du bsam par bya/ /dbus kyi ye shes dbyug pa ste/ /thams cad sprod dang bsdud pa po'o/ /A li kA li'i rab sbyor gyis/ /phyogs brgyad du ni bskyod par bya/ /A li kA li'i rab sbyor bas/ /'khor ba thams cad gcod pa ste/ /rdo rje dril bu'i thabs

yin te/ /thabs kyis rdo rje'i dbus gnas so/ /g.yas bar nyi ma bsams nas su/ /g.yon pa ru ni zla ba dgod/ /lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su/ /pad+ma'i rnam pa lag tu bskor/ /lus rnams la ni thabs dang sbyar/ /rang 'dod lha rnams bsam

par bya/ /rdo rje gsor bas sgrol ba ste/ /'khor ba sgrol ba yang dag byung / /hU~M zhes bya ba'i glu yis ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rjes chags bya/ /rdo rje gsor bas mdzes pa yis/ /sems can thams cad mdzes par bya/ /rnam thar chos su bya ba ste/ /

rdo rje shin tu snying po mchog /oM badzra gaN+De ho hU~M/ oM badzra d+harmA ra Ni ta/ pra ra Ni ta/ saM prar Ni ta/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha k+Shi tra pra tsA li te/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi hA nA dA swa b+hA ba na/ badzra d+harma hr-i da ya a ba san+to ShaNi/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ho ho ho/ a a a swA hA/ shes rab

thabs kyi gzugs brnyan gyis/ /shes rab thabs kyis dkrol bar bya/ /shes rab thabs kyi chos kyis ni/ /'gro ba rnams kyis rtags bya'am/ /mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/ /sems can don phyir dkrol bar bya/ /rdo rje de kho na yis bzung / /

chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /sems can don byed rnal 'byor pas/ /shes rab thabs su blta bar bya/ /de nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /glang chen dril bu'i sgra dang mtshungs/ /rnal 'byor de nyid dman pa yi/ /dngos grub ring bar shes par bya/ /de nas gsang

dang phra ba yi/ /rdo rje'i mtshan nyid gzung ba ste/ /yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub byed pa/ /dbu ma'i tshig ni bskor ba la/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje cha gsum bya/ /de nyid kyi ni cha gcig gis/ /phra ba'i rdo rje rab tu brtag /spyi gtsug lag

pa la sogs pa/ /rtag tu dag byed khu tshur bcang / /slob dpon rdo rje brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /'dod don thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog /bgrang phreng la sogs gzung ba ni/ /yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni

the tshom med/ /shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang / /gzhan yang nor bu dkar po sogs/ /zhi sogs las la khyad par gyi/ /bgrang phreng gi ni khyad nyid ni/ /gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang / /pad+ma sa bon khyad par du/ /rgyas pa yi ni bgrang phreng ste/ /

mkhas pa rnams kyis bgrang bar bya/ /gur kum la sogs dri zhim pa'i/ /dri rnams kun gyi khyad par las/ /ril bur byas te dmar por btsos/ /dbang du sdud par rab tu grags/ /rudwAk+Sha dang lung tang dang / /mi yi rus pa de bzhin te/ /drag po'i

las la sbyar bar bya/ /mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag la/ /bu tra dzi ni las kun bya/ /sngags sgrub pa la lnga bcu ste/ /dbang la de yi phyed du bya/ /zhi la brgya phrag gcig yin te/ /rgyas pa la ni brgyad lhag pa'o/ /mngon

spyo la ni drug cu'o/ /las kyi bya brag gis ni sbyar/ /las kyi bye brag ji bzhin du/ /bgrang phreng dag ni brtag par bya/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams brgyad dang ni/ /dbu ma nyid dang sangs rgyas dgu/ /lha dgu yi ni skud pa la/ /lha dgus byin gyis

brlab par bya/ /gzugs rdzogs shin tu mdzes pa dang / /gtsang zhing dang ldan snyan par smra/ /de yis bkal ba'i bgrang phreng gis/ /grol ba'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur/ /skud pa rnams ni sangs rgyas tshul/ /ril bu rnams ni dgra

bcom yin/ /'og ma mchod rten du ni bstan/ /steng ma chos kyi dbyings yin no/ /mchod rten chos kyi dbang po'o/ /lag bar nyi ma bsams nas su/ /dbyangs kyi dang po yi ge ni/ /lag pa yi ni dbus dag tu/ /dmar po la ni dmar po bsgos/ /

g.yon pa zla ba'i dbus su ni/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsam bya ba/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya/ /g.yas pa'i sor mo rdo rjer bsam/ /g.yon pa pad+ma'i 'dab mar bsgom/ /rdo rje pad+ma sbyor ba yis/ /kha sbyor dbus

su phreng bzhag la/ /de nyid thams cad bsgoms pa yis/ /bgrang phreng byin gyis brlab par bya/ /sor mo dag gi bye brag gis/ /de nas sngags pas bzlas ba bya/ /rdo rje ma dngos g.yon pa ste/ /g.yas pa rdo rje'i ngo bo'o/ /dkar po dud pa dung dang ni/ /

pad+ma g.yas kyi sor mo ste/ /gi wang dri gsum 'jigs pa dang / /sa gdugs g.yon par dgod pa dang / /ye shes rnam shes mthe bong gnyis/ /lag la sogs pa'i las can ma/ /zhi ba la ni khro bos bgrang / /rgyas pa la ni gung mo ste/ /srin lag

la ni dbang du bstan/ /tha mas mngon par spyod pa ste/ /mthe bong rdo rje lcags kyu ni/ /lha nyid dgug pa'i bsam pa yin/ /mnyam par gzhag ste bzlas bsgoms na/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de nyid me pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de nyid med pa'i

sngags bzlas dang / /de nyid med pa'i rdo rje dril/ /phyag rgya de nyid med 'byung ba/ /rnal 'byor pa yis grub pa med/ /rnal 'byor de nyid dmigs na ni/ /de nyid thams cad kun bya'o/ /yi ge'i rgyu las byung ba'i dngos/ /sngags kyi snying po mdzes pa ste/ /

rang bzhin med pa'i grangs bzlas na/ /rnal 'byor ma yi snying po 'grub/ /bram ze rgyal rigs dmangs rigs gcig /rnal 'byor ma yi dra ba 'grub/ /oM pa de pa de ma hA pa de dz+nyA na sarba bud+d+ha ma hA b+hA be/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ho ho ho/ AHswA hA/ sngags 'di yis

ni sbyang byas na/ /bgrang phreng gi ni lha rnams 'grub/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub 'gyur te/ /mi gsal ba ni ring bar 'gyur/ /ye shes de dag bye brag dag /yang dag rdo rje chen pos nyon/ /ye shes bye brag ring du gnas/ /thun mong ye shes brjod

pa ste/ /dman dang rab dman dman pa can/ /gnod sbyin lha min grub pa po/ /klu dang byol song gsang ba pa/ /lto 'phye dang ni mi'am ci/ /mi dang mkha' 'gro ma/ /dmyal bar 'tshang ba'i sems can dang / /byol song gzugs su brjod pa

ste/ /phra mo sgo nga gzung mi nus/ /chu dang me dang rlung dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni sa yi khams/ /brtan pa de nyid thams cad dang / /rtsa dang 'dab ma phra ba dang / /bong ba rdo dang brag la sogs/ /thams cad ye shes byin gyis brlabs/ /ye shes med na skye mi

'gyur/ /ye shes thams cad kun rig pa'o/ /ye shes thar par gang gis ni/ /ye shes thun mong byin brlabs pa/ /bye brag gzhan ni ji lta bu/ /lha las rol mo nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nyi shu rtsa gsum lha yi

gnas/ /gong nas gong du gnyis 'gyur te/ /'dod pa lnga yi ye shes dag /gong ma'i ye shes ye shes 'phel/ /gsang ba'i ye shes reg pa ste/ /lha min ye shes khro bo'o/ /ye shes zhen pa ste/ /dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs shing

du/ /byol song ye shes glen pa ste/ /brtan pa rnams ni sems med pa'o/ /mi rnams ye shes rnam pa lnga/ /bye brag tu ni shes par bya/ /glen pas sgribs dang lkugs pa dang / /bud med ye shes slu brid do/ /byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/ /

ye shes de nyid bye brag dag /rnal 'byor bstan bcos kyis spyangs pa/ /skye ba bye ba stong phrag du/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul yin/ /rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes 'brangs nas/ /'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya/ /sgra sgrogs phyi rol

bstan bcos ni/ /gar gi gnas dang mtshungs pa ste/ /blo ldan rnal 'byor bstan bcos kyis/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu thob/ /snying po snying po bstan bcos te/ /rnal 'byor gsang ba'i rim yin no/ /sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye

ba dang po'o// //'khor los sgrub pa'i khyad par dag /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams dang / /bsrung dang mngon par spyod pa dang / /re'u mig dgu sogs 'khor lo ni/ /phyi rol mu khyud bskor bar bya/ /'khor lo las

kyi kha dog gis/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ sa bon de dag thams cad ni/ /phyag 'tshal tham dbus su bya/ /dbus su ming dang bsrung ba yis/ /tshig kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /mnyam nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin

chus/ /bdag gi las ni bkru bar bya/ /mnyam nyid thams cad rig pas gnas/ /srung ba'i 'khor los bsrung bar bya/ /ye shes can gyis bsrung bsgoms na/ /'jigs pa kun las ring bar 'gyur/ /sems can dngos po med pa ru/ /sbyor ba'i dngos

pos 'jigs pa la/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad+ma'i gdan ni bsam par bya/ /sgrol ma'i rgyud du bsgoms pa yis/ /bdag gi lus ni rnam par sprul/ /oM tA re swA hA/ mgo la'o/ /oM tut+tA re swA hA/ mig la'o/ /oM tu re swA hA/

sna la'o/ /oM tu swA hA/ rna ba la'o/ /oM re swA hA/ lce la'o/ /oM tA re ni swA hA/ snying gar ro/ /yan lag drug tu rtag tu dgod/ /'phags ma sgrol ma bsam bya ba/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /rgyan rnams thams cad

kyis ni bklubs/ /kun tu mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang / /gzhan gyi rna drung ut+pal bsnams/ /thams cad 'od zer rnam bsgoms nas/ /khyad par du ni sngags bzlas bya/ /thams cad yon tan can du bsgom/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ srung ba'i las

thams cad kyi sngags so/ /rgyal po'i btson ra dgra phyogs dang / /nyam nga'i lam du 'gro ba dang / /yan lag sna tshogs rims dang ni/ /chu dang dug gis 'chi la sogs/ /gang dang gang du 'jigs pa'i gnas/ /de dang der ni bsam par bya/ /shes rab

zhen dang le lo sogs/ /'khor lo bris nas bcang bar bya/ /srung ba bzang po 'di yis ni/ /'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /srung ba 'di dag thams cad ni/ /de nyid sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/ /'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ /phyi rol mu

khyud bskor nas su/ /dbus su thog ma tha ma ste/ /bzlas pa thams cad gzhag par bya/ /mu khyud dbyangs kyis bskor nas su/ /'khor lo dkar bo bsam par bya/ /yan lag thams cad phye ba yis/ /mnyam nyid stong bar bsams nas su/ /sngon gyi

mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/ /sngar bstan bzhin du sbyar bar bya/ /'khor lo 'di ltar bsgom pa yis/ /las 'dis shes rab 'bar bar 'gyur/ /oM pradz+nye pradz+nye ma hA pradz+nye hU~M swA hA/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar bas su/ /dngos po bsgom pas bsgom par bya/ /zla

ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /shes rab bdag nyid bsgoms nas su/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu 'bar/ /shes rab dngos po bsgoms nas su/ /sa bon 'di

ni bzlas byas nas/ /shes rab myur du 'phel bar 'gyur/ /glen dang snyom las blun po yang / /sbyor ba 'di yis shes rab 'phel/ /snying po re'u mig dgu ru bya/ /de bzhin bar ma bcu gnyis te/ /phyi rol re'u mig bcu drug go/ /mthar thug mu khyud de

bzhin te/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mthar sbyar ba'i/ /dbus su bdag gi sems gzhag la/ /sgra dang thig le ldan pa yis/ /yi ge brgyad po snying por dgod/ /bcu gnyis po la dbyangs sa bon/ /ma ning spangs pa dri bar bya/ /sde tshan

gsum gyi yi ge rnams/ /yi ge lhag ma gcig dang bcas/ /sgra dang thig ler ldan pa dag /bcu drug gnas su gzhag par bya/ /gsod pa'i yi ge khyud la/ /thams cad rig pas kun tu bskor/ /dang po dkar po rabs ma bya ste/ /gnyis pa ser por bsgom

par bya/ /gsum pa dag ni dmar po ste/ /de bzhin bzhi ba sngon po'o/ /sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/ /mnyam nyid stong par yang dag gnas/ /mnyam nyid lta ba bskyed nas su/ /'khor lo 'di ni bsgom par bya/ /mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms

pa yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /kun nas thams cad 'bar ba ste/ /me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od kyis ni/ /bdud rnams thams cad sreg par byed/ /ye shes 'khor lo bsgoms pa yis/ /kun nas nyon mongs g.yogs pa yang / /sangs

rgyas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed nas su/ /bdag nyid nam mkha' bsgom byas la/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yis/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su sa bon ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni gzung bya ste/ /sde

tshan dang po gang yin pa'i/ /yi ge dang po bzung nas su/ /lcags kyu yis ni gzir bya ba/ /rtsa bar re pa sbyar bya ba/ /bdud rtsi'i thig le steng du dgod/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba ni/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag

pa bsgom/ /rgyal po rgyal po'i pho brang dang / /yid can gyis ni bsam par bya/ /yi ge nyis 'gyur thigs pa dang / /rtsa bar sga ni sbyar bar bya/ /bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste/ /'bum phrag gcig gis dbang du sdud/ /bu mo rnams kyis gang bsams

pa/ /ming dang bcas nas bsgrubs nas ni/ /bsam pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /ngas bstan pa la the tshom med/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid thams cad ni/ /sngar bzhin du ni stong pa nyid/ /thams cad bdag nyid bsams nas su/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor

dbus gnas par/ /bdud rtsi kun rig phyi mor bcas/ /'od zer sna tshogs rnam par 'phro/ /'od zer ser po shin tu mdzes/ /gzugs sdug 'od zer 'phro bar bsam/ /rin chen la sogs gang 'dod pa/ /thams cad rang gi dbugs kyis dgug /sgrub pa po

yi lus la ni/ /de yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rlung gi sa bon gyis bskor ba'i/ /lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgom par bya/ /kha dog la sogs dmar bsams shing / /gzugs kyang kha dog dmar por bsgom/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /

ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya/ /gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/ /g.yon pa lcags kyu'i tshul gyis ni/ /yid ni 'gugs pa bsgom par bya/ /lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgoms pa yis/ /mdzub mo lcags

kyu bskyod par bya/ /yi ge nyis 'gyur thigs pa dang / /rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya/ /bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste/ /'bum phrag gcig gis dbang du 'grub/ /de ltar bsgom zhing bzlas nas su/ /sor mo yang ni bskyod byas na/ /bsgrub bya'i yid ni

bskyed 'gyur bar/ /'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /'khor lo 'dab ma med pa la/ /mu khyud kyis ni bskor bar bya/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad kyis/ /mu khyud mkhas pas bskor bar bya/ /sde tshan lnga pa gang yin pa/ /yi ge gsum

pa bzung nas su/ /i dang re pha sbyar nas su/ /'bad pas dbus su bzhag nas kyang / /ye shes can gyi sa bon 'di/ /sgra yi bdun pa dang sbyar la/ /'dab ma rnams la'ang de nyid bya/ /'dab mar 'di nyid gzhag par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi grub 'dod

pas/ /'od zer sna tshogs rab 'bar bas/ /gser gyi mdog tu bsgom par bya/ /sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa ru/ /sngar bstan bzhin du mkhas pas bsgom/ /de 'og lha mo nor rgyun gyi/ /gzugs su bdag nyid bskyad par bya/ /gzugs

mdzes shin tu yongs su rdzogs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/ /thams cad lag g.yas mi 'jigs sbyin/ /g.yon pa 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams/ /dbus su bstan pa'i sa bon ni/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' sbyar te/ /de ltar bsgom

zhing bzlas pa yis/ /rgyas pa'i sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /lha mo nor ldan rnal 'byor gyis/ /rgyas pa ru ni grags pa yin/ /bdag nyid bye brag gzhan dag tu/ /rnam gzhag thams cad de bzhin no/ /bdag nyid sngon gyi mtshan nyid kyis/ /stong pa'i

de nyid bsgoms nas su/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes rnam shes dngos po bsgom/ /'dab ma brgyad pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /dbus su sa bon bsgoms

nas su/ /phyi rol 'khor lo'i mu khyud la/ /dbyangs kyi sa bon bskor bar bya/ /phyogs kyi 'dab mar bdud rtsi bzhi/ /gug skyed kun dang sbyar bar bya/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la yang / /sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor

rdzogs pa ni/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba can/ /rin chen bdun gyis mdzes pa ste/ /rang gi lus la bsgom par bya/ /gang 'dod yid ni rtog bya'i phyir/ /de yi 'od zer sbyar bar bya/ /'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med pas/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par

bya/ /rmugs dang glen dang snyom las dang / /shes rab zhan cing lta ngan rnams/ /rnal 'byor ba yis skad cig la/ /snyom las la sogs ring du spong / /mnyam gzhag cung zad bltas nas su/ /rdul phran dkar po spro bar bya/ /phyogs bcur song ste khyab nas

ni/ /thams cad rim pas kun snang bya/ /ye shes sems la bltas nas ni/ /rnal 'byor pha rol sems shes 'gyur/ /sems ni mnyam par bcings nas su/ /mnyam gzhag 'khor lor blta bar bya/ /mnyam nyid ye shes mthong ba yis/ /'khor

ba'i pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes sa bon gyis sprul te/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa yis/ /kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis bklubs

pa ste/ /phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas/ /snying ga'i phyogs su 'tsher bar mdzad/ /kha dog dkar po mdzes pa yi/ /'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad gtso/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par spro/ /spro ba sna tshogs mi zad pas/ /sems can khams

ni sgrol bar mdzad/ /shes rab rdo rjes 'gro sgrol ba/ /dbyangs yig dang po mchog sa bon/ /mtha' ru tsheg drag sbyar bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan/ /sa bon 'di ni bsgoms nas su/ /mnyam gzhag dngos por bzlas nas ni/ /byang chub

rim pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// //byin brlabs sbyor ba'i ngo bo dag /gang gis sems can rnams la bstan/ /byin brlabs rim pa ji lta bu/ /lha las gzigs mo nyan par 'tshal/ /

sems can rmongs pa gso ba'i phyir/ /byin gyis rlob pa'i chos bstan pa/ /yang dag 'khor bsgrol ba yi/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /snying gar zla ba bsam ma nas su/ /hU~M gi sa bon dbus su bsam/ /'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal/ /nyi

ma'i dbus su gzhag par bya/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /me yi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /gnas rnams thams cad 'bar ba yis/ /kun nas thams cad bsregs nas su/ /sngon bzhin mtshan nyid bstan pa yi/ /dang po stong

pa nyid du bya/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni bsam par bya/ /dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon/ /gya gyu phyag na rdo rje ste/ /lus ni 'jam pa'i mchog yin no/ /mgo dang bum pa byams pa ste/ /steng du

'bar ba'i ma yig ni/ /'khor ba thams cad sgrol ba po/ /'jig rten gsum gyi grub 'dod na/ /sa bon de ni bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma'i stan la gnas pa yi/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas su/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro'i rang bzhin du/ /bdag nyid ye shes

kyis bsrung ba/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes/ /steng gi rdo rje cod pan la/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /kha T+wA~M ga dang rnal 'byor snod/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/ /'od

zer sna tshogs 'bar ba du/ /dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/ /sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i/ /rdo rje dbyug pa gug skyed bcas/ /lu gu rgyud la sogs pas dkri/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan/ /'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas nas

su/ /gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis ni/ /de yi 'og tu las rnams bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pas/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/ /cho gar ldan pas sbyin par bya/ /de yi mod la 'bab par 'gyur/ /babs nas rnal 'byor ba yis ni/ /

rdo rje'i glu ni blang bar bya/ /rol cig rol cig rdo rje khyod/ /zhan dang drag po sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad kun nas khyod kyis gsol/ /skad cig 'khor las bdag mnyam bsgral/ /glu 'di yis ni gar byed de/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /oM tiSh+Tha yo ga

ma hA krod+ha hU~M hU~M hU~M swA hA/ 'di ni tshi ma bya thams cad bya/ /rnal 'byor ma kun bstan par bya/ /dman dang bar dang mchog rnams la/ /de yi 'og tu chos bstan bya/ /oM yo ga A be sha ya/ shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas/ /'di yis sngon du

bsnyen par bya/ /gnyis med gtor ma ldan pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis yungs kar dang / /hU~M gi sgra ni 'jigs pa yis/ /sgrub ba po yis 'dis gdab bya/ /sngar gyi smos pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed/ /oM ma na g+hu ru

g+hu ru/ d+h+ri sti tsi li tsi li hU~M hU~M phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas na/ /bltas pas 'bebs pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchod cing gang la bltas pa yi/ /mthong bar byas te gar byed do/ /oM ma la ma li hU~M phaT/ 'bum phrag gsum gyis 'grub

'gyur te/ /'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur/ /oM ma hA tsi li tsi li hU~M hU~M phaT/ 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa yis/ /skyes sogs ring po nas kyang 'bebs/ /oM ba ta li ba ta li hU~M phaT/ rnal 'byor 'bum phrag gsum du ni/ /bzlas

pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya/ /'byung po gsang ba sogs/ /lha rnams thams cad 'bebs par byed/ /oM pa ta ni pa ta ni hU~M phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum phrag gcig /bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya/ /chu dang bong ba rdo dang ni/ /shing

rnams kun la 'bebs par byed/ /dkyil 'khor sngon du slob dpon gyis/ /sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas ni/ /shin tu dul zhing brtags pa yis/ /de 'og dkyil 'khor de nyid bsam/ /lha ni mnyes par ma byas na/ /bdag nyid la ni co 'dri yin/ /

oM be ta li rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M hU~M hU~M g+h+raM phuHphaT/ thal par lan bdun par du ni/ /mngon par bzlas te ro la gtor/ /nyin zhag bdun du bzhag na yang / /cis kyang za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /oM phu ru phu ru/ maM tre dzaHhU~M phuHphaT/ skud pa dmar la brgyad brgya ru/ /

yongs su bzlas dang ldan pa yi/ /gang gi mgrin par bcings gyur na/ /ce spyang bzhin tu 'khyam par 'gyur/ /skud pa dang ni bral gyur na/ /bdag nyid 'dod pa bzhin du byed/ /byin rlabs rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom

zhing bzlas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsam bya/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /'od zer sna tshogs shin tu 'bar/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /mngon du bsgrub pa bya bar

bsam/ /rkang mthil gnyis su rlung gi ni/ /sa bon stan du bsgom par bya/ /sgra dang thig ler ldan pa ni/ /rlung gi sa bon dbus gnas par/ /rlung gis bskor ba snying gar gzhag /thams cad kha dog sngon por bsam/ /rang gi dbugs kyi rtse mo yi

rlung gi brda ru sbyar bar bya/ /oM yuM pre ta bA yu a mo ka s+ya yuM phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yi gsang sngags 'di/ /brgyad brgya rab zlas na 'grub par 'gyur/ /'gro ba la sogs bzung nas su/ /dug dang khrag gis bri bar bya/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni bzung nas

su/ /thams cad gnas nas bri bar bya/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas pa yis/ /skud pa dmar po dkris nas ni/ /shing gi rtse mor gdags par bya/ /rlung gis sbur bar bsgom pa ste/ /gad du rlung ni gzhol 'gyur ba/ /de yi phyogs su 'gro bar

'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bskrad pa ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsams te/ /bdag gi lus ni bsgoms nas su/ /blo dang ldan bas sngags bzlas na/ /gnyis med gang

ba'i gtor ma ni/ /de yi dbus su sbyar bar bya/ /oM badzra DA ki nI de sha mA kar+Sha ya A kar+Sha ya oM hrIHhU~M pho phrung phuHphaT/ maN+Dal dmar por byugs nas ni/ /seng ldeng phur bu brgyad kyis gdab/ /dbus su ming ni bris nas su/ /gtor ma yongs su gang

bar ldan/ /skud pa dmar la bzlas nas kyang / /lan bdun bskor bas drang bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyus drangs nas su/ /gsang sngags 'dis ni bzlas byas na/ /dpag tshad brgya yi phyi rol nas/ /las 'dis bzlog nas 'gugs par 'gyur/ /

maN+Dal gyi ni dbus dag tu/ /las 'dis 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /mkha' 'gro drag mor bsam bya ba/ /rang gi lus ni rnal 'byor mar/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su/ /nya mo gcig ni bzung

nas su/ /mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin gyi brlab/ /sngags dang bcas pa'i ming bris la/ /nya yi kha ru bcug nas ni/ /rkang pas mgo ni rab mnan la/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/ /oM phruM phruM/ a mu ka s+ya mu khaM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hrI hrI hrI/ phuM

phaT/ de ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/ /bya ba thams cad bcing bar 'gyur/ /thams cad chu la bya ba ste/ /las gzhan cho ga bshad par bya/ /sngags 'di rab tu sbyar nas ni/ /bag zan gyis ni dril bar bya/ /gang du nya ni gnas pa yi/ /nya yi kha ru gzhug

bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs te/ /ril bu brgyad brgya byas nas ni/ /lan re bzlas te zar bcug na/ /bya ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /bdag nyid tsaN+DA lI yi gzugs/ /gzugs rnams

thams cad yongs rdzogs shing / /me ltar 'bar ba bsams nas su/ /gnyis med gtor ma'i las rnams ni/ /de yi dbus su rab tu bya/ /lci bas pad+ma'i gzugs byas pa/ /ming dang sngags kyis gzhag par bya/ /oM stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya hU~M/

b+hag+gaM mu trAM phru phruM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di dang ming dag ni/ /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas su/ /lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas nas su/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /chung ma shin tu g.yon can rnams/ /las 'di yis ni gdul bar bya/ /

mthar na chu dang 'o ma yis/ /bkrus na bcings pa las grol 'gyur/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /lha mo rdo rje ma ru bsgom/ /kha dog sngon po shin tu mdzes/ /'od zer me dang mtshungs par 'bar/ /yongs su rdzogs shing mdzes par ldan/ /

rgyan rnams kun gyis bklubs pa ste/ /kyi ni gdan la bzhugs/ /ha har bzhad pas 'jigs su rung / /gnyis med gang ba'i gtor ma yi/ /las ni de ru byas nas kyang / /'bras phye la sogs khyad par las/ /pad+ma'i

dbyibs ni byas nas su/ /khyi yi spu yis dgang bar bya/ /ming dang sngags su sbyar nas su/ /gnyis med gtor ma'i las rnams ni/ /las der byin gyis brlab par bya/ /oM kro d+he shwa ri phru phruM phaT/ brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas nas su/ /rdo rje gsang bar gzhug

bar bya/ /las 'di sbyar zhing gzir ba yis/ /b+ha ga dag ni bzlog par 'gyur/ /las 'dis shin tu 'grub pa ste/ /phyung na de las thar bar 'gyur/ /chung ma shin tu gdul dka' la/ /las ni de ltar sbyar bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas

bar/ /lte bar bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsgom/ /rtsa rnams kun las drangs nas su/ /bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par bya/ /ban+du'i me tog rgyas pa yi/ /dbus su lcags kyu'i yi ge ste/ /kha dog dmar po shin tu 'bar/ /gsang zhing gsang bas bsgom par bya/ /

khro bo'i sor mo rtse mo ru/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams nas ni/ /sor mo 'di yis bskyod par bya/ /sbyor ba gsum ni bsams pa yis/ /de yi dbus kyi gnas rnams su/ /bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par bya/ /chung ma shin tu gdul dka' la/ /'di yis

b+ha ga brtag par bya/ /'od zer can dang bla mar bya/ /smyo byed yan lag lnga dang bcas/ /gu gul chen po'i cha dang bsre/ /mar nag chen pos bskol bar bya/ /sngags pas bdud rtsi'i chu dang ni/ /lce yi dbang pos myang bar bya/ /'dir ni smyo 'gyur the tshom

med/ /mar zos pas ni grol bar 'gyur/ /gos ni ma lhung bas/ /mar me yi ni sdong bu bya/ /klu dbang gi ni gong du gzung / /rkang gi mar gyis sbar bar bya/ /gtor ma yi ni gnas dag tu/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying sngags kyis/ /du ba

dag ni dbab par bya/ /dur khrod du ni gtor byin la/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas nas su/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor shing gcig drung / /gang la dub byugs pa des/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun mthong bar 'gyur/ /lhag ma'i snod ni gnyis gzung la/ /dur khrod kyi

ni sol ba yis/ /tsha ba'i rdzas la sbyar nas ni/ /bya rog sgro rtsas bri bar bya/ /oM ki ri ki ri kro d+he a mu kaM phruHphruM phaT/ snod ni gnyis la so so ru/ /gzugs gnyis ming dang bcas bris la/ /gnyis med gtor ma byin nas ni/ /khro bos bkang ste drud

par bya/ /oM ka li brtA li brtA li kro d+ha mu khe a mu ka s+ya hi li hi li badzra tiSh+Tha mu khi phruM phroM phroM phaT/ brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni/ /myur du 'thab rtsod 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnyis med gtor mar ldan pa yi/ /dbang bskur na ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i

gdan gyi rab tu dbye ba las rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// //gnyis med sbyor ba'i snying po ste/ /gnyis med ming gis brjod pa yin/ /sbyor ba ji ltar brtsam bgyi ba/ /rol mo dag ni nyan par 'tshal/ /gnyis med sbyor ba de nyid kyi/ /rdo rje

dril bu'i phyag rgya dag /so sor gzung ba'i de kho na/ /yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /de nyid ji bzhin bdag nyid dang / /chos kyi dril bu lha mo'o/ /kha sbyor sbyor ba phyag rgya ste/ /thabs ni de ru thim pa'o/ /dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo rje

thal mo dam bcings nas/ /sems can kun la rjes brtse bas/ /dag pa rnam gsum brjod par bya/ /oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM badzra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ gzung dang 'dzin

pa las grol bas/ /sbyin pa'i ra bas sbyin par bya/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /thams cad rtsa bzhin blta bar bya/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /'gro rnams brtse bar mi bya sogs/ /sems can don ni dgag mi bya/ /steng du

tshul khrims dra ba'o/ /gzhan la gnod pa 'gog la sogs/ /bzod pa'i phur bu 'og tu gdab/ /phur bur 'dra ba yis/ /sdang ba'i bdud dang dgra rnams bskrad/ /bdud ni bdud du 'char mi 'gyur/ /rang gi sems kyis bsdams

ba'o/ /rang gis rang sems btul ba na/ /bdud kyis 'tshe bar gal 'gyur/ /mnyam nyid sems kyi dri yis ni/ /gru bzhi pa ru byug par bya/ /lus la ste 'jog tsan+dan byug /sems ni mnyam par gzhag pa ste/ /bzod pa'i me tog rnal 'byor

bas/ /'bad dang ldan pas dgam par bya/ /mnyam nyid bsgoms pa'i bdug pa yis/ /rang bzhin dag pas bdug par bya/ /shes rab mar me'i snang ba ste/ /khams gsum gyi ni mun pa rnams/ /mar me 'di yis bcom nas su/ /ji

ltar 'dod bzhin snang bar bya/ /sems kyis mi 'jigs sbyin pa yis/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung bya/ /mchod pa'i dus dang khyad par du/ /gtor ma'i dus su rab tu sbyar/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas

su/ /bdag nyid rdo rjer bskyed nas ni/ /shes rab dril bu zhes byar sprul/ /bar du khru gang bzhag nas su/ /mnyam nyid lta bas blta bar bya/ /snying gar hU~M ni bsgom byas la/ /thams cad rig pas kun stong bya/ /khams gsum zad par byas nas

ni/ /thams cad nam mkha' yang dag gnas/ /sngon bzhin mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ /mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su/ /pho brang yangs par ci 'dod pa/ /ri rab rtse mor bsams par bya/ /lha ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad ldan/ /rdo rje sngon du bstan pa

bzhin/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /hU~M gi thig le las byung ba/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /mi g.yo rdo rje bsgoms nas su/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du/ /bdag gi lus ni sprul par bya/ /yi ge'i dgod pas bkod nas

su/ /mkhas pas go cha byas nas hU~M/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa ste/ /gangs dang kun zla ba'i mdog /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis bklubs pa ste/ /phyag rgya chen po snying por bcas/ /go 'phang

mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba la/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par 'phro/ /dngos po bsgom pa bsgoms nas su/ /hU~M gi sgra yis dgang bar bya/ /rang nyid ji ltar 'dod sems kyis/ /ye shes sa bon bzlas par bya/ /btso

ma'i gser ltar shin tu 'bar/ /sems can kun gyi don la chags/ /de nas stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sngar gyi mtshan nyid bdag nyid can/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sngar gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/ /nyi shu rtsa gsum lha rnams

kyis/ /dril bu'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las/ /sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par spro/ /de ltar bskyed pa'i lus rnams ni/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mas bskyed/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /rgyan

rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/ /kha dog cung zad 'dres pa'i sku/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan/ /yi ge brgyad kyi sngags rnams ni/ /yan lag brgyad du dgod par bya/ /phyag gnyis phyag rgya chen po ste/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgom

par bya/ /A li kA li las byung ba'i/ /de yi sa bon bzlas par bya/ /'dod chags sems kyi stobs kyis ni/ /btso ma gser gyi 'od dang bcas/ /sems can bsgral phyir kun tu 'khyud/ /nu ma 'khyud cing zhal gnyis 'jib/ /rdo rje sor mo'i rtse

mor ni/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams nas ni/ /lha mo'i g.yon gyi cha ru ni/ /bstan pa'i rtse mor gzung bar bya/ /bcu dang brgyad kyi gnas rnams ni/ /kun nas bdud rtsi gang gnas pa/ /mdzub mo 'di yis bskyod pa yis/ /bdud rtsi'i chu ni

'dzag par 'gyur/ /gnyis kyi kun sprod btang nas su/ /shar gyi phyogs su blta zhing bskyod/ /rol pa'i stabs kyis lha mo ni/ /rdo rje rkang pa'i stabs kyis mnan/ /dril bu g.yon gyi rlung gnon pa/ /nu ma lag pa gnyis kyis

gzir/ /sgeg cing bzhad pa'i bzhin can te/ /'og ma gnon pos btsir bar bya/ /dril bu lag gnyis gsang bar sbyor/ /de bzhin sa bon gnyis med bzlas/ /shar phyogs su ni bskyod pa yis/ /sems can pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/ /

lha mo g.yon pa bskyod nas su/ /lho ru kha ni blta bar bya/ /rdo rje yang ni bskyod nas su/ /rkang mthil gnyis ni de bzhin btsir/ /dril bu'i lag pa gnyis kyis ni/ /rked pa bsdams te btsir bar bya/ /rdo rje g.yas kyi nu ma dang / /de bzhin gsang

par rtse bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i lus dag ni/ /yang dang yang du sprad par bya/ /sa bon gnyis ni bzlas pa yis/ /lho phyogs sems can sgrol bar 'gyur/ /nub phyogs snying po'i rkang stabs kyis/ /lha mo nub tu blta bar bya/ /rdo rje yi ni phyogs

gcig gis/ /g.yas kyi brla ni mnan par bya/ /mgrin pa'i rgyab nas gnyis 'khyud de/ /dril bu'i lce ni bskyod nas su/ /rdo rje lce la reg par bya/ /de bzhin sbyar nas gnyi ga bzlas/ /rdo rje mnyam pa'i dbus su ni/ /lag pa gnyis kyis bsdam

pa'o/ /dril bu'i lag pa gnyis kyis kyang / /rna ba'i drung bar gzugs par bya/ /gnyis ka'i mchu ni kun sbyar nas/ /de yi bdud rtsi btung bar bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yis sngags bzlas nas/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /sems can thams cad

bde gyur cig /kun kyang 'tshe ba med par shog /gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub gyur cig /skad cig tshul gyis rnal 'byor dang / /skad cig tshul gyis phyag rgya can/ /kun nas kun tu skad cig ste/ /skad cig gis ni

gsang sngags 'don/ /dril bu lha ru sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /yi ge brgyad kyi sngags dag ni/ /gnas rnams kun gyi lha nyid de/ /rang nyid lha mor bsam par bya/ /slar yang 'di nyid rab tu bya/ /rang gi rjes su chags pa'i

sems/ /de nas rdo rje kun tu 'khyud/ /de nas bdag nyid rdo rje ru/ /ka ra nar bcas bsam par bya/ /rdo rje yi ni nga rgyal gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces brjod/ /chu las byung ba'i me tog ni/ /gsang ba'i nang gi mtshan nyid las/ /rtsa ba myu

gu me tog ste/ /ban+du ka ni rgyas pa 'dra/ /thong ga gnyis kyi sa bon rnams/ /sa dang rlung dag nyid yin no/ /'og tu chu yi rang bzhin la/ /myu gu me yi sa bon no/ /sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i/ /yi ge gsum pa bzung nas su/ /dbyug pa

phyi mo rdo rje can/ /ska bo che la sogs pas dkri/ /lha mo'i gzugs su bsams nas su/ /sa yi nang du thim par bya/ /dus me'i mar sbyor cing / /me dang dus me sbyor/ /lag pa gnyis kyis kha sbyar ba/ /mtheb chung mthe

bos mnan nas su/ /gsum po dag ni rtse mor sbyor/ /phyag rgya gnyis kyis mgor btsugs nas/ /bdud rtsi bza' ba'i bsam pa yis/ /gnon pos 'og ma btsir bar bya/ /bcud dang brgyad kyi lam dag nas/ /dril bu'i bdud rtsi bskul bar

bya/ /g.yon gyi cha na ban+du ka/ /chu 'dzag pa yi cha byad can/ /chu 'dzag bya mchu'i dbyibs lta bu/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi tshul dag la/ /der ni phyag rgyas bskul bar bya/ /rdo rje g.yas kyi chu dag ni/ /rang bzhin mnyam pa'i tshul du bya/ /thong ga

la sogs gnas kun tu/ /de nas sor mo gdab par bya/ /de nas rdo rje'i rtse mo ni/ /phyag rgya glo ru sbyar nas bya/ /gnyis ka kun tu sbyar nas ni/ /rdo rje pad+mo bsgul bar bya/ /hU~M gi sgra yis bkang nas su/ /lha mo thams cad tshim par bya/ /dril

bu yi ni dngos pa yis/ /A li sa bon kun tu sbyin/ /ye shes sa bon rdo rje rtse/ /bdag gi lha ni mnyes par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu lus yin te/ /phyag rgya kha sbyor sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang / /de kho na yis so sor gzung / /

rdo rje de kho nas bskyod la/ /dril bu rang dgar dkrol bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu rab sbyor te/ /phyag rgya'i de nyid sbyor ba yin/ /lus ni gnyis ka mnyes pa yis/ /sems can pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/ /gnyi ga yi ni bdag nyid sems/ /chu de byin gyis brlab

par bya/ /sgeg cing bskyod par gnas pa ste/ /bde ba'i sta na la 'dug nas ni/ /rdo rje rol pa'i rkang pa ste/ /dril bu g.yon gyi brla yis rol/ /lag g.yon 'khyud cing nu ma gzung / /g.yas kyi rdo rje gsor bar bya/ /bzhad cing khro dang sgeg pa

yis/ /yang dang yang du spre bar bya/ /dril bu bskyod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /brla yi stan la 'dug nas su/ /rkang pa g.yas pas dkris nas ni/ /dku yi gnas su gzhag par bya/ /mgrin par gcig gis 'khyud nas ni/ /g.yon pas dril bu

gsil bar bya/ /ngo mtshar bcas bzhad sgeg pa yis/ /yang dang yang du sprad par bya/ /de nas rdo rje glu blang zhing / /sna tshogs hU~M zhes bya bar 'dod/ /bdud rtsi'i chu ni bzung nas su/ /slar yang glu ni blang bar bya/ /'khor lo stong pa snying po med pa ni/ /

snying po dag ni shin tu bsags pa ste/ /rnam par thar pas rab tu bsgral ba ste/ /dngos las rnam par grol ba rab tu 'grub/ /phan tshun kun tu 'khyud pa'i sbyor byas pa/ /de yis don ni yang dag byed par 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i snying po dag ni med pa la/ /

rnal 'byor ma yi dbus su snying po bsgrub/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sgrar bcas pas/ /de nas de ltar glu blang bya/ /mnyam bzhag sgom zhing bzlas pa yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /las ni gang zhig bsams pa rnams/ /de yis thams cad

'grub par 'gyur/ /sman la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams/ /bskyod pa'i sbyor bar ldan par bya/ /gur gum dang ni gi wang dang / /kar sbrang rtse pa la sha/ /yung ba ru rta cha mnyam pa/ /sbyor ba'i gnas su gzung bar bya/ /rdzas de dag ni bsgos nas su/ /

rtag tu thig le byas gyur na/ /rgyal po blon po pho brang bcas/ /thams cad du ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /dbang po lag dang ru rta dang / /rmongs byed ma dang rengs byed ma/ /bdag gi lda dang yan lag lnga/ /lnga po thams cad cha bsnyams la/ /bza' dang btung dang so rtsi dang / /zhib tu

btags te sbyar la sbyin/ /thams cad du ni dbang 'gyur te/ /'chi ba na yang gter mi 'gyur/ /khrag ni gtor ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams 'grub/ /sngags ni 'bum du bzlas pa yis/ /'gro ba thams cad rmongs par 'gyur/ /

bdag gi lus la gshegs gsol ba/ /bdag nyid ji ltar dga' bar bya/ /sems can don phyir blo ldan pas/ /thams cad dbang du 'du bar 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs bram ze'i nye du mos/ /zhi ba'i las ni skye bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po bla ma gsang ba mos/ /

rgyas pa'i las ni sbyar par bya/ /rje'u rigs dmangs mo thams cad kyis/ /dbang gi las ni bsgrub par bya/ /lham mkhan shan pa nya pa mos/ /mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags/ /kla klo gdol pa tshos mkhan mas/ /sbyor ba'i dngos grub bshad pa yin/ /de

bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rnal 'byor bstan bcos gzung bar bya/ /gzhan yang rkang stabs bcing bar bya/ /sems can bsgral ba'i gnas yin te/ /gnyis ni kun tu 'dus nas bskyod/ /de nyid phyag rgya zhes bya bcing / /mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang /

dbye ba'i stabs dang / zlum po'i stabs dang / gsum gnon po'i stabs dang / rus sbal gyi stabs dang / g.yas brkyang dang / g.yon brkyang dang / gnas gcig pa dang / 'dug pa dang / bung ba'i tshogs dang / rgya mtsho rlab pa dang / ri bo

dpung pa dang / rkang pa'i 'phen pa dang / mchod sdong gi tshul dang / pus mo btsir ba dang / bsdu ba'i tshul dang / mnyam du gnas pa dang / dus kyi me dang / snying po dang / dga' bas gnas pa dang / gcig tu bsdu ba'o/ /

rkang stabs bskyod pa brgyad ni/ /mchod pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya/ /yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon par bya/ /snying gar btsir ba dang / rkang pa sbyar ba dang / phreng ba'i tshul dang / nu ma'i tshul dang / gnyi ga

sbyar te bza' ba dang / phyed kyis 'khyud pa dang / lag pa gnyis sbyar ba dang / gsang bar reg pa dang / lus mnye ba dang / ko sko la reg pa'o/ /lag pa'i thabs nyid bcud pa ni/ /zhal ni bzhad cing sgeg pa dang / mtshan nyid sna tshogs ldan pa

yis/ /de yis las rnams 'grub par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag /de kho na yis so sor bzung / /gsang ba'i rdo rje dang bral na/ /dril bus ji ltar 'bras bu 'grub/ /rdo rje'ang dril bu dang bral na/ /rdo rje sgrub pa'ang ring par 'gyur/ /rdo rje dril

bu'i phyag rgya dag /dmigs na pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/ /mtshan mo zla ba med pa dang / /nyin mo zla bas ci zhig nus/ /de bas rdo rje dril bu dag /mnyam pa de nyid gsal bar byed/ /A li kA li mnyam bsgoms nas/ /rnal 'byor chen po sgrub pa

pos/ /A li rdo rje zhes byar brjod/ /kA li de bzhin gshegs ma yin/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/ /dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed/ /sems can don rnams ma lus pa/ /lha yi gzugs kyis phri bar bya/ /phyi rol shes rab thabs
