rnams kyis/ /ji ltar 'khor ba sgrol bar 'gyur/ /rmongs pa phyi rol sems ldan pas/ /de yi dam tshig bstan pa yin/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba gsang ba che/ /rtag tu gab cing gsang ba yin/ /gang zhig lung ni shes gyur pa/ /de yi rnal 'byor

ba ru grags/ /shel ldan dag pa'i sems la ni/ /de yi chos ni bstan par bya/ /gal te sems ni the tshom na/ /skad cig gis ni dmyal bar ltung / /'dod la dga' ba ma yin zhing / /longs phyir ni bsten mi bya/ /sems can don bya'i phyir du ni/ /

rab tu 'bad pa'i de nyid dmigs/ /gal te 'dod dga'i rnal 'byor pa/ /thabs kyi mtshan nyid gcig yin te/ /rang dgar skad cig yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje dril bu sbyor ba'o/ /skad cig tshul gyis bskyed nas ni/ /bdag gi rnal 'byor bdag ces brjod/ /

gsang ba'i nang gi dbus gnas par/ /A li'i sa bon gzung bar bya/ /bdag nyid skad cig rnal 'byor ni/ /hU~M zhes bya ba 'bad de bzla/ /gang yang cung zad lus dang lag /lha yi sbyor bar thim par bya/ /thal sbyor phyogs ni thams cad du/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dbang gson/ /

dgyes shing thugs ni tshim pa yis/ /'gro ba thar pa de ring thob/ /e ma'o chos kyi mchog gi lam/ /e ma'o 'khor ba gcod pa po/ /e ma'o rnal 'byor grol ba'i gnas/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rnal 'byor lam/ /tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med/ /

smyung ba med par bstan pa ste/ /'di ni bde ba'i sgrub par brjod/ /bde bas 'khor lo gcod par byed/ /las kyi 'khor lor cho ga rnams/ /sgrub pa po yi sna tshogs 'dod/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /drag mo'i gzugs su sprul par

bya/ /de yi gzugs su bsams nas ni/ /sngon bzhin de nyid bsgom par bya/ /sngags bas sum 'bum bzlas nas su/ /byi nas las ni bsgrub par bya/ /yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le dang / /rtsa ba'i sgra ni sbyar bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i

mthar bzhag pa/ /rnal 'byor pa yis sum 'bum du/ /bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen nas ni/ /de nyid las rnams 'bad de sgrub/ /gos la sogs bzungs/ /lha mo ser mo tshon rtsi bris/ /phyag gnyis rol pa'i rkang stabs can/ /dkar

dang ser la 'bar ba'i lus/ /ha har bzhad cing gtsigs pa ste/ /skra ni lhug pas rnam par brgyan/ /kyi ni stan la bzhugs/ /skyes bu'i pags pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis

rnam par bklubs/ /glang po'i pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /kha T+wA~M mchog gis brgyan pa ste/ /g.yon pa chang gi thod pa bsnams/ /hU~M gi sgra yis 'jigs par mdzad/ /'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsol/ /lha mo seng ge bsgom par bya/ /sa yi

dbus sogs sbyor bar bya/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/ /gnyis med gtor mas dgang bar bya/ /gal te 'byor na mo/ /tha mal me 'bar dbus su ni/ /yam shing thang shing las byas pa'am/ /zho

can lnga yi shing las bya/ /mchod pa sna tshogs rgya chen dang / /sha chen la sogs bsreg par bya/ /sbrang rtsi khrag la spags pa dag /brgyad brgya ru ni sbyin sreg bya/ /de ltar bsreg pa tsam gyis ni/ /des ni mtshan ma ston par 'gyur/ /oM smrAM phruM phuH

phaT/ sbyin sreg gi rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /thams cad sngar bstan bzhin du bya/ /dang pos ni 'gul 'gyur te/ /gnyis pa la ni bris gzugs 'gul/ /gsum pa la ni dri chen 'byung / /bzhi par seng ge sgra sgrogs te/ /lnga par bsgrub pa'i grogs

por ni/ /seng ge'i tshul du babs nas su/ /drag po'i gzugs can rnam par gtsigs/ /'jigs pa'i sgra ni sgrogs par byed/ /dam tshig phyag rgya sogs phyin nas/ /gtor ma'i mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin gnas rnams dang / /

bstan ni bdag gis mdzad du gsol/ /de nas lha mo dngos bstan nas/ /bdag gis bu yi ci zhig bsgrub/ /'bad de dam tshig byin nas su/ /de la phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /dpa' bos de ltar byin nas su/ /da ltar bdag gi 'di mdzod cig /bdag

nyid la ni lha mo 'grub/ /oM tiSh+Tha ma ma ku ru hU~M hU~M hU~M dza dza dza swA hA/ spyi bor lag pa bzhag nas ni/ /gsang sngags 'dir ni brjod par bya/ /sha dang khrag dang sran chan bcas/ /gnyis med gtor ma de la sbyin/ /bgrod par gnas nas su/ /

rtag pa'i dus su byin gyis brlab/ /lha min klu mo gnod sbyin mo/ /dri za mi'am ci dang ni/ /mi mo gang 'dod pa/ /bka' bzhin skad cig gis 'gugs na/ /phran tshegs mi mo smos ci dgos/ /bka' ni bsgo ba tsam gyis su/ /lha min

klu yi gnas dag kyang / /gang zhig don du gnyer ba rnams/ /myur du khrid nas 'ong bar 'gyur/ /gang yang dgra rnams gsad pa dang / /bka' bzhin du ni skrod par 'gyur/ /las rnams kun byed lha mo ste/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /

stag mo ce spyad 'ug pa mo/ /las de nyid kyis bsgrub bya ste/ /dngos grub de ltar shes byas la/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni/ /de bzhin nyid kyis so sor bzung / /rdo rje de nyid kyis sbyar zhing / /dril bu chos kyi lha

mo'o/ /phyag rgya gnyis su ldan pa yin/ /kun rig pas ni thams cad sgrub/ /sbyor ba'i gdan zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// //rnal 'byor phyag rgya sogs mtshan pa'i/ /slob dpon dag ni bzung bya ba/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor

sogs ldan/ /'khor ba las sgrol mnyam nyid kyi/ /ji bzhin lam gyis 'khor ba las/ /sgrol ba'i mtshan nyid rdo rjes nyon/ /slob dpon yon tan ji 'dra zhing / /bla ma zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/ /slob dpon ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ /bcom ldan

ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ /thams cad byang chub mtshan nyid kyi/ /de nyid phyag na rdo rjes nyon/ /byang chub rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / /lus ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /cha shas byang chub yan lag gnas/ /dbu rgyan rigs ni lnga nyid de/ /ba spu

rnams ni dgra bcom mo/ /'jig rten pa ni zhabs kyi gdan/ /'od zer gnod sbyin gsang la sogs/ /de ltar yon tan ldan pa'i skur/ /rnal 'byor can ni rtag tu blta/ /ye shes can ni shes bya ba/ /mtshan nyid gang yin bstan

par bya/ /shin tu dul zhing zhi ba'i gzugs/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba mkhas/ /rnal 'byor bzo dang bstan bcos rig /thams cad du ni snyan par smra/ /sems can kun la bu bzhin lta/ /sbyin pa la sogs

rtag tu dga'/ /rnal 'byor bsam gtan mngon par brtson/ /snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bden par smra zhing 'tshe mi byed/ /mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed bas na/ /sems can rnams kyi mgon skyo ba yin/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs shes ba/ /'di ni

slob dpon zhes byar brjod/ /gzhan yang slob mas spyod pa yi/ /de nyid mtshan nyid mnyam par gyis/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba lta/ /dam tshig spyod pa dang lta nyid/ /gtor ma gsang ba las sogs ldan/ /slob dpon gsang ba smad mi bya/ /smad

na myur du mnar med 'gro/ /kun tu dam tshig med pa dang / /stan dang mal dang lha ma sogs dang / /gdugs dang na bza' nyer spyod rnams/ /grib ma 'gom zhing brdzi mi bya/ /bzlog dang gzir ba'i tshig brjod min/ /'das na de ni dus kun tu/ /

gdon gyis 'tshe bar 'gyur ba dang / /nor nyams dpal las ring du 'gyur/ /bdud dang sdang bas 'joms par byed/ /de yi grib ma 'gom gyur na/ /mchod rten bshig pa'i sdig 'drar brjod/ /slob dpon smod par gang byed pa/ /rmi lam na yang

dngos grub med/ /slob dpon yon tan gzung bya yi/ /skyon rnams nam yang gzung bya min/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor la sogs/ /de yi lam gyis 'grub phyir ro/ /bslab pa sbyin pa sngon 'gro bas/ /de nas maN+Dal la sogs bya/ /sngar bstan

yi ge gcig pa yis/ /sangs rgyas lnga ru bstan par bya/ /de yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /las rnams 'dod bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi dbang bskur ldan pa yis/ /yi ge brgyad po bsgom par bya/ /gnyis med gtor sbyin dbang bskur

ba'i/ /de yis chos ni shes par bya/ /sbyor ba'i dbang bskur ldan pa la/ /ye shes rnam shes bstan par bya/ /slob dpon dbang ni bskur nas su/ /thams cad gsang ba la sogs bstan/ /dang por slob mas bya ba ni/ /bla gos phrag par gzar

nas su/ /pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga dag /sa la legs par btsugs nas ni/ /thal mo snying gar sbyar bar bya/ /bla ma stan la 'dug nas ni/ /rang gi lha ru rab bsgoms la/ /lag pas lag pa bzung nas ni/ /mkhas pas bslab pa sbyin par

bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /theg pa gsum po thams cad dang / /rnal 'byor gsang sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /khyad par du

yang slob dpon la/ /rtag tu skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/ /rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa/ /rin chen mchog dang 'jig rten dbang / /don yod grub pa la sogs pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /

bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /dus chod 'di nas bzung nas su/ /byang chub snying por mchis par du/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bgyi zhing / /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /de ltar rjes su brtse ba'i phyir/ /bdag gis chos khrims 'di

bgyi'o/ /de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du/ /mnyam nyid brtan pa'i sems ldan brjod/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM badzra shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM yo ga shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ lus kyi las ni rnam
gsum dang / ngag gi las ni rnam pa bzhi/ /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /lus bsdams pas ni dam tshig bsrung / /sems ni mnyam nyid shes nas su/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i chos bshad bya/ /de nas ras kyis mig

bkab nas/ /gtor ma'i gnas su gzhug par bya/ /lag pas lag pa bzung nas su/ /slar yang bslab pa bstan par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor lo yi/ /sbyor ba'i

gdan la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /don dam rtogs mchog seng ge slob ma rnams shes nas/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas sgrib g.yogs rnams su dral ba'i phyir/ /srid pa'i nyes dmigs bskyed pa'i nyon mongs bcom nas su/ /rnal 'byor don dam grub byed de

nyid rgyal por 'gyur/ /AHni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /gsung gi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab/ /hU~M ni nyon mongs bsreg pa ste/ /thugs kyi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab/ /oM ni ye shes 'gugs pa ste/ /sku yi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab/ /de nas mig phye

mthong ma thag /kun la yan lag lngas btud nas/ /bdag gi rang bzhin lus 'di nyid/ /sbyor ba'i gdan du gding bar bya/ /de nas mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar/ /lus ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ /mkhas pa yis ni sbyin par bya/ /ji ltar bstan

bzhin mtshon byas la/ /de nas bslab sogs yang bya ste/ /ji ltar bstan pa'i yid kyis brtag /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /dam tshig chu ni de nas sbyin/ /ha zhes pa yis kha dog 'phrog /ho yis dri ni 'joms par byed/ /hrIHyis nus pa gzhom

bya ste/ /la lar sngags ni bzlas par bya/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi drung du ni/ /mgo bos btud de dbul bar bya/ /oM pany+tsa DA ki nI pU dzo bas+thA nA ya At+nA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ oM A tsAr+ya pU dzo pas+thA nA ya At+mA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ oM sarba satwa pa ri trA Na ar+thA ya At+mA naM

ni r+yA ta yA mi/ nga rgyal dang ni khro ba dang / /brlang dang tshig rtsub spang bar bya/ /sdig pa'i grogs po spang bya ste/ /srog gcod rku ba de bzhin no/ /longs spyod kun la mi chags shing / /bdag nyid nges par chog shes bya/ /gar gyi gnas dang tshul 'dra

ba'i/ /phyi rol bstan bcos zhen mi bya/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya hoH/ a A aM aHhU~M dzaH/ rdo rje phyag rgya ldan pa yis/ /yan lag drug gi sa bon gzung / /gzhan yang chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par bstan/ /

de nas slob ma 'byor ldan pas/ /rtag tu bla ma yon dbul bya/ /rang gi bu dang chung ma dang / /gnyen 'dun bran khol bcas pa dang / /glang chen rta dang ba glang khyu/ /rin chen khyim dang zhing yul bcas/ /gser dang dngul dang zangs dang ni/ /gos dang 'bru

la sogs pa'i nor/ /stan dang mal cha lham la sogs/ /gdugs sogs nye ba'i longs spyod dbul/ /mthar ni rang gi lus nyid kyang / /bla ma'i yon du phul nas su/ /chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa nyid/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin med pa ru/ /rdzogs

pa'i byang chub rim par bstan/ /sngon du bzod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /sems can rnams la gzir mi bya/ /gzhan la tshig rtsub smra mi bya/ /thams cad mi dgar bya ba min/ /tshul khrims sdom pa bsrung ba dang / /skye bo rnams la gnod mi bya/ /srog

chags bsad par mi bya ste/ /de bas shi bar 'gyur kyang bla/ /rab tu 'bar me mtshungs pas na/ /gzhan gyi nor la reg mi bya/ /dngos la srid pa'i blun po rnams/ /bdag nyid srid pa mi bzang ltung / /rags dang phra mo tsam la yang / /rnal 'byor pa

yis bsrung ngo / /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/ /de la smra yod pa min/ /spyod pa legs par bsdams pa dang / /bza' bca' sogs la'ang legs par bsdam/ /dga' dang rtse la 'ang legs par bsdam/ /gtor ma'i dus su'ang
legs par bsdam/ /rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod pa rnams/ /sems can dga' bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang zhig kun shes slob ma la/ /sems can spro ba bstan par bya/ /mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed nas ni/ /thams

cad mnyam par blta bar bya/ /rtag tu mnyam par spyod par bya/ /rnal 'byor bsam gtan 'bad par bya/ /sems dman pa sred pa'i gzhis/ /tshong byed myu gu 'phel 'gyur te/ /de yi myu gu ljon shing gis/ /'gro ba'i 'bras lam 'gog par

byed/ /mtho ris longs spyod 'dod pa yis/ /lus can rnams ni byams pas na/ /dga' zhing rtse ba'i chos spyod kyis/ /bdag nyid srid par ltung bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing / /glegs bam bklag par mi bya'o/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya

mi bcing zhing / /sngags kyi yi ge bzla mi bya/ /bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste/ /de yi sbyor ba rnyed par dka'/ /slob dpon dag gi lung gis ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni blta bar bya/ /bdag gi lha dang gzhan las ni/ /bdag gi lha ni lha yi mchog /

bdag gi gzugs su mi nus pas/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs bri bar bya/ /gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba dang po'o// //der ni sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba/ /nyon cig rdo rje rgyal po gtso/ /de nyid med pa'i sngags pa

rnams/ /srid pa 'phel byed 'og tu ltung / /lus po ngo mtshar skyes gyur pas/ /de nyid chos ni bstan du gsol/ /rnal 'byor kyi ni tshad ma ci/ /sngags dang phyag rgya ji lta bu/ /chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyis/ /lus kyi chad ni ji ltar lags/ /

rnal 'byor pa yi gtor ma'i las/ /rab tu sbyar ba'i tshad ma gang / /gang gis 'gro ba bsgrub pa yi/ /mtshan nyid tshad ma ji ltar lags/ /mtshon bya'i lus dang sems kyi tshad/ /ji bzhin de nyid rdo rjes nyon/ /bdag gi khams ni mi brtan pas/ /

gtor ma'i las dang bzlas pa dang / /dkyil 'khor me dang chu yi las/ /phyag rgya gdugs sogs mchod pa yi/ /'bras bu thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa'ang / /srid pa'i rgya mtshor ltung bar 'gyur/ /phyag na rdo rjes yang gsal ba/ /srid pa so sor

'byung ba rnams/ /gang gis de yi tshad ma ste/ /sems ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ /yid ni the tshom skyes par gyur/ /'khor ba khyod yis dris pa nyon/ /sems ni yid kyis bkrus nas su/ /rang dga' ye shes dngos med pa/ /mkha' 'gro rlung gis

bcings pa yis/ /sems ni gzugs dang gzugs med par/ /bsam gtan dmigs pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dod lha la sogs 'dod can rnams/ /rtag tu 'dod yon spyod pa ste/ /de ltar 'khor ba'i mi rnams ni/ /rang 'dod sa la sogs pa

'grub/ /de las sgrol ba'i dngos po rnams/ /de yi don ni gang yin pa/ /nga yis legs par bshad par bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis mdor bsdus nyon/ /rnal 'byor can gyi rnam shes dang / /lhan cig 'gro bas 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rnam shes rnam par shes

pa yis/ /phyogs kun gyis ni gsal bar 'grub/ /sems kyi ngo bo the tshom pas/ /bcom ldan de yang bshad du gsol/ /shes rab rnam shes dngos rang bzhin/ /mi shes ye shes ji ltar lags/ /rnam shes ye shes mtshan nyid kyis/ /the tshom

gyur pa nyan par 'tshal/ /shel dang mtshungs pa dag pa'i sems/ /sems la skyon dang yon tan med/ /yul rnams dang ni sprad pa yin/ /srid pa'i skyon gyis gos pa yin/ /gang gis 'di yi srid pa'i dngos/ /yul gnas pa yi zhi gyur nas/ /ji

ltar gnas bzhin rab sbyor ba/ /bu ga'i sgo ru gzir bar bya/ /de yi dbus su shes bya ba/ /rtag tu rnam shes nam mkha' 'dra/ /kha dog med cing thams cad mtshon/ /mi ldan lus can ldan pa ste/ /gzugs med pa ni kun gyi gzugs/ /de bzhin

thung ngu ring po min/ /sems kyi de kho na nyid kyis/ /dngos med rdzu 'phrul 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /mtshan nyid thams cad ster ba'o/ /dngos po med par bsgom pa yis/ /bsgom pa dag ni

mtshon par bya/ /gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni/ /sems ni mkhas pas shes bya ste/ /thams cad kun nas dmigs pa yis/ /rnal 'byor lus ni skyon med pa'o/ /gsang las gsang ba gsang chen po/ /rnam shes ye shes gsang ba dag /

bstan bcos klog la sogs sbas shing / /yul gyis mtshan nyid las kyang ring / /mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid de nyid ni/ /bla ma'i lam gyis mthong bar 'gyur/ /sems dang lus su bcas mnyam zhing / /sems kyang gdung bar mi bya'o/ /lus ni gdung

bar mi bya'o/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /lag gnyis gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag /mig ni sna rtser bltas nas su/ /dbugs

ni lte ba'i rtsa bar bzung / /thong ga kun tu spangs pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor lta bur sbyar bar bya/ /'bad de mnyam nyid sems kyis ni/ /de nyid rang bzhin dag byas la/ /yid kyi dri yis byug pa dang / /yid kyi me tog mchod par bya/ /rang bzhin dri yis

byugs nas su/ /shes rab sgron mas snang bar bya/ /bdud rtsi'i gtor mas tshim pa'i lus/ /kun nas drangs te bza' bar bya/ /kha dog ser po 'bar ba'i 'od/ /ka sha gnyis 'gyur yi ge ste/ /drag mor ldan pa'i sa bon nyid/ /tshangs pa'i sgo ru

shin tu bsrung / /thams cad gzugs kyi 'jig byed pa/ /dril bu chu yi yi ge ste/ /stong par ldan pa'i sa bon ni/ /sna dang rna ba dag la dgod/ /bdud rtsi'i chu yi sa bon ni/ /lce dbang rtse mor gzung bar bya/ /seng ge'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis/ /

rgyas pa'i sgo ni bsrung bar bya/ /stag mo'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis/ /thong ga kun tu gzung bar bya/ /ce spyang sa bon brtsegs pa ni/ /snying ga'i gnas su gzhag par bya/ /lte ba'i tshigs ni gdan gyi sgor/ /phyugs kyi sa bon gyis bsrung ngo / /lha mo

brgyad du sbyar nas ni/ /sa bon brgyad po gzung bar bya/ /de yi mdog ni dkar mo ste/ /lus kun tu ni shin tu 'bar/ /steng gi mche pa gnyis las ni/ /dngul chu'i rgyun dang 'dra bar dbab/ /'o ma'i chu zhes bya ba yin/ /'jug pas brlabs pa'i

mdog lta bu/ /steng gi mche ba gnyis kyi ni/ /lce yis bsten pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu/ /lce chung gsang ba'i nang du dbab/ /dpral pa'i sde dang sna dang ni/ /rna ba gnyis kyi rgyab dag tu/ /kha zas lta bu'i dngos po ni/ /kun nas drangs te gzhag par bya/ /

mchod rten sgo ru sa bon ni/ /hU~M zhes bya ba dbang phyug mchog /bdud rtsi'i chu yis bkrus nas su/ /lhag ma 'og tu them par bya/ /'og tu rlung gi sa bon gyis/ /'khrul 'khor lta bur kun nas drangs/ /chu ni mjug de rtsib logs dang / /de bzhin

mchan khung gnyis dang ni/ /dus dang me rkang pa/ /tshigs rnams kun dang snying ga nas/ /bdud rtsi btung ba gang yin pa/ /ba lang rmig par thim nas ni/ /sgo gcig nas ni sgo dgur gzhag /lus kun la ni gnas pa yi/ /bdud rtsi

gang gis shes pa dag /lus rnams thams cad skye 'gyur bas/ /de yi rnal 'byor brtags pa yin/ /snying dbus zla ba bsam bya ba/ /mdangs ldan shin tu mdzes shing gsal/ /gangs dang kun+da zla ba 'dra/ /zla ba de dbus 'o ma'i rgyun/ /bdud

rtsi'i kun rig gug skyed bcas/ /bdud rtsi'i 'od ni shin tu bsil/ /ma ning rnams ni spangs pa yis/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad kyis/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dngos rnams kyi/ /gnas rnams kun tu bskor bar bya/ /ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni/

rtag tu bdud rtsi bzhag nas su/ /gzugs dang kha dog mdzes pa yi/ /ye shes lus su bsgom par bya/ /mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom byas la/ /'o ma'i zla ba sa bon dag /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha'

ldan pa/ /mnyam gzhag dngos pos bzlas byas nas/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /dbang po rnams kyi sred pa dang / /bkres skom la sogs med par 'gyur/ /lo ni brgya phrag du mar 'tsho/ /gzugs dang gzi brjid na chod ldan/ /rims dang

dug la sogs pa dang / /grang dang tsha sogs gnod pa rnams/ /ye shes can gyi ye shes lus/ /yan lag kun la gnas mi 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi'i rtsa ba dmigs pa yis/ /myu gu skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dang de ni 'phel 'gyur bas/ /gzugs

dang ye shes bdag nyid che/ /de yi rnal 'byor gnas rnams ni/ /stong pa'i brag la sogs par brten/ /bdud rtsi gang gis shas pa yis/ /bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar bdag nyid kyi ni sems/ /ye shes can gyis de kho nas/ /

dag bya 'khor ba'i pha rol mtshan/ /ye shes dbang las nyan par 'tshal/ /gnyis med sngon gyi sems kyis ni/ /'dod chags nyon mongs rgya mtsho yi/ /rang gi lus ni bkru bya ba/ /ye shes sems dpa' mnyan par gyis/ /rgya mtsho zab mo lta bu

yi/ /stong nyid ye shes de nyid kyis/ /phyi nang dri ma bkrus pas na/ /lus ni shel dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /shel dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi dngos/ /dri med dung dang kun+da 'dra/ /ye shes dbang po sna tshogs kyi/ /chos kyi tshon gyis btso bar bya/ /rang

bzhin gyis ni rnal 'byor pa/ /nyes byas legs byas las byung ba/ /gang gis rang bzhin las rgyal ba/ /ye shes kyis ni snang bar bya/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid stong pa yis/ /'gro ba'i dngos kun zad par bya/ /mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed pa yis/ /

gzugs sogs thams cad zad pa na/ /de gnyis dbus su bsam bya ba/ /zla ba 'o ma'i sa bon te/ /A li kA li rab sbyor bas/ /de yi dbus su btu bar bya/ /de yi sa bon de nyid kyis/ /'od zer phreng ba bsam par bya/ /sa bon de nyid gang gis ni/ /myur du

ye shes snang bar 'gyur/ /gzugs mdzes yongs su mdzes pa yis/ /ye shes sku ru de nas bsgom/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams su ni/ /sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' ldan pa'i/ /sa bon gang zhig bzla

ba ni/ /sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i/ /yi ge gsum pa gzung bar bya/ /dbyug pa spyi bo rdo rje dang / /ska bo che la sogs pas dkri/ /sems ni mnyam nyid bsgoms nas su/ /rnal 'byor can gyis bzlas par bya/ /mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /

dngos pos dngos po bsgom byas la/ /rnal 'byor bsam gtan la 'bad pas/ /'og min la sogs snang bar bya/ /'od zer 'phro ba spros pa yis/ /sa 'og rim pa bdun yang bsam/ /rnal 'byor snang bar 'dod pa yis/ /rtag tu sems kyis

bsgom par bya/ /snying ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /hU~M zhes bya ba dbang phyug mchog /sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/ /thams cad kun nas zad par bya/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /

'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /ye shes sa bon de dbus bsam/ /de las byung nga'i ye shes lus/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bdag nyid de/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa ste/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun

rig pas/ /yan lag rdzogs pa'i skur bsgoms la/ /snying gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'o ma'i sa bon bsam/ /kun nas mnyam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rtag tu de nyid bsgom par bya/ /kha dog dkar po 'od 'bar las/ /kun tu

rdul phran dkar pos dgang / /pha rol dngos po dmar po ru/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa yi/ /rdo rje sems dpar bsams nas su/ /gang gi snying gi dbus su ni/ /de yi rnam shes gzung bar

bya/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i phyogs brgyad du/ /kha dog dmar po bsams nas ni/ /rtag tu mnyam nyid lta ba yis/ /blo ldan pha rol sems shes bya/ /kun nas dpag tshad phyi rol du/ /rnal 'byor pas ni gang bsams na/ /de yi bsam pa thams cad ni/ /

yi ge de yis sten par 'gyur/ /gal te pha rol cha yis ni/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid shes 'dod pas/ /gzhan gyi sems ni rig pa yis/ /kun nas thams cad shes byas la/ /dpa' bo sems can kun don phyir/ /rnal 'byor 'di yis sbyar bar

bya/ /de nas me yi las kyi bdag /sbyor ba ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ /ye shes me yi bdag nyid la/ /sbyin sreg mtshan nyid ji ltar lags/ /thams cad sems kyis byin brlabs pas/ /skye bo'i lus can ye shes me/ /thams cad ye shes byin

brlabs pa/ /me yi de nyid mnyam par gyis/ /bdag nyid sems kyis bsregs pas ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis sbyin sreg bya/ /mdud pa'i lte ba'i dbus nyid kyi/ /dngos su sor ni bdun pa ste/ /me yi thab kyi gnas yin la/ /klu dbang 'khyil ba'i

bskor ba yin/ /yi ge thams cad 'bar bar bya/ /de dbus pad+ma rig pa yis/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes lus ni 'bar bar gzung / /mdud pa'i me la dkar po ru/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro thim par bya/ /g.yas kyi cha yi logs su

ni/ /drag po thim bya me dang 'dra/ /lte ba dmar bo 'bar ba la/ /lha mo'i rtse mo ro langs ma/ /g.yon phyogs cha ni sngon po la/ /drag tu 'bar ba gtum mo ste/ /me lnga yi ni bdag nyid rnams/ /gzugs mdzes mthe bo'i tshad du blta/ /chu dang me dang

rlung dang ni/ /sa dang ye shes rnam pa lnga/ /lha mo lnga yi bdag nyid la/ /sbyin sreg cho ga'i mchog yin no/ /bcu dang brgyad kyi rtsa rnams nas/ /dus su bdud rtsi dmigs par bya/ /ba lang rmig pa'i dbus su ni/ /'dzag pa der ni thim par bya/ /me

yi dbus su bsreg pa'i gzhi/ /dbyangs yig dang po sogs sa bon/ /'di ltar de kho na bsgoms nas/ /bdag nyid rgyas phyir bsreg par bya/ /cung zad bza' dang btung la sogs/ /rung bar byas nas bza' bar bya/ /'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /

bu lon du yang mi 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par bye ba gnyis pa'o// //spre'u 'dra bar mi gnas pa/ /mnyam nyid gang gis sbyar bar bgyi/ /lus kyi sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid rnams/ /lha la rol mo nyan par 'tshal/ /

'byung ba yi ni khyad par dang / /gsang ba rdo rje chen pos nyon/ /sems ni mnyam par gnas pa ste/ /nye bar zhi nas ka lir 'jug /lus las spu rnams skye ba ni/ /kun tu chu yi tshad ma ste/ /chu la lus ni ma yin te/ /lus la chu yi tshad ma yin/ /lus

kun las ni khyab pas na/ /blo ldan chu ni tshad ma'o/ /lus ni rdo rje lha mo yin/ /lus kyi yan lag thams cad la/ /me 'bar lta bur dro ba ste/ /kha zas smin pa'i tshad ma yis/ /me ni tsad mar rab tu grags/ /yan lag thams cad khyab pa yi/ /me ni

kun rig dmar yin pas/ /lus ni drag mor bstan pa ste/ /bdag nyid tshad mang rab tu grags/ /bu gar zla ba 'dra gnas pas/ /rlung gis lus kun khyab pa ste/ /dbugs rgyu ba yi tshad ma yis/ /mkhas pas sems ni tshad mar grags/ /lus la brten

ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /dbugs ni gang gis shes nas su/ /thams cad lha mo ro langs mar/ /mkhas pa yi ni shes pa ra bya/ /sa ni kun gyi gnas yin te/ /gzugs sogs dbang po yon tan ldan/ /gzugs la sogs pa snang ba na/ /sa ni tshad

ma'i gnas yin no/ /mdzes ma zhes bya rab tu grags/ /de ni lha mo gtum mo ste/ /kun gyi gtso mor rab tu grags/ /yid ni the tshom gcod pa ste/ /byed po sdud po za bo'ang yin/ /dbang po kun gyi sems rnams kyi/ /mtshan

gzhi mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /dbang rgyal nyer sbyor longs spyod pa/ /yul la sogs pa nyer spyod kyi/ /rnal 'byor tshad ma mkhas pa yis/ /lus la ye shes bsten par bya/ /sems las chu ni byung bas na/ /rnam shes chu ru gyur pa ste/ /gal te

chu ni gzhan yin na/ /ci phyir zhen chu mi 'byung / /lus la nges par drod yod na/ /chu yi nang du bying mi 'gyur/ /lus la tshad ma lnga yod pas/ /lnga po gcig gi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid gcig tu shes byas nas/ /rnal 'byor ba yis 'gro ba brtag /

de yi mtshan nyid shes bya'i phyir/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya/ /de nyid rnal 'byor grogs kyis ni/ /'khor ba'i pha rol rgal bar 'gyur/ /yul dang dbang po'i ye shes ni/ /gzir dang bcas pas sdom par 'gyur/ /sgong skyes khyim gyi

gnas su ni/ /dbus su gnas pa bcing bar bya/ /'byung dang 'byung min sems kyis ni/ /g.yo ba'i dngos po bskor bar bya/ /bcing ba'i gnas dang stan dag ni/ /rnam shes pad+ma'i stan la'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yis de yi phyir/ /rnam shes rang bzhin

mtshon par bya/ /gzugs zhes bya ba'i dngos po yis/ /rnal 'byor grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /rang bzhin zhes bya'i dngos por 'gyur/ /lte bar chu shing me tog ni/ /snying gar yang ni 'greng ste gnas/ /rtag tu stong pa'i sgo yin te/ /mkhas pas

rtag tu bzlog par bya/ /gser dang ni ldan pa yi/ /rtag tu 'dab ma brgyad du 'gyur/ /de dbus rtag tu gsungs pa ni/ /ye shes rnam shes sbyor ba ste/ /sbyor ba yi ni shar phyogs char/ /de dang mthun pa'i sor brug pa'o/ /mdud pa yi ni nub

phyogs char/ /'og tu sor ni lnga pa'o/ /zhing de la ni sa bon dang / /'od zer tshogs kyi myu gur 'gyur/ /sa bon de yi 'od zer gyis/ /chu shing lta bur bskor bar bya/ /rgyas pa lnga yi sa bon la/ /lho yi 'og nas dgar bar bya/ /pad+mo mdzes pa

bkas pa yis/ /'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /pad+mo de yi stan la ni/ /sgong skyes ye shes gnas dag la/ /dbus su shel ltar dag pa yis/ /ye shes rnam shes dbu ma nyid/ /mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'i sa bon rnams/ /phyogs kyi 'dab

mar gnas pa ste/ /dbyangs yig dang po sogs sa bon/ /mtshams su sen mo la sogs pa'i/ /ma ning yi ge sngar bstan bzhin/ /snying gar dngos po dngos po yis/ /snying gar yi ge blta bar bya/ /ba lang rmeg pa'i steng du ni/ /sgo dgu pa yi bdud rtsi

yis/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bkru/ /yi ge dkar po brgyad po rnams/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge dkar po yi/ /'od 'bar pa spu'i khung nas spro/ /rnal 'byor can gyis thams cad du/ /'gro dang 'chag dang 'dug pa dang / /nyal ba la sogs dus kun tu/ /

ye shes rnam shes sa bon bzlas/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag sems kyis ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis bsgoms bzlas na/ /ye shes las byung rnal 'byor pa/ /'khor ba'i pha rol rgal bar 'gyur/ /g.yo ba med cing 'tshe med par/ /dngos pos

dngos po bsgom par bya/ /gong du 'pho ba'i sbyor mtshan nyid/ /ji bzhin rdo rjes mnyan par gyis/ /lam bzang po yi rnal 'byor pa/ /'gro ba mdzes pa blta bar bya/ /sgo dgu po ni ji lta bu/ /ye shes sgo yi bye brag gis/ /yon tan skyon rnams ji lta bu/ /

ye shes dbang las nyan par 'tshal/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshad ma rnams/ /yang dag rab sbyor mnyan par gyis/ /lam bzang po yis mdzes pa'i gnas/ /lam ngan srid pa'i skyon gyis gos/ /thig le lte ba spyi gtsug dang / /mig dang sna dang rna srid sgo/ /chu

dang chu min sgo yin te/ /sgo dgu yi ni mtshan nyid yin/ /lte ba 'dod can mtho ris te/ /thig les gzugs khams kyi lus can/ /steng nas steng du gnas de ru/ /mi gdung la sogs de ru 'gro/ /sna nas gnod sbyin gnas su ste/ /

rna ba dag gis grub pa'i lha/ /gal te mig las ye shes 'gro/ /mi rnams kyi ni bdag por 'gro/ /srid pa'i sgo yis te/ /de bzhin gci bas dud 'gro'o/ /chu min rnam shes myur ba ru/ /dmyal ba brgyad du shes par bya'o/ /sgo rnams kyi ni bye

brag gis/ /'khor ba'i bye brag 'byung ba yin/ /de bas sgo yi bye brag las/ /sgrub pos lam ni bzang po ste/ /'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa dang / /'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na/ /rims la sogs pas ma phog par/ /gong du 'pho ba sbyor ba'i mchog /

sngon du bum pa brtsams pa yis/ /sgo rnams thams cad bcing bar bya/ /rgyas pa lnga yi mchod rten gyis/ /sgo ni dgag pa bsgom bya ste/ /de la 'og gi sgo ru ni/ /chu yi sa bon dkar po bsam/ /chu dang chu min sgo la ni/ /me yi sa bon 'bar ba ste/ /de

la shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ /dbugs ni bum pa can du bsgom/ /lus ni rlung gi mdog tu ste/ /sems ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la/ /rtsa ba rlung gi sa bon no/ /rlung gi mtha' ni rtsa ba can/ /thig le sgra dang ldan pa yi/ /rtsa ba'i sa bon drang bar bya/ /rdo rje'i

sa bon drag mo yis/ /lcags kyu la sogs sbyar bar bya/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig dbugs rnams kyis/ /gnas nas drag tu drang bar bya/ /gnas dang gnas nas steng du dbye/ /tshigs dgu las ni steng du bya/ /steng du smin pa'i sa bon dang / /yi ge phyed dang

gnyis kyis sbyang / /drag mo'i nga ro brjod bya ste/ /brgyad kyi mtha' yi sa bon la/ /sde tshan dang po'i dbang po ni/ /yi ge phyed du sbyar bar bya/ /'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /sgra yi dbye bas bskul bar bya/ /rlung gi sa bon ldan pa yi/ /rlung gi dkyil

'khor bsams nas ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig gnas rnams nas/ /gong nas de bzhin steng gnas su/ /rnal 'byor pa yis smin byas la/ /steng gi rtsa la bzla bar bya/ /tshigs dgu las ni steng gzhan gyis/ /mod la 'pho bar shes bya ste/ /nyin re bram ze

gsod pa dang / /mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang / /rku 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa dag /lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te/ /sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhing / /srid pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro/ /ji ltar 'dam nas skyes pa yi/ /pad+ma dri med yid 'ong ba/ /de

bzhin lus kyi 'dam las ni/ /ye shes sku ni 'dod bzhin 'gro/ /dus la bab na 'pho bya ste/ /dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur/ /de bas lus la mtshan ma rnams/ /mthong nas mkhas pas sbyor ba brtsam/ /rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i khyad par gyi/ /

de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /sngar gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/ /mnyam nyid sems ni bsgom par bya/ /snying ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon bsam/ /de 'od nyi mar 'bar ba yis/ /gzugs rnams zad par bsams nas ni/ /

sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/ /sngar bstan stong nyid bsam par bya/ /gzugs sogs thams cad bcom nas ni/ /hU~M zhes bya ba gnas par bsam/ /sa bon gyis ni bskyed bya ba/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa yi/ /

ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bdag nyid ni/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/ /spyan gsum cod pan gyis brgyan zhing / /bzhad dang khro dang sgeg pa ste/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis bklubs pa yi/ /kun+da zla ba ltar dkar zhing / /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /

sems dpa'i skyil krung gnas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro ba mdzad/ /g.yas kyi dang po mda' yin te/ /gnyis pa yis ni lcags kyu bsnams/ /gsum pa ni rdo rje nyid/ /g.yon pa khro bo'i sdigs mdzub ste/ /gnyis pa 'jigs pa'i zhags pa

thogs/ /go cha'i gzhu ni steng na bsnams/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru/ /dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/ /yan lag brgyad du rab 'bad nas/ /sa bon brgyad kyi yi ge dgod/ /A li kA li rab sbyor bas/ /sa bon ji bzhin pa tu

bar bya/ /'od zer ldan pa'i sa bon rnams/ /kun tu kha dog dkar por bya/ /chu shing me tog pad+mo la/ /snying gar sgong skyes gzhag par bya/ /de yi dbus su rnam shes dang / /ye shes lhan cig ldan par ni/ /mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /dngos pos

dngos po bsgom par bya/ /de nas phyi rol sbyor ba ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /gnas gnyis dag ni bsams pa ni/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su me yin te/ /me yi dbus su nyi ma la/ /A li kA lir ldan pa yi/ /de yi

sa bon dmar por da god/ /rnal 'byor pa yis khyad par du/ /'byung dang 'jug pas bzlas par bya/ /'byung ba ye shes sa bon gyis/ /dbus su bsnun dang ldan par bya/ /'jug pas snying gi rnam shes la/ /me tog lta bur bsnun par bya/ /'byung ba 'jug

min bzlas bya zhing / /'jug pa 'jug pa min la bzla/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'byung 'jug dang / /bdag nyid dang ni phyi rol bya/ /'byung ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa dang / /'jug pa yis ni mtshon byas la/ /rnal 'byor pa yi 'byung 'jug dag /de kho na nyid

mnyam par bsgom/ /mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms nas ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /de nas phyi rol lus la ni/ /sgrub pa po yis rnam par sprul/ /pha rol sems dang rjes mthun par/ /mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya/ /bsgom dang

bzlas pa'i khyad par gyi/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag ste bsam/ /gang gis lam nas bsams nas ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// //gsang ba'i gdan gyi gsang

ba nyid/ /sems dang ye shes 'dres pa yi/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim ci 'dra/ /ye shes dbang las nyan par 'tshal/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba chos kyi don/ /byang chub rim pa rdo rje nyon/ /'dod chags la sogs rim spangs nas/ /mnyam nyid sems ni

bskyed par bya/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni/ /khams dang sems ni bde ba yis/ /snying rjes phan pa bsam par bya/ /yang dag bstan bcos de nyid thos/ /slob dpon lung gi rjes 'gro zhing / /gsang chen de nyid

don sgom pa/ /gcig nas gcig brgyud de nyid can/ /thams cad sngon bzhin mtshon byas nas/ /thams cad stong pa nyid du bya/ /dri ma bkrus pa'i lus la ni/ /byang chub rim pas btso bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes

mkha' 'gro bsam byas te/ /zla ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba yi/ /kun+da zla ba ltar dkar mdog /zhabs gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /pad+ma yi ni stan la bzhugs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa ste/ /phyag

gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas/ /nyid kyi thugs kar 'tshir bar mdzad/ /gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ /ye shes sems dpa' bdag ces brjod/ /chu shing me tog lte ba nas/ /snying gi bar du 'greng ste gnas/ /sngar gyi mtshan nyid kyis

bzlog nas/ /sngon bzhin pad+ma rgyas par bya/ /ge sar dang ni lte bar bcas/ /'dab brgyad shin tu mdzes pa ste/ /dbus kyi sgong skyes la gnas par/ /yi ge'i dgod pa dgod par bya/ /kha dog dkar po dag cing gsal/ /dbus su bsgom bya zhu ba'i

gtso/ /de yi dbus su rnam shes dang / /ye shes dag ni sbyar bar bya/ /shar du byams par ldan pa yis/ /mi bskyod pa yi sa bon bsam/ /lho yi sgo ru snying rje ste/ /rin chen sa bon de nyid do/ /nub kyi sgo yi 'dab ma la/ /'od dpag med kyi sa bon

dgod/ /byang gi cha yi 'dab ma la/ /don yod gtso bo bsam par bya/ /dbyangs yig thog ma sogs sa bon/ /thig le dbyug par ldan rim bzhin/ /'od zer dkar pos brgyan pa ste/ /yi ge bzhi ni dgod par bya/ /phyogs

mtshams dag ni bzhi po ru/ /sngon du bstan pa'i ma ning dgod/ /de yi dbus su de yi sems/ /yi ge ru ni mtshon par bya/ /stong pa mtshan nyid med pa las/ /ji ltar yi ge sbyar bar bgyi/ /sems ni ya mtshan skyes par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan bdag la

bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /stong pa'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa las/ /chu shing snye ma'i bdud rtsi bzhin/ /snying po med pa'i snying por gyur/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /dbus na gnas pa ye shes te/ /ye shes rang

bzhin gzugs med cing / /mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /dri ma med pa'i ye shes sku/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/ /yi ge'i gzugs ni yi ge med/ /gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis de nyid gzugs/ /

gang gi mtshan nyid shes byas nas/ /mnyam nyid ye shes shes pa dang / /de yis rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam/ /myur ba nyid du mthong bar 'gyur/ /bla ma nyid kyi lam gyis ni/ /ye shes rnam shes rang bzhin nyid/ /bstan bcos la ni mtshan nyid bstan/ /

de kho na nyid dpa' bos bshad/ /'od zer dkar pos rgyas pa ru/ /'di ni kun tu bsgom par bya/ /rgyas pa lnga yi mchod rten te/ /bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsams nas ni/ /'od zer dkar po gsal ba'i mdangs/ /bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'dzag pas bkru/ /thigs

pa'i dbus su sa bon ni/ /mthe bo tsam gyi zlum por bya/ /de yi dbus kyi sa bon ni/ /A li kA li dag las btu/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/ /zla ba'i 'od zer kun tu 'phro/ /de yi dbus kyi sa bon ni/ /thig le bsam par rab tu grags/ /

skra yi rtse mo brgya yi cha/ /rdul phran gzugs su kun tu bsam/ /rnam par shes pa'i dngos po yi/ /mtshan nyid mtshon pa'i ye shes can/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid mi shes pas/ /thig le gnas kyi go 'phang lta/ /snying dang tshangs pa'i sgo nga ni/ /thigs

pa'i lam gyi sgo dag tu/ /bla ma'i lung la gus pa yis/ /rnam shes ye shes gzung bar bya/ /phyi rol gyi ni lam dag dang / /bstan bcos las kyang ring ba yin/ /bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste/ /de yi sbyor ba rnyed par dka'/ /bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la

gus pa'i/ /thabs dang ldan pa sgrub pa po/ /bla ma'i lung gi lam gyis ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni blta bar bya/ /mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /mnyam par gzhag pas dngos po bsgom/ /chos kyi sngon 'gro yid yin te/ /yid kyis 'jug cing yid kyis 'dag /

de bas thams cad yid rang bzhin/ /blo ldan yid las 'byung zhes bya/ /gal te bzlas 'dod rnal 'byor pas/ /snying gi sdom pa bsam par bya/ /sa bon gyi ni rgyur gyur pa/ /de kho nar ni gzugs min no/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sa bon ni/ /de kho na nyid

mthong ba min/ /gzugs sogs srid pa'i longs spyod la/ /sa bon dmigs shing bzlas par bya/ /kun nas kun tu 'jug pa dang / /'og dang 'og min yang dag gnas/ /rtsa bar rtag tu gzer bar bya/ /ye shes rnam shes sa bon ni/ /thig le sgra dang

yang dag ldan/ /srid pa'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis/ /phyi rol ngag ni spangs nas su/ /yid kyis bzlas dang ldan par bya/ /rtag pa chos kyi dbyings nyid kyis/ /mi g.yo go 'phang rgyun du gnas/ /rtag tu phra zhing gos med pas/ /ye shes la ni rnam

shes thim/ /rnam shes ye shes nyid gyur nas/ /byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /mar me lta bu thams cad du/ /snang 'gyur mtshan ma dang po ste/ /srin bu me khyer lta bu'i rdul/ /mthong ba mtshan ma gnyis pa yin/ /gsum pa la ni rnal 'byor

pas/ /nyon mongs 'joms pa'i mtshan ma ste/ /rdul phran dkar po'i tshul gyis ni/ /de bzhin phyogs bcur mthong bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa lha yis longs spyod rnams/ /sems kyis mthong ba bzhi pa ste/ /mtho ris gzugs kyi

lha rnams ni/ /sems kyis mthong ba lnga ba yin/ /gzugs med longs spyod drug pa ste/ /bdun pa chos kyi sa la'o/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu brgyad pa ste/ /rnal 'byor pa ni rang dgar spyod/ /mchod rten gzugs kyi khyad par las/ /dbyibs kyi

gzugs ni ji lta bu/ /lha yi rnam dag bsgoms pa rnams/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /lus can rnams la yang dag blta/ /yang dag de nyid shes nas su/ /de nyid sbyor ba brtsam pa yi/ /rab sbyor rdo rje mnyan par gyis/ /snying gar zla ba

bsams nas su/ /dbus su hU~M ni bsgom par bya/ /me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gsal/ /spyi gtsug dkar por yang dag ldan/ /me lce 'bar bas bcom nas ni/ /thams cad kun nas zad par bya/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid de kho nas/ /de nyid stong pa nyid du

bya'o/ /de nas zla bar sa bon ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsams nas su/ /mchod rten pho brang gnas nyid ni/ /de la sems kyis bskyed par bya/ /gya gyu sa zhes brjod pa ste/ /phyogs brgyad dag ni khams yin na/ /dril bu nam mkha'i dbus gnas pa/ /

lhun po'i lha yi gnas nyid do/ /'dod na spyod pa'i lus can rnams/ /bre ru nges par brtag par bya/ /'og dang steng dang dbus nyid kyi/ /dbus su gnas pa bdag med chos/ /gzugs khams zhes bya'i mtho ris rnams/ /'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam

par brgyan/ /gzugs can bcu dang brgyad po ni/ /ji bzhin rnam par gnas/ /gzugs med srid pa'i sems can ni/ /chos kyi srog shing nyid du thim/ /lha rnams kun gyi pho brang ni/ /gzugs su mchod rten bskyed par bya/ /steng gi

sgong skyes gnas su ni/ /bdag gi sems ni mnyam bya ste/ /sems dang ye shes 'dres pas na/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i khyad par gyis/ /gzugs dang stong pa'i mtha' dang ni/ /de bzhin dngos dang dngos med nyid/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa la sogs

gzhan/ /legs byas dang ni bzlog pa rnams/ /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid ston pa'o/ /de yi dbus su bsgom par bya/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sogs pa'i/ /rdzas 'di yis ni mchod nas su/ /mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /dngos pos dngos

po bsgom par bya/ /mnyam bzhag dngos po bsgoms nas ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi/ /de nyid bstan bcos lung la sogs/ /rnal 'byor dmigs pa goms byas pa'i/ /slob ma chen po'i lus

can rnams/ /gdan bzhi pa yi de kho na/ /bla ma'i man ngag ldan pa yis/ /rim gyis rang dgar longs spyod de/ /bdag med blta zhing myang bar bya/ /bdud rtsi myong ba'i rnal 'byor bas/ /ye shes sku ni myur du 'thob/ /ye shes sku yi rnal 'byor pas/ /

bdag dang gzhan don mchog tu 'gyur/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa yi/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rnal 'byor ro/ /gsang chen sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid kyi/ /de nyid de nyid mchog de nyid/ /gang gis byang chub lam gyur pa/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas/ /bdag nyid rang dgar byed pa yi/ /rta rgod lta bu'i sems de nyid/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsdam par bya/ /ji ltar bung ba me tog bsnyung ba yi/ /chang gis myos shing sems ni

brtan 'gyur te/ /longs spyod zhugs shing sdug bsngal rmongs dang bral/ /de bzhin bsgom pa'i lam gyis yid bcing bya/ /yid bsdams pa ni 'grub 'gyur bas/ /dang por yid ni bsdam par bya/ /yid kyis bsgrub pa'i bye brag gis/ /byang chub ye shes

mtshon par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro sprul bya ste/ /phyag rgya chen po snying gar bcing / /sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/ /yi ge brgyad kyi sa bon rnams/ /yi ge'i gnas su dgod par bya/ /

rgyal ba lnga yi mchod rten gyi/ /sgo ni dgag par bsam bya ste/ /bdud rtsi'i sngags kyi yi ge yis/ /rgyas pa'i sgo ni bsrung bar bya/ /me yi yi ge 'bar ba yis/ /chu dang chu min de bzhin bsrung / /chu shing me tog pad+ma ni/ /mdzes shing 'khyil ba rgyas

par dbye/ /de yi dbus kyi sgo ngar ni/ /dung dang zla ba ltar dkar ba/ /phyogs phyogs gnas su sa bon de/ /phyogs bzhir khams ni bzhi po yi/ /phyogs mtshams sa bon brtsegs pa bzhi/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/ /'od zer

kun nas dkar zhing dag /lha mo'i yi ge bsgom par bya/ /ye shes rnam shes ngo bo'o/ /de nyid dbus su dmigs nas ni/ /sems ni rang dgar bsgoms pa yis/ /phyi nas gzugs ni gzhom par bya/ /phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams dag tu/ /

phyogs phyogs gnas su bzhag nas su/ /rang bzhin thams cad bcom pa yi/ /lhag ma rnam shes ye shes nyid/ /shar gyi phyogs su chu yin te/ /kha dog dkar po kun+da'i 'od/ /me ni ser po 'od 'bar bar/ /rtag tu byang du bsam par bya/ /rlung gi

sa bon dmar po ni/ /nub kyi phyogs su brtag par bya/ /sa yi sa bon ljang khu ni/ /lho yi phyogs su bsam par bya/ /phyogs mtshams 'dres pa'i kha dog gis/ /grwa bzhi dag tu sbyar bar bya/ /lhag ma dbus kyi ye shes te/ /sgong skyes bcas pa

gzhom par bya/ /de yi mtshan nyid mtshon par bya/ /mtshon bya mtshan nyid dngos med pa'o/ /sems kyi dngos po stong pa bas/ /rang bzhin gnas rnams zad par bya/ /rnam rtog stong pa'i dbus dag tu/ /rdul phran tsa na lta bu'i gzugs/ /A li kA li

sa bon ni/ /rdul phran zhes bya dbus su ste/ /rnam pa med cing brjod du med/ /thams cad rdul zhes bya ba la/ /stong nyid du yang mi dmigs te/ /gzugs la sogs par mi blta'o/ /rdul ni sa bon ma yin la/ /rang bzhin med cing mtshan nyid med/ /

rlung dang nam mkha' ma yin te/ /mnyam nyid dbu mar mtshon par bya/ /gzugs dang stong pa de bzhin dbus/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor can gyis gzung / /bla ma'i lung gis rtogs bya ste/ /lung gi dam pa dag dang ni/ /bstan bcos mtshan nyid dpyad

nas su/ /lung dang bcas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi g.yo'ang 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /mnyam gzhag dngos pos dpyad nas ni/ /byang chub rim pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /ye shes thim pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /sems

can don byed mchog tu brtson/ /kun rtog lus dang sems kyi ni/ /gang tshe yul 'khor bsrung 'dod na/ /ye shes dbang po'i longs spyod can/ /rang 'dod lus kyi dngos grub kyis/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras 'dod cing / /khams gsum ye shes kyis

blta dang / /rang 'dod yid kyi gnas dang ni/ /nam mkhar rgyu ba'i lus can dang / /sems can kun gyi gzhan don gnyer/ /mchog ni myur du ster bar 'gyur/ /lus dang dbang po don gnyer bas/ /bdag med pa yis rang dgar bya/ /chos kyi dbyings

kyi rang bzhin gyi/ /sbyor bas 'khor ba sgrol bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams kyi yang / /sbyor ba gzhan ni don gnyer 'gyur/ /sgrub po 'du 'dzi med pa dang / /sgra sgrogs skye bos dben pa yi/ /tshal dang ri sul brag phug tu/ /gnas nas

de ru bsgom par bya/ /nA ga mu la ba la sha/ /ru twa rta cha ni gsum po dag /ma ga d+hA ni srang gcig ste/ /cha bsnyams phye mar byas nas ni/ /ba yi 'o mar yang dag bcas/ /phye ma bzhi char bsres nas su/ /'di ni nyin re rnal 'byor pa/ /mkhas pa

yis ni bza' bar bya/ /rnal 'byor can gyi lo brgya ru/ /brag phug stong sogs gnas nas ni/ /nges par shin tu smin pa yis/ /grang dang bkres skom la sogs grol/ /sman 'di dag ni ldan pa ru/ /brag phug stong sogs gnas

nas ni/ /'dul ba bsrung ba'i rnal 'byor pa/ /lus ni rtag tu bsrungs par 'gyur/ /ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang / /gnyis spyod gtam du smra zhing ston pa ste/ /de ltar lam bshad 'chi ba yod ma yin/ /rnal 'byor lam ngan de ltar bstan pa

min/ /rig byed chu dang de bzhin dUr ba rnams/ /bram zes spyir bzhag sangs rgyas pas gzung min/ /dbang bskur sngags sogs nyams kyis 'jigs pas na/ /gnas ngan lha tshogs rigs la phyag mi bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor pa dang / rnal 'byor ma

dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bye ba phrag brgyad cu du ma'i 'khor rnams sems tshim nas/ thams cad kyis ye shes thob par gyur te/ /phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / sems can

rnams kyis thal mo sbyar te glu blangs pa/ rang dgar sems can sgrol ba yi/ /rgyu med dngos la 'dud par bgyi/ /te na hU~M te na hU~M te na te te hU~M/ ston ka'i zla ltar zhal mdzes shing / /dung ltar dkar ba'i sku 'dzin pa/ /te na hU~M te na hU~M te na te te hU~M/ rdo rje dril

bu'i phyag rgya can/ /gnyis su sbyar ba 'dzin pa po/ /te na hU~M te na hU~M te na te te hU~M/ sgyu ma'i lus su thim pa yi/ /'gro ba mdzes pa rgyu med dngos/ /te na hU~M te na hU~M te na te te hU~M/ srid pa gsum 'bar sku ni rjes chags 'dul bar ldan/ /'od zer rnon po stong

phrag nyi ma stong 'drar ldan/ /rnam mang sku dang cha byad rjes chags sems dpar ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug mchog dang rol gar mdzad ces bya ba ste/ bkra shis sgra yis bkang nas su/ /thams cad kun nas glur blangs so/ /ji bzhin lam ni rdo rjes

nyon/ /bstan bcos shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ /gang zhig su yang rung ba las/ /yi ge 'am tshig tsam nyan byed na/ /mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur te/ /yang na 'khor los sgyur bar ro/ /'dri 'am 'dir 'jug klog pa dang / /shin tu dang ldan sngags

zlos pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe/ /srid pa'i gzugs kun bsams bzhin 'grub/ /rnal 'byor bsam gtan byed pa rnams/ /myur du byang chub rim pa thob/ /ces bdag nyid kyis bka' stsal pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi

rnal 'byor pa dang / /rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa de dag dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor

gyis dga' zhing mgu nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas 'bum phrag brgyad pa las snying po lta bur gsungs pa
rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ga ya d+har dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba 'gos khug pa lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shi tsa tuHbI ThA khyA ta tan+t+ra rA jo man+t+ra aM sa nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gdan bzhi pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sngags kyi cha zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig la spyod pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni/ /gsum pa

yi ni dang po'o/ /de yi sbyor ba rnyed nas ni/ /sngags kyi de bzhin khyad par nyid/ /snying po yi ni snying po'i chos/ /rab sbyor gsang zhing gsang ba yi/ /de nyid de nyid de las mchog /snying po'i de nyid bsdus pa'o/ /bla ma'i ma ning

gnyis bzung la/ /rtsa bar bskor zhing mnan par bya/ /spyi bor 'od dang zla ba'o/ /sa bon bskyed pa'i rim pa bzhin/ /zla ba dkar dang kun+da'i mdog /gtso bo'i sngon du sbyar bar bya/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa rdzogs bya zhing / /dbyangs yig mngon par

mthong ba ni/ /las rnams gsum gyi sngon du ni/ /bla ma'i yi ge sngon du'o/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar po'o/ /bzhi pa dag pa ru ni brjod/ /myu gu'i gnas ni gtso bo nyid/ /sred pa mchog tu sgrol pa'o/ /dbyangs yig dbyangs kyi bsgom pa ni/ /rnal

'byor pa yi mtshon par bya/ /don grub 'dod pas bzlas pa yi/ /ban+du ka yi me tog 'dra/ /rdo rje dbyug pa la rtag tu/ /de nyid du na rnam par thim/ /dkar bo zla bas mnan pa yi/ /gnyis ka bsgoms pas bkru bar bya/ /pad+ma rdo rje zla ba dang / /bdud rtsi

yis ni bkru bar ldan/ /dang po'i sa bon gtso bo yis/ /dbyangs yi ge kun la khyab pa'o/ /dkar zhing dag la mnyam pa'i 'od/ /gsum pa'i las kyi sa bon ni/ /bzhi bar nam yang ma yin no/ /ji ltar dang po mthar gnas pa'i/ /khyad par dbyangs

yig sa bon nyid/ /mtha' yi sngon du sa bon nyid/ /de bzhin sngon du nyis 'gyur ro/ /bzhi po mnyam pa'i cha ru ni/ /mnyam pa'i gnas su sbyar bar bya/ /bzhi pa gsum pa'i sa bon ni/ /mgo smos go ba'i lus nyid do/ /yi ge gsum gyi lus nyid

ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dbyangs yig dngos/ /lus dang lus sogs yi ge ni/ /lcags kyu yis ni mnan par bya/ /dmar dang gnag sogs sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par du/ /lnga ba drug pa'i sa bon ni/ /thams cad sgra yi yi ge'o/ /

dkar dang ser la lci bar bshad/ /dmar dang sngon po de bzhin yang / /zhi rgyas dbang la sogs pa ni/ /kun kyang sgra yid bye ba'o/ /thams cad las la sgra yis ni/ /kha dog bzhi ru rab tu grags/ /bdun pa brgyad pa'i sa bon gyis/ /skyes bu rang 'dod

pa yi las/ /nges bar lus ni sdom pa dang / /gnyis pa'i sa bon gyis mnan pa'o/ /yang bas dmar dang gnag la sbyar/ /rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par du/ /mtshams ni bcad cing mnan pa'i las/ /gnyis pa lcags kyu'i yi ge ni/ /rang bzhin yi ge

ming gi ni/ /de nyid las rnams 'gugs pa dang / /sa bon 'di ni dbye ba'o/ /kha dog dmar po mchog gi 'od/ /thams cad 'dres pa'i sa bon ni/ /dbyangs yig bskyed pa'i sa bon ni/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa'o/ /ma ning gis bskyed sa bon

ni/ /brtan zhing rtag pa'i sa bon no/ /bud med dang ni skyes pa'am/ /'di nyid kun nas rab tu sbyar/ /sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa ni/ /tha ma bzhi ni rnam spangs pa/ /dkar dang kun+da zla ba'i mdog /nyi ma'i yi ge rnam par shes/ /tha ma bzhi ni lnga pa dang / /

sde tshan drug pa yang dag ldan/ /kun nas mtshan mo'i stong par ni/ /khyad par du ni shes par bya/ /bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon ni/ /dkar zhing shel ltar mnyam pa'i 'od/ /de nyid kun gyi de nyid ni/ /kun nas bdud rtsi'i grub pa'o/ /lha min grub pas

'gugs pa dang / /lha dang mi dang gnod sbyin dang / /thams cad las rnams grub pa ni/ /sa bon 'di ni khyad par nyid/ /sbom po ma ning gnyis kyis la/ /lcags sgrog bzhin du kha sprad pa/ /rtsa bar yang ba nyis 'gyur ro/ /spyi bor bdud rtsi rnam

par dgod/ /steng du thig le 'bar ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin sku/ /sa bon lnga yi ngo bo nyid/ /rnam bzhir phye zhing phye ba yis/ /lce rtsa lce rtser gsungs pa ni/ /kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /zhi dang chu yi bye brag la/ /hU~M gi rnam

pa rkan la sbyar/ /rtsa bar sgra dang 'od bral ba/ /bar ma yi ni dbyangs su gsungs/ /gal te 'dod na lha yi lus/ /khyad par du ni zhi ba'i las/ /snying ga'i rtsa bar gsungs pa ni/ /kha dog ser po'i 'od mnyam pa/ /sbom po'i sgra

dang thig le dang / /rgyas pa dang ni me yi las/ /lte bar sgra dang 'joms pa ni/ /kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa/ /sbom po'i sgra dang ldan pa'i 'od/ /dbang gi las la rab tu sbyar/ /sna rtser sbrid pa gsum pa ni/ /kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /

yang ba'i sgra yi 'od du ni/ /ldan par blo dang ldan par bskul/ /bskrad dang gsang dang bcing ba dang / /mnan dang gdug sogs bskrad pa dang / /gtor ma la sogs nag po'i las/ /hU~M gi rnam pa sbrid par sbyar/ /de nyid de nyid bzhi par ni/ /hU~M gi rnam pa

nye bar mtshon/ /sa bon thams cad 'byin mdzad pa/ /hU~M gi rnam pa dbang phyug mchog /thams cad 'byin pa'i ngo bo bas/ /hU~M gi yi ge mchog gi lha/ /stong nyid yi ge'i hU~M gyur pas/ /hU~M gi rnam pa phyag 'tshal bstod/ /stong pa'i gzugs dang

rab ldan pa/ /dngos dang dngos med 'byin mdzad pa/ /btso ma gser dang 'dra ba'i mdog /sgra dang thig le yang dag ldan/ /ri rab rgya mtsho ri ni grags/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo bar ldan/ /lha dang lha min grub pa dang / /mi dang gnod sbyin rnal 'byor ba/ /

lha rnams kun nas g.yo ba ni/ /gsungs pa'i sa bon gyis 'gugs byed/ /sde tshan dang po'i sa bon ni/ /rtsa bar re pha ma nan pa dang / /lcags kyus mgor ni rnam par dgod/ /steng du zla ba'i 'od dang bcas/ /kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /lcags

kyu yis ni snying po bsgrub/ /lcags kyu yi ge sa bon bzhin/ /lcags kyu yis ni kun 'gugs pa'o/ /stong bar rlung gi sa bon ni/ /sde tshan brgyad kyi dang po la/ /rtsa bar sgra yis dkri bar bya/ /spyi bor zla tshes thig le dang / /rlung gi kha dog drag po yis/ /

lus can kun ni bskul bar bya/ /bskul ba'i las kyi sa bon gyis/ /sa bon de nyid kun tu sbyar/ /lnga pa sde tshan gnyis pa yi/ /gsum pa'i yi ge gzung byas la/ /yi ge gsum pas mnan par bya/ /re pha rtsa bar sbyar ba dang / /steng du bdud rtsi'i

thigs pa'o/ /kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /dgyes pa la sogs sa bon gyis/ /lha tshogs kun nas mnyes par byed/ /sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni/ /gsang ba'i sgra ni rtsa bar ro/ /steng du bdud rtsi'i thig le dang / /dkar zhing yid 'ong shin

tu 'bar/ /mchod pa'i sngags kyi dus dang ni/ /gtor ma sbyin sreg phyag rgya sogs/ /rgyas pa'i las ni thams cad la/ /rgyas pa'i sa bon du ni grags/ /dang po'i sde tshan bzhi pa la/ /rtsa bar re pha sgra dang ni/ /spyi bo'i steng du 'bar ba'o/ /kha dog

dmar bo mnyam pa'i 'od/ /zhi ba'i las ni rnam spangs pa/ /las rnams kun gyi sngon du'o/ /rmongs shing lus kun rmongs byed pas/ /rmongs pa'i sa bon du ni grags/ /sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa dang / /gnyis pa'i sa bon blang byas pa/ /mtha' ru

stod pa gnyis kyis so/ /kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba sogs/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su gzhag /bzhag pa'i las la rnal 'byor pas/ /blo ldan yi ge 'di yis gzhag /stong pa'i sde tshan la spyad la/ /de yi

bzhi pa gzung bar bya/ /rtsa bar ma ning sbom po dang / /steng du bdud rtsi'i thig le'o/ /'jigs pa bsrung ba'i las nyid la/ /kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /rnal 'byor de nyid 'dod pa yi/ /sa bon 'di nyid kyis bsrung ngo / /bsreg pa'i

yi ge sngags nyid ni/ /dbye ba rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar sogs kyi/ /las gsum gyi ni mtha' ru'o/ /bdun pa yi ni mtha' bzung la/ /brgyad pa gnyis pa yi ni gdan/ /bdud rtsi yi ni gdan du chu/ /kha dog dkar po

mnyam pa'i 'od/ /ma ning sde tshan gyis bskyed pa'i/ /me ltar dmar ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /logs su dbyangs yig dbyug pa'o/ /zhi ba la ni bsreg pa'i mthar/ /bdud rtsi'i sa bon kha dog ser/ /chu yi sa bon dkar ba'i gdan/ /

logs su dbyangs yig dbyug pa'o/ /brgyad kyi mtha' ma kun nas 'bar/ /rdo rje 'od bzhin 'bar ba'i me/ /sa bon 'od bzhin 'bar bcas pa/ /dbyangs yig dbyug pa'i sreg pa'o/ /rgyas pa'i sreg pa'i mtha' mar ro/ /de yi bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i ni/ /

brgyad mtha'i logs su dbyug pa'o/ /kun nas dmar dang dmar ba yi/ /mthar ni dbyug ba lcags kyu'o/ /dbu mar drang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /dbyug pa'i dbugs kyis bzla bar bya/ /chags pa'i las la rnal 'byor pas/ /sreg pa'i yi ge rnam pa

gsum/ /rnam pa bzhi las don gnyer pas/ /'joms pa'i yi ge gnyis su shes/ /bskrang dang bsad dang dbye ba dang / /mnan dang nye bar bzlog pa la/ /stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa ni/ /dbyug pa glo ru rnam par sbyar/ /nyi ma'i sde tshan gsum

pa las/ /dang po gnyis pa'i glo ru'o/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/ /'od zer me bzhin kun nas ldan/ /rdo rje sa bon mnyam 'bar las/ /lus kyi dbus su dbug par bya/ /bsad dang gdug pa bskrad la sogs/ /drag po'i las ni thams cad

la/ /dngos grub 'dod pa rnal 'byor pas/ /'joms pa'i yi ge mtha' mar ro/ /de yi sa bon ldan pa ni/ /sngon gyi dbyug tshogs rnam par spangs/ /dang po dbu yi steng rnams su/ /kha dog sngon por ba rno bas/ /gsad dang dbye dang gdug pa ni/ /khro

bo'i lha yis bskrad par bya/ /'joms pa'i yi ge'i mtha' mar ni/ /sa bon 'di yis sbyar bar bya/ /dkar po'i sde dang sde tshan gyi/ /dang po'i dang po blang byas la/ /kun nas rdo rje'i sa bon gyis/ /sa bon yi ge phyed dang gnyis/ /'pho bar sbyor ba'i sngon

dus su/ /rnam shes gong du bskul ba'o/ /lte bar rtsa ba'i phyogs nas ni/ /yi ge phyed dang gnyis kyis drang / /brgyad pa'i mtha' ni sngon du'o/ /ma la ta yi sbyor dus su/ /'pho bar sbyor bas sngon du'o/ /'pho ba'i dus kyi sngon du ni/ /rnal 'byor ba

yis rab tu spyad/ /u la pa li ta sa bon/ /spyad bya'i yi ge phyed dang gnyis/ /dngos dang dngos med sa bon las/ /skra dang thig le rnam par sbyar/ /rlung gi rtsa ba'i gnas su ni/ /sgra dang sgra yis bstan pa'o/ /chu shing me tog lte bar gnas/ /sa bon 'di

yis bsgyur bar bya/ /sngon du sbyor ba'i bsam gtan dang / /mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis bcing / /bdun pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/ /bdud rtsi'i sa bon sa bon gyis/ /bzlog byas rgyas pa'i gnas su ni/ /chu shing me tog lta bur gyis/ /ji ltar

sde tshan gsum pa ni/ /yi ge gsum pa gzung byas la/ /dbyug par phyi ma'i sa bon dang / /'og pag gis ni sngon dkris pa/ /de nyid de nyid kun dang ni/ /sa bon sa bon mchog gi gtso/ /theg pa rnam gsum dag byed pa/ /A li'i sa bon rab tu

grags/ /sde tshan brgyad pa'i gnyis pa la/ /lcags kyu yis ni spyi bor mnan/ /spyi bor zla tshes thig le dang / /kha dog dmar po mchog gi 'od/ /sems can kun nas rmongs byed pa/ /yid dbye ba la kun nas sbyar/ /kun tu rmongs ni sa bon no/ /

rmongs pa'i las la rab tu sbyar/ /brgyad pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/ /spyi bor lcags kyu 'dren pa dang / /rtsa bar re pha'i sa bon no/ /kha dog sngon po 'bar ba yi/ /dri dang me tog ro sogs mid/ /las kyis kun nas 'phrog par byed/ /'phrog byed ming

gi sa bon gyis/ /'phrog pa'i las la kun tu sbyar/ /bdun pa dkar po'i sa bon ni/ /dung dang kun+da mnyam pa'i 'od/ /bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon no/ /chu yi yi ge ming can no/ /ka shar ldan pa'i sa bon ni/ /kha dog ser po 'od mnyam pa/ /me bzhin

'bar zhing 'bar ba yi/ /me yi yi ger rnam par grags/ /sde tshan brgyad kyi dang bor ni/ /de nyid stong pa'i dngos po dang / /rlung gi sa bon dmar po ni/ /rlung gi sa bon du ni grags/ /brgyad pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/ /kha dog sngon

po'i 'od mnyam pa/ /snying gar sa yi sa bon ni/ /de nyid pa yi sa bon no/ /'di rnams sa bon sa bon la/ /thig le'i yi ge rtsa bar ro/ /rtsa bar nyis 'gyur re pha dang / /rlung gi sa bon gsum par ro/ /rtsa bar sgra ni bzhi pa'o/ /steng du thig le sbyar ba

dang / /de nyid bzhi pa'i sa bon ni/ /bzhi pa'i yi ge drug pa'o/ /rmongs pa chu yi sa bon ni/ /g.yo ba'i rlung gi sa bon dang / /sa ni nyon mongs par 'gyur ro/ /phyugs ni me la kun tu sbyar/ /yi ge brgyad pa'i sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad sems

dang bcas/ /bdag nyid de nyid gtso bo yi/ /'khor ba thams cad gcod mdzad pa/ /thams cad kun nas spyi bo dang / /yi ge kun nas gnas pa'o/ /sa bon 'di ni kun nas bzung / /ye shes sa bon zhes bya'i ming / /rtag pa'i rtsa bar mnan pa dang / /

sgra dang thig ler sbyar bar bya/ /dkar po kun+da zla ba'i mchog /ye shes rnam shes sa bon nyid/ /rgyu pa'i gzugs kyi sa bon ni/ /sa bon sa bon de bas mchog /ye shes rnams shes bya ba'i ming / /las kun la ni rab sbyar bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhi

ba ni/ /zhi ba'i gzugs can rdzu 'phrul che/ /mthar ni swA hA ring por ldan/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i sngags pa yis/ /gnyi ga lus la bsgoms nas ni/ /'di yis lha mo sbyar bar bya/ /sngags bas bsreg pa'i sngags pa ni/ /sngon du dbyug pa med

pa'o/ /lha mo'am yang na lha mo la/ /khro bo'i gzugs 'joms la sogs pa'i/ /'joms pa'i yi ge mtha' bzhag ste/ /bzlas shing bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /gzugs dang gzugs can dngos po yis/ /khro bo khro mo khyad par nyid/ /sreg

dang 'joms pa'i sa bon ni/ /khyad par dang ni khyad par can/ /de nyid de nyid kun gyis ni/ /rab tu spyad cing blta bar bya/ /de nyid med pa'i sngags pa ni/ /dngos grub ring du bstan pa yin/ /bsgrub pa'i dus su lha nyid kyi/ /sa bon mtha' ra bzlas pa bya/ /mchog

tu zhi ba'i de nyid la/ /dang po dbyangs yig mtha' ru'o/ /khro bo mo'i lha la ni/ /rdo rje'i sa bon mtha' mar ro/ /lha mo kun gyi de nyid la/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge mtha' mar ro/ /dang po sngags kyi sa bon ni/ /phyag 'tshal gcig ni rnam spangs nas/ /bdag

nyid ming gi sa bon dang / /gnyi ga yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu/ /stong dang stong pa'i sa bon ni/ /bar ma bsgrub pa'i lha nyid do/ /nyin mo'i yi ge dang po ru/ /bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i ming nyid ni/ /de yi sgrub pa'i las rnams ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rnam par mtshon/ /

sngags pas sngon gyi dus su ni/ /rab tu blta zhib spyad par bya'o/ /nyin mo stong pa'i sgrub pa ni/ /'chi bar yang ni the tshom med/ /nyin mo nyin mo nyin mo sgrub/ /stong pa stong pa bar ma'o/ /go bzlog pa yi sa bon ni/ /lhag pa'i yi ge brtsi bar byed/ /nyin

bar bsgrub bya lhag ma ni/ /sgrub pa po la bu lon ni/ /bsgrub bya stong pa lhag pa ni/ /dag nyid pas na 'dras bu med/ /rab tu blta zhing spyad pa yis/ /sngags kyi sgrub pa shes pa yin/ /sngon du ma ning sa bon dang / /de bzhin bsgrub bya'i ma ning nyid/ /dbus

sum ning yi ge ni/ /dngos grub stong par bshad pa yin/ /de nyid 'di yi sa bon gyis/ /rang 'dod lha nyid bsgrub par bya/ /thog ma tha ma khyad par du/ /dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming nyid do/ /mtho dang dma' dang bar ma dang / /khyad nyid kyang ni khyad par ro/ /zhi dang

rgyas pa la sogs la/ /khyad par sa bon ldan pa nyid/ /stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa la/ /rtsa bar re pha sgra nyid dang / /steng du zla tshes thig le dang / /kha dog ser po kun 'od la/ /lha mo rnal 'byor ma kun gyis/ /snying po yi ni snying po mchog /gong du
phyag 'tshal yi ge dang / /'don bzhin ming ni dbus su'o/ /mtha' dang mtha' ni bsreg sogs nyid/ /thams cad du ni kun nas ldan/ /stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa la/ /spyi bor e yi rnam pas mtshan/ /rtsa

bar nA da thig ler bcas/ /kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /dga' byed las kyi sa bon gyis/ /rnal 'byor ma kun dga' bar byed/ /de nyid kun gyi sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor ma kun gyis rab spyad/ /de nas sman sogs rim pa ni/ /khyad

par nyid du sbyar bar bya/ /bla re bla re nyid dang ni/ /spos dang bdug pa dril sogs/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i cho ga yis/ /mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs pa/ /sngon du gnyis med gtor mar ldan/ /dri yi maN+Dal gru bzhi pa/ /dbus su rnal 'byor

bas bri ba/ /gur gum shin tu dri zhim ldan/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /blo dang ldan pas gru bzhi bri/ /dbang po la sogs re'u mig nas/ /blo dang ldan pas yi ge dgod/ /dngos dang dngos med ldan pa yis/ /de yi sa bon spang dbus so/ /nyin mo'i

yi ge thams cad nyid/ /lhag ma'i sde tshan brgyad pa yi/ /sa bon mnyam par gzhag pa dgod/ /sgra dang thig ler yang dag ldan/ /kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa'o/ /gu gul dbang po'i lag pa dad/ /rmongs byed rengs byed de bzhin sgra/ /sat+ta si

hA tsam pa ka/ /ku tu ru dang ko li ki/ /son rtsi ka dang pa bla dang / /gu gul ru rta dUr ba kar/ /me dang dri dang gur gum dang / /tsan+dan gi wang yang dag ldan/ /sha khar dang li shi dang / /pri yang ku dang ge sar dang / /chu srin sder mo nub phyogs cha/ /re'u

mig kun dang gnas kun tu/ /dbang po la sogs sman rim bzhin/ /rdzas ni re re re re dang / /cha la sa bon bzlas par bya/ /phyag 'tshal dang po bsreg pa mtha'/ /brgyad dang brgyad du bzlas pa bya/ /cha dang ldan sogs sa bon ni/ /sman dang ldan na de

bas mchog /bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /gu gul la sogs sbyar byas nas/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo rgyal dbang la/ /mkhas pas byin pas dbang du byed/ /bdag nyid lnga yi lnga dang ni/ /sha da wa sogs sbyar byas nas/ /re pa'i rdzas la

bsgoms byas na/ /ji ltar sngon dang sngon bzhin nyid/ /rje'u rigs bram ze dmangs rigs dang / /skyes pa'am yang na bud med la/ /bza' ba'i dngos po byin pa yis/ /dbang du 'gyur bar yongs su grags/ /skyo byed la sogs rnam pa lnga/ /son

rtsi ka yi cha dang sbyar/ /brtul zhugs dman pa'i rigs rnams ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni dbang du byed/ /me da la sogs sman rim dang / /mi yi mar khu yang dag ldan/ /mkhas pas dpyad cing brtags pa yis/ /mnyam pa'i cha dang ma ru bya/ /thig

le'u ni sbyin byas na/ /rgyal po'i rigs la 'gro ba dang / /tha snyad las ni rnam par rgyal/ /'gro ba yang dag rmongs par byed/ /dang po sha kha ra sogs dang / /tsan+dan dang ni rnam par sbyar/ /sde tshan gcig gi cha dang ni/ /tsan+dan gyi ni cha nyid dang / /

byams pa'i gnas su rnal 'byor pa/ /yan lag nying lag byug byas nas/ /dri ni sna la man mas tsam gyis/ /nges par dbang du byed pa'o/ /mtshams dang mtshams kyis sha kha ra/ /sbrang rtsi'i cha dang sbyar nas ni/ /mchog tu bsgoms shing bdug pa

yis/ /kun nas nges par dbang du byed/ /mtshams kyi nang gi kun bzung nas/ /sha khar yi cha dang bsre/ /bdug pas bdug cing bdug byas nas/ /mi ni kun nas rmongs par byed/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes mkha'

'gro sprul nas ni/ /sa bon so so'i sa bon nyid/ /kun nas brgya phrag gcig tu'o/ /de bzhin du ni dmar po'i las/ /de yi rjes ni kun bzung la/ /bdag nyid ye shes lta ru'o/ /nyi ma'i lag pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i

'od/ /de nyid sa bon bzlas pa yis/ /g.yo ba dang ni ltung bar byed/ /snying ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/ /de yi dbus su sa bon ni/ /skyed par re pa thig le can/ /khri phrag

gcig tu bzlas pa yis/ /gnyis kyis ltung ba'am g.yo bar byed/ /phyi nas gtor ma'i las kyis ni/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo grub par byed/ /gu gul la sogs srin bu lngas/ /rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar byas nas/ /phra ba'i sgo nga tsam zos pas/ /mod la

myur du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sha ta ca sogs srin bu ni/ /'o ma bdun par sbyar byas pa'i/ /zhag bdun las lhag par zos na/ /'chi ba 'di la the tshom med/ /son rtsi kar sogs srin bu lnga/ /sbrang rtsi smyo byed lnga ba ni/ /bza' dang btung ba sbyin byas nas/ /

skyo byed myos bar 'gyur ba'o/ /med la sogs srin bu lnga/ /sbrul gyi sgo ngar bzlas byas nas/ /thig le tsam zhig zos pas ni/ /skad cig de la mdze yis 'dzin/ /kha ra'i sde tshan srin bu ni/ /mgo la sgong dang ldan par/ /de yi phye ma zos pa yis/ /

mi ni dbyangs dang bral bar 'gyur/ /mtshams kyi khar kun bzung la/ /sbrang rtsi mar gyi cha dang sbyar/ /de yi phye ma bza' byas na/ /de yi mod la gzir bas 'dzin/ /mtshams kyi nang gi yang dag gzung / /sbrang rtsi lhan cig bsgo byas pa'i/ /phra rab tsam zhig

zos pa yi/ /mod la rims kyis gdung bar byed/ /de nyid rab sbyor snying po ni/ /gsang zhing gsang ba'i lung gi don/ /ye shes ldan zhing blo ldan pa'i/ /lus kyi rim pa rnam par blta/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang / /slob dpon dang ni gsang

smod pa/ /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyis gsungs/ /lnga pa'am lnga ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba bstan pa rdzogs so// //de nas gzhan gyi rim pa ni/ /sman rnams kyi ni khyad par nyid/ /de nyid kun gyi mchog 'gyur ba/ /

mchog gi snying po snying po nyid/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas/ /cho ga rim bzhin sman dang sngags/ /de nyid gtor ma'i las dang ni/ /dri yi re'u mig dgod par bya/ /bcu dgu dang ni sum cu yi/ /gru bzhi pa yi re'u mig dgod/ /nyin mo stong pa'i sa

bon dang / /sde tshan tha ma dgod par bya/ /dbang po la sogs gnas rnams su/ /dang por dbyangs yig rim ji bzhin/ /re'u mig kun gyi sa bon ni/ /sman sogs bzhin du gzhag par bya/ /na ki b+ha la bi ling ga/ /ru rta bu ram b+ha sa ka/ /ka sa la sogs

bdun pa ni/ /dbang ldan la sogs gnas su dgod/ /dbang po'i lag pa shu dag dang / /rmongs byed dang ni tsan+dan dang / /tsan+dan dang ni gur gum nyid/ /bdun pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya/ /cha mnyam pa ni gnyis pa'o/ /ga bur sA li shu dag dang / /

gur gum rkun mo gi wang dang / /sbrang rtsi bdun pa yi ni cha/ /gsum pa'i re'u mig sde tshan no/ /sa rdzar gu gul ru rta dang / /g+han d+hi kha ra kun du ru/ /me tog phreng ba bdun pa ni/ /bzhi pa'i re'u mig gnas su'o/ /ka ko la dang sha ta dang / /ge sar

so rtsi rgya skyegs dang / /pa tra bdun pa'i cha nyid ni/ /lnga pa'i las su yongs su grags/ /dri dang bcud len k+Sha ra dang / /yung ba dang ni kha ra tra/ /k+Shau dri bi bi ling gi cha/ /drug pa'i re'u mig mig yin no/ /dan ta dan ta ku su ma/ /rams dang gar sma be ta

ki/ /sar rnams ni bdun pa'i cha/ /bdun pa'i sman gyi rim pa'o/ /brgya phyed gcig gis mtshang bar/ /re'u mig kun sogs sman nyid do/ /re re la yang sngags 'di ni/ /brgya phrag mngon par rab bsngags te/ /dang po chu srin sde tshan sogs/ /bdag

nyid bdun gyi bdun pa ni/ /mthar ni phye ma sbyar byas te/ /shin tu zhi ba mor mkhas pas btags/ /'dus pa rgyal po rgyal dbang gi/ /bza' dang btung dang ldan par sbyin/ /thams cad bdag nyid 'dod pa bzhin/ /kun nas thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /dang po

la sogs sde tshan ni/ /phra zhing zhib par rab tu bya/ /phye ma kun nas blangs nas ni/ /bdag nyid mchil mas de bzhin bdun/ /bza' dang ston mor cho ga bzhin/ /rab tu mnyam par bzhag pas bya/ /skyes pa'am ni bud med dam/ /thams

cad kun nas 'od 'gyur ro/ /dang por shel gyi sde tshan ni/ /mnyam por cha de phyed mar bya/ /mi yi snum dang kun tu sbyar/ /grib ma dang ni grib mar bskams/ /cho lor 'jug cing dga' ba dang / /snga dro thig le sbyin byas na/ /rgyal po'i rigs la nyer 'gro ba/ /

skye bo skal can myur du 'gyur/ /sa rdza sngon sogs dbang por sbyar/ /phye ma zhib tu byas nas ni/ /sbrang rtsi kha ra'i cha nyid dang / /rang 'dod spos chu rab sbyar nas/ /mi dga' ba kun dga' ba dang / /ngag gi 'dren pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de yi bdug pas bdugs pa'i

lus/ /'gro ba kun tu rmongs par 'gyur/ /ka ko la sogs dang ldan pas/ /phye ma mnyam por char byas te/ /tsan+dan dang po thams cad kun/ /cha gsum du ni bya bar bya/ /mi byams sman zhing bkur pa ni/ /skal ldan mdzes par 'dod 'gyur na/ /de yi

yan lag la byugs la/ /'gro ba rnam par rmongs byed yin/ /dri yi sde tshan bdun par ni/ /ka ko la sogs dang ldan par/ /mar dang 'o ma dang bsres nas/ /kun gyi cha dang sbyar byas nas/ /grib ma'i grib mar bskam par bya/ /rigs dman kla klo la sogs

kun/ /yid mi 'ong ba byams par 'gyur/ /'di yi sbyor ba sbyin byas nas/ /dang gi 'dod bzhin byed pa'o/ /da na ti mnyam pa'i cha nyid dang / /rgya skyegs la sogs kun gyi cha/ /me la bsro bar rab tu sbyar/ /ka ra na dza yi rdog ma tsam/ /yid du mi 'ong

ba yi gnas/ /khar bcug kun tu de yi dag /tshig gsum tshig tu brjod pa yis/ /bdag 'dod pa bzhin dbang du byed/ /mtshams kyi dan ti la sogs pa/ /smyo byed chu ni lnga ba dang / /bdag nyid bcings bar sngon ldan pas/ /mchog tu bsgoms na

'dug par bya/ /bdug pa 'di yis bdug byas na/ /sgrub pos sna la mnams tsam gyis/ /de yi rang 'dod su la ni/ /dbang du gyur par yongs su grags/ /mtshams kyis ra la sogs blang / /phye ma zhib mor byas na ni/ /bdag nyid dri ma lnga dang

ni/ /kun nas cha ni mnyam byas la/ /phye ma zhib mo yang dag ldan/ /'di yi sman dang ldan pa yis/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la reg byas na/ /nges par dbang du byed pa'o/ /cha dang cha yi bye brag ni/ /mkhas shing bzo bar byas bar bya/ /khyad par sman gyi

las 'di ni/ /cho ga bzhin du rnam par blta/ /rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba ni/ /pad+ma'i gdan gyi gdan la bzhugs/ /kun nas yongs su rdzogs pa yi/ /btso ma gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /a ni thig le yang dag ldan/ /

'bar zhir rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /bsgrub bya'i sems ni 'grugs par byed/ /mi 'gyur yi ge'i thig le dang / /rtsa bar sgra yis rab tu sbyar/ /mthang ni bdud rtsi'i yi ge'i ming / /'bum phrag gcig gis rab tu bsgrub/ /sman gyi sbyor bar ldan pa ni/ /zla ba'i

dkyil du kun nas bya/ /gtor ma de nyid byin brlabs nas/ /'bum dang 'bum du bsnyen pa bya/ /sngon du da na ti'i yan lag dang / /thig le brgya par kun nas ldan/ /bza' ba'i dngos pos sbyin byas na/ /mi yi skad cig rnam par spangs/ /da na ta la sogs srin

bu dang / /ra yi 'o mar bsres byas na/ /gang gis zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /zhag bdun na ni nges par 'chi/ /ku gsum srin bu bdun dang ni/ /smyo byed chu ni rnam pa lnga/ /bza' bar zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /smyo zhing smyo bar 'gyur ba'o/ /rams kyi lam sogs

sde tshan dang / /dkar por srin bu sbyar nas ni/ /bza' ba'i dngos por sbyin byas na/ /thams cad kun nas 'thab par 'gyur/ /ka mi srin bu'i sde tshan dang / /mi yi mar khu dang sbyar nas/ /phye mas yan lag la reg na/ /skal ngan mi byams pa dag ni/ /tsi te

sde tshan bdun pa ni/ /nor bur sgong ldan bzlas nas/ /thig le tsam zhig zos pa yis/ /mong la tshor ba mi bzad 'byung / /sa yal sogs sde tshan dang / /nyi shur ra yi chu yis spangs/ /cung zhig tsam zhig zos pa yis/ /nyi ma nyi shu na

de 'chi/ /dan ti mtshams kyi srin bu dang / /mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar nas ni/ /bza' dang btung ba zos nas ni/ /mdze nad kyis ni yan lag gzir/ /mtshams sogs thang chu'i srin bu ni/ /bza' dang btung bar rab byin na/ /rnam par rmongs shing dran pa nyams/ /

de nyid med cing mnyam gzhag med/ /rab sbyor snying po bsdus pa nyid/ /gsang zhing gsang bar byas pa yi/ /rmongs shing blun pa'i sems can sogs/ /sbyor ba 'di yis longs spyod ldan/ /dkon mchog gsum la brnyas pa dang / /slob dpon dang ni

gsang smod dang / /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ba/ /rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyis gsungs/ /nyon mongs rmongs sogs bag chags dang / /shes rab zhan cing yid mi gzhungs/ /sngags kyi snod min snying rje med/ /sman gyi bya ba la 'jug pa'o/ /gdan

bzhi pa yi rgyud kyis ni/ /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa'o/ /de yi sbyor ba mthong nas ni/ /brda yi skad kyis bsdus pa'o/ /le'u bzhi pa zhes bya pa rdzogs so// //de yi rtsa ba'i snying po'i don/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba'i rim pa yi/ /de nyid bsdus pa'i 'grub

pa'o/ /de nyid sman pas lus nyon mongs/ /shes rab thabs ni rgyur gyur pas/ /rang 'dod las ni bsgrub par bya/ /shes rab ye shes snang ba'o/ /thabs ni rigs pa'i tshul nyid do/ /rnal 'byor shes rab rtsa ba 'di/ /thabs ni de yi grogs nyid do/ /

gang zhig thabs dang shes rab ldan/ /nyon mongs lus las rnam par rgyal/ /srid pa'i nyes skyon du ma yang / /srid pa dang ni rmongs pa gzhi/ /dngos po'i gnas ni mi rtag pas/ /de phyir shes rab yongs su spangs/ /dngos med dngos po yang ma yin/ /skye

pa dang ni 'gag pa med/ /dngos po yongs su gnas pa med/ /'jigs pa yi ni rnam pa med/ dngos dang dngos med la sogs mtha'/ /dag dang ma dag dbus su ni/ /de yi mtshan nyid sngon shes nas/ /mnyam pa'i lta ba ldan par gzung / /gzung dang

'dzin pa rnam grol ba'i/ /dngos po'i 'du shes rnam par spangs/ /sangs rgyas kyis rtogs bstan bcos las/ /yongs su brtags nas snying po blang / /dngos med dngos por gzung par bya/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin rnam par spangs/ /dngos dang dngos

med mnyam byas pas/ /'o ma bsrubs pa las ni mar/ /mchog gi snying po yang dag blang / /mnyam par lta ba 'ba' zhig go/ /bstan bcos bstan zhing yongs shes na/ /de yi mtshan nyid dngos po med/ /yang dag lam la dmigs pa yis/ /dngos

po mchog dang mchog tu 'grub/ /ji bzhin gnas kyi rim pa brten/ /ye shes mchog tu gong nas gong / /gzhan gyi gnas las 'phangs pa yi/ /mnga' yis mnga' ni bsnun par bya/ /gong nas gong la sogs par blta/ /rang 'dod dngos por yang

dag blang / /bdun pa'i dgra las rnam par rgyal/ /'khor pa'i dgra yi g.yul nyid ni/ /gang zhig thabs dang shes rab ldan/ /dgra yi dngos po gang du gnas/ /le lo gnyid dang 'dod pa dang / /khro dang rmongs pa srod pa dang / /khro ba yis ni yan lag

gzir/ /thabs kyis bdud ni rnam par sbangs/ /le lo nyes skyon kun gyi gnas/ /gnyid kyis dge ba rnam par 'joms/ /khro ba yis ni sring pas 'dren/ /'dod pas dran pa rnam par nyams/ /rmongs pa yis ni gnyis kyis non/ /sreng ba yis ni 'khor

bar 'jug /bkres pas dman zhing sdang ba yi/ /bdud bdun po ni yongs su srangs/ /kun nas bdud kyis 'bigs pa yi/ /lus ni nyon mongs sdug bsngal gnas/ /rang 'dod pa yi sems kyis ni/ /dul bar bsrubs shing mnan par bya/ /gang

dang gang gi lam du ni/ /rang 'dod sems kyi 'bad pa yis/ /thams cad snying po bsdus nas ni/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni brtsam par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas/ /smon lam bla med rgyu yi ni/ /o~M swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba

shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ yo ga shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ badzra shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ smon lam kun mchog don du ni/ /lha nyid dmigs par bya ba yis/ /rnam shes rang 'dod par byas pas/ /sred dang rmongs pa rnam par spangs/ /zla ba'i dkyil

'khor dbus gnas par/ /bdag nyid lus ni rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /dung dang kun+da mnyam pa'i 'od/ /bdag nyid sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /phyag na rdo rje dril bu dang / /sku la rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan/ /rdo rje me

'od rab 'phro ba/ /'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par/ /dngos po dngos por bsgom par bya/ /A li kA li rab sbyor bas/ /sa bon sa bon byung ba yi/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mthar bzhag pa/ /rang 'dod pa yi sems kyis bzla/ /rim bzhin 'gags

pa'i phyi nas ni/ /bdag med shin tu mnyam par gzhag /gzugs kun rnam par dbug nas ni/ /khams gsum du ni mi rtog go/ /zla ba la sogs bdag nyid med/ /kun nas thams cad stod par rig /stong nyid stong pa stong chen dang / /dngos med

dngos por bsgoms pa yis/ /bsgoms nas lhag ma'i mtha' ru ni/ /rnam shes sgron ma lta bur 'bar/ /de yi 'od zer snang ba yis/ /khams gsum mun pa bsal nas ni/ /'bar zhing rab tu phra ba'o/ /rnam shes ye shes snang ba nyid/ /dngos dang

dngos po med pa'i dbus/ /gzugs dang gzugs med dbus nyid dang / /'du shes 'du shes med par ldan/ /yud tsam lta bar rig pa'o/ /gzugs dang stong ba la sogs dbus/ /'di yi mtshan nyid mtshon pa nyid/ /'gog pa'i sbyor ba'i rim

pa ni/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /yan lag gzir med pa dang / /sems kyi skyo ba med pa yis/ /rim dang rim pa tsam byas nas/ /'khor ba gcod cing gcod pa'o/ /rtag tu nyid kyi sems kyis ni/ /yang dag byang chub rim pa

bstan/ /shin tu bcad cing bltas nas ni/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni blang bar bya/ /o~M b+ha ta li b+ta ta li pe ta mu khi hU~M phaT swA hA/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor gyis/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/ /gzugs kun rdzogs shing mdzes pa yi/ /btso ma'i gser dang

'dra ba'i 'od/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje 'od zer kun nas 'phro/ /ye shes sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni/ /sngags pas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na/ /'dod dang grol ba rgya chen po'i/ /phyis ni las rnams brtsam par bya/ /dur khrod thal ba sogs

blangs la/ /snod la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi sol ba'i phye ma yis/ /gang du dkyil 'khor sprul ba yis/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ba/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma bri/ /thod pa brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /

dri dang bdug pa mar me dang / /gtor ma'i de nyid de nyid dang / /kun nas nya phyes dngos po yi/ /sna tshogs mchod pa rgya chen po/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro dgug pa ni/ /pho nya bzhi dang kun tu ldan/ /seng ge stag mo ce spyang dang / /'ug pa mo ni phyogs

bzhir ro/ /thams cad kun nas kun tu ni/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi sems kyis mchod/ /de yi shar gyi gnas su ni/ /me yi las ni rab tu bya/ /dur khrod shing gi lhag ma dang / /de yi shing gi ba dan gsum/ /de'am 'on te gdol pa'i mes/ /'bad

pas me ni rab tu sbar/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rgya chen po/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres byas pas/ /mchog gi sngags ni bzla bya zhing / /bsregs pas lha mo tshim par 'gyur/ /thams cad gnas dang phyogs nas ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni 'jigs pa dang / /

mi bzad ku co rab sgrogs na/ /'jigs par mi 'joms par 'gyur/ /dbung gi tshogs ni yan lag bzhi/ /rgyal bo myur du 'ong 'gyur na/ /de la tsham dam sbyin par bya/ /ri rab ri la sogs pa dang / /sa gzhi 'ur 'ur 'gul ba

dang / /sna tshogs mi bzad dri dang ni/ /'dren pa'i sems ni 'jig mi bya/ /sems can chen po'i rnal 'byor pas/ /khri phrag gcig tu bsreg byas na/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdun nyid ni/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i bya

ba dang / /gtor ma'i las dang las nyid dang / /lus la ltos ba med pa yis/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /phyi nas ye shes lha mo ni/ /me yi dbus su ston par byed/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis/ /gtor ma dang ni ar+g+haM dbul/ /zab

cing rgya cher sgrogs pa yi/ /de la lha mo tshig tu brjod/ /sems can chen po ci zhig 'grub/ /gang 'dod dngos grub rab tu smros/ /de la sgrub pos smras pa ni/ /dngos grub chen po 'grub ldan pa'i/ /gal te mchog gi dngos grub 'dod/ /grub pa brgyad
