ni gsol ba gdab/ /bdud dang nyon mongs gza' sogs kyis/ /gal te yid gnyis skyes nas ni/ /til mar chen po dang ldan pa'i/ /lcags kyu chen po sbyin sreg bya/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /

dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i/ /mchog gi lha mo bsgrub pa ni/ /lus dang srog la mi ltos par/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nas ye shes de nyid mchog /shin tu phra la rab zhi ba/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /'byung ba

kun la 'dis khyab pa/ /'od kyi bdag nyid gnas pa'i mi/ /ma rig nyon mongs gcod byed pa/ /srid pa la sogs nyon mongs rnams/ /gang dug nas kyi rnam pa 'byung / /lus la sems shing sems pa dang / /bcu gnyis dus kyi gnas su yang / /

gzugs med sems kyi longs spyod pa'o/ /rmongs pa'i gnas dang gnas su ni/ /srid pa'i ngo bo nyid du mchod/ /rmongs pa gcod sogs rnal 'byor pa/ /srid pa'i 'dam sogs rgal dka' ba/ /dag pa'i chos kyi sgron ma yis/ /sgrib pa'i mtshan ma

'joms pa yi/ /chos dag pa yi thabs kyis ni/ /dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa'o/ /dngos dang dngos med ldan pa yis/ /legs byas nyes byas 'du shes can/ /'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs dag /rgya mtsho lta bur gting dpag dka'/ /

bcu gnyis lus kyi bdag nyid can/ /rmongs pa ye shes rnam par gnas/ /dag pa'i chos kyi chu yis ni/ /lhan cig gnas pa'i dri ma 'khru/ /rang bzhin pad+ma'i dbye ba yis/ /nyon mongs la sogs gdung ba gcod/ /rnam rtog 'jigs pa chen po

ni/ /srid pa'i rgyu ste me bzhin no/ /de phyir rnam rtog ring du spang / /rnal 'byor ba yi 'gro ba rtogs/ /mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed byas nas/ /kun nas thams cad mnyam par blta/ /rab tu mi gnas ming can la/ /las dang las kyi mtshan

nyid med/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin yang / /bdud rtsis lus ni tshim par bya/ /rtag tu bdud rtsis mchod pa'o/ /dngos su med na rnam par brtag /lcags kyu rnam pa lnga drangs nas/ /thams cad kun nas rim pas mchod/ /sbyor bas

mkha' 'gro la sogs ni/ /bdag nyid dbang du myur du 'gyur/ /rtag tu de nyid kyis bza' zhing / /med na gzhan las rnam par brtag /gsher ba'i bdud rtsi kun nas bas ma/ /bza' ba yang na sha nyid du/ /rtag tu dga' ba'i ngo bo yis/ /rtags

dang rnam rtog rnam par spangs/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i dpa' bo ni/ /dag pa'i lus su gdon mi za/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor ba spangs pa/ /bgrod dang bgrod min rnam par spangs/ /lo ma'i dang ni 'dab ma'i rgyu/ /snod la thams cad myu gu'i/ /de yi pad+ma

rgyas byed pa/ /dag pa'i mtshan ma dang po'o/ /kha dog ngan zhing dri mi zhim/ /btung ba dro ba rnam par spangs/ /dag pa'i ngo bo gcod byed pa/ /gnyis pa'i mtshan mar bstan pa'o/ /kun la dga' zhing byams pa dang / /gnod pa nam

yang mi byed cing / /sems can kun la snying brtse ba/ /gsum pa'i mtshan ma nyid du bstan/ /rtag tu stong pa'i blo ldan pas/ /zab cing rgya che'i sems kyis ni/ /thams cad rtsa bzhin du ni stong / /bzhi pa'i mtshan ma nyid du bstan/ /dag cing brtan

pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /lus gcig la ni rab lhos pa/ /rtag tu gsang sogs za ba ni/ /lnga ba'i mtshan ma ru ni gsungs/ /brtson 'grus kun nas ldan pa dang / /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /bsam gtan mchog tu brten byed pa/ /drug pa'i

mtshan ma ru ni brtag /bzo dang sgyu rtsal nyan pa dang / /rtag tu mnyam pa'i sems dang ni/ /rtag tu sems can don la brtson/ /bdun pa yi ni mtshan mar bstan/ /mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi blo rtogs byed/ /srid pa

yang dag byang chub lam/ /mtshan ma brgyad pa ru ni bstan/ /'ga' yang nam du mi smod cing / /rdzas dang rdzas min rnam rtog bcas/ /gdug pa'i bdud dang bgegs sogs dang / /rnam par rtog pas srid bar ltung / /dka' thub sdug bsngal mi bzad

pas/ /bsnyen pa 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /lus ni dka' bar spyod pa yis/ /'khor zhing srid pa'i mtha' ru'o/ /rnam rtog med pas mnyam par bya/ /dngos po mtshan ma'i sems dang bcas/ /sbyor ba grub pa'i don du ni/ /rnam par mi rtog sems

kyis bza'/ /bsgrubs pa rang 'dod snying po ni/ /g.yong nga mi g.yo dngos grub rgyu/ /chos kyi snying po snying po nyid/ /sems ni ye shes rang bzhin ldan/ /sbyor ba'i bstan bcos cha nyid ni/ /de nyid de nyid khyad par ro/ /sbyar dang bsam gtan byas

pa yis/ /rtag tu sems ni sbyar bar bya/ /rnal 'byor rjes rnal 'byor dang / /rnal 'byor las 'das gnas chen po/ /las bzhi dang ni rab ldan pa'i/ /ye shes kyis ni 'khor bsgrol/ /dang por bskyed rim spyod pa dang / /dbugs kyi sbyor ba

rim sogs dang / /las la sems shing sems pa dang / /dang po'i sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /me bzhin du ni za ba dang / /mnyam pa'i nyi ma bzhin du blta/ /rna dbang rlung gi rang bzhin du/ /rna ba sgra yi mchod par ldan/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin

ni/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs mchod pa'o/ /gtor mas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/ /gnyis pa shin tu sbyor ba'o/ /dngos dang dngos med mnyam byas nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag sbyar/ /phyag rgya chen po yi ni thabs/ /sbyor ba las

'das 'di nyid do/ /rang bzhin gyis ni legs spyad na/ /thams cad bdag med pa las byung / /lus sogs stong bar rtogs pa ni/ /bzhi pa rnal 'byor chen po'o/ /'di rnams mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/ /chen po'i sems kyi sdom pa'o/ /rtag

tu bya ba der 'jug pas/ /'byung zhing 'khor bar sgrol ba'o/ /spyan ni pad+ma ltar yangs shing / /bzhin ni me tog rgyas pa 'dra/ /'dod pa lnga po nye bar bsten/ /bde bar spyo cing bde bar reg /'dod pa kun dang nyer ldan pa/ /bde ba'i sems kyis

bsgrub par bya/ /rnam par rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /srid par 'khor zhing 'jug pa'o/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /rang bzhin ldan pa'i las kyis ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /zla ba nyi ma kha

sbyar nas/ /sor mo 'brel par byas nas ni/ /dri med gsum dang dud pas sprel/ /sems ma rdo rje rab tu grags/ /tsham dam phur bu ra ba dang / /dra ba thams cad las nyid do/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /'di yi phyag rgyar bstan

par bya/ /kha ga'i phyogs gzhan nyid dang ni/ /rtsa bar rlung dbang gnon pa dang / /spyi bor 'bar ba'i re ba dang / /mtshan ma'i mnga' bdag gis brgyan cing / /rtag tu zhi zhing mchog gi gnas/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /'di

ltar sa bon mdor byas pa/ /thams cad las ni bsgrub pa'o/ /lus la sgra yis kun tu dgang / /gzugs la sogs pa zad par byed/ /sa bon lus kyi bdag nyid ni/ /sa bon lhag ma bsam par bya/ /go cha'i bsrung ba dang bral zhing / /thams cad

yan lag drug gi las/ /stong pa'i de nyid snying po ni/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ /smad pa dang ni bstod pa'ang med/ /ci 'byor dag pa'i bza' ba dang / /dbang po yul dang longs spyod ni/ /mnyam pa nyid du sems kyis bya/ /sngon du rig pas

smon lam rnams/ /bsgrub bya bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu rtogs/ /gang zhing yid la 'dod spyod pa/ /de yi thabs ni rdo rje'i/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /rked pa'i phyogs su bzung nas ni/ /hU~M gi dbyangs kyis kun bkang zhing / /grub pa'i

glu yis mnyam par bya/ /dza dza dza dza/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bzhugs pa'i bdag po khyod/ /ha ha ha ha/ hU~M yig mgon po dam tshig bdag po bdag phyag 'tshal/ /ba ba ba ba/ rdo rje sgrog gi gsang ba las byung sku 'dzin pa/ /a a a a/

a ho ma gu pa'i rdo rje A li gcig tu thim par hU~M/ /'di ltar gsang ba'i glu chen po/ /rnal 'byor ma kun tshim byed pa/ /rtse gcig rnal 'byor sems bcas pas/ /khu byug skad ltar snyan pa'i sgras/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa/ /khams

gsum snying po'i dbus su ni/ /rlung gi nam mkha' ltar dag pas/ /sems nyid rlung bzhin nam mkhar brjod/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /de yi dbus su rab mdzes pa'i/ /A li sa bon 'od

dang bcas/ /las kyi sa bon mdog tu ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya/ /'byin dang sdud cing gcod mdzad ma/ /A li'i sa bon rab tu grags/ /ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa yi/ /yi ge gsum pa bzung byas te/ /glo ru dbyug pa rdo rje

dang / /'og bag gis ni dkri bar bya/ /'di ltar rnal 'byor mchog bsgom pa/ /'khor ba thams cad gcod par byed/ /phyi nas bdag nyid lus po ni/ /sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun nas chu yis gang bar ni/ /phyogs brgyad du ni

mnyam par ro/ /de yi dbus su rab mdzes pa'i/ /pad+ma dkar po yid 'ong ba'i/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /'o ma zla ba'i bon 'dzin/ /gdugs dkar po yis mngon par bkab/ /'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang po/ /de yi sa bon

las skyes pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni/ /kun dkar dang zla ba'i mdog /phyag gnyis pa la mdzes pa'i brang / /dbu rgyan sangs rgyas lnga yi dngos/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /rdo rje snying gar mtha' 'dzin cing / /g.yon pa

dril bu dku ru brten/ /sgeg cing spro ba'i rang bzhin dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang po/ /dngos po'i tshon gyis btso bar bya/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab rgyas pa'i/ /rdo rje rnon po'i 'od 'phro ba/ /'jigs

pa med cing gnod med par/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /bzlas 'dod pa yi rnal 'byor pas/ /spro ba'i sems kyis mnyam par bsgom/ /dbus su mchog gi sa bon dang / /phyag 'tshal A lir mthar bzhag pa/ /yi ge drug pa'i

sngags chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'o/ /zlos dang bsam gtan rnal 'byor pas/ /rang 'dod las ni mngon par 'grub/ /'bum phrag gsum du bsnyen pa yis/ /de nas de yi mngon du 'grub/ /de nas kun gyi snying po ni/ /skye

dang 'jig dang rnam bral ba/ /gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor bas/ /'dod bzhin ye shes gnas rnyed pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu de nyid dang / /ye shes sku ni gnyis kyi gzugs/ /rdo rje g.yas brkyang gnas nas ni/ /dril bu mnan pa'i

rkang pas gnon/ /pad+ma rdo rje sbyar byas nas/ /phyag rgya 'ching bar mchog tu brtson/ /dril bu lag gnyis kyis mgrin par/ /rdo rje gcig gis nu mar reg /g.yon pas gzhung tshigs mtha' ru'o/ /tshems kyis ma mchu btsir mdzad cing / /gnyis

kyis sems kyi mchog brtson par/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /steng dang 'og dang dbus gnyis dang / /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/ /thams cad stong pa'i de nyid ni/ /sems kyis rab tu spyad par bya/ /mthar ni sgron ma'i

rnam pa'o/ /dbus su A li'i sa bon ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba rab tu 'phro/ /khams gsum kun gyi cha dang bcas/ /phyis ni gzugs nyid yongs rdzogs pa/ /gnyis ka yid 'ong gzugs mdzes pa'o/ /dbyig pa rdo rje 'jam pa'i mgon/ /

'od dpag shes rab kyi ni gzhi/ /rdo rje dril bu rab sbyor bas/ /mchog gi go 'phang bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje gsang bas mtshan nas ni/ /gnyis ka 'khyud nas bzlas par bya/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mthar bzhag nas/ /dbus su A li'i sa

bon ni/ /rtag pa mchog tu phra ba nyid/ /bde ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /yid kyi mchod pa'i cho ga yis/ /kun nas yid kyis bsgrub par bya/ /shes rab rdo rje yang dag par sbyor ba'i le'u rdzogs so// //de nas thams cad

snying po ni/ /mchog gi gtso bo bsdus pa'o/ /sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /gus pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /shel gyi rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dag pa'i dngos por bza' bar bya/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/ /dag pa'i ngo bor

bsgom pa nyid/ /de nas rtog pa mi rtog pa/ /bza' dang bza' min mnyam pa nyid/ /btung dang mi btung rang 'dod du'o/ /'khor ba'i pha rol rgal 'dod pas/ /sngon du dbang bskur dpa' bo rnams/ /'bad pas brtul zhugs gzung bar bya/ /rim

pa bzhin du zla ba dang / /nyi ma 'am ni lo dus su/ /brtul zhugs mtshan nyid bzhi pa'o/ /yon tan de yi yongs su bza'/ /lnga dang ni bcu bzhi dang / /khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la'o/ /brtul zhugs rim pa 'di nyid ni/ /nan tan gyis

ni gtor ma sbyin/ /de yi las rnams thams cad ni/ /ye shes de nyid 'bras bu sogs/ /de ltar bden pa'i sngags kun gyis/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /bza' sogs ston mo'i rnal 'byar pas/ /zla ba tha ma'i nyi ma gzung / /rang 'dod

chos ni rab brtags na/ /thams cad sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs ldan pa nyin re'am/ /gal te ma 'byor pa na yang / /dbyar zla 'bring po'i tha ma ni/ /lo yi nyi ma gzung bar bya/ /mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin/ /skyon

med sngags kyis sbyin byas nas/ /de yis dus rnams thams cad du/ /dpal dang phun tshogs mdun na gnas/ /rnal 'byor chos sogs la dga' bas/ /gnyis med grogs mchog rab ldan pas/ /de yis chos la brten nas ni/ /mchog gi

go 'phang bsgrub par bya/ /stong nyid kyis ni gzugs 'jig cing / /blangs pa'i chos rnams zad par byed/ /thams cad sdom pa nam mkha' ni/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsam/ /thams cad nam mkha'i gnas su ni/ /'o ma zla ba'i sa

bon bsam/ /'od zer 'bar ba mang po ni/ /dkar dang kun+da zla ba'i mdog /A li'i sa bon mchog gtso bo/ /dbugs mi g.yo bas bsgom par bya/ /skad cig rnam par sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag nyid ni/ /zhal gsum

phyag ni drug pa nyid/ /kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ /steng du rdo rje cod pan dang / /sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu la brgyan/ /rgod dang khro dang sgeg

pa dang / /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /smad g.yogs glang chen pags pa dang / /mi yi pags pa rab tu gsol/ /mi yi yan lag lnga rus pa'i/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rab tu brgyan/ /skra yi rtse mo rab 'jam zhing / /me 'bar ba dang

mnyam pa'i 'od/ /dang po'i phyag na kha T+wA~M ga/ /gnyis pa na ni dgra sta bsnams/ /gsum pa na ni rdo rje'o/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /gnyis pa thod pa khrag gis bkang / /ral gri'i phyag ni steng du'o/ /rdo rje 'od zer dri ma med/ /

sangs rgyas sprin ltar rab 'phro ba/ /sa yi dbus su rnam rol bar/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /'ug pa ce spyang seng ge dang / /stag mo phyogs su rnam par bsgom/ /bya rog ce spyang bya rgod dang / /tsa li ka yi mtshams su dgod/ /'jigs

pa'i sgra sgrogs mche ba gtsigs/ /ha hU~M rnam par 'jigs par byed/ /'di ltar mkha' 'gro rgyal dbang ma/ /bdag nyid sems kyis bsgom par bya/ /rang gi dbugs las phyung nas ni/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs dgod par bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yi

bris sku sogs/ /de yi gnas su kun tu bsam/ /'dod dang grol ba'i go 'phang gnas/ /gnyis med gtor ma'i lha nyid yin/ /sbyor ba'i sgo nas sgrub pa pos/ /'di yi mchod pa'i cho ga bshad/ /bza' dang ston mo de nyid dang / /gsang ba'i

mchod pas rab tu mchod/ /snying ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sems kyis hU~M gi sa bon las/ /de yi gzugs la sogs bskyed pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid dgod/ /bza' ba la sogs khyad par nyid/ /dag pa'i dngos por

bsgoms nas ni/ /bsgrub pa shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ /yud tsam gyis ni sbyor ba yis/ /o~M ha ho hrIHswA hA/ oM gyis 'bar bar bsam pa dang / /ha yi rnam pas so sor rtogs/ /sa bon ho yis snang par byas/ /hrIHyi rnam pas dri ma sbyong / /

lus kyi lha nyid tshim pa'i phyir/ /a yi rnam par rtogs par bya/ /sa bon lnga yis lha nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga nyid mngon par thim/ /o~M dza~M g+h+ra~M trA~M hU~M a swA hA/ bza' ba la sogs khyad par nyid/ /sngags 'di yis ni gzung bar bya/ /oM gyis rnam

pas lus dang ni/ /dza~M gyis rnam pas gzung ba dang / /g+h+ra~M gyis rnam par lto ba dang / /trA~M gis rnam par dri med lus/ /hU~M gis rnam pas spyad par bye/ /sems kyis snying gar yi ge a/ /de nyid rtag tu mchod byas na/ /rnal 'byor pa yis sdig sbyang bya/ /

dri dang mar me me tog dang / /lha bshos dang ni gtor ma yis/ /glu yi dus su dbyangs snyan dang / /pi wang gling bu la sogs sbyar/ /rtag tu de dag gis mchod cing / /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid brjod/ /'gro dang nyal dang 'dug pa dang / /'chag

dang thams cad dus nyid du/ /rtag tu sems shing sems pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsam par bya/ /oM a mu hU~M swA hA/ ye shes gzugs brnyan sbyor ba yis/ /sa bon 'di ni bzlas byas na/ /sdig pa thams cad thag bsrings shing / /rang

'dod las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'byung ba lnga las gyur pa'i sdig /gang gis gsang ba dbye byas pa'ang / /rtag tu bsgom zhing bzlas byas na/ /sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /oM ka ra ka ra pra dz+r+wA ma hA tIk+Sh+Na pany+tsa oM bud+d+he ha/ oM kro d+ha hU~M hU~M hU~M/ a

a a mu mu mu swA hA/ sngags chen po yi sa bon 'di/ /sangs rgyas sems ni mdor bsdus pa'o/ /skyon med sbyor ba'i sgrub pa pos/ /thams cad ldan pa'i sa bon ni/ /mtshan mo yi ni mtha' nyid dang / /dang por ro hi ta dus la/ /nya phyis snod du chu

dang ni/ /ma gad+hA ni srang gnyis nyid/ /kun nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /bdud rtsi'i dbus su yang dag ldan/ /bdud rtsi bsam pa'i thabs kyis ni/ /shin tu mnyam rnal 'byor pas/ /lan bdun mngon par bsngags

byas pa'i/ /de yi chu ni btung byas ni/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig pa dang / /ye shes bdud rtsi ye shes sku/ /yid gzhungs shes rab rno ba dang / /rlung dang gzi brjid dpal 'phel zhing / /kun nas skal ldan dag dang ni/ /thos dang shes rab

nor dang ni/ /rlung mkhris dug dang bad kan dang / /'dus dang glo sogs kyis gzer dang / /mig dang yan lag gzer ba ni/ /chu 'di yis ni nad kun 'grog /o~M ra ta a brta ni/ sarba phA pha~M ha ran+tu ma~M hU~M/ bi kr-i ta kro d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di yi sngags

ni sngags chen po/ /bsrung ba kun gyi bla na med/ /sngon gyi dus su gzhag byas nas/ /rnal 'byor lus ni bsrung ba'o/ /lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas la/ /gnas lnga ru ni lan gsum mo/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni mngon bsam nas/ /spyi bo'i steng du

bskur byas nas/ /rgyal po seng ge dgra sogs dang / /rkun mo dang ni me dang chu/ /rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs nad/ /'jigs byed 'jigs pa 'joms par byed/ /o~M bi mo ha ni sa~M mo ha ni/ sarba pri ye ti hU~M hU~M hU~M swA hA/ 'di yi sngags ni sngags chen

pos/ /'gro kun rmongs par byed pa gsungs/ /mi byams byams pa skye byed cing / /kun nas mdza' bar gyur pa'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa yi ni chus/ /snga dro'i dus su kha bkrus na/ /rnal 'byor pa ni grub 'dod pa/ /dgos pa thams cad 'grub par

'gyur/ /de nas sbyor ba mchog tu bshad/ /snying po las ni snying po mchog /rdo rje la sogs bsgom par bya/ /gnyis su med par mnyam par 'dres/ /yan lag 'di yis tha dad bsgom/ /dug med pa yang dug gis bsnun/ /shin tu mi bzad

rmongs pa yis/ /rmongs pa rnal 'byor bdag nyid 'jigs/ /'bad pas chos kyi thabs kyis ni/ /dag pa'i lus ni rnam dag byed/ /dag pa'i sgron ma bltas pa yis/ /nyon mongs la sogs mun pa 'joms/ /nam mkha' rdo rje rdo rje la/ /sems dang

sems ni rnam par thim/ /gcig sogs dngos po bsgom pa ni/ /'di yi rnal 'byor mtshan nyid do/ /me yi lhag ma sogs lhags pa/ /dbus dang dbus su rnam par 'tsher/ /de yi 'od kyis nam mkha'i khams/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas

blta/ /sa bon 'di yi myu gu las/ /A li kA li rnam par 'byung / /sa bon sa bon rab 'phro ba/ /nam mkha'i khams su yang dag gnas/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /ro langs ma yi dbus su bsam/ /pad+ma'i gdan la rnam par

bzhugs/ /gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa/ /lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang / /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /sgeg pa'i nyams kyis

blta ba dang / /na bza' dmar po mngon par g.yogs/ /mchog gi sems dang sems pa la/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge rnam par bsam/ /lcags kyu'i rtse mor yi ge k+Shu~M/ /bzlas shing 'di yis drang par bya/ /gzugs brnyan gyis ni yid bskyod cing / /rang

gi dbugs kyis dga' bar bya/ /o~M rA ga ta rA ga ta b+ha ti hU~M k+Shu~M swA hA/ lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'dod bzhin drang / /rmongs chen shin tu rmongs pa ni/ /mnyam par gzhag nas rab tu bsgrub/ /gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni/ /

sbyor ba'i gdan gyi gsum pa las/ /grub pa'i snying po bsdus pa ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bsdus pa'o/ /de nas ye shes lus la ni/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas/ /bza' dang bza' ba'i bsam pa yis/ /sbyang dang rtogs par spyad par

bya/ /dngos por smad pa ma yin zhing / /gang yang brtag par mi bya'o/ /mtho dang dma' ba'i rigs la sogs/ /mnyam nyid lha ni lnga pa'o/ /gang zhig skye ba po sogs pa/ /sems kyis gnod par mi bya'o/ /gal te gnod pa

byed sems na/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa ring bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig che dang phra ba yi/ /gzhan rdzas rang gir byed pa yis/ /rku ba'i sems ni mi bya'o/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa ring pa nyid/ /dang tshig rtsub phra ma dang / /'khyal ba'i dag ni ring du spang / /

gzhan gyi sems la gnod byas pas/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba nyid/ /don dang ling ga rab sbyor bas/ /sbyor ba'i chos kyi snying po nyid/ /rmongs pas log dkris ngag sogs kyis/ /de yi rab sbyar smad pa nyid/ /legs par byas pa'i las kyis ni/ /

bde ba bskyed pa'i lus kyis ni/ /sems can bde ba lhur len pas/ /theg pa che la legs par bslabs/ /gal te sems can gnod sogs pa'i/ /mi dga' ba yi tshig mi smra/ /sdig pa'i las ni mi bya zhing / /rnal 'byor gtsug lag mi smad do/ /

rnal 'byor 'dod dga' ma yin zhing / /rmongs pas rgyags par mi bya'o/ /phyag rgya 'ching bar rab sbyor bas/ /rang 'dod kyis ni bsten par bya/ /bsten cing bsten pa'i rab sbyor bas/ /lha nyid tshim zhing bsgrub par bya/ /sems can don gyi ngo bo yis/ /

sems can bde bas phan 'dogs byed/ /theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu che/ /'di yis lam gyis bsten par bya/ /gang dang gang du rab sbyor bas/ /de dang der ni phan pas bde/ /sems can sdom pa la sogs pas/ /de yi sems ni gnod mi bya/ /

'khor bar skyes pa'i dus na ni/ /thabs dang shes rab yang dag ldan/ /dngos po dngos med byed pa dang / /sems can don ni A lir sgyur/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i rgya/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba bcings pa yis/ /de yi dbus su bdud rtsi ni/ /skye

zhing myu gu 'byung ba'o/ /'dab ma gsum dang kun ldan pa'i/ /A li mchog ni mtha' med do/ /gzhan yang bdud rtsi mchog nyid ni/ /phyi rol kun gyi snying po nyid/ /bdud rtsi yid 'ong skal ldan zhing / /sems can la ni snyan par stod/ /sangs rgyas

lnga yi kun gyi lus/ /btso ma gser ltar 'bar ba'o/ /cod pan bcings shing 'phyar ba dang / /phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/ /dgod dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ni/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /steng du rdo rje lcags kyu dang / /gnyis pa rdo

rje zhags pa'o/ /g.yon pa rdo rje dril bu dang / /gsum pa lcags sgrog 'ching ba yi/ /phyag bzhi bo yi phyag rgya ni/ /gsang ba gsang sogs 'ching ba dang / /lus dang kha dog 'bar ba ru/ /snang ba mtha' yas mnyam par gzhag /ha yi rnam pa'i

sa bon ni/ /yi ge mchog gi dga' bar byed/ /ho yi rnam pas lus dang lus/ /rnam snang mnga' bdag lha nyid do/ /sems dang sems pa bsgoms pas ni/ /lha nyid du ni yongs su grags/ /thams cad lus dang lus can gyi/ /srog dang sems

ni 'phrog pa'o/ /hrIHyi rnam pa'i sa bon ni/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /o~M gyi rnam pa gsal bar 'phro/ /kun nas sems ni rtogs mdzad pa'o/ /a yi rnam pa des tshim byed/ /blo dang ldan pas yongs su bsten/ /bdud rtsi chu yi lha mo ni/ /

de yi shes bya rtogs pa'o/ /bdud rtsi gang gis myangs pa yis/ /bdud rtsi yi ni 'bras bu thob/ /de bzhin gshegs dgyes lha mo ni/ /gzugs mdzes mchog tu yid 'ong ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam pa yis/ /phyag rgya bzhi pa bcing bar

bya/ /rnal 'byor pa ni bsgrub 'dod na/ /gnyis ni gnyis su med par bsgom/ /gnyis ni dngos po dngos med pas/ /ye shes ldan pas yongs su gsal/ /nga rgyal chen pos bcings pa ni/ /spros pa'i sems dang ldan pas bcings/ /sgeg

dang khro ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /lha mo'i snying po nyid du thim/ /nyi ma'i lag pa'i gdan la ni/ /zla ba'i lag pas reg byas la/ /de yis 'khyud cing 'khyud nas ni/ /lha mo'i ye shes nyid du thim/ /lto ba'i ye shes me yi lha/ /de yi

gnas su tshim par bya/ /shes rab thabs la thim pa yis/ /gnyis med sbyor bas tshim pa nyid/ /o~M ha ho hrIHa/ sa bon chen bo'i sa bon ni/ /'di yis sa bon bsam par bya/ /rim pa 'di yis mchod pa ni/ /sman gyi rgyur ni ma yin no/ /lha

mo bkres dang sdug bsngal 'phrog /sgeg cing snyan par smra ba dang / /nga rgyal med pa'i nga rgyal byed/ /brtson med pa yi brtson 'grus bcas/ /kun nas skal ldan lha mos ni/ /rmongs byed 'jigs dang 'gugs par byed/ /yid mi gzhungs dang ngo

tsha 'jigs/ /lha mo snyan mas 'joms par byed/ /de ltar yon tan lha mo ldan/ /yid 'ong bdud rtsi snyan pa mo/ /'dod dang thar pa'i go 'phang gnas/ /gang zhig lha mo 'di yi lam/ /chu sbyar ne tso gtam dang ni/ /sgeg dang gar ni lnga ldan

pa'o/ /lha min brtson 'grus bdun pa ste/ /dran pa nyams byed brgyad pa'o/ /lha mo pho nya brgyad kyi las/ /myur du sems ni 'phrog pa'o/ /rnal 'byor ba yi bdag nyid sems/ /'dod pa'i sems kyi rnam par byed/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i

mtshan nyid kyis/ /'bad pas thang ka sna tshogs dgram/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan par/ /kun nas pho nya brgyad pa ni/ /bud med gzugs su de yi tshul/ /phyogs kyi mdog dang mdog tu'o/ /gzugs

mdzes yon tan ldan pa yi/ /dung chen la sogs lag pa na/ /gnas dang gnas la bdud rtsi'i chu/ /sha lnga yi ni snod la sogs/ /bza' dang ston mos nye bar mdzes/ /de yi gzugs brnyan mdun du ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /

me tog spos dang dri la sogs/ /gnyis med gtor mar yang dag ldan/ /dang por re zhig dam tshig gi/ /phyag rgya la sogs bcing bar bya/ /zla ba'i lag pa rab brkyang nas/ /rnam shes byed par kun tu ldan/ /oM hi li hi li hU~M phaT/ dam tshig

sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /mchod pa'i las la rab tu sbyar/ /oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha ho hrIHa swA hA/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /nyi ma'i lag pa'i gdan la ni/ /zla ba'i lag pa kun sbyar la/ /snying po'i snying dang phyag rgya yis/ /rang

'dod las ni rab tu byed/ /'bum phrag gcig zlos rnal 'byor pas/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /phyis ni me la sogs pa'i las/ /gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis so/ /me thab kha ran gsum par ni/ /snang byed shing ni rab sbar la/ /lha

mi'i me tog rgyas pa ni/ /sbrang rtsis bsku zhing sbyar byas la/ /bdud rtsi'i chu dang kun nas bsre/ /gang gi ming nas yang dag bzung / /brgyad brgya ru ni bsreg byas na/ /nges par dbang du 'gyur ba'o/ /me yi lha sogs thal ba dang / /bdag nyid khu ba

lan lnga ru/ /bdud rtsi dbus su sbyin byas na/ /bdag nyid 'dod bzhin dbang du byed/ /smyo byed sbrul ni lnga pa dang / /u dza'i shing ni cha mnyam pa/ /bdud rtsir ldan par byin byas na/ /myur du smyo bar 'gyur ba'o/ /nim pa la sogs rtse mo la/ /

mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /me tog bdug pa dri sogs dang / /gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis ni/ /arga dkar po'i rtsa ba las/ /'bad pas me ni rab tu sbrar/ /pad+mo zhib mo phye ma ni/ /'o ma dang ni bdud rtsis bsku/ /brgyad brgya ru bsreg

byas pa yi/ /lhag ma'i thal ba bsgos pa'o/ /tsi tra ka yi rtsa ba'i chus/ /lan bdun bsgos la grib mar bskam/ /mchod pa'i dus rnal 'byor pas/ /de yi thal ba bdud rtsi chus/ /myur ba nyid du bsgos pa ni/ /kha ba kun+da 'o ma ru/ /lus

ni rmongs pa'i gzugs dang ni/ /shin tu rmongs shing rmongs pa'i dri/ /pho nya brgyad kyi lha mo ni/ /stobs dang gzi brjid don med pa'o/ /rnam rtog rmongs pa'i sems can la/ /'di yis las kyis rab tu sbyar/ /rmongs pa spangs

pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /'gro ba myur du rtogs par 'gyur/ /'di yis phye ma blangs byas la/ /dzA ti mar khu lan gsum spang / /bdud rtsi mchod pa'i dus su ni/ /thal ba lhan cig bsres byas nas/ /thig le lce yis myangs pa yis/ /pho nya brgyad

kyis 'dzin par 'gyur/ /pho nya'i mtshan ma yongs rdzogs pa/ /smyo zhing rgyags shing rgyags pa'o/ /smyo byed shing ni yang dag blang / /'bad pas me ni rab sbar la/ /me tog sbrang rtsi bdud rtsir ldan/ /brgya brgya ru ni bsreg par bya/ /de yi thal ba blangs

nas ni/ /rab tu sbyor ba la sogs bya/ /bdud rtsi bskyed pa'i gnas su ni/ /thal pa de yis byugs byas na/ /chu yis mdog ni gzhan du dang / /de yi ro ni gzhan du 'gyur/ /sbrang rtsi 'o mar ldan pa yis/ /de gzugs snga ma bzhin du 'gyur/ /de

yi thal ba blangs byas la/ /sku gsum pa yi cha dang bsre/ /bdud rtsi yi ni cha bdun dang / /ma ru tse yi cha brgyad nyid/ /mchod pa'i dus su chang la ni/ /de yi thal ba blugs byas na/ /gang la byin pa tsam gyis ni/ /bdud rtsi kun nas rang 'dod rig /

gang dang gang gis lam gyis ni/ /de dang de yi rmongs pa rnams/ /sems can don du rmongs bsal phyir/ /rtag tu lam ni bstan par bya/ /gzhan gyi don la brtson par bya/ /rang gi 'dod 'di bsdus pa'o/ /sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba yang / /shes

rab dman la sogs pas dman/ /gdan bzhi ba yi rgyud kyi ni/ /gsum pa gtor ma'i las kyi ni/ /dngos grub snying po btus pa ni/ /de yi dngos po bsdus pa'o/ /sngags sgrub pa yi don du ni/ /gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /mchog

gi gzugs brnyan rab sbyar bas/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis rim pas bsgrub/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/ /gsad dang bskrad dang dbye ba ni/ /gzugs brnyan gyis ni thams cad 'grub/ /gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid ldan par bya/ /sngon du ras

kyi mtshan nyid dang / /gnyis pa ta la'i mtshan nyid dang / /gsum pa kha dog rim pa dang / /bzhi pa gtor ma sbyin sreg nyid/ /gleng gzhi rang 'dod bskyed nas ni/ /mnyams kha tshar yang dag ldan/ /steng 'og la sogs rab rgyas pa/ /ras la zhi

ba'i ri mo bri/ /ma lhung ba yi gos/ /ma nyams kha tshar bgo bar bya/ /tshon gyis ma phog cha la ni/ /rgyas pa yi ni mtshan nyid do/ /mo yi dmar po'i ras/ /ma ltung bar ni rab tu spyad/ /tshon gyis ma phog rab sbyar ba/ /dbang

nyid du ni yongs su grags/ /ra nag po yi pags pa dang / /ba lang rta sogs gzhan dag la/ /gnag cing drag sogs pa yi las/ /mngon spyod las kyi mtshan nyid do/ /de yi mnan pa'i gnas su ni/ /thig gi mtshan nyid gdab par bya/ /cha gsum

du ni rab tu bsgo/ /gcig ni 'og tu dor bar bya/ /cha gnyis lnga pa'i steng du'o/ /gsum pa gsungs pa'i thig nyid ni/ /tshangs pa'i ri mo dbyug pa ni/ /cha lnga pa ni bdun du'o/ /lus ni cha gsum nyid du 'dod/ /zhi dang yan lag mnyam pa'o/ /

zhal ni bcu gnyis cha nyid do/ /mgrin pa la ni sor bzhi'o/ /mgo dang skra la'ang de nyid do/ /rna ba nyid kyang de yi tshad/ /zhal gyi cha ni gsum pa nyid/ /dpral ba lkog ma sna nyid do/ /smin ma'i mtha' ni rna ba'i ltag /mig ni sor gnyis pa yi tshad/ /

bug pa sor mo bzhi pa'o/ /de ni mig gi mtshan nyid do/ /mgrin pa'i mtha' yi dbus su ni/ /brang gi cha ni gnyis kyis mnan/ /snying ga'i gnas dang lte bar ni/ /mnan cing kun tu mnan pa'o/ /nu ma'i mthar ni mnan bcas pa/ /brang du nu ma

gnyis mnan la/ /lag pa gnyis kas mnan pa ni/ /lag gnyis kun tu gnon pa'o/ /sor bzhi pa dang ldan pa ni/ /brla dang rje dar kun tu ldan/ /bus mo gnyis la sor bzhi'o/ /rkang pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin no/ /bcu

gnyis ta la'i tshad kyi ni/ /lha yi gzugs ni ri mor bri/ /lhag pa'i sor mo bzhi po ni/ /lha brgyad kyi ni gdan du'o/ /dgu pa yi ni gdan nyid ni/ /sor mo gnyis su bshad pa'o/ /dbus kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /kun nas na bza'i 'od zer

sogs/ /rab zab rdo rje'i lha nyid ni/ /ta la bcu gnyis kyi ni tshad/ /'og ma'i cha dang cha sogs dang / /nye bar mdzes sogs ri mo bri/ /steng gi lhag pa'i cha la ni/ /rigs ni lnga pa bstan pa'o/ /las kyi mdog sogs mdog tu ni/ /'dod

bzhin lha nyid bsgrub par bya/ /gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba ni/ /bcu gnyis ta la'i rnam pa'o/ /de yi ta la'i tshad la ni/ /phyag gnyis kun nas bkug pa ni/ /sor mo gnyis ni rab dor la/ /zhi ba'i lha yi rnam pa'o/ /de yi ta las zhal bzhin

bya/ /gsus khyim che zhing che ba nyid/ /kun nas tshigs dang tshigs nyid ni/ /sor mo gnyis ni dor bar bya/ /khro bo khro mo dbang phyug ma/ /bran pho bran mo mngag gzhug ni/ /drag po 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs/ /ta la bcur ni bri ba'o/ /dkyil

'khor bsgrub par 'dod pa yis/ /mchod pa'i lha mo mngon par ldan/ /ras kyi brgyad kyi cha nyid ni/ /ta la'i steng du dor bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor lha mo'i rim pa ni/ /rim dang rim bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /dbus su mnga' bdag rdo rje'i lha/ /gcig

ba'i mtshan nyid rnam par bri/ /mgrin pa ko sko zhabs nyid ni/ /de gsum ring na nyes skyon no/ /sngags pa nges par bdag nyid ni/ /skrod dang gnas ni brlag pa'o/ /shangs dang snyan dang sor mo ni/ /de gsum thung ba'i nyes pa ni/ /nges par dngos

grub brlag pa dang / /de yi dpal yang ring ba nyid/ /rje ngar zhabs dang mkhur tshos ni/ /de gsum sbom pa nyes pa che/ /nges par sgrub po'i bdag nyid ni/ /bdud dang bgegs dang dpal ring ngo / /'gram pa brang dang rtsib logs ni/ /de gsum

dma' na skyon che'o/ /yun mi ring ba myur du ni/ /nor ni brlag par 'gyur ba'o/ /nu ma rna ba dpral ba ni/ /de gsum yo na skyon che'o/ /'thab mo dang ni dgras 'tshe bar/ /myur du sgrub po 'gyur ba'o/ /brang dang lus dang brla gnyis ni/ /de gsum

dma' na skyon che'o/ /dgras ni 'jigs par 'gyur ba dang / /'chi bar yang ni the tshom med/ /sna zhom mig ni yo ba dang / /rna ba mchu dang dpral ba ni/ /bgegs dang bdud dang mes 'jigs shing / /dngos grub ring bar 'gyur ba nyid/ /gyen du lta

ba'i dbu dang ni/ /gdan ni yo zhing tha dad pa/ /brang dang mgrin pa yan lag ni/ /nyes skyon grangs ni med par grags/ /'od zer yo zhing tha dad dang / /phyag rgya phyag mtshan nor bas ni/ /mya ngan gdung bas sdug bsngal bar/ /sgrub po'i gzugs

brnyan nyes skyon no/ /rgyab yol gdugs dang ba dan ni/ /rnam gsum dog pa'i nyes pa ni/ /'chi zhing dpal nyams brlag pa dang / /mi mdza' mdza' ba 'joms pa'o/ /de ltar nyes skyon skyon chen pos/ /dul zhing dul la bzod pa dang / /

sems ni shin tu mnyam gzha pas/ /rnam par brtag cing rab tu dpyod/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing / /mdzes pa'i tshul gyis mchod par bstan/ /sngags grub rgyu yi don dang ni/ /dbang dang dgug pa yi ni lha/ /zhi ba la ni zhi

ba'i tshul/ /drag la drag cing 'jigs su rung / /dpa' zhing dpa' ba'i nga rgyal gyis/ /dgod cing khro dang sgeg pa dang / /khro ba'i gzugs kyi tshul dang ni/ /bran dang bran mo'i rnam par sprul/ /las kyi gnas dang gnas nyid du/ /bdag nyid kyi ni

kha dog bsgyur/ /de ltar mtshan nyid mtshon pa yi/ /dngos grub myur du rdzogs pa dang / /rnal 'byor ba yi 'dod pa las/ /sngags pas thang ka'i ri mo bri/ /na maHsaman+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ sa~M bod+ha ni/ bi shud+d+ha/ na maHsarba b+hi ga ha re nam

hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags pa yis ni sngags 'di yis/ /ras dang skud pa bkru ba'o/ /thams cad las kyis sngags kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi byin gyis brlabs/ /gzugs brnyan so sor rab sbyor bas/ /sgrub pos thang ka bsgrub par

bya/ /gzugs brnyan 'grub pa'i rgyu ru ni/ /sbyin sreg phyag rgya sngags bya'o/ /kyis ni gos blangs la/ /gtor ma la sogs ldan pa yi/ /nan tan gyis ni thang ka brgyad/ /thig skud kyis ni ri mo bya/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa

ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /phyag gnyis pa la thang ka mdzes/ /rdo rje cod pan mthon ka'i rtse/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /

dar gyis dkri zhing rnam par 'phyang / /rdo rje phyag gis gsor mdzad cing / /snying gar gnon pa mchog tu brtson/ /g.yon par dril bu mngon ldan pas/ /rked pa'i mtshams su rnam par gnon/ /bco ma gser gyi kha dog dang / /sgeg cing shin

tu bzhad pa'i zhal/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor la brten par/ /khro bo'i 'od zer rnam par spro/ /dkar dang zla ba kun+da'i mdog /lha mo gsang ba'i snod mdzad cing / /rkang pas 'khyud pas thal mo sbyar/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni mgrin par 'khyud/ /

tshams kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni/ /myos pas khro bo mchog gi ste/ /rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa'i sku/ /chags pa'i gos dkar mnabs pa nyid/ /ba spu nas ni rdo rje 'phro/ /gdugs dkar po yis mngon g.yogs pa'i/ /'di ltar rdo

rje dbang phyug rgyal/ /pad+ma'i lus can rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje shar gyi cha ru ni/ /mo gzugs ri mor bris pa ni/ /gzugs kun la sogs rab rgyas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin mo ni rgyal dbang 'di/ /rin chen gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ /rgyan kun gyis ni

rnam par brgyan/ /phyag na gtor ma'i snod sogs pa/ /phyogs kyi mdog tu btso bar bya/ /dngos grub kun ster lha mo ni/ /lus ngan gyi ni sring mo'o/ /phyag 'tshal tshul gyis 'dud pa ni/ /lha mo bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /rdo rje byang gi cha la ni/ /

lha mo snyan par smra ba ni/ /de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal/ /pad+ma'i lus can ye shes 'dzin/ /snyan pa'i gser btso ma yi mdog /bzang po'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /gnyis kyi phyag na bdud rtsi'i snod/ /

sgeg pa'i nyams kyi lta ba ru/ /mkhas pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /ye shes nub kyi cha la ni/ /lha mo snyan pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog dang ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /thams cad mtshan nyid yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /

lha mo gzhon nu grub pa ni/ /lcags kyu lnga sogs snod kyis ni/ /gnyis pa'i phyag ni rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje lho yi cha ru ni/ /'byung mo'i ming ni ska rags can/ /sku mdog sngon mo gzugs mdzes pa'i/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /bdud

rtsi'i bum pa phyag gnyis na/ /gzhan gyi sgeg pa'i yan lag dang / /gshin rje yi ni sring mo nyid/ /dngos grub kun ster lha mo ni/ /thams cad kun la gzugs mdzes par/ /rnam par brtags te ri mo bri/ /rdo rje dril sogs rim par yang / /

dbang ldan la sogs rim par sbyar/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /phyag ni phyag rgya mtshan ma sogs/ /de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal/ /rol pa'i 'khor lo bsam par bya/ /lha rnams dmigs pa dang bcas pa/ /sngags dang phyag rgya

gtor mas mchod/ /o~M sarba sid+d+hi ku ru hU~M/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so/ /o~M badzra hU~M phaT/ nyi ma'i lag pa rab brkyang nas/ /ye shes kyi ni pad+ma mnan/ /dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /

yan lag drug tu bsrung bar bya/ /ye shes khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /dkar po dang nis gdugs bsgreng / /'khyil ba ras gdugs 'khyud byas la/ /dkar po'i lcags kyus spyan drang ngo / /o~M badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ phyag rgya de gnyis brtan

bcings la/ /dkar bo dang ni gi wang sbrel/ /zhags ba'i dam tshig phyag rgya yis/ /kun nas lha mo bzhugs par ldan/ /o~M badzra pA sha hU~M/ phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /gsang zhing gsang ba'i lcags

sgrog gis/ /lha rnams kun nas mnyes par bya/ /khu tshur de nyid dam bcings nas/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu yang dag ldan/ /sa gdugs pad+ma sprel byas la/ /kun nas lha nyid tshim byed pa'o/ /spos kyi phyag gnyis rab ldan pas/ /sor mo gnyis

ka bsgreng byas la/ /zla ba nyi mar bzhugs byas la/ /snying rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM su ra ta badzra hU~M dza/ khu tshur gnyis ni bcings byas la/ /nyi ma'i steng du kha sbyar la/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi lha mo ni/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /o~M

shri ye ba ti hU~M phu swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings te/ /ye shes dang ni rnam shes bsgreng / /oM su kri ye hU~M phu swA hA/ byang gi phyogs kyi lha mo ni/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas/ /dkar po dang ni gi wang bsgreng / /

oM su ru su ru ma dur hU~M phu swA hA/ nub kyi phyogs kyi lha mo ni/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas/ /sa gdugs pad+ma'i kha sbyin bya/ /oM pri ya~M me khA la hU~M phu swA hA/ lho phyogs lha mo rgyal dbang gis/ /snying po

sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /gnyis med cho ga'i sngags kyis ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /bdug pa me tog sogs glu dang / /mkhas pas mchod pa nyi shus mchod/ /'dod dang thar pa dge ba'i gnas/ /las rnams thams cad grub byed pa/ /

rdo rje chos kyi bde spro ba/ /rnal 'byor sngags kyis sgrub par byed/ /de nas kun gyi snying po ni/ /khro bo gnod byed khro mo ni/ /dbye ba rnam gsum sku rang bzhin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag bzhi/ /khros pa'i khro bo'i mchog tu spro/ /

'jigs pa theg pa rnam pa gsum/ /lha mo'i lta bas 'jigs par byed/ /bdud dang 'byung po gcod byed cing / /bdud dang gdug pa skems pa dang / /gnon cing yul nas skrod pa dang / /'dod dang thar pa'i go 'phang bsgrub/ /tshangs pa

mnan cing nyed pa dang / /tsa muN+Di ni drag pos 'gugs/ /'jigs byed kun nas bsgrubs pa yang / /mkhas pa yi ni bsgrub par bya/ /re zhig dang po bris pa'i sku/ /mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin/ /bye ba bcu bzhi'i tshogs dang ni/ /

sna tshogs gzugs can bzhin ngan pa/ /lha mo dka' zlog gdan du ni/ /rgyab tu kun nas rnam par mnan/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnam par sprul/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid/ /'od zer sngon po 'bar

ba'i zhal/ /rol pas 'phen pa'i gdan la ni/ /tshangs pa'i mgo ni zhabs kyis mnan/ /spyan gsum khro la nga rgyal can/ /dmar zhing dmar ba'i spyan dang ldan/ /'khyil zhing rnam par gyes pa yi/ /dbu sgra dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ /rus

ba'i thod pa'i phreng ba yis/ /sangs rgyas mi bzad cod pan no/ /bgegs kyi mgo bo bsam pa yis/ /klu gnyis kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /shin tu rgod cing mche ba gtsigs/ /zhal gsum kha dog gsum pa'o/ /glang chen pags pa

bsnams pa'o/ /mi yi pags pa rab tu gsol/ /rgyan brgyad kyi ni gnas nyid du/ dkar zhing rab 'bar rus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mgo bo'i phrang ba dang / /mche ba rno zhing sor mo 'bar/ /steng gi phyogs su mda' dang ni/ /

gnyis pa la ni kha T+wA~M ga/ /gsum pas rdo rje gsor ba'o/ /g.yas pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /gnyis pa la ni thod pa'o/ /gsum pa gzhu dang kun nas ldan/ /rgan byad drag mo 'jigs su rung / /zhags pas bcings shing rnam par

brgyan/ /drag mo mnan cing mche ba gtsigs/ /khrag 'dzag pa dang brgyal ba ni/ /so sor dbus su brgyan pa yi/ /so so'i pho na rab tu bsgrub/ /tshon bdun gyis ni gos pa yi/ /rgyun mi 'chad par rtag tu spro/ /khro bo mche ba gtsigs pa'i

lus/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer rdo rje can/ /mi yi keng rus keng rus dang / /gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs/ /ye shes khro bo dbang phyug bdag /drag cing shin tu drag pa 'dul/ /bdud rnams thams cad gnon mdzad pa/ /shin

tu gdug pa'i sems can rnams/ /zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis/ /khro bo'i gzugs la sogs pa bstan/ /khwa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang / /ce sbyang srin po khyi la sogs/ /'jigs pa'i ku cho rab

sgrogs dang / /mi yi keng rus gyis bkang ba'i/ /de ltar gzugs brnyan rab sbyor bas/ /'dod dang thar pa don gnyer dang / /thams cad khro bo 'jigs mdzad pa'i/ /sngags pas gzugs brnyan bsgrub par bya/ /o~M ta hU~M ma tha ma tha du Sh+DA na g+hA ta

ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ ba dan gsum sogs phyag rgya yis/ /las rnams kun nas rab tu byed/ /spos dang bdug pa la sogs dri/ /rgyas pa'i mchod pa kun ldan pas/ /dpa' bo mchod sogs yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga mthong ba yis/ /

cho ga'i yan lag sbyin sreg las/ /gtor ma'i las ni khyad par nyid/ /ma brtags pa yi sha dang ni/ /khrag gis kyang ni de nyid las/ /gang gang dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /de yi rnam pas tshim par bya/ /o~M bi tri t+ti nA ma ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ zla

ba nyi ma brkyang nas ni/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /dkar po gi wang sbrel byas nas/ /sa yi gdugs dang pad+ma sbrel/ /de nyid snying po phyag rgya dang / /sngags de nyid ni rnam par sbyar/ /phur bu ra ba tsham ngam dang / /dra ba ge cha mtshon cha rnams/ /

las kyi gnas su dgod pa ni/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab tu grags/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid snying gar bcing / /ye shes dang ni rnam shes sbyar/ /o~M kro d+ha ni hU~M a/ snying po mchog gi sa bon dang / /phyag rgya de nyid rnam par bya/ /lus dang srog la ltos

med par/ /chen po'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /drag cing rno ba'i lha mo ni/ /rno ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /cung zad zhi ba'i lha mo ni/ /thabs cig gis ni mtshan nyid do/ /chu yi 'gram gyi sa phyogs su/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs

bya/ /'bum phrag lnga ni bzlas pa dang / /phyis ni 'bum phrag gcig gis so/ /zhi ba'i mchod pa phul nas ni/ /me yi las la sogs pa bya/ /nag por yi sha dang ni/ /khrag dang rnam par bsres nas ni/ /bris sku la sogs gzugs brnyan

mdun/ /rdzogs pa'i cho gas sbyin sreg bya/ gtor ma sbyin sreg gis tshim bya/ /thams cad las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag dang / /mngon par spyod pa la sogs 'grub/ /dri zhim chu yis bkang ba yis/ /bum pa rgya

cher mchod pa yis/ /nad kyi yan lag gzir ba la/ /sngon du dbang bskur byin byas nas/ /nad kun dang ni bral ba dang / /de bzhin gza' yis gnod pa nyid/ /skal ba dman dang mi byams pas/ /thams cad zhi ba thob par 'gyur/ /ser po'i

tshon dang spra tshil las/ /log 'dren lha yi gzugs brnyan nyid/ /mnyam pa'i gdan la thal mo sbyar/ /phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/ /mche ba gtsigs pa yan lag rgyas/ /pad+ma'i snod la gnas pa ni/ /rtse gsum

dang ni bza' ba'i snod/ /dgra sta la phug phyag na'o/ /sor mo bzhi yi tshad du ni/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /bris sku'i gzugs brnyan mdun du ni/ /'khrul 'khor 'di ni bri bar bya/ /groga'am ni shing shun la/ /gi wang dang ni gur

gum gyis/ /sgrub pa po yi gzugs brnyan bri/ /gzugs dang rnam pa kun ldan pa/ /snying gar ming ni bri bar bya/ /g.yo dang lhung dang srog 'dren pa/ /lcags kyu kun nas ldan pa dang / /dpral bar drangs nas gzhag par bya/ /bgegs kyi

dbang pa yi ni gdan/ /snying gar mnan nas gzhag par bya/ /me tog bdug pa sogs pas mchod/ /nan tan gyis ni gtor ma'i las/ /don 'dod 'bras bu don gnyer ba'i/ /rnal 'byor pas ni sngags yig bzlas/ /o~M tra~M tha tha tha hU~M

dza swA hA/ me tog dkar po la bzlas shing / /re re zhing ni brdeg par bya/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs rdzogs na/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /sngags 'di yis ni sbyor ba yis/ /sgrub pa po yi yid g.yo zhing / /myur du 'gugs

shing yon pa'o/ /rgyal po'i dbang po dbang phyug sogs/ /rgyal po dang ni rgyal tshab dang / /phyug po'i byis pa la sogs dang / /shin tu mdzes pa'i bdag nyid lus/ /sha tsi dang ni brgya byin sogs/ /gal te kun nas 'dod tsam gyis/ /

sgrub pa po yi dbang du 'gyur/ /ji srid lus ni 'tsho ba'i bar/ /dus rtag tu ni rnam par 'dud/ /nga rgyal yan lag gtso bo bas/ /nga rgyal gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /khro bo'i lus ni bstan pa yis/ /las dang las ni myur du 'grub/ /khro bo'i

lus rnam par bstan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //spyod pa'i chos can kun bsdus pa/ /brtul zhugs mtshan nyid bstan pa'o/ /ye shes longs spyod 'bras 'dod pas/ /spyod pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /mi bzad 'khor ba 'jigs pa ni/ /

chags pas srid par ltung ba'o/ /chags pa spangs pa'i lus kyi ni/ /rgyun du brtul zhugs yang bzung ngo / /dben par shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ /dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus pa'o/ /chags pas srid par ltung ba dang / /zhen pas 'khor

bar 'jug par byed/ /rmongs pa'i bdag nyid ring du spangs/ /sems can don du chos bstan phyir/ /sems can don byed gyur pas kyang / /brtul zhugs dka' thub mi bzad pas/ /dben par sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /chags pa'i nyes pa rgya

mtshor 'khor/ /bdag nyid nyon mongs las rgyal phyir/ /sems can don blo 'ba' zhig go/ /sems can don 'gyur dus su ni/ /spyod dang sdom pa'i ston bzhin no/ /'du 'dzi dang bral dben pa ni/ /dga' ba ru ni lus bsrung ngo / /dang po re zhig

rnal 'byor pas/ /bstan bcos tshig rnams blangs byas nas/ /sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan/ /rab tu rno bas chos spyad do/ /gnas dang gnas la'ang mi gnas pa'i/ /nam du yang ni mi gzung ngo / /bza' dang bza' min par rtog pa'i/ /dman

sogs nges par mi bya'o/ /'bad pas rtag tu dga' ba yis/ /lha ma mkhan nya pa shan pa dang / /bram ze dmangs rigs rgyal rigs rnams/ /mnyam pa'i sems kyi lam gyis ni/ /rtag tu slong mo bslang bar bya/ /gal te gong du spyod pa'i tshe/ /

gang zhig bza' ston zos pa dang / /mal cha ras dang mchil lham yang / /longs spyod longs spyod yid 'ong ba'i/ /brtul zhugs la gnas tsam gyis ni/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba nyid/ /spyod pa spyod dgur rnal 'byor pas/ /bsod nams

lag tu blang bar bya/ /thams cad bslangs kyang nyes med de/ /dngos po yang ni mi gzung ngo / /sems ni rnam par dag pa yis/ /thams cad bza' zhing bza' ba nyid/ /dag cing gus bcas nga rgyal gyis/ /de yi gnas ni

yongs su spangs/ /dad pas dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang / /yang na gtor ma'i las la ni/ /bsags pa'i rdzas kyi dngos po ni/ /de yi gnas su dbul bar bya/ /chos gos gsum gyi lhag ma ni/ /slar yang gus pa yis ni gzung / /spyi bor

ngur smrig mtshan ma dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag dang / /rnying pa'i tshem ber chos gos gsum/ /steng du rdo rje dbyug pa dang / /lhung bzed mchan khung chu tshags bcas/ /de ltar 'dzin pa'i lus la ni/ /glegs bam la sogs gzhan

yang med/ /grog mo la sogs bsal ba'i phyir/ /rnga ma'i chun po bsngags pa yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag dang / /chos don rtsa pa snying rje nyid/ /de nas bslab par bya ba ni/ /bla ma'i tshig gi sdom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rdzu

'phrul che/ /mchog la skyabs dang skyabs su mchi/ /rdo rje dbang phyug mchog gi lus/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag phyag 'tshal/ /lha mo shes rab sbyor rang bzhin/ /mkha' 'gro lnga la phyag 'tshal lo/ /o~M a mu ka sa ma yo ha~M sa ma ya/ a mu

ka sa ma yo/ o~M a mu ka sa ma yo/ ha~M sa ma ya/ o~M badzra badzra/ ma hA badzra badzra/ kA ya su par/ hi hi hi/ ho ho ho/ hU~M na ni ba ta da~M/ 'di yis slob ma rab tu gzung / /brtul zhugs rdo rje rdo rje can/ /gnyis pa'i las kyis bsgrub

par bya/ /sbyor dang gsang ba'i sngags rig pas/ /thams cad dus dang dus nyid du/ /tshigs bcad gnyis ni brjod par bya/ /gang zhig pha dang gang zhig ma/ /gang zhig mdza' ba'ang mi rtag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas lus ni sgya ma nyid/ /rtag tu

chos kyis yongs su skyob/ /kye ma stong ba nyid kyi mthus/ /dngos kun rnam par mnan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu rab ster ba'i/ /mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /rmongs pa bcad pa'i don du ni/ /dus gsum du ni tshigs bcad brjod/ /'chag

dang nyal dang 'gro ba dang / /'dug dang 'gro ba thams cad du/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba brtan byas nas/ /sems dang sems kyis nyal bar bya/ /skye dang skye bar brgyud pa yi/ /'byung ba lnga yi lus kyi sdig /nyin mtshan gnyis kyi spyod pa yis/ /

lus kyi dri ma dag pa nyid/ /zla ba drug tu spyad byas pas/ /rang 'dod lha ni 'grub pa'o/ /brtul zhugs spyad pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /mi shes pas kyang ye shes 'thob/ /de ltar yon tan rang bzhin zhing / /brtul zhugs spyod pa yi ni rgyu/ /brtul

zhugs sbyor ba sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad rmongs pa rnam par spangs/ /thabs kyi mtshan nyid mtshon pa yis/ /mnyam nyid lta ba rdzogs byas nas/ /rnam dag lta ba 'ba' zhig go/ /kun nas stong pa mnyam pa'i ros/ /dngos po kun gyi mtshan

nyid med/ /kun nas stong pa nyid kyi mthar/ /rnam par rtog pa ji lta bur/ /rmongs pas brtags shing rnam brtags pa'i/ /dag pa'i sems dang sems par bcas/ /rmongs pa nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i lus/ /'dod pa khro bo'i gzhi de ni/ /rno

ba'i sems kyis rmongs pa ni/ /ye shes ldan pa'i lus kyi dbye/ /snum pa'i bza' dang 'jam pa'i gos/ /sna tshogs dbang bos reg pa yis/ /gti mug chags pas go bzlog pas/ /srid par ltung ba'i las su 'gyur/ /las ni bya ba'i dbang

por 'gyur/ /rmongs pa ye shes mi rtag pa'o/ /'dod dang khro dang nga rgyal 'joms/ /srid par 'ching ba'i bza' ba'o/ /'byung po 'byung la brtse ba dang / /kun nas sdig pa mi brtag go/ /mgon med sdug bsngal phongs pa la/ /nor bas

mnar med gyur pa bzhin/ /'jig rten 'dir ni rma 'bebs dang / /mtshang 'dru ba ni mchog tu gtso/ /theg pa che la legs bslabs pas/ /ngan 'gro'i dngos por yang ma yin/ /kun nas bza' dang legs bza' bas/ /yang

dag dga' bas lus bsrung ngo / /rnying pa'i bza' ston ngan pa yis/ /nges par bdag nyid dga' bar bya/ /sngon gyi bslab sogs bslab pa dang / /sngon du thams cad bsdam pa nyid/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa mnyam gzhag pas/ /mnar

med dmigs pa med pa'o/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid mtshon pa yis/ /sngon du bslab sogs bslab par bya/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa mnyam gzhag pas/ /bslab pa gus pas bslab par bya/ /bud med 'jigs gzugs drag mo nyid/ /skra ni

'jings shing 'khyil pa dang / /ngur smrig dmar po 'jam pa nyid/ /phra mo'i rdul gyis 'jam pa bgo/ /mi yi rus pas byas pa yang / /bud med rgyan du rnam par brgyan/ /rnying pa'i tshom ber dmar po ni/ /mi yi pags pas g.yog par bya/ /

snod chen po ni gnyis pa ru/ /bzung la dbang po lnga ni gzung / /steng du rdo rje'i dbyug pa ni/ /mi yi yan lag rus pas brgyan/ /ba dan dril bu phreng ba ni/ /dbyug pa lag pa g.yon pas gzung / /de ltar bsdus pa'i lus kyis ni/ /'bad

pas brtul zhugs spyod par bya/ /'di ltar rdzas sogs dngos po ni/ /me bzhin 'bar bas reg mi bya/ /bza' dang btung ba la sogs gzhan/ /dang po bsdu bar yang mi bya/ /snying rjer phan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /kun nas dga' zhing bza' bar

bya/ /thams cad gnod pa don med pas/ /dngos po kun nas yongs su sbang / /lus ni bsrungs pa tsam gyis ni/ /slong mo'i bza' ba bslang bar bya/ /stong pa'i khyim dang dur khrod dang / /bas mtha' dang ni dgon par gnas/ /mtshan mo

kun nas bgrod par ni/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan mchog tu brtson/ /'chag dang nyal dang 'dug pa'am/ /shel gyi rnam pa'i sems dang ni/ /rang bzhin yongs su dag pa nyid/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan 'ba' zhig go/ /de yis thams cad

'grub 'gyur bar/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa nyid/ /sdig spangs rnam par spyod pa yis/ /'khor ba ru ni mi gnas pa'o/ /thams cad dngos po dngos med par/ /rtag tu sems kyis blta ba nyid/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas rgyu ru ni/ /

de nas tshigs bcad gnyis ni brjod/ /sbyin pa chos kyis bsrung ba ni/ /tshigs bcad gcig gis gnang bar bya/ /e ma'o rmongs pa yi ni mthus/ /lus can kun nas dbang du byas/ /'dod sogs chos sogs mi bzad pas/ /mkhas pa

yis ni yongs su spangs/ /dngos med dngos po yang ma yin/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa mi rtogs pas/ /srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal zhing / /dmigs pa med pa'i bde ba 'thob/ /gzhan gyis brtags pa'i longs spyod sogs/ /nyal dang 'chag

par dus gsum du/ /rnal 'byor tshigs bcad gcig gis ni/ /rnal 'byor rmongs pa gcod byed pa'o/ /sems chen po yi sems kyi ni/ /rnying pa'i ras ni bsags pa yis/ /de yi gos su rab tu bgos/ /keng rus kyi ni yan lag kun/ /

shin tu mjos pa'i dbyug pa bzung / /pa Ta ha yi chos kyis brdung / /rdo rje'i glu ni blang ba nyid/ /sems can sgrol ba'i rgyu ru ni/ /grong nas grong du kun tu rgyu/ /dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /brtul zhugs spyod pas mnyam par

gzhag /dag pa'i sems ni mi dmigs pas/ /dga' ba yis ni bsrung bar bya/ /spyod pa yis ni rgyur gyur pas/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa don gyi rgyu/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam bsal zhing / /nyes pa kun nas rnam spangs la/ /brtul zhugs

zla drug spyad pa yi/ /rang 'dod ye shes 'grub par 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa rnam par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //de nas thams cad snying po ni/ /de nyid kun gyi don bsdus pa/ /'khor ba'i

brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i/ /kun gyi snying por rab sbyor ba'o/ /dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /rdo rje'am shes rab rnal 'byor gyis/ /

'bum phrag gsum du bzlas byas nas/ /phyis ni rang 'dod pa yi las/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /spra tshil las ni gzugs brnyan bya/ /tsha ba'i mar khus byugs byas la/ /snying gar ming ni bzhag pa dang / /tshigs dang tshigs su tsher

mas dgang / /skyur bo tshwa dang ma ru tser/ /gzugs brnyan dang ni yang dag ldan/ /snod du bsres la yang dag gzhag /ye shes lus la lus kyi ni/ /rkang pa g.yas pas mnan par bya/ /rno ba'i sems kyis bzlas byas pas/ /mtshan mo

gcig gi mtha' ru ni/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /smin pa'i me la gzhag byas na/ /rgyal po myur du gdung bar 'gyur/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa la/ /las 'di yis ni sbyar bar bya/ /hrIHa mo g+ha si si da ha da ha gr-i h+Na hU~M hrIH

phaT/ snga dro nyi ma shar dus la/ /me tog dkar po'i maN+Dal dang / /spos dang mar me'i cho ga yis/ /zhi ba'i las ni rnam par bya/ /chu dang 'o ma bsres pa'i snang / /der ni gtor ma sbyar nas ni/ /sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /rgyal po

nad dang bral bar 'gyur/ /oM a mr-i ta b+ha re de hU~M hU~M hU~M/ a a a/ thams cad las ni bsdus byas la/ /chu bo chen po'i rgyun la bskur/ /rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so// //de nas rab sbyor snying po

'di/ /sngags bas rab tu rnam par spyad/ /yungs kar las ni gzugs brnyan bya/ /snying gar ming ni rnam par sbyar/ /rdo dang tsher ma lte bar ro/ /rkang pas mnan cing bzlas par bya/ /su tI k+Sha NA shU la hU~M dza phaT hrIH/ me la bsro zhing gdung ba dang / /

lhag par bzlas shing gzhag par bya/ /'di ltar mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ /mod la gzer bas yang 'dzin to/ /zhi ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga las/ /'o ma dang ni sbrang rtsis bkru/ /chu bo'i rgyun la bskur byas na/ /gzer zhing gzer ba'i nad dang

bral/ /oM sarba ka ri hU~M dza swA hA/ gzer ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags go/ /de nas thams cad snying po yis/ /gzhan gyi las kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /sngon du bsnyen sogs bsten byas pas/ /las kun 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/ /nag po'i mtha'

dang tha ma la/ /ba skam gyi ni lci ba las/ /bsgrub bya yi ni ming dang gzugs/ /dmar po'i tsan+dan gyis ni bsku/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni kun nas gzhag /seng ldeng phur bas mig 'bras la/ /g.yon pa'i rkang bas mnan nas ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du

bzlas byas shing / /me la bdug cing bdugs pa yis/ /mig ni gzer bas 'dzin par 'gyur/ /oM tsak+Shu ma li ni hU~M phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /zhi ba'i mchod pas mchod byas nas/ /oM badzra

tIk+Sha NA ya hU~M swA hA/ lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas nas/ /de yi 'o rgyun la bkrus nas/ /bsgrub bya'i nad dang gnod pa sel/ /mig 'bras rno zhing gsal bar 'gyur/ /mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o/ /lhad tsher las ni

bsgrub par bya/ /mkhas pas khrag gis bri pa'o/ /dug dang dur khrod sol ba yis/ /mig gi 'bras bu byugs byas la/ /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'o/ /o~M kr-iSh+NA ping+ga li hU~M kha~M phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang

sngags kyis ni/ /bdag nyid lci bas bran par bya/ /de ltar mtshan nyid kun ldan pas/ /bsgrub bya myur du long bar 'gyur/ /sbrang rtsi mar gyis bsku byas nas/ /bsgrub bya'i nad dang gnod pa sel/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon

par bzlas/ /oM a mr-i ta lo tsa ne a swA hA/ long ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so/ /gzhan yang bsgrub bya sgrub pa pos/ /las ni shin tu rnam par spyad/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa/ /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur

ro/ /bag zan las ni pad+ma'i dbyibs/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni dbus nyid do/ /khyi yi spu yis bug pa dgang / /tsha ba'i mar khus bskus byas la/ /g.yon pa'i rkang pas mnan ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /oM badzra ba ke hU~M phu phaT/ me la bsro zhing

bsros pa yis/ /b+ha ga myur du bzlog par bya/ /shin tu gdug pa'i chung ma ni/ /'di yi las kyis rab tu sbyar/ /lan bdun du ni mngon bsngags nas/ /sbrang rtsi 'o ma'i rgyun gyis bkru/ /oM su ko b+ha bi hU~M he swA hA/ zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so/ /

'jim pa'i snod ni blangs byas la/ /pad+ma'i dbyibs kyi rnam par bya/ /rno ba'i til mar yungs kar gyis/ /bug pa dgang zhing sbyar bar bya/ /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/ /seng ldeng phur pas brdung bya zhing / /sngags ni brgyad brgya rab bzlas na/ /

b+ha ga gzir zhing gzir bar 'gyur/ /hri pi la ta hU~M phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni/ /b+ha ga gzir ba'i las nyid do/ /chu dang 'o mar bkru bya zhing / /sngags kyang mngon du sbyar bar bya/ /oM sarba sho d+ha ni swA hA/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags

kyis ni/ /b+ha ga gzir sogs las grol lo/ /gzhan yang las kyis mtshan nyid ni/ /shin tu rnal 'byor pas spyad do/ /rgyal po lam gyi sa rdul blang / /yang na bzhi mdo'i sa rdul las/ /pad+ma'i mtshan nyid mtshan nyid ni/ /b+ha ga'i snying po khrag

dang ni/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya yis/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas/ /hri pri phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni/ /pad+ma sdom pa'i las su 'gyur/ /oM a mri ta wa ti swA hA/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang / /bla ma dang ni slob

dpon smod/ /dam tshig spyod la 'phya ba ni/ /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te rmongs shing khro ba ni/ /las kyi rtag tu byas nas ni/ /'dis ni nges par ltung ba ru/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs the tshom med/ /las kyi rab tu dbye ba

zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so/ ///gsang zhing gsang ba'i de nyid don/ /snying po'i mchog ni mdor bsdus pa/ /rol mo bstan bcos sogs glu yi/ /de nyid thar pa go 'phang gnas/ /gnyis med dngos po ngo bo las/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa ji ltar

'gyur/ /gnyis kyi dngos po bdag min pas/ /gnyis dngos dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po dngos min dngos med la/ /mnyam nyid lta ba'i sems kyis su/ /rnam par brtan dang brten bya med/ /rtog cing rnam rtog 'khrul pa dang / /gzugs

dang gzugs can zad par byed/ /rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /sems kyi brtan pa'i gnas su ni/ /bsam gtan bsam bya bsam par bya/ /dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /thams cad dbyings su 'jig par byed/ /stong nyid stong la

sogs stong pa'i/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' can nyid/ /dag cing phra la phra ba'i don/ /sems dang sems pa dang bcas pa/ /kun tu dngos po dngos med pas/ /thams cad nam mkha' bsngams pa'o/ /rtag cing rtag la rtag pa'i

don/ /nam mkha'i khams ltar brtan sems pas/ /me stag rdul phran yan lag 'phro/ /chu skyar bzhin du brtags pa yi/ /rnam shes ye shes lhag ma ni/ /nam mkha' 'phro zhing snang ba'o/ /nyon mongs de bzhin mun pa ni/ /ye shes rdo rjes

bcom nas su/ /rnam par shes pa lhan cig 'bar/ /ye shes snang ba sogs thob 'gyur/ /sems dang sems byung sems pa yis/ /rnam par blta zhing rab tu spyad/ /'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par/ /dngos pos dngos

po bsgom par bya/ /thams cad kun tu snang byed cing / /thams cad 'od zer kun bsdus pa/ /snying po'i sa bon sa bon ni/ /dkar dang kun+da zla ba'i mdog /A li kA li rab sbyar bas/ /phyung ba yi ni sa bon mchog /sbyor ba 'grub pa'i rgyu ru ni/ /

mnyam nyid rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom/ /sa bon nam mkhar spros pa yis/ /'jig rten gsum po snang bar byas/ /ma lus sprin ltar spro ba nyid/ /skad cig gis ni spro zhing bsdu/ /phyis ni rang 'dod dmigs med cing / /yi ge med pas yang bsam mo/ /

gzugs ni stong par brtags pa yi/ /mnyam nyid sems dang sems kyis ni/ /ma lus rnam par bltas pa yis/ /khams gsum snang bar byed pa'o/ /de ltar sems kyis bsams pa yis/ /byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /skad cig gzugs

dang gzugs nyid dang / /skad cig phung po'i rnam pa dang / /skad cig thams cad dbyibs rnams ni/ /de phyir mi rtag pa yi gnas/ /legs byas nyes byas ming can ni/ /nyes pas smad par mi bya'o/ /gzugs dang stong pa la sogs dbus/ /sems

dang sems byung rnam par mtshon/ /dngos po'i lhag ma dngos med pas/ /de yi lhag ma gzugs med pa'o/ /ye shes ri mo 'bar ba yi/ /'od zer mnyam par gnas pa nyid/ /de yi mtshan nyid mtshon pa nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu spyad/ /rtag

tu zhi zhing mchog gi las/ /yang dag byang chub rtag pa'o/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rab brtsams nas/ /las dang don kun rab grub pa'o/ /ri rab rtse mor kun bsams pa/ /rang 'dod rgyal

chen gzhal yas khang / /sna tshogs rin chen rang bzhin mchog /dril bu dra bas mngon par brgyan/ /gdugs dkar po dang ba dan dang / /sna tshogs mchod pas mngon par brgyan/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni/ /dkar dang kun+da zla ba'i 'od/ /de

ni rgyan kun gyis brgyan cing / /sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par chas/ /rab tu mdzes pa'i gos mnabs shing / /phyag gnyis na ni rdo rje dril/ /'od zer 'phro ba rnam mang po/ /kun nas rdo rje'i 'od zer 'phro/ /khams gsum po yi rnam pa ni/ /sems

dang sems kyis bsgom pa'o/ /snying gar dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /dmar po'i hU~M ni rab 'bar ba/ /spyi bor thig le me ri'o/ /ba spu'i bu ga nas 'phro ba'o/ /shar du rdo rje gzhag pa dang / /lho ru mda' ni rnam par dgod/ /nub tu ral gri

mtshon pa dang / /byang du gzhu ni yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje'i zhags pa las sogs bzhi/ /mtshams dang mtshams su gzhag par bya/ /'di ltar mtshan nyid mngon ldan pas/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/ /A li'i sa bon gtso mo ni/ /de nyid

ldan pas yang sngags bzlas/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pas mthar bzhag pa/ /'bum phrag gsum du rab bsnyen pas/ /rdo rje'i lus dang lus nyid du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/ /sbas pa'i snying po snying po dang / /rdo rje chos dang chos mchog go /

rdo rje sems ni rjes mchod pa'i/ /hU~M gi glu yi rnam pas bya/ /bkra shis sgra ni snyan pa yis/ /mnyam par gzhag pas blang par bya/ /tri b+hu ba na dzA li ta mU rti a nu ra ya na wa ti/ rasmi sa ha sra tIk+Sha NA d+ha sa su pa ra sra wa ti/ ba hU bi da ru ba pe sha a nu ra ya na ta ta

ta wa ti/ na ta i badzra sa bar be sa ra liM la wa ti swA hA/ gdan bzhi'i rgyud ni rgya chen las/ /stong phrag bcu gnyis mdor bsdus pa/ /de yi dngos po mdor bsdus las/ /snying po mdor ni bsdus pa'o/ /sdeb sbyor sgra dang rtog sogs med/ /don dang

don ni yang dag bsdus/ /rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i don ni sbas ba nyid/ /brda yi skad kyis bshad pa'o/ /gdan bzhi pa las yang dag par btus bsngags kyi cha'i rgyud bshad pa sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //
bshad pa'i rgyu man+dA ang pa zhes bya ba le'u bdun pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+har dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba 'gos khug pa lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsa tu rwI Tha bi kh+y+wa ha tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gdan bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha' dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs

gang gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam pa thams cad la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje sems

dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug nyid/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor mchog nyid dang / /drang srong rnams kyi ye shes dbang / /rnal 'byor ma yi dra mchog bde/ /gnas gtsang ma na bzhugs nas su/ /thams cad mkhyen pas 'di

skad gsungs/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i dbus nas phyag na rdo rjes thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gsang ba sbyor ba'i khyad par dang / /bdag ni de nyid ji ltar lha/ /chu dang me ni ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar

rab mdzes nam mkha' dang / /ye shes ji ltar 'tshal bgyi ba/ /ye shes dbang la nyan par 'chal/ /'khor ba las bsgral mtshan nyid dag /nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /dang bor dbang gi mtshan nyid dang / /gnyis par yi ge gcig pa ni/ /

gsum par sa bon brgyad pa dang / /bzhi bar rtsa yi lha nyid do/ /bdag nyid lus kyi ye shes me/ /blo ldan rnal 'byor pas shes bya/ /lto ba me yi thab khung du/ /de yi me la sbyin sreg bya/ /steng dang 'og dang dbus su ni/ /rnam shes rtsa ni bsngam par bya/ /

thog mar bdag nyid lto ba ru/ /rtsa yi lha ni rnam par bsgom/ /lho ba'i me ni 'bar ba la/ /khyad par kha dog bsgom pa ni/ /lte ba'i me ni dkar po'o/ /g.yon pa'i me ni de bzhin ser/ /lho ni sngon po'i ming can te/ /lhag ma 'di ni dmar por sbyang / /de

dbus kha dog sngo bsangs su/ /me yi du bar rab tu grags/ /me yi dbus su pad+ma nyid/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ /de yi dbus su ye shes lha/ /'khor ba kun las grol bar mdzad/ /phyag gnyis sbyor ba'i gdan la ni/ /rdo rje dril

bus rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas kyi lag na rdo rje dang / /rgyan rnams mthon ka'i rtse mo can/ /bzhad dang khro bas hU~M sgrogs shing / /'di yi ye shes dbang phyug lha/ /de yi dbus su rab tu grags/ /shar du lha mo sgrol ma dang / /byang du de bzhin gos dkar

mo/ /nub tu lha mo mA ma kI/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni lho ru'o/ /gzugs ni mthe bo'i tshad tsam du/ /bdag nyid lha yi lha nyid do/ /lce la mchu ni sbyar bar bya/ /nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o/ /mig la sa 'di rnam par shes/ /de bzhin tshangs par

'bar ba'i me/ /mgrin par rmongs pa'i sa nyid dang / /g.yo ba snying la gnas pa nyid/ /thams cad nyon mongs brang dang ni/ /phyugs gnyis lte ba'i rtsa bar ro/ /yan lag brgyad du bkod nas ni/ /'di nyid lha ni shes par bya/ /rnam shes rtsa nas

drangs pa yi/ /de bzhin du ni bdud rtsi dgu/ /steng gi mche ba gnyis pa'i rtsa/ /kun tu tshwa bzhin zhu ltar babs/ /ji bzhin chu ni 'o ma'i ming / /lce yi steng du bsten pa yi/ /nyi ma thig le 'bar ba yis/ /'khor lo phrar brdul bzhin no/ /steng gi

nam mkha' nam mkha' ni/ /bsreg pa'i bdag nyid du ni thim/ /g.yon pa'i dbugs ni bud med nyid/ /g.yas pa de bzhin skyes bu'o/ /'og dang steng ni 'di yi rtsa/ /'og ni sngon du rab tu grags/ /dbugs dang dri ni mnyam drangs

nas/ /rgyas pa'i lnga yi steng du ni/ /rnam shes gnyis kyi rtsa nas drang / /bdud rtsi de la rnam par thim/ /ye shes dbang phyug de'i steng du/ /de la bdud rtsis bkru bar bya/ /de ltar kun tu bzhin rngubs nas/ /dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/ /

lag mthil zla ba nyi ma bsgom/ /ye shes yi ges de dbus so/ /mgo bo'i phyag rgya yis/ /khams lnga'i ba dgra nyid bsreg pa'o/ /sngon sa bon hU~M byas nas/ /gnyis par de bzhin gsum dang ni/ /gsum par bzod pas bza' ba'o/ /de

bzhin rlung min bzhi pa dang / /lnga par rang ba'i sa bon gyis/ /mkhas pas khams lnga'i sbyin sreg bya/ /bdag gi de nyid me la ni/ /bdag nyid sbyor bas bsregs pa nyid/ /ji ltar ye shes me de ni/ /bsreg pa'i bdag nyid rab tu grags/ /sbyin

sreg byas pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba dang po rdzogs so// //stong pa'i bdag nyid dge ba yis/ /skye ba'i dra ba rnam 'jig pas/ /'khor ba ru ni mi gnas pa/ /bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par 'tshal/ /stong pa'i de nyid rang

bzhin gyis/ /nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /gling gzhan de bzhin ri rab dang / /sa ni nam mkhar kun tu bsam/ /rgya mtsho chu yi dbyibs dang ni/ /yid 'ong pad+ma 'byung bar ldan/ /stong pa'i mtshan nyid sngon 'gro bas/ /me yi bdag nyid

bsgom par bya/ /shar du lha mo sgrol ma 'di/ /de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo/ /mA ma kI ni nub phyogs su/ /lhor ni lha mo sangs rgyas spyan/ /chu ni sgrol mar kun tu thim/ /me ni gos dkar ma la thim/ /mA ma kI ni nub nas sa/ /rlung ni sangs

rgyas spyan la thim/ /chu shing me tog pad+ma 'di/ /sgong skyes ye shes kyi ni gdan/ /de yi ye shes rgyal dbang mo/ /sgong skyes 'og tu 'byed pa can/ /gzugs med sbid pa'i dbyibs can na/ /ye shes rgyal po nyid du thim/ /de ltar bdag nyid stong pa

nyid/ /de nyid de nyid stong pa nyid/ /'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /ji ltar stong nyid de bsgoms la/ /lus kyi dri ma rab tu bkru/ /phyis ni chu yi gzugs su bsgom/ /dmar po 'dab ma brgyad dang ni/ /

ge sar lte bar btsas pa yis/ /dbus su pad+mas rnam par brgyan/ /'dab brgyad la ni lha mo yi/ /sa bon brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /shar du si ka zhes bya dang / /byang du bzod pa'i sa bon bzhin/ /nub tu rlung gi sa bon gsungs/ /lho ru hU~M gi

dbang phyug go/ /dbang ldan du ni dbang po'i dbyangs/ /me phyogs sgra dang rnam shes so/ /bden bral dbyangs yig brgyad pa dang / /rlung du dbyangs yig lnga pa'o/ /dbus su ye shes rgyal bo 'di/ /sgong skyes ye shes dbang phyug ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil

'khor gyis dkris pa/ /bdud rtsi sa bon 'bar ba'o/ /kha dog bdun pa'i me 'di ni/ /go 'phang mchog gis bsgom par bya/ /dbugs mi g.yo ba'i sems dpa' yis/ /dngos pos dgos po bsgom byas nas/ /phyis ni rtsa nyid lha yi gdan/ /

mig las yi sa bon dang / /nam mkha' sna dang rna ba la'o/ /lce la bdud rtsi'i sa bon 'di/ /snying gar hU~M zhes bya ba'i ming / /yan lag drug 'dzin sa bon gyis/ /rnal 'byor lus ni rnam par bsrung / /ye shes lus 'di shes byas pas/ /ci yi phyir

na skye bo'i ming / /gzugs med ye shes gzugs can dang / /kha dog med cing mtshon kun dngos/ /gnas med gnas kyi dbyibs can dang / /mi rigs de bzhin rigs pa nyid/ /stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa rdzogs so// //

bdag nyid lnga yi bye brag nyid/ /bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par 'tshal/ /nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /gnyis dang gnyis med la brten nas/ /bskal bzang po brgya yi sngon/ /dag pa'i gnas la kun tu gnas/ /ri rab

lha mo sangs rgyas spyan/ /mA ma kI ni lho phyogs gnas/ /lha mo sgrol ma nub kyi gling / /de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo/ /shar du lha mo snyan ma 'di/ /lha mo rnam pa lnga yi gnas/ /de ltar snying ga ri rab dang / /de bzhin mgo bo mA ma kI/ /sgrol ma

lho yi gnas dang ni/ /g.yon pa de bzhin gos dkar mo/ /snyan pa mo 'di bdag gis gnas/ /lha mo lnga yis byin gyis brlab/ /pad+ma'i dbus su rdo rje dang / /rdo rje'i dbus su pad+ma can/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi kun thim pa/ /lus po kun nas dkris

pa'o/ /yan lag brgyad kyi rtsa nyid du/ /bdud rtsi'i chu ni rnam par thim/ /lha yi gnas ni nam mkha' nyid/ /rdo rje'i sa bon du rab shes/ /bdag nyid lus la bsgoms pa ni/ /rdo rje'i rtsa zhes rab tu grags/ /de yi lus kyi khrag dang ni/ /

lus dang lhan cig bcas par gnas/ /khrag dang chu ni kun sbyor bas/ /blo ldan yan lag brgyad nas 'dzag /ji ltar bdag gis sa bon lnga/ /de ltar pad+ma yi yang bsgom/ /ji ltar bdag nyid lus 'di ni/ /nam mkha' rdo rje 'jib byed do/ /

rkang bas rkang pa dkri bya zhing / /mchu yis mchu ni btsir byas la/ /gnyi ga'i lag pa phyag rgya ni/ /rtse mo gsum pa'i rdo rje brtag /rang bzhin gyis ni so sra dang / /snying ga'i rnam shes bsgom pa yi/ /yi shes rgyal po'i lus can 'di/ /skyes

bus khros pas hU~M byas nas/ /de ltar rdo rje pad+ma 'di/ /rnal 'byor bsdus pas bskyod par bya/ /gnyi ga dga' zhing tshim pa yis/ /lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya/ /khrag dang khu ba las byung ba'i/ /sa bon myu gus 'gro ba la/ /lha rnams

lus ni yang dag 'byung / /'dod la dga' nyid ma yin te/ /longs spyod phyir yang gnas mi bya/ /sems can don phyir 'dod pa'i phyir/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i yid 'ong sku/ /gnyis med sbyor ba la gnas par/ /gtor ma sngon du sbyin par bya/ /

sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba gsum pa rdzogs so// //nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /de nyid bcu yi bye brag nyid/ /yi ge bcu ru sngon sbyar bya/ /lnga yi bdag nyid du rtogs bya/ /lnga pa lnga yi bdag nyid kyi/ /lnga yis lus ni yongs

su bsrungs/ /yi ge bcu ni ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar bdag nyid la 'di sbyar/ /ji ltar sbyang zhing bsgom pa dang / /ji ltar sa bon myu gu ste/ /ji ltar thar pa la gnas nyid/ /ngo mtshar lha la nyan par 'tshal/ /gsang ba gsang ba zhes bya ba/ /

rgyal po ji bzhin de nyid nyon/ /thog mar stong pa de kho na/ /stong par chu ni bsam par bya/ /kha dog bdun gyi pad+ma ni/ /ge sar dang bcas yid 'ong ba/ /stong phrag brgya yi khyon tsam gyis/ /pad+ma'i gzugs ni snying por bcas/ /pad+ma rgya cher rab

mdzes pa/ /rin chen bdun gyis mngon par spras/ /dril bu dra ba'i phreng ba dang / /dar dang na bza' mngon par 'phyang / /seng ge'i gdan ni mngon par bsam/ /de steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /pad+ma rdo rje'i ngo bo 'di/ /'od zer nyi ma bye ba yi/ /

sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon gyis/ /rdo rje'i rtse mo rnam par bsam/ /dbus su rnam par snang mdzad dgyes/ /shar du de bzhin mi bskyod pa/ /rin chen sa bon lho nyid du/ /de bzhin nub tu 'od dpag med/ /byang phyogs su ni don yod grub/ /sa bon

lnga ni rnam par bsgom/ /pad+ma byang chub yan lag brgyad/ /ji bzhin sa la rab tu brtag /dbus su snying po sgong la/ /rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid thim/ /pad+ma brgyad pa'i rtse mor ni/ /mnga' bdag de bzhin rnam snang mdzad/ /shar du

lha mo sgrol ma 'di/ /byang du lha mo sangs rgyas spyan/ /nub tu bsam pa gos dkar mo/ /de bzhin lho ru mA ma kI/ /'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang por/ /'jigs pa med par bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje las ni lha yi lus/ /bzhugs

ba ru ni rnam par bsam/ /spyan gsum phyag ni drug pa'o/ /kha dog sngon po rab tu mdzes/ /rdo rje yi ni cod pan can/ /dar gyis bcings shing rnam par 'phyang / /rgod cing khro dang sgeg pa dang / /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /steng du

ral gri 'phyar ba dang / /gnyis pa la ni de bzhin gzhu/ /gsum par rdo rje gdengs pa gsor/ /g.yon pa'i steng du kha T+wA~M dang / /gnyis pas lha mo'i nu ma 'tshir/ /gsum pas dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing / /rab tu mdzes pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /stag

gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /rgyan kun phun sum tshogs pa dang / /me tog phreng bas rab tu brgyan/ /g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma ni/ /phyag gcig gis ni 'khyud pa dang / /gcig gi phyag na thong pa ni/ /bdud rtsi'i chu dang yang dag ldan/ /mA ma

kI yang de bzhin du/ /gcig gi phyag gis mngon par 'khyud/ /gcig gi phyag gi thod pa na/ /khrag dang sha yis gang ba'o/ /spyan ma rgyab tu kun nas bsam/ /phreng pas phyag ni brgyan pa dang / /gtor ma spyangs pa'i phyag gnyis pa/ /mdun du snod la rnam par blta/ /de ltar

bdag nyid lnga yi lus/ /lus la kun nas yang dag gnas/ /shar du lha mo me tog ma/ /lho ru spos dang yang dag ldan/ /nub tu mar me'i lag pa ma/ /byang du dri yi lha mo'o/ /dbang ldan du ni sgeg mo nyid/ /de bzhin me phyogs phreng ba ma/ /bden bral

phyogs su dbyangs ma dang / /rlung du gar ma brgyad pa'o/ /nyi ma bye ba brgya stong gi/ /'od zer rnam pa mang po'i mdog /sangs rgyas sprin ltar 'phro ba ni/ /sems can sgrol la mchog tu brtson/ /bdag nyid lha dang lha gzhan ni/ /bdag nyid lha ni

mchog yin no/ /bdag nyid gzugs su mi nus pas/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs bsgom par bya/ /phyis ni de yi mdun nyid du/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /de nyid pad+ma bsam pa dang / /de nyid gzhal yas khang pa bsam/ /sngon du gsungs

pa'i gdan la ni/ /der ni nyi mas mngon par g.yogs/ /sna tshogs rin chen mchod pa dang / /sna tshogs dar ni mngon par dbyangs/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /pad+ma'i tshul du kha phye la/ /oM kam la ud b+ta be shrI swA hA/ pad+ma'i sngags

dang phyag rgya'o/ /rang gi dbugs la phyung nas ni/ /rdo rje mdun du rnam par bsgom/ /lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs nas ni/ /sdigs mdzub g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung dkri/ /lcags kyu yi ni rnam pa'o/ /o~M badzra a~M ku sha dzaH/ rdo rje lcags kyu'i

sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas/ /sdigs mdzub gnyis ni dkri byas pa/ /zhags pa yi ni rnam pa'o/ /o~M badzra bA sha hU~M/ zhags pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /ji ltar bdag nyid gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /de ltar mdun

du'ang rab bsam bya/ /lha mo brgyad ni kun rdzogs pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bzhi par ro/ /shar du gshin rje mthar byed dngos/ /lho ru de bzhin bgegs mthar byed/ /nub tu pad+ma mthar byed pa/ /byang du khro bo skyong pa'o/ /lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur

bcings/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /oM badzra s+pho Ta ba~M/ rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni sbyar bar bya/ /oM badzra g+haN+De hoH/ rdo rje dril bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag

pa lcags sgrog phyag rgya las/ /sor mo dbus ma brkyang byas la/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM bai ro tsa na sa mA d+hi/ bi shwa ye g+hu ya pa dza b+hi Shai swA hA/ /oM hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ho ho ho ho ho ho/ hri hri hri hri swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha'i sngags

dang phyag rgya'o/ o~M tA re tut+ta re sa ta k+Shi tA hU~M swA hA/ lha mo sgrol ma'i sngags so/ /o~M hi li hi li ba li swA hA/ gos dkar mo'i sngags so/ /o~M ta ra sarba ta na hU~M phaT/ mA ma kI'i sngags so/ /oM bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha ya hU~M/ sangs rgyas

spyan gyi sngags so/ /sdigs mdzub gnyis dang gung mo ni/ /dbus dang dbus su sbyar bar bya/ /mthe bong ngos su sbyar ba ni/ /lha mo bzhi yi phyag rgya'o/ /ma ning yi ge bzhi pa ni/ /me tog ma la sogs pa dang / /sgeg mo yi ni sngags nyid

yin/ /g.yas brkyang rkang ba yang dag gnas/ /sdigs mdzub snying gar sbyin byas nas/ /dbung pa mdun nas brkyang byas nas/ /se gol hU~M gi rnam pa dang / /lhan cig tu ni sbyar byas pa/ /'di ni khro bo'i phyag rgya'o/ /o~M A yuHpA la pra ti

rak+Sha duk+Sha ban d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ shar phyogs kyi sgor zhi ba yi'o/ /o~M A kar+Sha ya sa twa d+hA tu nA~M kro swA hA/ byang du rgyas pa yi'o/ /o~M mo ha ya mo ha ya/ /sarba sa twA nA~M shrI swA hA/ nub tu dbang gi'o/ /oM shak+Sha sarba duSh+Ta k+dA ta ya hri phaT/ lho ru mngon

bar spyod pa yi'o/ /oM su ga na d+ha hU~M haM swA hA/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba bri'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM su so bid puSh+pe b+h+yaHswA hA/ sdigs mdzub dang mtheb mo sbyar ba ni me tog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /o~M d+hU pa mA la ku la swA hA/ sor mo dbus ma bsgreng ba

ni/ bdug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /o~M tI k+Sha Na dI pe pra ti gr-i h+Na swA hA/ khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bo bsgreng ba ni/ mar me'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /o~M ku ru ku ru bi dza ya swA hA/ lag pa gnyis brkyang nas dbus su sbyar ba ni/ gtor

ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /ji ltar ston du sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /hU~M gi glu yi rnam pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun nas mnyes par bya/ /lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas/ /rked pa'i phyogs su bzung byas la/ /pi wang tshul

gyis bsgreng ba dang / /gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang / /si la snyan tshul gyis dkrol ba dang / /brdab pa'i tshul gyis rdegs pa dang / /gar gyi tshul gyis bskyod pa dang / /rlung g.yab tshul gyis g.yob pa dang / /rgyal mtshan tshul gyis bsgreng

ba dang / /bla re'i tshul gyis bre ba dang / /ba dan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang / /gdugs kyi tshul gyis dag pa ba dang / /cang te'u'i tshul gyis 'khrol ba dang / /khar rnga'i tshul gyis brdung ba dang / /bzhad pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang / /khro bo'i stabs

stabs yan lag bskyod/ /de ltar de nyid rnal 'byor bas/ /glu yi mchod pa'i khyad par nyid/ /hU~M hU~M hU~M/ bdag med rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis/ /'byin pa'i sa bon gzung byas pa/ /spyi yi rnal 'byor ston pa'o/ /dbang po mchog gi mchod pa che/ /

thar pa chen po gnas chen po/ /gsang zhing de nyid gsang ba yi/ /gsang ba'i bdag po dga' chen po/ /rnam snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /lus kyi rtsa ni lnga nyid las/ /lha dang lha min mngon par sprul/ /bde ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba/ /sbyor ba'i

sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /glu dang bstod pas nyer mchod nas/ /ji ltar las la mngon bde bar/ /rang gi sngags kyi yi ge yis/ /phreng ba la ni bzlas bar bya/ /ji ltar nus pa mchod byas la/ /slar yang gshegs su gsol ba'o/ /dbugs

kyis bdag nyid lus bkang ste/ /lhan cig thim par bsam par bya/ /ji ltar rnal 'byor nam mkha' nyid/ /de ltar rnam par snang mdzad bdag /ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad lha/ /de bzhin rgyab kyi rtsa nyid do/ /ji ltar sngon gyi rtsa nyid las/ /de bzhin

ye shes skye ba 'di/ /chu ni sgrol ma zhes su bshad/ /me la gos dkar yang dag ldan/ /rlung la lha mo sangs rgyas 'di/ /de bzhin rab mdzes mA ma kI/ /dkar po chu yi rtsa dang ni/ /dud pa yang ni me yi gnas/ /dung gi rtsa 'di rlung gi'o/ /de bzhin

du ni pad+ma dang / /ye shes 'byin pa yi ni rtsa/ /lnga yi bdag nyid khyad par ni/ /gdan bzhi nyan par mi nus pa/ /gzhung nyung ba ni bstan pa yin/ /gzugs brnyan gyi rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba bzhi ba rdzogs so// //

rdo rje'i chu ni ji ltar lags/ /bdud rtsi'i chu ni ji ltar skye/ /gang gi dbye ba ji ltar myang / /gang gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ /'di yi rab tu dgos pa'ang ci/ /ngo mtshar lha la mnyan par 'tshal/ /nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /gnyis dang gnyis med

spangs pa yi/ /gsang zhing gsang ba rab spas pa'i/ /'gro ba'i 'bras bu de de nyid/ /bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul ba/ /sangs rgyas lam ni mthong ba'o/ /ye shes snang ba de bdun nyid/ /ji ltar me yis mnyam

ra bsreg pa'i spyod pa dang / /nyi ma ji ltar mnyam par lta bar ston pa dang / /ji ltar rlung ni mnyam pa nyid du len pa ltar/ /rnam rtog rmongs pa'i rgya mtsho bsrings pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /pad+ma'i dbang phyug sku ni gser gyi mdog /dri chu'i ngo bo shin tu

snang mdzad dang / /ro ni rdo rje dbang phyug rdo rje phyag /lha gsum dag gi cho ga shes par bya/ /ha zhes pa yis kha dog 'phrog /ho zhes pa yis dri med cing / /dpa' bo hrIHyis bcom pa yi/ /de dag rim bzhin shes par bya/ /pad+ma'i gdan ni rtag tu

mnyam pa nyid du bsgom/ /mthe bo rdo rje srin lag gnyis kun ldan pas/ /sngags gsum yi ge gsum gyis cho ga bsrung bar bya/ /gang zhes ro 'di myang pa blo ldan rnal 'byor ma'o/ /rdo rje chu yi khyad par ni/ /nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /'dzag
